h4.p: [03] 1^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^M3.0001^ea^ ^a^V3.0001^ea^ ^a^P2.0214^ea^ ^a^T3.0001^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa sakkesu viharati devadaha.m naama sakyaana.m nigamo. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``santi, bhikkhave, eke sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- `ya.m ki~ncaaya.m purisapuggalo pa.tisa.mvedeti sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa, sabba.m ta.m pubbekatahetu. iti puraa.naana.m kammaana.m tapasaa byantiibhaavaa, navaana.m kammaana.m akara.naa, aayati.m anavassavo; aayati.m anavassavaa kammakkhayo; kammakkhayaa ^a^V3.0002^ea^ dukkhakkhayo; dukkhakkhayaa vedanaakkhayo; vedanaakkhayaa sabba.m dukkha.m nijji.n.na.m bhavissatii'ti. eva.mvaadino, bhikkhave, niga.n.thaa.

[03] ``eva.mvaadaaha.m ^a^T3.0002^ea^, bhikkhave, niga.n.the upasa"nkamitvaa eva.m vadaami -- `sacca.m kira tumhe, aavuso niga.n.thaa, eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- ya.m ki~ncaaya.m purisapuggalo pa.tisa.mvedeti sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa, sabba.m ta.m pubbekatahetu. iti puraa.naana.m kammaana.m tapasaa byantiibhaavaa, navaana.m kammaana.m akara.naa, aayati.m anavassavo; aayati.m anavassavaa kammakkhayo; kammakkhayaa dukkhakkhayo; dukkhakkhayaa vedanaakkhayo; vedanaakkhayaa sabba.m dukkha.m nijji.n.na.m bhavissatii'ti? te ca me, bhikkhave, niga.n.thaa eva.m pu.t.thaa `aamaa'ti pa.tijaananti.
[03] ``tyaaha.m ^a^M3.0002^ea^ eva.m vadaami -- `ki.m pana tumhe, aavuso niga.n.thaa, jaanaatha -- ahuvamheva maya.m pubbe, na naahuvamhaa'ti? `no hida.m, aavuso'.
[03] ```ki.m pana tumhe, aavuso niga.n.thaa, jaanaatha -- akaramheva maya.m pubbe paapakamma.m, na naakaramhaa'ti? `no hida.m, aavuso'.
[03] ```ki.m pana tumhe, aavuso niga.n.thaa, jaanaatha -- evaruupa.m vaa evaruupa.m vaa paapakamma.m akaramhaa'ti? `no hida.m, aavuso'.

[03] ```ki.m pana tumhe, aavuso niga.n.thaa, jaanaatha -- ettaka.m vaa dukkha.m nijji.n.na.m, ettaka.m vaa dukkha.m nijjiiretabba.m, ettakamhi vaa dukkhe nijji.n.ne sabba.m dukkha.m nijji.n.na.m bhavissatii'ti? `no ^a^P2.0215^ea^ hida.m, aavuso'.
[03] ```ki.m pana tumhe, aavuso niga.n.thaa, jaanaatha -- di.t.theva dhamme akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaana.m, kusalaana.m dhammaana.m upasampada'nti? `no hida.m, aavuso'.

[03] 2^b^.^eb^ ``iti kira tumhe, aavuso niga.n.thaa, na jaanaatha -- ahuvamheva maya.m ^a^T3.0003^ea^ pubbe, na naahuvamhaati ^a^V3.0003^ea^, na jaanaatha -- akaramheva maya.m pubbe paapakamma.m, na naakaramhaati, na jaanaatha -- evaruupa.m vaa evaruupa.m vaa paapakamma.m akaramhaati, na jaanaatha -- ettaka.m vaa dukkha.m nijji.n.na.m, ettaka.m vaa dukkha.m nijjiiretabba.m, ettakamhi vaa dukkhe nijji.n.ne sabba.m dukkha.m nijji.n.na.m bhavissatiiti, na jaanaatha -- di.t.theva dhamme akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaana.m, kusalaana.m dhammaana.m upasampada.m; eva.m sante aayasmantaana.m niga.n.thaana.m na kallamassa veyyaakara.naaya -- ya.m ki~ncaaya.m purisapuggalo pa.tisa.mvedeti sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa, sabba.m ta.m pubbekatahetu. iti puraa.naana.m kammaana.m tapasaa byantiibhaavaa, navaana.m kammaana.m akara.naa, aayati.m anavassavo; aayati.m anavassavaa kammakkhayo; kammakkhayaa dukkhakkhayo; dukkhakkhayaa vedanaakkhayo; vedanaakkhayaa sabba.m dukkha.m nijji.n.na.m bhavissatii''ti.

[03] ``sace pana tumhe, aavuso niga.n.thaa, jaaneyyaatha -- ahuvamheva maya.m pubbe, na naahuvamhaati, jaaneyyaatha -- akaramheva maya.m pubbe paapakamma.m, na naakaramhaati, jaaneyyaatha -- evaruupa.m vaa evaruupa.m vaa paapakamma.m akaramhaati, jaaneyyaatha -- ettaka.m vaa dukkha.m nijji.n.na.m, ettaka.m vaa dukkha.m nijjiiretabba.m, ettakamhi vaa dukkhe nijji.n.ne sabba.m dukkha.m nijji.n.na.m bhavissatiiti, jaaneyyaatha -- di.t.theva dhamme akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaana.m, kusalaana.m dhammaana.m ^a^M3.0003^ea^ upasampada.m; eva.m sante aayasmantaana.m niga.n.thaana.m kallamassa veyyaakara.naaya -- ya.m ^a^T3.0004^ea^ ki~ncaaya.m purisapuggalo pa.tisa.mvedeti sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa, sabba.m ta.m pubbekatahetu. iti puraa.naana.m kammaana.m ^a^P2.0216^ea^ tapasaa byantiibhaavaa, navaana.m kammaana.m akara.naa, aayati.m anavassavo; aayati.m anavassavaa kammakkhayo; kammakkhayaa dukkhakkhayo; dukkhakkhayaa vedanaakkhayo; vedanaakkhayaa sabba.m dukkha.m nijji.n.na.m bhavissatii''ti.

[03] 3^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, aavuso niga.n.thaa, puriso sallena viddho assa savisena gaa.lhuupalepanena {gaa.lhapalepanena (ka0)}; so sallassapi vedhanahetu {vedanaahetu (sii0 pii0 ka0)} dukkhaa tibbaa {tippaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} ka.tukaa vedanaa vediyeyya. tassa mittaamaccaa ~naatisaalohitaa bhisakka.m sallakatta.m upa.t.thaapeyyu.m. tassa so bhisakko sallakatto satthena va.namukha.m parikanteyya; so satthenapi va.namukhassa parikantanahetu dukkhaa tibbaa ka.tukaa vedanaa vediyeyya. tassa so bhisakko sallakatto esaniyaa salla.m eseyya; so esaniyaapi sallassa esanaahetu dukkhaa tibbaa ka.tukaa vedanaa vediyeyya ^a^V3.0004^ea^. tassa so bhisakko sallakatto salla.m abbuheyya {abbuyheyya (sii0), abbhuu.nheyya (syaa0 ka.m0)}; so sallassapi abbuhanahetu {abbuyhanahetu (sii0), abbhuu.nhanahetu (syaa0 ka.m0)} dukkhaa tibbaa ka.tukaa vedanaa vediyeyya. tassa so bhisakko sallakatto agada"ngaara.m va.namukhe odaheyya; so agada"ngaarassapi va.namukhe odahanahetu dukkhaa tibbaa ka.tukaa vedanaa vediyeyya. so aparena samayena ruu.lhena va.nena sa~nchavinaa arogo assa sukhii serii saya.mvasii yena kaama"ngamo. tassa evamassa -- aha.m kho pubbe sallena viddho ahosi.m savisena gaa.lhuupalepanena. soha.m ^a^T3.0005^ea^ sallassapi vedhanahetu dukkhaa tibbaa ka.tukaa vedanaa vediyi.m. tassa me mittaamaccaa ~naatisaalohitaa bhisakka.m sallakatta.m upa.t.thapesu.m. tassa me so bhisakko sallakatto satthena va.namukha.m parikanti; soha.m satthenapi va.namukhassa parikantanahetu dukkhaa tibbaa ka.tukaa vedanaa vediyi.m. tassa me so bhisakko sallakatto esaniyaa salla.m esi; so aha.m esaniyaapi sallassa esanaahetu dukkhaa tibbaa ka.tukaa vedanaa vediyi.m. tassa me so bhisakko ^a^M3.0004^ea^ sallakatto salla.m abbuhi {abbuyhi (sii0), abbhuu.nhi (syaa0 ka.m0)}; soha.m sallassapi abbuhanahetu dukkhaa tibbaa ka.tukaa vedanaa vediyi.m. tassa me so bhisakko sallakatto agada"ngaara.m va.namukhe odahi; soha.m agada"ngaarassapi va.namukhe odahanahetu dukkhaa tibbaa ka.tukaa vedanaa vediyi.m. somhi ^a^P2.0217^ea^ etarahi ruu.lhena va.nena sa~nchavinaa arogo sukhii serii saya.mvasii yena kaama"ngamo''ti.

[03] ``evameva kho, aavuso niga.n.thaa, sace tumhe jaaneyyaatha -- ahuvamheva maya.m pubbe, na naahuvamhaati, jaaneyyaatha -- akaramheva maya.m pubbe paapakamma.m, na naakaramhaati, jaaneyyaatha -- evaruupa.m vaa evaruupa.m vaa paapakamma.m akaramhaati, jaaneyyaatha -- ettaka.m vaa dukkha.m nijji.n.na.m, ettaka.m vaa dukkha.m nijjiiretabba.m, ettakamhi vaa dukkhe nijji.n.ne sabba.m dukkha.m nijji.n.na.m bhavissatiiti, jaaneyyaatha -- di.t.theva dhamme akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaana.m, kusalaana.m dhammaana.m upasampada.m; eva.m sante aayasmantaana.m niga.n.thaana.m kallamassa veyyaakara.naaya -- ya.m ^a^T3.0006^ea^ ki~ncaaya.m purisapuggalo pa.tisa.mvedeti sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa, sabba.m ta.m pubbekatahetu. iti puraa.naana.m kammaana.m tapasaa byantiibhaavaa, navaana.m kammaana.m akara.naa, aayati.m anavassavo; aayati.m anavassavaa kammakkhayo; kammakkhayaa dukkhakkhayo; dukkhakkhayaa vedanaakkhayo; vedanaakkhayaa sabba.m dukkha.m nijji.n.na.m bhavissatii''ti.

[03] ``yasmaa ca kho tumhe, aavuso niga.n.thaa, na jaanaatha -- ahuvamheva maya.m pubbe, na naahuvamhaati, na jaanaatha -- akaramheva maya.m pubbe paapakamma.m, na naakaramhaati, na jaanaatha -- evaruupa.m vaa evaruupa.m vaa paapakamma.m akaramhaati, na jaanaatha -- ettaka.m vaa dukkha.m nijji.n.na.m, ettaka.m ^a^V3.0005^ea^ vaa dukkha.m nijjiiretabba.m, ettakamhi vaa dukkhe nijji.n.ne sabba.m dukkha.m nijji.n.na.m bhavissatiiti, na jaanaatha -- di.t.theva dhamme akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaana.m, kusalaana.m dhammaana.m upasampada.m; tasmaa aayasmantaana.m niga.n.thaana.m na kallamassa veyyaakara.naaya -- ya.m ki~ncaaya.m purisapuggalo pa.tisa.mvedeti sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa, sabba.m ta.m pubbekatahetu. iti puraa.naana.m kammaana.m tapasaa byantiibhaavaa, navaana.m kammaana.m akara.naa, aayati.m anavassavo; aayati.m anavassavaa kammakkhayo; kammakkhayaa dukkhakkhayo; dukkhakkhayaa vedanaakkhayo; vedanaakkhayaa sabba.m dukkha.m nijji.n.na.m bhavissatii''ti.

[03] 4^b^.^eb^ ``eva.m ^a^M3.0005^ea^ vutte, bhikkhave, te niga.n.thaa ma.m etadavocu.m -- `niga.n.tho ^a^P2.0218^ea^, aavuso, naa.taputto {naathaputto (sii0)} sabba~n~nuu sabbadassaavii, aparisesa.m ~naa.nadassana.m pa.tijaanaati ^a^T3.0007^ea^. carato ca me ti.t.thato ca suttassa ca jaagarassa ca satata.m samita.m ~naa.nadassana.m paccupa.t.thita'nti. so evamaaha -- `atthi kho vo, aavuso niga.n.thaa, pubbeva paapakamma.m kata.m, ta.m imaaya ka.tukaaya dukkarakaarikaaya nijjiiretha, ya.m panettha etarahi kaayena sa.mvutaa vaacaaya sa.mvutaa manasaa sa.mvutaa ta.m aayati.m paapakammassa akara.na.m. iti puraa.naana.m kammaana.m tapasaa byantiibhaavaa, navaana.m kammaana.m akara.naa, aayati.m anavassavo; aayati.m anavassavaa kammakkhayo; kammakkhayaa dukkhakkhayo; dukkhakkhayaa vedanaakkhayo; vedanaakkhayaa sabba.m dukkha.m nijji.n.na.m bhavissatii'ti. ta~nca panamhaaka.m ruccati ceva khamati ca, tena camhaa attamanaa''ti.

[03] 5^b^.^eb^ ``eva.m vutte aha.m, bhikkhave, te niga.n.the etadavoca.m -- `pa~nca kho ime, aavuso niga.n.thaa, dhammaa di.t.theva dhamme dvidhaavipaakaa. katame pa~nca? saddhaa, ruci, anussavo, aakaaraparivitakko, di.t.thinijjhaanakkhanti -- ime kho, aavuso niga.n.thaa, pa~nca dhammaa di.t.theva dhamme dvidhaavipaakaa. tatraayasmantaana.m niga.n.thaana.m kaa atiita.mse satthari saddhaa, kaa ruci, ko anussavo, ko aakaaraparivitakko, kaa di.t.thinijjhaanakkhantii'ti. eva.mvaadii {eva.mvaadiisu (ka0)} kho aha.m, bhikkhave, niga.n.thesu na ka~nci {ki~nci (sii0 pii0 ka0)} sahadhammika.m vaadapa.tihaara.m samanupassaami.

[03] ``puna caparaaha.m {puna ca panaaha.m (sii0 pii0 ka0)}, bhikkhave, te niga.n.the eva.m vadaami -- `ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, aavuso niga.n.thaa. yasmi.m vo samaye tibbo {tippo (pii0)} upakkamo hoti ^a^T3.0008^ea^ tibba.m padhaana.m, tibbaa tasmi.m samaye opakkamikaa dukkhaa tibbaa ka.tukaa vedanaa vediyetha; yasmi.m pana vo samaye na tibbo upakkamo ^a^V3.0006^ea^ hoti na tibba.m padhaana.m, na tibbaa tasmi.m samaye opakkamikaa dukkhaa tibbaa ka.tukaa vedanaa vediyethaa'ti? `yasmi.m no, aavuso gotama, samaye tibbo upakkamo hoti tibba.m padhaana.m, tibbaa tasmi.m samaye opakkamikaa dukkhaa tibbaa ka.tukaa vedanaa vediyaama; yasmi.m pana no samaye ^a^P2.0219^ea^ na tibbo upakkamo hoti na tibba.m padhaana.m, na tibbaa tasmi.m samaye opakkamikaa dukkhaa tibbaa ka.tukaa vedanaa vediyaamaa'''ti.

[03] 6^b^.^eb^ ``iti ^a^M3.0006^ea^ kira, aavuso niga.n.thaa, yasmi.m vo samaye tibbo upakkamo hoti tibba.m padhaana.m, tibbaa tasmi.m samaye opakkamikaa dukkhaa tibbaa ka.tukaa vedanaa vediyetha; yasmi.m pana vo samaye na tibbo upakkamo hoti na tibba.m padhaana.m, na tibbaa tasmi.m samaye opakkamikaa dukkhaa tibbaa ka.tukaa vedanaa vediyetha. eva.m sante aayasmantaana.m niga.n.thaana.m na kallamassa veyyaakara.naaya -- ya.m ki~ncaaya.m purisapuggalo pa.tisa.mvedeti sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa, sabba.m ta.m pubbekatahetu. iti puraa.naana.m kammaana.m tapasaa byantiibhaavaa, navaana.m kammaana.m akara.naa, aayati.m anavassavo; aayati.m anavassavaa kammakkhayo; kammakkhayaa dukkhakkhayo; dukkhakkhayaa vedanaakkhayo ^a^T3.0009^ea^; vedanaakkhayaa sabba.m dukkha.m nijji.n.na.m bhavissatiiti. sace, aavuso niga.n.thaa, yasmi.m vo samaye tibbo upakkamo hoti tibba.m padhaana.m, na tibbaa tasmi.m samaye opakkamikaa dukkhaa tibbaa ka.tukaa vedanaa vediyetha; yasmi.m pana vo samaye na tibbo upakkamo hoti na tibba.m padhaana.m, tibbaa tasmi.m samaye opakkamikaa dukkhaa tibbaa ka.tukaa vedanaa vediyetha {padhaana.m, ti.t.theyyeva tasmi.m samaye... vedanaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}; eva.m sante aayasmantaana.m niga.n.thaana.m kallamassa veyyaakara.naaya -- ya.m ki~ncaaya.m purisapuggalo pa.tisa.mvedeti sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa, sabba.m ta.m pubbekatahetu. iti puraa.naana.m kammaana.m tapasaa byantiibhaavaa, navaana.m kammaana.m akara.naa, aayati.m anavassavo; aayati.m anavassavaa kammakkhayo; kammakkhayaa dukkhakkhayo; dukkhakkhayaa vedanaakkhayo; vedanaakkhayaa sabba.m dukkha.m nijji.n.na.m bhavissatii''ti.

[03] ```yasmaa ca kho, aavuso niga.n.thaa, yasmi.m vo samaye tibbo upakkamo hoti tibba.m padhaana.m, tibbaa tasmi.m samaye opakkamikaa dukkhaa tibbaa ka.tukaa vedanaa vediyetha; yasmi.m pana vo samaye na tibbo upakkamo hoti na tibba.m padhaana.m, na tibbaa tasmi.m samaye opakkamikaa dukkhaa tibbaa ka.tukaa vedanaa vediyetha; te tumhe saama.myeva opakkamikaa dukkhaa ^a^V3.0007^ea^ tibbaa ka.tukaa vedanaa vedayamaanaa avijjaa a~n~naa.naa sammohaa vipaccetha ^a^P2.0220^ea^ -- ya.m ki~ncaaya.m purisapuggalo pa.tisa.mvedeti sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa, sabba.m ta.m pubbekatahetu. iti puraa.naana.m kammaana.m ^a^T3.0010^ea^ tapasaa byantiibhaavaa, navaana.m kammaana.m akara.naa, aayati.m anavassavo; aayati.m anavassavaa kammakkhayo; kammakkhayaa dukkhakkhayo; dukkhakkhayaa vedanaakkhayo ^a^M3.0007^ea^; vedanaakkhayaa sabba.m dukkha.m nijji.n.na.m bhavissatii'ti. eva.mvaadiipi {eva.mvaadiisupi (ka0)} kho aha.m, bhikkhave, niga.n.thesu na ka~nci sahadhammika.m vaadapa.tihaara.m samanupassaami.

[03] 7^b^.^eb^ ``puna caparaaha.m, bhikkhave, te niga.n.the eva.m vadaami -- `ta.m ki.m ma~n~nathaavuso niga.n.thaa, yamida.m kamma.m di.t.thadhammavedaniiya.m ta.m upakkamena vaa padhaanena vaa samparaayavedaniiya.m hotuuti labbhameta'nti? `no hida.m, aavuso'. `ya.m panida.m kamma.m samparaayavedaniiya.m ta.m upakkamena vaa padhaanena vaa di.t.thadhammavedaniiya.m hotuuti labbhameta'nti? `no hida.m, aavuso'. `ta.m ki.m ma~n~nathaavuso niga.n.thaa, yamida.m kamma.m sukhavedaniiya.m ta.m upakkamena vaa padhaanena vaa dukkhavedaniiya.m hotuuti labbhameta'nti? `no hida.m, aavuso'. `ya.m panida.m kamma.m dukkhavedaniiya.m ta.m upakkamena vaa padhaanena vaa sukhavedaniiya.m hotuuti labbhameta'nti? `no hida.m, aavuso'. `ta.m ki.m ma~n~nathaavuso niga.n.thaa, yamida.m kamma.m paripakkavedaniiya.m ta.m upakkamena vaa padhaanena vaa aparipakkavedaniiya.m hotuuti labbhameta'nti? `no hida.m, aavuso'. `ya.m panida.m kamma.m aparipakkavedaniiya.m ta.m upakkamena vaa padhaanena vaa paripakkavedaniiya.m hotuuti labbhameta'nti? `no hida.m, aavuso'. `ta.m ki.m ma~n~nathaavuso niga.n.thaa, yamida.m kamma.m ^a^P2.0221^ea^ bahuvedaniiya.m ta.m upakkamena vaa padhaanena vaa appavedaniiya.m ^a^T3.0011^ea^ hotuuti labbhameta'nti? `no hida.m, aavuso'. `ya.m panida.m kamma.m appavedaniiya.m ta.m upakkamena vaa padhaanena vaa bahuvedaniiya.m hotuuti labbhameta'nti? `no hida.m, aavuso'. `ta.m ki.m ma~n~nathaavuso niga.n.thaa, yamida.m kamma.m savedaniiya.m ta.m upakkamena vaa padhaanena vaa avedaniiya.m hotuuti labbhameta'nti? `no hida.m, aavuso'. `ya.m panida.m kamma.m avedaniiya.m ta.m upakkamena vaa padhaanena vaa savedaniiya.m hotuuti labbhameta'nti? `no hida.m, aavuso'.

[03] 8^b^.^eb^ ``iti kira, aavuso niga.n.thaa, yamida.m kamma.m di.t.thadhammavedaniiya.m ta.m upakkamena vaa padhaanena vaa samparaayavedaniiya.m hotuuti alabbhameta.m, ya.m panida.m kamma.m samparaayavedaniiya.m ta.m upakkamena vaa padhaanena vaa di.t.thadhammavedaniiya.m hotuuti alabbhameta.m, yamida.m kamma.m sukhavedaniiya.m ta.m ^a^V3.0008^ea^ upakkamena vaa padhaanena vaa dukkhavedaniiya.m hotuuti alabbhameta.m, yamida.m kamma.m dukkhavedaniiya.m ^a^M3.0008^ea^ ta.m upakkamena vaa padhaanena vaa sukhavedaniiya.m hotuuti alabbhameta.m, yamida.m kamma.m paripakkavedaniiya.m ta.m upakkamena vaa padhaanena vaa aparipakkavedaniiya.m hotuuti alabbhameta.m, yamida.m kamma.m aparipakkavedaniiya.m ta.m upakkamena vaa padhaanena vaa paripakkavedaniiya.m hotuuti alabbhameta.m, yamida.m kamma.m bahuvedaniiya.m ta.m upakkamena vaa padhaanena vaa appavedaniiya.m hotuuti alabbhameta.m, yamida.m kamma.m appavedaniiya.m ta.m upakkamena vaa padhaanena vaa bahuvedaniiya.m hotuuti alabbhameta.m, yamida.m kamma.m savedaniiya.m ta.m upakkamena vaa padhaanena vaa ^a^T3.0012^ea^ avedaniiya.m hotuuti alabbhameta.m, yamida.m kamma.m avedaniiya.m ta.m upakkamena vaa padhaanena vaa savedaniiya.m hotuuti alabbhameta.m; eva.m sante aayasmantaana.m niga.n.thaana.m aphalo upakkamo ^a^P2.0222^ea^ hoti, aphala.m padhaana.m''.
[03] ``eva.mvaadii, bhikkhave, niga.n.thaa. eva.mvaadiina.m, bhikkhave, niga.n.thaana.m dasa sahadhammikaa vaadaanuvaadaa gaarayha.m .thaana.m aagacchanti.

[03] 9^b^.^eb^ ``sace, bhikkhave, sattaa pubbekatahetu sukhadukkha.m pa.tisa.mvedenti; addhaa, bhikkhave, niga.n.thaa pubbe dukka.takammakaarino ya.m etarahi evaruupaa dukkhaa tibbaa ka.tukaa vedanaa vediyanti. sace, bhikkhave, sattaa issaranimmaanahetu sukhadukkha.m pa.tisa.mvedenti; addhaa, bhikkhave, niga.n.thaa paapakena issarena nimmitaa ya.m etarahi evaruupaa dukkhaa tibbaa ka.tukaa vedanaa vediyanti. sace, bhikkhave, sattaa sa"ngatibhaavahetu sukhadukkha.m pa.tisa.mvedenti; addhaa, bhikkhave, niga.n.thaa paapasa"ngatikaa ya.m etarahi evaruupaa dukkhaa tibbaa ka.tukaa vedanaa vediyanti. sace, bhikkhave, sattaa abhijaatihetu sukhadukkha.m pa.tisa.mvedenti; addhaa, bhikkhave, niga.n.thaa paapaabhijaatikaa ya.m etarahi evaruupaa dukkhaa tibbaa ka.tukaa vedanaa vediyanti. sace, bhikkhave, sattaa di.t.thadhammuupakkamahetu sukhadukkha.m pa.tisa.mvedenti; addhaa, bhikkhave, niga.n.thaa evaruupaa di.t.thadhammuupakkamaa ya.m etarahi evaruupaa dukkhaa tibbaa ka.tukaa vedanaa vediyanti.

[03] ``sace, bhikkhave, sattaa pubbekatahetu sukhadukkha.m pa.tisa.mvedenti, gaarayhaa niga.n.thaa; no ce sattaa pubbekatahetu sukhadukkha.m ^a^T3.0013^ea^ pa.tisa.mvedenti, gaarayhaa niga.n.thaa. sace, bhikkhave, sattaa issaranimmaanahetu ^a^V3.0009^ea^ sukhadukkha.m pa.tisa.mvedenti, gaarayhaa niga.n.thaa; no ce sattaa issaranimmaanahetu sukhadukkha.m pa.tisa.mvedenti, gaarayhaa niga.n.thaa. sace, bhikkhave, sattaa sa"ngatibhaavahetu ^a^M3.0009^ea^ sukhadukkha.m pa.tisa.mvedenti, gaarayhaa niga.n.thaa; no ce sattaa sa"ngatibhaavahetu sukhadukkha.m pa.tisa.mvedenti, gaarayhaa niga.n.thaa. sace, bhikkhave, sattaa abhijaatihetu sukhadukkha.m pa.tisa.mvedenti, gaarayhaa niga.n.thaa; no ce sattaa abhijaatihetu sukhadukkha.m pa.tisa.mvedenti, gaarayhaa niga.n.thaa. sace, bhikkhave, sattaa di.t.thadhammuupakkamahetu sukhadukkha.m pa.tisa.mvedenti, gaarayhaa ^a^P2.0223^ea^ niga.n.thaa; no ce sattaa di.t.thadhammuupakkamahetu sukhadukkha.m pa.tisa.mvedenti, gaarayhaa niga.n.thaa. eva.mvaadii, bhikkhave, niga.n.thaa. eva.mvaadiina.m, bhikkhave, niga.n.thaana.m ime dasa sahadhammikaa vaadaanuvaadaa gaarayha.m .thaana.m aagacchanti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, aphalo upakkamo hoti, aphala.m padhaana.m.

[03] 10^b^.^eb^ ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, saphalo upakkamo hoti, saphala.m padhaana.m? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na heva anaddhabhuuta.m attaana.m dukkhena addhabhaaveti, dhammika~nca sukha.m na pariccajati, tasmi~nca sukhe anadhimucchito hoti. so eva.m pajaanaati -- `imassa kho me dukkhanidaanassa sa"nkhaara.m padahato sa"nkhaarappadhaanaa viraago hoti, imassa pana me dukkhanidaanassa ajjhupekkhato upekkha.m bhaavayato viraago hotii'ti. so yassa hi khvaassa {yassa kho panassa (sii0), yassa khvaassa (pii0)} ^a^T3.0014^ea^ dukkhanidaanassa sa"nkhaara.m padahato sa"nkhaarappadhaanaa viraago hoti, sa"nkhaara.m tattha padahati. yassa panassa dukkhanidaanassa ajjhupekkhato upekkha.m bhaavayato viraago hoti, upekkha.m tattha bhaaveti. tassa tassa dukkhanidaanassa sa"nkhaara.m padahato sa"nkhaarappadhaanaa viraago hoti -- evampissa ta.m dukkha.m nijji.n.na.m hoti. tassa tassa dukkhanidaanassa ajjhupekkhato upekkha.m bhaavayato viraago hoti -- evampissa ta.m dukkha.m nijji.n.na.m hoti.

[03] 11^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, puriso itthiyaa saaratto pa.tibaddhacitto tibbacchando tibbaapekkho. so ta.m itthi.m passeyya a~n~nena purisena saddhi.m santi.t.thanti.m sallapanti.m sa~njagghanti.m sa.mhasanti.m. ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, api nu tassa purisassa amu.m itthi.m disvaa a~n~nena purisena saddhi.m santi.t.thanti.m sallapanti.m sa~njagghanti.m sa.mhasanti.m uppajjeyyu.m ^a^V3.0010^ea^ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassuupaayaasaa''ti? ``eva.m, bhante''. ``ta.m kissa hetu''? ``amu hi, bhante, puriso amussaa itthiyaa saaratto pa.tibaddhacitto tibbacchando tibbaapekkho ^a^P2.0224^ea^. tasmaa ta.m itthi.m disvaa a~n~nena purisena saddhi.m santi.t.thanti.m sallapanti.m sa~njagghanti.m ^a^M3.0010^ea^ sa.mhasanti.m uppajjeyyu.m sokaparidevadukkhadomanassuupaayaasaa''ti. ``atha kho, bhikkhave, tassa purisassa evamassa -- `aha.m kho amussaa itthiyaa saaratto pa.tibaddhacitto tibbacchando tibbaapekkho. tassa me amu.m itthi.m disvaa a~n~nena purisena saddhi.m santi.t.thanti.m sallapanti.m sa~njagghanti.m sa.mhasanti.m ^a^T3.0015^ea^ uppajjanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassuupaayaasaa. ya.mnuunaaha.m yo me amussaa itthiyaa chandaraago ta.m pajaheyya'nti. so yo amussaa itthiyaa chandaraago ta.m pajaheyya. so ta.m itthi.m passeyya aparena samayena a~n~nena purisena saddhi.m santi.t.thanti.m sallapanti.m sa~njagghanti.m sa.mhasanti.m. ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, api nu tassa purisassa amu.m itthi.m disvaa a~n~nena purisena saddhi.m santi.t.thanti.m sallapanti.m sa~njagghanti.m sa.mhasanti.m uppajjeyyu.m sokaparidevadukkhadomanassuupaayaasaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``ta.m kissa hetu''? ``amu hi, bhante, puriso amussaa itthiyaa viraago. tasmaa ta.m itthi.m disvaa a~n~nena purisena saddhi.m santi.t.thanti.m sallapanti.m sa~njagghanti.m sa.mhasanti.m na uppajjeyyu.m sokaparidevadukkhadomanassuupaayaasaa''ti.

[03] ``evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na heva anaddhabhuuta.m attaana.m dukkhena addhabhaaveti, dhammika~nca sukha.m na pariccajati, tasmi~nca sukhe anadhimucchito hoti. so eva.m pajaanaati -- `imassa kho me dukkhanidaanassa sa"nkhaara.m padahato sa"nkhaarappadhaanaa viraago hoti, imassa pana me dukkhanidaanassa ajjhupekkhato upekkha.m bhaavayato viraago hotii'ti. so yassa hi khvaassa dukkhanidaanassa sa"nkhaara.m padahato sa"nkhaarappadhaanaa viraago hoti, sa"nkhaara.m tattha padahati; yassa panassa dukkhanidaanassa ajjhupekkhato upekkha.m bhaavayato viraago hoti, upekkha.m tattha bhaaveti. tassa tassa dukkhanidaanassa sa"nkhaara.m padahato ^a^T3.0016^ea^ sa"nkhaarappadhaanaa viraago hoti -- evampissa ta.m dukkha.m nijji.n.na.m hoti ^a^P2.0225^ea^. tassa tassa dukkhanidaanassa ajjhupekkhato upekkha.m bhaavayato viraago hoti -- evampissa ta.m dukkha.m nijji.n.na.m hoti. evampi, bhikkhave, saphalo upakkamo hoti, saphala.m padhaana.m.

[03] 12^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `yathaasukha.m kho me viharato akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, kusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti; dukkhaaya pana me attaana.m padahato akusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti, kusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti. ya.mnuunaaha.m dukkhaaya attaana.m padaheyya'nti. so dukkhaaya attaana.m padahati. tassa dukkhaaya attaana.m padahato akusalaa ^a^M3.0011^ea^ dhammaa ^a^V3.0011^ea^ parihaayanti kusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti. so na aparena samayena dukkhaaya attaana.m padahati. ta.m kissa hetu? yassa hi so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu atthaaya dukkhaaya attaana.m padaheyya svaassa attho abhinipphanno hoti. tasmaa na aparena samayena dukkhaaya attaana.m padahati. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, usukaaro tejana.m dviisu alaatesu aataapeti paritaapeti uju.m karoti kammaniya.m. yato kho, bhikkhave, usukaarassa tejana.m dviisu alaatesu aataapita.m hoti paritaapita.m uju.m kata.m {uju.m kata.m hoti (sii0)} kammaniya.m, na so ta.m aparena samayena usukaaro tejana.m dviisu alaatesu aataapeti paritaapeti uju.m karoti kammaniya.m. ta.m kissa hetu? yassa hi so, bhikkhave, atthaaya usukaaro tejana.m dviisu alaatesu aataapeyya paritaapeyya uju.m ^a^T3.0017^ea^ kareyya kammaniya.m svaassa attho abhinipphanno hoti. tasmaa na aparena samayena usukaaro tejana.m dviisu alaatesu aataapeti paritaapeti uju.m karoti kammaniya.m. evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `yathaasukha.m kho me viharato akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, kusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti; dukkhaaya pana me attaana.m padahato akusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti, kusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti. ya.mnuunaaha.m dukkhaaya attaana.m padaheyya'nti. so dukkhaaya attaana.m padahati. tassa dukkhaaya attaana.m padahato akusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti, kusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti. so na aparena samayena dukkhaaya ^a^P2.0226^ea^ attaana.m padahati. ta.m kissa hetu? yassa hi so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu atthaaya dukkhaaya attaana.m padaheyya svaassa attho abhinipphanno hoti. tasmaa na aparena samayena dukkhaaya attaana.m padahati. evampi, bhikkhave, saphalo upakkamo hoti, saphala.m padhaana.m.

[03] 13^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, idha tathaagato loke uppajjati araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu anuttaro purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa. so ima.m loka.m sadevaka.m samaaraka.m sabrahmaka.m sassama.nabraahma.ni.m paja.m sadevamanussa.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa pavedeti. so dhamma.m deseti aadikalyaa.na.m majjhekalyaa.na.m pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m saattha.m sabya~njana.m, kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m ^a^M3.0012^ea^ brahmacariya.m pakaaseti. ta.m dhamma.m su.naati gahapati vaa gahapatiputto ^a^T3.0018^ea^ vaa a~n~natarasmi.m vaa kule paccaajaato. so ta.m dhamma.m sutvaa tathaagate saddha.m pa.tilabhati. so tena saddhaapa.tilaabhena samannaagato iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `sambaadho gharaavaaso rajaapatho, abbhokaaso pabbajjaa. nayida.m sukara.m agaara.m ajjhaavasataa ekantaparipu.n.na.m ekantaparisuddha.m sa"nkhalikhita.m brahmacariya.m caritu.m. ya.mnuunaaha.m kesamassu.m ^a^V3.0012^ea^ ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajeyya'nti. so aparena samayena appa.m vaa bhogakkhandha.m pahaaya mahanta.m vaa bhogakkhandha.m pahaaya, appa.m vaa ~naatipariva.t.ta.m pahaaya mahanta.m vaa ~naatipariva.t.ta.m pahaaya kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajati.

[03] 14^b^.^eb^ ``so eva.m pabbajito samaano bhikkhuuna.m sikkhaasaajiivasamaapanno paa.naatipaata.m pahaaya paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato hoti nihitada.n.do nihitasattho, lajjii dayaapanno sabbapaa.nabhuutahitaanukampii viharati. adinnaadaana.m pahaaya adinnaadaanaa pa.tivirato hoti dinnaadaayii dinnapaa.tika"nkhii, athenena sucibhuutena attanaa viharati. abrahmacariya.m pahaaya brahmacaarii hoti aaraacaarii virato methunaa gaamadhammaa. musaavaada.m pahaaya musaavaadaa pa.tivirato hoti saccavaadii saccasandho theto paccayiko avisa.mvaadako lokassa. pisu.na.m vaaca.m pahaaya pisu.naaya vaacaaya pa.tivirato hoti; ito sutvaa na amutra akkhaataa imesa.m bhedaaya, amutra vaa sutvaa na imesa.m akkhaataa amuusa.m bhedaaya -- iti bhinnaana.m ^a^T3.0019^ea^ vaa sandhaataa sahitaana.m vaa anuppadaataa samaggaaraamo samaggarato samagganandii samaggakara.ni.m vaaca.m bhaasitaa hoti. pharusa.m vaaca.m pahaaya pharusaaya vaacaaya pa.tivirato hoti; yaa saa vaacaa nelaa ka.n.nasukhaa pemaniiyaa hadaya"ngamaa porii bahujanakantaa bahujanamanaapaa tathaaruupi.m vaaca.m bhaasitaa hoti. samphappalaapa.m pahaaya samphappalaapaa pa.tivirato hoti kaalavaadii bhuutavaadii atthavaadii dhammavaadii vinayavaadii, nidhaanavati.m vaaca.m bhaasitaa kaalena saapadesa.m pariyantavati.m atthasa.mhita.m. so biijagaamabhuutagaamasamaarambhaa pa.tivirato hoti. ekabhattiko hoti rattuuparato virato vikaalabhojanaa. naccagiitavaaditavisuukadassanaa pa.tivirato hoti. maalaagandhavilepanadhaara.nama.n.danavibhuusana.t.thaanaa ^a^M3.0013^ea^ pa.tivirato hoti. uccaasayanamahaasayanaa pa.tivirato hoti. jaataruuparajatapa.tiggaha.naa pa.tivirato hoti. aamakadha~n~napa.tiggaha.naa pa.tivirato hoti. aamakama.msapa.tiggaha.naa pa.tivirato hoti. itthikumaarikapa.tiggaha.naa pa.tivirato hoti. daasidaasapa.tiggaha.naa pa.tivirato hoti. aje.lakapa.tiggaha.naa pa.tivirato hoti. kukku.tasuukarapa.tiggaha.naa pa.tivirato hoti. hatthigavassava.lavapa.tiggaha.naa pa.tivirato hoti. khettavatthupa.tiggaha.naa pa.tivirato hoti. duuteyyapahi.nagamanaanuyogaa pa.tivirato hoti. kayavikkayaa pa.tivirato hoti. tulaakuu.taka.msakuu.tamaanakuu.taa pa.tivirato hoti. ukko.tanava~ncananikatisaaciyogaa {saaviyogaa (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0) ettha saacisaddo ku.tilapariyaayo} pa.tivirato hoti. chedanavadhabandhanaviparaamosaaalopasahasaakaaraa pa.tivirato hoti {passa ma0 ni0 1.293 cuu.lahatthipadopame}.

[03] ``so ^a^T3.0020^ea^ santu.t.tho hoti kaayaparihaarikena ciivarena, kucchiparihaarikena pi.n.dapaatena. so yena ^a^V3.0013^ea^ yeneva pakkamati samaadaayeva pakkamati. seyyathaapi naama pakkhii saku.no yena yeneva .deti sapattabhaarova .deti, evameva bhikkhu santu.t.tho hoti kaayaparihaarikena ciivarena, kucchiparihaarikena pi.n.dapaatena; so yena yeneva pakkamati samaadaayeva pakkamati. so iminaa ariyena siilakkhandhena samannaagato ajjhatta.m anavajjasukha.m pa.tisa.mvedeti.

[03] 15^b^.^eb^ ``so cakkhunaa ruupa.m disvaa na nimittaggaahii hoti naanubya~njanaggaahii. yatvaadhikara.namena.m cakkhundriya.m asa.mvuta.m viharanta.m abhijjhaadomanassaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa anvaassaveyyu.m tassa sa.mvaraaya pa.tipajjati, rakkhati cakkhundriya.m, cakkhundriye sa.mvara.m aapajjati. sotena sadda.m sutvaa...pe0... ghaanena gandha.m ghaayitvaa...pe0... jivhaaya rasa.m saayitvaa...pe0... kaayena pho.t.thabba.m phusitvaa...pe0... manasaa dhamma.m vi~n~naaya na nimittaggaahii hoti naanubya~njanaggaahii. yatvaadhikara.namena.m manindriya.m asa.mvuta.m viharanta.m abhijjhaadomanassaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa anvaassaveyyu.m tassa sa.mvaraaya pa.tipajjati, rakkhati manindriya.m, manindriye sa.mvara.m aapajjati. so iminaa ariyena indriyasa.mvarena samannaagato ajjhatta.m abyaasekasukha.m pa.tisa.mvedeti.

[03] ``so ^a^M3.0014^ea^ abhikkante pa.tikkante sampajaanakaarii hoti, aalokite vilokite sampajaanakaarii hoti, sami~njite {sammi~njite (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} pasaarite sampajaanakaarii hoti, sa"nghaa.tipattaciivaradhaara.ne sampajaanakaarii hoti ^a^T3.0021^ea^, asite piite khaayite saayite sampajaanakaarii hoti, uccaarapassaavakamme sampajaanakaarii hoti, gate .thite nisinne sutte jaagarite bhaasite tu.nhiibhaave sampajaanakaarii hoti.

[03] 16^b^.^eb^ ``so iminaa ca ariyena siilakkhandhena samannaagato, (imaaya ca ariyaaya santu.t.thiyaa samannaagato,) {passa ma0 ni0 1.296 cuu.lahatthipadopame} iminaa ca ariyena indriyasa.mvarena samannaagato, iminaa ca ariyena satisampaja~n~nena samannaagato vivitta.m senaasana.m bhajati ara~n~na.m rukkhamuula.m pabbata.m kandara.m giriguha.m susaana.m vanapattha.m abbhokaasa.m palaalapu~nja.m. so pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto nisiidati palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa, uju.m kaaya.m pa.nidhaaya, parimukha.m sati.m upa.t.thapetvaa. so abhijjha.m loke pahaaya vigataabhijjhena cetasaa viharati, abhijjhaaya citta.m parisodheti. byaapaadapadosa.m pahaaya abyaapannacitto viharati sabbapaa.nabhuutahitaanukampii, byaapaadapadosaa citta.m parisodheti. thinamiddha.m pahaaya vigatathinamiddho viharati aalokasa~n~nii sato sampajaano, thinamiddhaa citta.m parisodheti. uddhaccakukkucca.m pahaaya anuddhato viharati ajjhatta.m vuupasantacitto ^a^V3.0014^ea^, uddhaccakukkuccaa citta.m parisodheti. vicikiccha.m pahaaya ti.n.navicikiccho viharati akatha.mkathii kusalesu dhammesu, vicikicchaaya citta.m parisodheti.

[03] ``so ime pa~nca niivara.ne pahaaya cetaso upakkilese pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.ne vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. evampi ^a^T3.0022^ea^, bhikkhave, saphalo upakkamo hoti, saphala.m padhaana.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m cetaso ekodibhaava.m avitakka.m avicaara.m samaadhija.m piitisukha.m dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. evampi, bhikkhave, saphalo upakkamo hoti, saphala.m padhaana.m.

[03] ``puna ^a^M3.0015^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu piitiyaa ca viraagaa upekkhako ca viharati sato ca sampajaano, sukha~nca kaayena pa.tisa.mvedeti. ya.m ta.m ariyaa aacikkhanti -- `upekkhako satimaa sukhavihaarii'ti tatiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. evampi, bhikkhave, saphalo upakkamo hoti, saphala.m padhaana.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahaanaa dukkhassa ca pahaanaa, pubbeva somanassadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaa, adukkhamasukha.m upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. evampi, bhikkhave, saphalo upakkamo hoti, saphala.m padhaana.m.

[03] 17^b^.^eb^ ``so eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe pariyodaate ana"nga.ne vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite aane~njappatte pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.naaya citta.m abhininnaameti. so anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati, seyyathida.m {seyyathiida.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} -- ekampi jaati.m dvepi jaatiyo tissopi jaatiyo catassopi jaatiyo pa~ncapi jaatiyo dasapi jaatiyo viisampi jaatiyo ti.msampi jaatiyo cattaaliisampi jaatiyo pa~n~naasampi jaatiyo jaatisatampi ^a^T3.0023^ea^ jaatisahassampi jaatisatasahassampi anekepi sa.mva.t.takappe anekepi viva.t.takappe anekepi sa.mva.t.taviva.t.takappe -- `amutraasi.m eva.mnaamo eva.mgotto eva.mva.n.no evamaahaaro eva.msukhadukkhappa.tisa.mvedii evamaayupariyanto, so tato cuto amutra udapaadi.m; tatraapaasi.m eva.mnaamo eva.mgotto eva.mva.n.no evamaahaaro eva.msukhadukkhappa.tisa.mvedii evamaayupariyanto, so tato cuto idhuupapanno'ti. iti saakaara.m ^a^V3.0015^ea^ sauddesa.m anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati. evampi, bhikkhave, saphalo upakkamo hoti, saphala.m padhaana.m.

[03] 18^b^.^eb^ ``so eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe pariyodaate ana"nga.ne vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite aane~njappatte sattaana.m cutuupapaata~naa.naaya citta.m abhininnaameti. so dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte passati cavamaane upapajjamaane hiine pa.niite suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne, sugate duggate yathaakammuupage satte pajaanaati ^a^M3.0016^ea^ -- `ime vata bhonto sattaa kaayaduccaritena samannaagataa vaciiduccaritena samannaagataa manoduccaritena samannaagataa ariyaana.m upavaadakaa micchaadi.t.thikaa micchaadi.t.thikammasamaadaanaa, te kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapannaa. ime vaa pana bhonto sattaa kaayasucaritena samannaagataa vaciisucaritena samannaagataa manosucaritena samannaagataa ariyaana.m anupavaadakaa sammaadi.t.thikaa sammaadi.t.thikammasamaadaanaa, te kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m ^a^T3.0024^ea^ sagga.m loka.m upapannaa'ti. iti dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte passati cavamaane upapajjamaane hiine pa.niite suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne, sugate duggate yathaakammuupage satte pajaanaati. evampi, bhikkhave, saphalo upakkamo hoti, saphala.m padhaana.m.

[03] 19^b^.^eb^ ``so ^a^P2.0227^ea^ eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe pariyodaate ana"nga.ne vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite aane~njappatte aasavaana.m khaya~naa.naaya citta.m abhininnaameti. so `ida.m dukkha'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m dukkhasamudayo'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m dukkhanirodho'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati; `ime aasavaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m aasavasamudayo'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m aasavanirodho'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m aasavanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. tassa eva.m jaanato eva.m passato kaamaasavaapi citta.m vimuccati, bhavaasavaapi citta.m vimuccati, avijjaasavaapi citta.m vimuccati. vimuttasmi.m vimuttamiti ~naa.na.m hoti. `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaati. evampi kho, bhikkhave, saphalo upakkamo hoti, saphala.m padhaana.m. eva.mvaadii, bhikkhave, tathaagataa. eva.mvaadiina.m, bhikkhave, tathaagataana.m {tathaagato, eva.mvaadi.m bhikkhave tathaagata.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} dasa sahadhammikaa paasa.msa.t.thaanaa aagacchanti.

[03] 20^b^.^eb^ ``sace ^a^V3.0016^ea^, bhikkhave, sattaa pubbekatahetu sukhadukkha.m pa.tisa.mvedenti; addhaa, bhikkhave, tathaagato pubbe ^a^T3.0025^ea^ sukatakammakaarii ya.m etarahi evaruupaa anaasavaa sukhaa vedanaa vedeti. sace, bhikkhave, sattaa issaranimmaanahetu sukhadukkha.m pa.tisa.mvedenti; addhaa, bhikkhave, tathaagato bhaddakena issarena ^a^M3.0017^ea^ nimmito ya.m etarahi evaruupaa anaasavaa sukhaa vedanaa vedeti. sace, bhikkhave, sattaa sa"ngatibhaavahetu sukhadukkha.m pa.tisa.mvedenti; addhaa, bhikkhave, tathaagato kalyaa.nasa"ngatiko ya.m etarahi evaruupaa anaasavaa sukhaa vedanaa vedeti. sace, bhikkhave, sattaa abhijaatihetu sukhadukkha.m pa.tisa.mvedenti; addhaa, bhikkhave, tathaagato kalyaa.naabhijaatiko ya.m etarahi evaruupaa anaasavaa sukhaa vedanaa vedeti. sace, bhikkhave, sattaa di.t.thadhammuupakkamahetu sukhadukkha.m pa.tisa.mvedenti; addhaa, bhikkhave, tathaagato kalyaa.nadi.t.thadhammuupakkamo ya.m etarahi evaruupaa anaasavaa sukhaa vedanaa vedeti.

[01] ``sace, bhikkhave, sattaa pubbekatahetu sukhadukkha.m pa.tisa.mvedenti, paasa.mso tathaagato; no ce sattaa pubbekatahetu sukhadukkha.m pa.tisa.mvedenti, paasa.mso tathaagato. sace, bhikkhave, sattaa issaranimmaanahetu sukhadukkha.m pa.tisa.mvedenti, paasa.mso tathaagato; no ce sattaa issaranimmaanahetu sukhadukkha.m pa.tisa.mvedenti, paasa.mso tathaagato. sace, bhikkhave, sattaa sa"ngatibhaavahetu sukhadukkha.m pa.tisa.mvedenti, paasa.mso tathaagato; no ce sattaa sa"ngatibhaavahetu sukhadukkha.m pa.tisa.mvedenti, paasa.mso tathaagato. sace, bhikkhave, sattaa abhijaatihetu sukhadukkha.m pa.tisa.mvedenti, paasa.mso tathaagato; no ce sattaa ^a^T3.0026^ea^ abhijaatihetu sukhadukkha.m pa.tisa.mvedenti, paasa.mso tathaagato. sace, bhikkhave, sattaa di.t.thadhammuupakkamahetu sukhadukkha.m pa.tisa.mvedenti, paasa.mso tathaagato; no ce sattaa di.t.thadhammuupakkamahetu sukhadukkha.m ^a^P2.0228^ea^ pa.tisa.mvedenti, paasa.mso tathaagato. eva.mvaadii, bhikkhave, tathaagataa. eva.mvaadiina.m, bhikkhave, tathaagataana.m ime dasa sahadhammikaa paasa.msa.t.thaanaa aagacchantii''ti.
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamanaa te bhikkhuu bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandunti.
[06] devadahasutta.m ni.t.thita.m pa.thama.m.

[03] 21^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^M3.0018^ea^ ^a^V3.0017^ea^ ^a^T3.0027^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``santi, bhikkhave, eke sama.nabraahma.naa aparantakappikaa aparantaanudi.t.thino aparanta.m aarabbha anekavihitaani adhivuttipadaani {adhimuttipadaani (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} abhivadanti. `sa~n~nii attaa hoti arogo para.m mara.naa'ti -- ittheke abhivadanti; `asa~n~nii attaa hoti arogo para.m mara.naa'ti -- ittheke abhivadanti; `nevasa~n~niinaasa~n~nii attaa hoti arogo para.m mara.naa'ti -- ittheke abhivadanti; sato vaa pana sattassa uccheda.m vinaasa.m vibhava.m pa~n~napenti {pa~n~naapenti (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}, di.t.thadhammanibbaana.m vaa paneke abhivadanti. iti santa.m vaa attaana.m pa~n~napenti aroga.m {para.m mara.naa. iti imaani (ka0)} para.m mara.naa, sato vaa pana sattassa uccheda.m vinaasa.m vibhava.m pa~n~napenti, di.t.thadhammanibbaana.m vaa paneke abhivadanti. iti imaani pa~nca {para.m mara.naa. iti imaani (ka0)} hutvaa tii.ni honti, tii.ni hutvaa pa~nca honti -- ayamuddeso pa~ncattayassa.

[03] 22^b^.^eb^ ``tatra, bhikkhave, ye te sama.nabraahma.naa sa~n~ni.m attaana.m ^a^P2.0229^ea^ pa~n~napenti aroga.m para.m mara.naa, ruupi.m vaa te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa sa~n~ni.m attaana.m pa~n~napenti aroga.m para.m mara.naa, aruupi.m ^a^T3.0028^ea^ vaa te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa sa~n~ni.m attaana.m pa~n~napenti aroga.m para.m mara.naa, ruupi~nca aruupi~nca vaa te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa sa~n~ni.m attaana.m pa~n~napenti aroga.m para.m mara.naa, nevaruupi.m naaruupi.m vaa te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa sa~n~ni.m attaana.m pa~n~napenti aroga.m para.m mara.naa, ekattasa~n~ni.m vaa te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa sa~n~ni.m attaana.m pa~n~napenti aroga.m para.m mara.naa, naanattasa~n~ni.m vaa te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa sa~n~ni.m attaana.m ^a^V3.0018^ea^ pa~n~napenti aroga.m para.m mara.naa, parittasa~n~ni.m vaa te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa sa~n~ni.m attaana.m pa~n~napenti aroga.m para.m mara.naa, appamaa.nasa~n~ni.m vaa te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa sa~n~ni.m attaana.m pa~n~napenti aroga.m para.m mara.naa, eta.m {eva.m (ka0)} vaa panekesa.m {panetesa.m (syaa0 ka.m0)} upaativattata.m vi~n~naa.nakasi.nameke abhivadanti appamaa.na.m aane~nja.m ^a^M3.0019^ea^. tayida.m, bhikkhave, tathaagato abhijaanaati {pajaanaati (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0) a.t.thakathaa oloketabbaa}. ye kho te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa sa~n~ni.m attaana.m pa~n~napenti aroga.m para.m mara.naa, ruupi.m vaa te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa sa~n~ni.m attaana.m pa~n~napenti aroga.m para.m mara.naa, aruupi.m vaa te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa sa~n~ni.m attaana.m pa~n~napenti aroga.m para.m mara.naa, ruupi~nca aruupi~nca vaa te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa sa~n~ni.m attaana.m pa~n~napenti aroga.m para.m mara.naa, nevaruupi.m naaruupi.m vaa te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa sa~n~ni.m attaana.m pa~n~napenti aroga.m para.m mara.naa, ekattasa~n~ni.m vaa te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa ^a^T3.0029^ea^ sa~n~ni.m attaana.m pa~n~napenti aroga.m para.m mara.naa, naanattasa~n~ni.m vaa te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa sa~n~ni.m attaana.m pa~n~napenti aroga.m para.m mara.naa, parittasa~n~ni.m vaa te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa sa~n~ni.m attaana.m pa~n~napenti aroga.m para.m mara.naa, appamaa.nasa~n~ni.m vaa te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa sa~n~ni.m attaana.m pa~n~napenti aroga.m para.m mara.naa {mara.naati (ka0)}, yaa vaa panetaasa.m sa~n~naana.m parisuddhaa paramaa aggaa anuttariyaa akkhaayati ^a^P2.0230^ea^ -- yadi ruupasa~n~naana.m yadi aruupasa~n~naana.m yadi ekattasa~n~naana.m yadi naanattasa~n~naana.m. `natthi ki~ncii'ti aaki~nca~n~naayatanameke abhivadanti appamaa.na.m aane~nja.m. `tayida.m sa"nkhata.m o.laarika.m atthi kho pana sa"nkhaaraana.m nirodho attheta'nti -- iti viditvaa tassa nissara.nadassaavii tathaagato tadupaativatto.

[03] 23^b^.^eb^ ``tatra, bhikkhave, ye te sama.nabraahma.naa asa~n~ni.m attaana.m pa~n~napenti aroga.m para.m mara.naa, ruupi.m vaa te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa asa~n~ni.m attaana.m pa~n~napenti aroga.m para.m mara.naa, aruupi.m vaa te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa asa~n~ni.m attaana.m pa~n~napenti aroga.m para.m mara.naa, ruupi~nca aruupi~nca vaa te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa asa~n~ni.m attaana.m pa~n~napenti aroga.m para.m mara.naa, nevaruupi.m naaruupi.m vaa te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa asa~n~ni.m attaana.m pa~n~napenti aroga.m para.m mara.naa. tatra, bhikkhave, ye te sama.nabraahma.naa sa~n~ni.m attaana.m pa~n~napenti aroga.m para.m mara.naa tesamete ^a^T3.0030^ea^ pa.tikkosanti. ta.m kissa hetu? sa~n~naa rogo sa~n~naa ga.n.do sa~n~naa salla.m, eta.m santa.m eta.m pa.niita.m yadida.m -- `asa~n~na'nti. tayida.m, bhikkhave, tathaagato abhijaanaati ye kho te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa asa~n~ni.m attaana.m pa~n~napenti aroga.m para.m mara.naa, ruupi.m vaa te bhonto ^a^M3.0020^ea^ sama.nabraahma.naa asa~n~ni.m attaana.m pa~n~napenti aroga.m para.m mara.naa, aruupi.m vaa te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa asa~n~ni.m attaana.m pa~n~napenti aroga.m para.m mara.naa, ruupi~nca aruupi~nca vaa te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa asa~n~ni.m attaana.m pa~n~napenti aroga.m para.m mara.naa, nevaruupi.m naaruupi.m vaa te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa asa~n~ni.m attaana.m pa~n~napenti aroga.m para.m mara.naa. yo hi koci, bhikkhave, sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa eva.m vadeyya -- `ahama~n~natra ruupaa, a~n~natra vedanaaya, a~n~natra sa~n~naaya, a~n~natra ^a^V3.0019^ea^ sa"nkhaarehi, vi~n~naa.nassa {a~n~natra vi~n~naa.naa (syaa0 ka.m0), a~n~natra vi~n~naa.nena (ka0)} aagati.m vaa gati.m vaa cuti.m vaa upapatti.m vaa vuddhi.m vaa viruu.lhi.m vaa vepulla.m vaa pa~n~napessaamii'ti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. `tayida.m sa"nkhata.m o.laarika.m atthi kho pana sa"nkhaaraana.m ^a^P2.0231^ea^ nirodho attheta'nti -- iti viditvaa tassa nissara.nadassaavii tathaagato tadupaativatto.

[03] 24^b^.^eb^ ``tatra, bhikkhave, ye te sama.nabraahma.naa nevasa~n~niinaasa~n~ni.m attaana.m pa~n~napenti aroga.m para.m mara.naa, ruupi.m vaa te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa nevasa~n~niinaasa~n~ni.m attaana.m pa~n~napenti aroga.m ^a^T3.0031^ea^ para.m mara.naa, aruupi.m vaa te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa nevasa~n~niinaasa~n~ni.m attaana.m pa~n~napenti aroga.m para.m mara.naa, ruupi~nca aruupi~nca vaa te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa nevasa~n~niinaasa~n~ni.m attaana.m pa~n~napenti aroga.m para.m mara.naa, nevaruupi.m naaruupi.m vaa te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa nevasa~n~niinaasa~n~ni.m attaana.m pa~n~napenti aroga.m para.m mara.naa. tatra, bhikkhave, ye te sama.nabraahma.naa sa~n~ni.m attaana.m pa~n~napenti aroga.m para.m mara.naa tesamete pa.tikkosanti, yepi te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa asa~n~ni.m attaana.m pa~n~napenti aroga.m para.m mara.naa tesamete pa.tikkosanti. ta.m kissa hetu? sa~n~naa rogo sa~n~naa ga.n.do sa~n~naa salla.m, asa~n~naa sammoho, eta.m santa.m eta.m pa.niita.m yadida.m -- `nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~na'nti. {nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naati (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0) etantipada.m manasikaatabba.m} tayida.m, bhikkhave, tathaagato abhijaanaati. ye kho te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa nevasa~n~niinaasa~n~ni.m attaana.m pa~n~napenti aroga.m para.m mara.naa, ruupi.m vaa te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa nevasa~n~niinaasa~n~ni.m attaana.m pa~n~napenti aroga.m para.m mara.naa, aruupi.m vaa te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa nevasa~n~niinaasa~n~ni.m attaana.m ^a^M3.0021^ea^ pa~n~napenti aroga.m para.m mara.naa, ruupi~nca aruupi~nca vaa te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa nevasa~n~niinaasa~n~ni.m attaana.m pa~n~napenti aroga.m para.m mara.naa, nevaruupi.m naaruupi.m vaa te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa nevasa~n~niinaasa~n~ni.m attaana.m pa~n~napenti aroga.m ^a^T3.0032^ea^ para.m mara.naa. ye hi keci, bhikkhave, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa {sama.nabraahma.naa (sii0 pii0)} di.t.thasutamutavi~n~naatabbasa"nkhaaramattena etassa aayatanassa upasampada.m pa~n~napenti, byasana~nheta.m, bhikkhave, akkhaayati {aayatanamakkhaayati (ka0)} etassa aayatanassa upasampadaaya ^a^P2.0232^ea^. na heta.m, bhikkhave, aayatana.m sa"nkhaarasamaapattipattabbamakkhaayati; sa"nkhaaraavasesasamaapattipattabbameta.m, bhikkhave, aayatanamakkhaayati. `tayida.m sa"nkhata.m o.laarika.m atthi kho pana sa"nkhaaraana.m nirodho attheta'nti -- iti viditvaa tassa nissara.nadassaavii tathaagato tadupaativatto.

[03] 25^b^.^eb^ ``tatra, bhikkhave, ye te sama.nabraahma.naa sato sattassa uccheda.m vinaasa.m vibhava.m pa~n~napenti ^a^V3.0020^ea^, tatra, bhikkhave, ye te sama.nabraahma.naa sa~n~ni.m attaana.m pa~n~napenti aroga.m para.m mara.naa tesamete pa.tikkosanti, yepi te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa asa~n~ni.m attaana.m pa~n~napenti aroga.m para.m mara.naa tesamete pa.tikkosanti, yepi te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa nevasa~n~niinaasa~n~ni.m attaana.m pa~n~napenti aroga.m para.m mara.naa tesamete pa.tikkosanti. ta.m kissa hetu? sabbepime bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa uddha.m sara.m {uddha.msaraa (sii0 pii0), uddha.m paraamasanti (syaa0 ka.m0)} aasatti.myeva abhivadanti -- `iti pecca ^a^T3.0033^ea^ bhavissaama, iti pecca bhavissaamaa'ti. seyyathaapi naama vaa.nijassa vaa.nijjaaya gacchato eva.m hoti -- `ito me ida.m bhavissati, iminaa ida.m lacchaamii'ti, evamevime bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa vaa.nijuupamaa ma~n~ne pa.tibhanti -- `iti pecca bhavissaama, iti pecca bhavissaamaa'ti. tayida.m, bhikkhave, tathaagato abhijaanaati. ye kho te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa sato sattassa uccheda.m vinaasa.m vibhava.m pa~n~napenti te sakkaayabhayaa sakkaayaparijegucchaa sakkaaya~n~neva anuparidhaavanti anuparivattanti. seyyathaapi naama saa gaddulabaddho da.lhe thambhe vaa khile {khiile (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} vaa upanibaddho ^a^P2.0233^ea^, tameva thambha.m vaa khila.m vaa anuparidhaavati anuparivattati ^a^M3.0022^ea^; evamevime bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa sakkaayabhayaa sakkaayaparijegucchaa sakkaaya~n~neva anuparidhaavanti anuparivattanti. `tayida.m sa"nkhata.m o.laarika.m atthi kho pana sa"nkhaaraana.m nirodho attheta'nti -- iti viditvaa tassa nissara.nadassaavii tathaagato tadupaativatto.

[03] 26^b^.^eb^ ``ye hi keci, bhikkhave, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa aparantakappikaa aparantaanudi.t.thino aparanta.m aarabbha anekavihitaani adhivuttipadaani abhivadanti, sabbe te imaaneva pa~ncaayatanaani abhivadanti etesa.m vaa a~n~natara.m.

[03] 27^b^.^eb^ ``santi, bhikkhave, eke sama.nabraahma.naa pubbantakappikaa pubbantaanudi.t.thino pubbanta.m aarabbha anekavihitaani adhivuttipadaani abhivadanti. `sassato attaa ca loko ca, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'nti -- ittheke abhivadanti, `asassato attaa ca loko ca, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'nti -- ittheke abhivadanti, `sassato ca asassato ca attaa ca loko ca, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'nti -- ittheke abhivadanti, `nevasassato ^a^T3.0034^ea^ naasassato attaa ca loko ca, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'nti -- ittheke abhivadanti, `antavaa attaa ca loko ca, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'nti -- ittheke abhivadanti, `anantavaa attaa ca loko ca, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'nti -- ittheke abhivadanti, `antavaa ca anantavaa ca attaa ^a^V3.0021^ea^ ca loko ca, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'nti -- ittheke abhivadanti, `nevantavaa naanantavaa attaa ca loko ca, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'nti -- ittheke abhivadanti, `ekattasa~n~nii attaa ca loko ca, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'nti -- ittheke abhivadanti, `naanattasa~n~nii attaa ca loko ca, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'nti -- ittheke abhivadanti, `parittasa~n~nii attaa ca loko ca, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'nti -- ittheke abhivadanti, `appamaa.nasa~n~nii attaa ca loko ca, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'nti -- ittheke abhivadanti, `ekantasukhii attaa ca loko ca, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'nti -- ittheke abhivadanti, `ekantadukkhii attaa ca loko ca, idameva sacca.m ^a^P2.0234^ea^ moghama~n~na'nti -- ittheke abhivadanti, `sukhadukkhii attaa ca loko ca, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'nti -- ittheke abhivadanti, `adukkhamasukhii attaa ca loko ca, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'nti -- ittheke abhivadanti.

[03] 28^b^.^eb^ ``tatra ^a^M3.0023^ea^, bhikkhave, ye te sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- `sassato attaa ca loko ca, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'nti ^a^T3.0035^ea^, tesa.m vata a~n~natreva saddhaaya a~n~natra ruciyaa a~n~natra anussavaa a~n~natra aakaaraparivitakkaa a~n~natra di.t.thinijjhaanakkhantiyaa paccatta.myeva ~naa.na.m bhavissati parisuddha.m pariyodaatanti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. paccatta.m kho pana, bhikkhave, ~naa.ne asati parisuddhe pariyodaate yadapi {yadipi (ka0)} te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa tattha ~naa.nabhaagamattameva pariyodapenti tadapi tesa.m bhavata.m sama.nabraahma.naana.m upaadaanamakkhaayati. `tayida.m sa"nkhata.m o.laarika.m atthi kho pana sa"nkhaaraana.m nirodho attheta'nti -- iti viditvaa tassa nissara.nadassaavii tathaagato tadupaativatto.

[03] 29^b^.^eb^ ``tatra, bhikkhave, ye te sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- `asassato attaa ca loko ca, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'nti...pe0... {yathaa sassatavaare, tathaa vitthaaretabba.m} sassato ca asassato ca attaa ca loko ca... nevasassato naasassato attaa ca loko ca... antavaa attaa ca loko ca... anantavaa attaa ca loko ca... antavaa ca anantavaa ca attaa ca loko ca... nevantavaa naanantavaa attaa ca loko ca... ekattasa~n~nii attaa ca loko ca... naanattasa~n~nii attaa ca loko ca... parittasa~n~nii attaa ca loko ca... appamaa.nasa~n~nii attaa ca loko ca... ekantasukhii attaa ca loko ca... ekantadukkhii attaa ca loko ca... sukhadukkhii attaa ca loko ca... adukkhamasukhii attaa ca loko ca, idameva ^a^T3.0036^ea^ sacca.m moghama~n~nanti, tesa.m vata a~n~natreva ^a^V3.0022^ea^ saddhaaya a~n~natra ruciyaa a~n~natra anussavaa a~n~natra aakaaraparivitakkaa a~n~natra di.t.thinijjhaanakkhantiyaa paccatta.myeva ~naa.na.m bhavissati parisuddha.m pariyodaatanti -- neta.m .thaana.m ^a^P2.0235^ea^ vijjati. paccatta.m kho pana, bhikkhave, ~naa.ne asati parisuddhe pariyodaate yadapi te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa tattha ~naa.nabhaagamattameva pariyodapenti tadapi tesa.m bhavata.m sama.nabraahma.naana.m upaadaanamakkhaayati. `tayida.m sa"nkhata.m o.laarika.m atthi kho pana sa"nkhaaraana.m nirodho attheta'nti -- iti viditvaa tassa nissara.nadassaavii tathaagato tadupaativatto.

[03] 30^b^.^eb^ ``idha ^a^M3.0024^ea^, bhikkhave, ekacco sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa pubbantaanudi.t.thiina~nca pa.tinissaggaa, aparantaanudi.t.thiina~nca pa.tinissaggaa, sabbaso kaamasa.myojanaana.m anadhi.t.thaanaa, paviveka.m piiti.m upasampajja viharati -- `eta.m santa.m eta.m pa.niita.m yadida.m paviveka.m piiti.m upasampajja viharaamii'ti. tassa saa pavivekaa piiti nirujjhati. pavivekaaya piitiyaa nirodhaa uppajjati domanassa.m, domanassassa nirodhaa uppajjati pavivekaa piiti. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, ya.m chaayaa jahati ta.m aatapo pharati, ya.m aatapo jahati ta.m chaayaa pharati; evameva kho, bhikkhave, pavivekaaya piitiyaa nirodhaa uppajjati domanassa.m, domanassassa nirodhaa uppajjati pavivekaa piiti. tayida.m, bhikkhave, tathaagato abhijaanaati. aya.m kho bhava.m sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa pubbantaanudi.t.thiina~nca pa.tinissaggaa ^a^T3.0037^ea^, aparantaanudi.t.thiina~nca pa.tinissaggaa, sabbaso kaamasa.myojanaana.m anadhi.t.thaanaa, paviveka.m piiti.m upasampajja viharati -- `eta.m santa.m eta.m pa.niita.m yadida.m paviveka.m piiti.m upasampajja viharaamii'ti. tassa saa pavivekaa piiti nirujjhati. pavivekaaya piitiyaa nirodhaa uppajjati domanassa.m, domanassassa nirodhaa uppajjati pavivekaa piiti. `tayida.m sa"nkhata.m o.laarika.m atthi kho pana sa"nkhaaraana.m nirodho attheta'nti -- iti viditvaa tassa nissara.nadassaavii tathaagato tadupaativatto.

[03] 31^b^.^eb^ ``idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa pubbantaanudi.t.thiina~nca pa.tinissaggaa, aparantaanudi.t.thiina~nca pa.tinissaggaa, sabbaso kaamasa.myojanaana.m anadhi.t.thaanaa, pavivekaaya piitiyaa samatikkamaa niraamisa.m sukha.m upasampajja viharati -- `eta.m santa.m eta.m pa.niita.m yadida.m niraamisa.m sukha.m upasampajja viharaamii'ti. tassa ta.m niraamisa.m sukha.m nirujjhati. niraamisassa sukhassa nirodhaa uppajjati pavivekaa piiti, pavivekaaya piitiyaa nirodhaa uppajjati niraamisa.m sukha.m ^a^P2.0236^ea^. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, ya.m chaayaa jahati ta.m aatapo pharati, ya.m aatapo jahati ^a^V3.0023^ea^ ta.m chaayaa pharati; evameva kho, bhikkhave, niraamisassa sukhassa nirodhaa uppajjati pavivekaa piiti, pavivekaaya piitiyaa nirodhaa uppajjati niraamisa.m sukha.m. tayida.m, bhikkhave, tathaagato abhijaanaati. aya.m kho bhava.m sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa pubbantaanudi.t.thiina~nca pa.tinissaggaa, aparantaanudi.t.thiina~nca pa.tinissaggaa, sabbaso kaamasa.myojanaana.m anadhi.t.thaanaa ^a^T3.0038^ea^, pavivekaaya piitiyaa samatikkamaa, niraamisa.m sukha.m upasampajja viharati -- `eta.m santa.m eta.m pa.niita.m yadida.m niraamisa.m sukha.m upasampajja viharaamii'ti. tassa ^a^M3.0025^ea^ ta.m niraamisa.m sukha.m nirujjhati. niraamisassa sukhassa nirodhaa uppajjati pavivekaa piiti, pavivekaaya piitiyaa nirodhaa uppajjati niraamisa.m sukha.m. `tayida.m sa"nkhata.m o.laarika.m atthi kho pana sa"nkhaaraana.m nirodho attheta'nti -- iti viditvaa tassa nissara.nadassaavii tathaagato tadupaativatto.

[03] 32^b^.^eb^ ``idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa pubbantaanudi.t.thiina~nca pa.tinissaggaa, aparantaanudi.t.thiina~nca pa.tinissaggaa, sabbaso kaamasa.myojanaana.m anadhi.t.thaanaa, pavivekaaya piitiyaa samatikkamaa, niraamisassa sukhassa samatikkamaa, adukkhamasukha.m vedana.m upasampajja viharati -- `eta.m santa.m eta.m pa.niita.m yadida.m adukkhamasukha.m vedana.m upasampajja viharaamii'ti. tassa saa adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa nirujjhati. adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya nirodhaa uppajjati niraamisa.m sukha.m, niraamisassa sukhassa nirodhaa uppajjati adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, ya.m chaayaa jahati ta.m aatapo pharati, ya.m aatapo jahati ta.m chaayaa pharati; evameva kho, bhikkhave, adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya nirodhaa uppajjati niraamisa.m sukha.m, niraamisassa sukhassa nirodhaa uppajjati adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa. tayida.m, bhikkhave, tathaagato abhijaanaati. aya.m kho bhava.m sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa pubbantaanudi.t.thiina~nca pa.tinissaggaa ^a^T3.0039^ea^, aparantaanudi.t.thiina~nca pa.tinissaggaa, sabbaso kaamasa.myojanaana.m anadhi.t.thaanaa, pavivekaaya piitiyaa samatikkamaa, niraamisassa sukhassa samatikkamaa, adukkhamasukha.m vedana.m upasampajja viharati -- `eta.m santa.m eta.m pa.niita.m yadida.m adukkhamasukha.m ^a^P2.0237^ea^ vedana.m upasampajja viharaamii'ti. tassa saa adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa nirujjhati. adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya nirodhaa uppajjati niraamisa.m sukha.m, niraamisassa sukhassa nirodhaa uppajjati adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa. `tayida.m sa"nkhata.m o.laarika.m atthi kho pana sa"nkhaaraana.m nirodho attheta'nti -- iti viditvaa tassa nissara.nadassaavii tathaagato tadupaativatto.

[03] 33^b^.^eb^ ``idha ^a^V3.0024^ea^ pana, bhikkhave, ekacco sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa pubbantaanudi.t.thiina~nca pa.tinissaggaa, aparantaanudi.t.thiina~nca pa.tinissaggaa, sabbaso kaamasa.myojanaana.m anadhi.t.thaanaa, pavivekaaya piitiyaa samatikkamaa, niraamisassa sukhassa samatikkamaa, adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya samatikkamaa -- `santohamasmi, nibbutohamasmi, anupaadaanohamasmii'ti samanupassati. tayida.m, bhikkhave, tathaagato abhijaanaati. aya.m kho bhava.m sama.no vaa braahma.no ^a^M3.0026^ea^ vaa pubbantaanudi.t.thiina~nca pa.tinissaggaa, aparantaanudi.t.thiina~nca pa.tinissaggaa, sabbaso kaamasa.myojanaana.m anadhi.t.thaanaa, pavivekaaya piitiyaa samatikkamaa, niraamisassa sukhassa samatikkamaa, adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya samatikkamaa -- `santohamasmi, nibbutohamasmi, anupaadaanohamasmii'ti samanupassati; addhaa ayamaayasmaa nibbaanasappaaya.myeva ^a^T3.0040^ea^ pa.tipada.m abhivadati. atha ca panaaya.m bhava.m sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa pubbantaanudi.t.thi.m vaa upaadiyamaano upaadiyati, aparantaanudi.t.thi.m vaa upaadiyamaano upaadiyati, kaamasa.myojana.m vaa upaadiyamaano upaadiyati, paviveka.m vaa piiti.m upaadiyamaano upaadiyati, niraamisa.m vaa sukha.m upaadiyamaano upaadiyati, adukkhamasukha.m vaa vedana.m upaadiyamaano upaadiyati. ya~nca kho ayamaayasmaa -- `santohamasmi, nibbutohamasmi, anupaadaanohamasmii'ti samanupassati tadapi imassa bhoto sama.nassa braahma.nassa upaadaanamakkhaayati. `tayida.m sa"nkhata.m o.laarika.m atthi kho pana sa"nkhaaraana.m nirodho attheta'nti -- iti viditvaa tassa nissara.nadassaavii tathaagato tadupaativatto.

[03] ``ida.m kho pana, bhikkhave, tathaagatena anuttara.m santivarapada.m abhisambuddha.m yadida.m -- channa.m phassaayatanaana.m samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca assaada~nca aadiinava~nca nissara.na~nca yathaabhuuta.m viditvaa {anupaadaavimokkho. tayida.m bhikkhave tathaagatena anuttara.m santivarapada.m abhisambuddha.m, yadida.m channa.m phassaayatanaana.m samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca assaada~nca aadiinava~nca nissara.na~nca yathaabhuuta.m viditvaa anupaadaavimokkhoti (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} anupaadaavimokkho''ti {anupaadaavimokkho. tayida.m bhikkhave tathaagatena anuttara.m santivarapada.m abhisambuddha.m, yadida.m channa.m phassaayatana.m samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca assaada~nca adiinava~nca nissara.na~nca yathaabhuuta.m viditvaa anupaadaavimokkhoti (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}.
[03] idamavoca ^a^P2.0238^ea^ bhagavaa. attamanaa te bhikkhuu bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandunti.
[06] pa~ncattayasutta.m ni.t.thita.m dutiya.m.

[03] 34^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T3.0041^ea^ ^a^V3.0025^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa pisinaaraaya.m {kusinaaraaya.m (sii0)} viharati balihara.ne vanasa.n.de. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``kinti vo ^a^M3.0027^ea^, bhikkhave, mayi hoti -- `ciivarahetu vaa sama.no gotamo dhamma.m deseti, pi.n.dapaatahetu vaa sama.no gotamo dhamma.m deseti, senaasanahetu vaa sama.no gotamo dhamma.m deseti, itibhavaabhavahetu vaa sama.no gotamo dhamma.m desetii'''ti? ``na kho no, bhante, bhagavati eva.m hoti -- `ciivarahetu vaa sama.no gotamo dhamma.m deseti, pi.n.dapaatahetu vaa sama.no gotamo dhamma.m deseti, senaasanahetu vaa sama.no gotamo dhamma.m deseti, itibhavaabhavahetu vaa sama.no gotamo dhamma.m desetii'''ti.

[03] ``na ca kira vo, bhikkhave, mayi eva.m hoti -- `ciivarahetu vaa sama.no gotamo dhamma.m deseti...pe0... itibhavaabhavahetu vaa sama.no gotamo dhamma.m desetii'ti; atha kinti carahi vo {atha kinti vo (sii0 pii0), atha ki~ncarahi vo (ka0)}, bhikkhave, mayi hotii''ti? ``eva.m kho no, bhante, bhagavati hoti -- `anukampako bhagavaa hitesii; anukampa.m upaadaaya dhamma.m desetii'''ti. ``eva~nca ^a^T3.0042^ea^ {eva.m (sii0 pii0)} kira vo, bhikkhave, mayi hoti -- `anukampako bhagavaa hitesii; anukampa.m upaadaaya dhamma.m desetii'''ti.

[03] 35^b^.^eb^ ``tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, ye vo {ye te (ka0)} mayaa dhammaa abhi~n~naa desitaa, seyyathida.m -- cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa cattaaro sammappadhaanaa cattaaro iddhipaadaa pa~ncindriyaani pa~nca balaani satta bojjha"ngaa ^a^P2.0239^ea^ ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo, tattha sabbeheva samaggehi sammodamaanehi avivadamaanehi sikkhitabba.m. tesa~nca vo, bhikkhave, samaggaana.m sammodamaanaana.m avivadamaanaana.m sikkhata.m siya.msu {siyu.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0) saddaniiti oloketabbaa} dve bhikkhuu abhidhamme naanaavaadaa. tatra ce tumhaaka.m evamassa -- `imesa.m kho aayasmantaana.m atthato ceva naana.m bya~njanato ca naana'nti, tattha ya.m bhikkhu.m suvacatara.m {subbacatara.m (ka0)} ma~n~neyyaatha so upasa"nkamitvaa evamassa vacaniiyo -- `aayasmantaana.m kho atthato ceva naana.m, bya~njanato ca naana.m. tadaminaapeta.m {tadiminaapeta.m (syaa0 ka.m0)} aayasmanto jaanaatha -- yathaa atthato ceva naana.m, bya~njanato ca naana.m. maayasmanto vivaada.m aapajjitthaa'ti. athaaparesa.m ekatopakkhikaana.m ^a^V3.0026^ea^ bhikkhuuna.m ya.m bhikkhu.m suvacatara.m ma~n~neyyaatha so upasa"nkamitvaa evamassa vacaniiyo -- `aayasmantaana.m kho atthato ceva naana.m, bya~njanato ca naana.m. tadaminaapeta.m aayasmanto jaanaatha -- yathaa atthato ^a^M3.0028^ea^ ceva naana.m, bya~njanato ca naana.m. maayasmanto vivaada.m aapajjitthaa'ti. iti duggahita.m duggahitato dhaaretabba.m, suggahita.m suggahitato dhaaretabba.m. duggahita.m duggahitato dhaaretvaa suggahita.m suggahitato dhaaretvaa {iti duggahita.m duggahitato dhaaretabba.m, duggahita.m duggahitato dhaaretvaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0) anantaravaarattaye pana ida.m paa.thanaanatta.m natthi} yo dhammo yo vinayo so bhaasitabbo.

[03] 36^b^.^eb^ ``tatra ^a^T3.0043^ea^ ce tumhaaka.m evamassa -- `imesa.m kho aayasmantaana.m atthato hi kho naana.m, bya~njanato sametii'ti, tattha ya.m bhikkhu.m suvacatara.m ma~n~neyyaatha so upasa"nkamitvaa evamassa vacaniiyo -- `aayasmantaana.m kho atthato hi naana.m, bya~njanato sameti. tadaminaapeta.m aayasmanto jaanaatha -- yathaa atthato hi kho naana.m, bya~njanato sameti. maayasmanto vivaada.m aapajjitthaa'ti. athaaparesa.m ekatopakkhikaana.m bhikkhuuna.m ya.m bhikkhu.m suvacatara.m ma~n~neyyaatha so upasa"nkamitvaa evamassa vacaniiyo -- `aayasmantaana.m kho atthato hi kho naana.m, bya~njanato sameti. tadaminaapeta.m aayasmanto jaanaatha -- yathaa atthato hi kho naana.m, bya~njanato sameti. maayasmanto vivaada.m aapajjitthaa'ti ^a^P2.0240^ea^. iti duggahita.m duggahitato dhaaretabba.m, suggahita.m suggahitato dhaaretabba.m. duggahita.m duggahitato dhaaretvaa suggahita.m suggahitato dhaaretvaa yo dhammo yo vinayo so bhaasitabbo.

[03] 37^b^.^eb^ ``tatra ce tumhaaka.m evamassa -- `imesa.m kho aayasmantaana.m atthato hi kho sameti, bya~njanato naana'nti, tattha ya.m bhikkhu.m suvacatara.m ma~n~neyyaatha so upasa"nkamitvaa evamassa vacaniiyo -- `aayasmantaana.m kho atthato hi sameti, bya~njanato naana.m. tadaminaapeta.m aayasmanto jaanaatha -- yathaa atthato hi kho sameti, bya~njanato naana.m. appamattaka.m kho paneta.m yadida.m -- bya~njana.m. maayasmanto appamattake vivaada.m aapajjitthaa'ti. athaaparesa.m ekatopakkhikaana.m bhikkhuuna.m ^a^T3.0044^ea^ ya.m bhikkhu.m suvacatara.m ma~n~neyyaatha so upasa"nkamitvaa evamassa vacaniiyo -- `aayasmantaana.m kho atthato hi sameti, bya~njanato naana.m. tadaminaapeta.m aayasmanto jaanaatha -- yathaa atthato hi kho sameti, bya~njanato naana.m. appamattaka.m kho paneta.m yadida.m ^a^M3.0029^ea^ -- bya~njana.m. maayasmanto appamattake {appamattakehi (sii0 pii0)} vivaada.m aapajjitthaa'ti. iti suggahita.m suggahitato dhaaretabba.m, duggahita.m duggahitato dhaaretabba.m. suggahita.m suggahitato dhaaretvaa duggahita.m duggahitato dhaaretvaa yo dhammo yo vinayo so bhaasitabbo.

[03] 38^b^.^eb^ ``tatra ^a^V3.0027^ea^ ce tumhaaka.m evamassa -- `imesa.m kho aayasmantaana.m atthato ceva sameti bya~njanato ca sametii'ti, tattha ya.m bhikkhu.m suvacatara.m ma~n~neyyaatha so upasa"nkamitvaa evamassa vacaniiyo -- `aayasmantaana.m kho atthato ceva sameti, bya~njanato ca sameti. tadaminaapeta.m aayasmanto jaanaatha -- yathaa atthato ceva sameti bya~njanato ca sameti. maayasmanto vivaada.m aapajjitthaa'ti. athaaparesa.m ekatopakkhikaana.m bhikkhuuna.m ya.m bhikkhu.m suvacatara.m ma~n~neyyaatha so upasa"nkamitvaa evamassa vacaniiyo -- `aayasmantaana.m kho atthato ceva sameti bya~njanato ca sameti. tadaminaapeta.m aayasmanto jaanaatha -- yathaa atthato ceva sameti bya~njanato ca sameti. maayasmanto vivaada.m ^a^P2.0241^ea^ aapajjitthaa'ti. iti suggahita.m suggahitato dhaaretabba.m. suggahita.m suggahitato dhaaretvaa yo dhammo yo vinayo so bhaasitabbo.

[03] 39^b^.^eb^ ``tesa~nca ^a^T3.0045^ea^ vo, bhikkhave, samaggaana.m sammodamaanaana.m avivadamaanaana.m sikkhata.m siyaa a~n~natarassa bhikkhuno aapatti siyaa viitikkamo, tatra, bhikkhave, na codanaaya taritabba.m {coditabba.m (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0) turitabba.m (?)}. puggalo upaparikkhitabbo -- `iti mayha~nca avihesaa bhavissati parassa ca puggalassa anupaghaato, paro hi puggalo akkodhano anupanaahii ada.lhadi.t.thii suppa.tinissaggii, sakkomi caaha.m eta.m puggala.m akusalaa vu.t.thaapetvaa kusale pati.t.thaapetu'nti. sace, bhikkhave, evamassa, kalla.m vacanaaya.

[03] ``sace pana, bhikkhave, evamassa -- `mayha.m kho avihesaa bhavissati parassa ca puggalassa upaghaato, paro hi puggalo kodhano upanaahii ada.lhadi.t.thii suppa.tinissaggii, sakkomi caaha.m eta.m puggala.m akusalaa vu.t.thaapetvaa kusale pati.t.thaapetu.m. appamattaka.m kho paneta.m yadida.m -- parassa {yadida.m mayha~nca vihesaa bhavissati parassa ca (ka0)} puggalassa upaghaato. atha kho etadeva bahutara.m -- svaaha.m sakkomi eta.m puggala.m akusalaa vu.t.thaapetvaa ^a^M3.0030^ea^ kusale pati.t.thaapetu'nti ^a^T3.0046^ea^. sace, bhikkhave, evamassa, kalla.m vacanaaya.

[03] ``sace pana, bhikkhave, evamassa -- `mayha.m kho vihesaa bhavissati parassa ca puggalassa anupaghaato. paro hi puggalo akkodhano anupanaahii da.lhadi.t.thii duppa.tinissaggii, sakkomi caaha.m eta.m puggala.m akusalaa vu.t.thaapetvaa kusale pati.t.thaapetu.m. appamattaka.m kho paneta.m yadida.m ^a^V3.0028^ea^ -- mayha.m vihesaa {mayha~nca vihesaa bhavissati parassa ca puggalassa upaghaato (ka0)}. atha kho etadeva bahutara.m -- svaaha.m sakkomi eta.m puggala.m akusalaa vu.t.thaapetvaa kusale pati.t.thaapetu'nti. sace, bhikkhave, evamassa, kalla.m vacanaaya.

[03] ``sace pana, bhikkhave, evamassa -- `mayha~nca kho vihesaa bhavissati parassa ca puggalassa upaghaato. paro hi ^a^P2.0242^ea^ puggalo kodhano upanaahii da.lhadi.t.thii duppa.tinissaggii, sakkomi caaha.m eta.m puggala.m akusalaa vu.t.thaapetvaa kusale pati.t.thaapetu.m. appamattaka.m kho paneta.m yadida.m -- mayha~nca vihesaa bhavissati parassa ca puggalassa upaghaato. atha kho etadeva bahutara.m -- svaaha.m sakkomi eta.m puggala.m akusalaa vu.t.thaapetvaa kusale pati.t.thaapetu'nti. sace, bhikkhave, evamassa, kalla.m vacanaaya.

[03] ``sace pana, bhikkhave, evamassa -- `mayha~nca kho vihesaa bhavissati parassa ca puggalassa upaghaato. paro hi puggalo kodhano upanaahii da.lhadi.t.thii duppa.tinissaggii, na caaha.m sakkomi eta.m puggala.m akusalaa vu.t.thaapetvaa kusale pati.t.thaapetu'nti. evaruupe, bhikkhave, puggale upekkhaa naatima~n~nitabbaa.

[03] 40^b^.^eb^ ``tesa~nca vo, bhikkhave, samaggaana.m sammodamaanaana.m avivadamaanaana.m sikkhata.m a~n~nama~n~nassa vaciisa.mhaaro {vaciisa"nkhaaro (sii0 pii0)} uppajjeyya di.t.thipa.laaso {di.t.thipalaaso (sii0 ka0)} cetaso aaghaato appaccayo anabhiraddhi. tattha ekatopakkhikaana.m bhikkhuuna.m ya.m bhikkhu.m suvacatara.m ma~n~neyyaatha so upasa"nkamitvaa evamassa vacaniiyo -- `ya.m no, aavuso, amhaaka.m samaggaana.m sammodamaanaana.m avivadamaanaana.m sikkhata.m a~n~nama~n~nassa vaciisa.mhaaro uppanno di.t.thipa.laaso cetaso aaghaato appaccayo anabhiraddhi, ta.m jaanamaano sama.no garaheyyaa'ti {samaano (sii0 ka0)}. sammaa byaakaramaano, bhikkhave, bhikkhu eva.m byaakareyya ^a^T3.0047^ea^ -- `ya.m no, aavuso, amhaaka.m ^a^M3.0031^ea^ samaggaana.m sammodamaanaana.m avivadamaanaana.m sikkhata.m a~n~nama~n~nassa vaciisa.mhaaro uppanno di.t.thipa.laaso cetaso aaghaato appaccayo anabhiraddhi, ta.m jaanamaano sama.no garaheyyaati. eta.m panaavuso, dhamma.m appahaaya nibbaana.m sacchikareyyaa'ti. sammaa byaakaramaano, bhikkhave, bhikkhu eva.m byaakareyya -- `eta.m, aavuso, dhamma.m appahaaya na nibbaana.m sacchikareyyaa'ti.

[03] ``athaaparesa.m ekatopakkhikaana.m bhikkhuuna.m ya.m bhikkhu.m suvacatara.m ma~n~neyyaatha, so upasa"nkamitvaa ^a^V3.0029^ea^ evamassa vacaniiyo -- `ya.m no, aavuso, amhaaka.m samaggaana.m sammodamaanaana.m avivadamaanaana.m sikkhata.m a~n~nama~n~nassa vaciisa.mhaaro uppanno di.t.thipa.laaso cetaso aaghaato appaccayo anabhiraddhi, ta.m jaanamaano sama.no garaheyyaa'ti. sammaa byaakaramaano, bhikkhave, bhikkhu eva.m byaakareyya -- `ya.m no, aavuso, amhaaka.m samaggaana.m sammodamaanaana.m avivadamaanaana.m sikkhata.m a~n~nama~n~nassa vaciisa.mhaaro uppanno di.t.thipa.laaso cetaso aaghaato appaccayo anabhiraddhi ta.m jaanamaano sama.no garaheyyaati. eta.m panaavuso, dhamma.m appahaaya nibbaana.m sacchikareyyaa'ti. sammaa byaakaramaano, bhikkhave, bhikkhu eva.m byaakareyya ^a^P2.0243^ea^ -- `eta.m kho, aavuso, dhamma.m appahaaya na nibbaana.m sacchikareyyaa'''ti.

[03] ``ta.m ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu.m pare eva.m puccheyyu.m -- `aayasmataa no ete bhikkhuu akusalaa vu.t.thaapetvaa kusale pati.t.thaapitaa'ti? sammaa byaakaramaano, bhikkhave, bhikkhu eva.m byaakareyya ^a^T3.0048^ea^ -- `idhaaha.m, aavuso, yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.m, tassa me bhagavaa dhamma.m desesi, taaha.m dhamma.m sutvaa tesa.m bhikkhuuna.m abhaasi.m. ta.m te bhikkhuu dhamma.m sutvaa akusalaa vu.t.thahi.msu, kusale pati.t.thahi.msuu'ti. eva.m byaakaramaano kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na ceva attaana.m ukka.mseti, na para.m vambheti, dhammassa caanudhamma.m byaakaroti, na ca koci sahadhammiko vaadaanuvaado gaarayha.m .thaana.m aagacchatii''ti.
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamanaa te bhikkhuu bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandunti.
[06] kintisutta.m ni.t.thita.m tatiya.m.

[03] 41^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^M3.0032^ea^ ^a^V3.0030^ea^ ^a^T3.0049^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa sakkesu viharati saamagaame. tena kho pana samayena niga.n.tho naa.taputto {naathaputto (sii0 pii0)} paavaaya.m adhunaakaala"nkato {kaalakato (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} hoti. tassa kaala"nkiriyaaya bhinnaa niga.n.thaa dvedhikajaataa {dve.lhakajaataa (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} bha.n.danajaataa kalahajaataa vivaadaapannaa a~n~nama~n~na.m mukhasattiihi vitudantaa viharanti -- ``na tva.m ima.m dhammavinaya.m aajaanaasi, aha.m ima.m dhammavinaya.m aajaanaami. ki.m tva.m ima.m dhammavinaya.m aajaanissasi! micchaapa.tipanno tvamasi, ahamasmi sammaapa.tipanno. sahita.m me, asahita.m te. purevacaniiya.m pacchaa avaca ^a^P2.0244^ea^, pacchaavacaniiya.m pure avaca. adhici.n.na.m {avici.n.na.m (sii0 pii0)} te viparaavatta.m. aaropito te vaado. niggahitosi, cara vaadappamokkhaaya; nibbe.thehi vaa sace pahosii''ti. vadhoyeva kho {vadhoyeveko (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} ma~n~ne niga.n.thesu naa.taputtiyesu vattati. yepi niga.n.thassa naa.taputtassa saavakaa gihii odaatavasanaa tepi niga.n.thesu naa.taputtiyesu nibbinnaruupaa {nibbindaruupaa (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} virattaruupaa pa.tivaanaruupaa yathaa ta.m durakkhaate dhammavinaye duppavedite aniyyaanike anupasamasa.mvattanike asammaasambuddhappavedite bhinnathuupe appa.tisara.ne.

[03] 42^b^.^eb^ atha kho cundo sama.nuddeso paavaaya.m vassa.mvu.t.tho {vassa.mvuttho (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} yena saamagaamo yenaayasmaa aanando tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno ^a^T3.0050^ea^ kho cundo sama.nuddeso aayasmanta.m aananda.m etadavoca -- ``niga.n.tho, bhante, naa.taputto paavaaya.m adhunaakaala"nkato. tassa kaala"nkiriyaaya bhinnaa niga.n.thaa dvedhikajaataa...pe0... bhinnathuupe appa.tisara.ne''ti. eva.m vutte, aayasmaa aanando cunda.m sama.nuddesa.m etadavoca -- ``atthi kho ida.m, aavuso cunda, kathaapaabhata.m bhagavanta.m dassanaaya. aayaama, aavuso cunda, yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkamissaama; upasa"nkamitvaa etamattha.m bhagavato aarocessaamaa''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho cundo sama.nuddeso aayasmato aanandassa paccassosi.

[03] atha ^a^M3.0033^ea^ kho aayasmaa ca aanando cundo ca sama.nuddeso yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa ^a^P2.0245^ea^ aanando bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``aya.m, bhante, cundo sama.nuddeso evamaaha -- `niga.n.tho ^a^V3.0031^ea^, bhante, naa.taputto paavaaya.m adhunaakaala"nkato. tassa kaala"nkiriyaaya bhinnaa niga.n.thaa dvedhikajaataa...pe0... bhinnathuupe appa.tisara.ne'ti. tassa mayha.m, bhante, eva.m hoti -- `maaheva bhagavato accayena sa"nghe vivaado uppajji; svaassa {so (sii0 pii0), svaaya.m (ka0)} vivaado bahujanaahitaaya bahujanaasukhaaya bahuno janassa anatthaaya ahitaaya dukkhaaya devamanussaana'''nti.

[03] 43^b^.^eb^ ``ta.m ^a^T3.0051^ea^ ki.m ma~n~nasi, aananda, ye vo mayaa dhammaa abhi~n~naa desitaa, seyyathida.m -- cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa cattaaro sammappadhaanaa cattaaro iddhipaadaa pa~ncindriyaani pa~nca balaani satta bojjha"ngaa ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo, passasi no tva.m, aananda, imesu dhammesu dvepi bhikkhuu naanaavaade''ti? ``ye me, bhante, dhammaa bhagavataa abhi~n~naa desitaa, seyyathida.m -- cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa cattaaro sammappadhaanaa cattaaro iddhipaadaa pa~ncindriyaani pa~nca balaani satta bojjha"ngaa ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo, naaha.m passaami imesu dhammesu dvepi bhikkhuu naanaavaade. ye ca kho {santi ca kho (syaa0 ka.m0), santi ca (ka0)}, bhante, puggalaa bhagavanta.m patissayamaanaruupaa viharanti tepi bhagavato accayena sa"nghe vivaada.m janeyyu.m ajjhaajiive vaa adhipaatimokkhe vaa. svaassa {sossa (sii0 pii0), svaaya.m (ka0)} vivaado bahujanaahitaaya bahujanaasukhaaya bahuno janassa anatthaaya ahitaaya dukkhaaya devamanussaana''nti. appamattako so, aananda, vivaado yadida.m -- ajjhaajiive vaa adhipaatimokkhe vaa. magge vaa hi, aananda, pa.tipadaaya vaa sa"nghe vivaado uppajjamaano uppajjeyya; svaassa vivaado bahujanaahitaaya bahujanaasukhaaya bahuno janassa anatthaaya ahitaaya dukkhaaya devamanussaana.m.

[03] 44^b^.^eb^ ``chayimaani, aananda, vivaadamuulaani. katamaani cha? idhaananda, bhikkhu kodhano hoti upanaahii. yo so, aananda, bhikkhu kodhano hoti upanaahii so sattharipi agaaravo viharati appatisso, dhammepi ^a^M3.0034^ea^ agaaravo viharati appatisso, sa"nghepi ^a^T3.0052^ea^ agaaravo viharati appatisso, sikkhaayapi na paripuurakaarii hoti. yo so, aananda, bhikkhu satthari agaaravo viharati appatisso, dhamme... sa"nghe agaaravo viharati ^a^P2.0246^ea^ appatisso, sikkhaaya na paripuurakaarii hoti, so sa"nghe vivaada.m janeti; yo hoti vivaado bahujanaahitaaya bahujanaasukhaaya, bahuno janassa anatthaaya ahitaaya dukkhaaya devamanussaana.m. evaruupa~nce tumhe, aananda, vivaadamuula.m ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa samanupasseyyaatha, tatra tumhe, aananda, tasseva paapakassa vivaadamuulassa pahaanaaya vaayameyyaatha. evaruupa~nce tumhe, aananda, vivaadamuula.m ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa na samanupasseyyaatha. tatra tumhe, aananda, tasseva paapakassa ^a^V3.0032^ea^ vivaadamuulassa aayati.m anavassavaaya pa.tipajjeyyaatha. evametassa paapakassa vivaadamuulassa pahaana.m hoti, evametassa paapakassa vivaadamuulassa aayati.m anavassavo hoti.

[03] 45^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, aananda, bhikkhu makkhii hoti pa.laasii...pe0... issukii hoti maccharii...pe0... sa.tho hoti maayaavii...pe0... paapiccho hoti micchaadi.t.thi {micchaadi.t.thii (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0)} ...pe0... sandi.t.thiparaamaasii hoti aadhaanaggaahii duppa.tinissaggii. yo so, aananda, bhikkhu sandi.t.thiparaamaasii hoti aadhaanaggaahii duppa.tinissaggii so sattharipi agaaravo viharati appatisso, dhammepi agaaravo viharati appatisso, sa"nghepi agaaravo viharati appatisso, sikkhaayapi na paripuurakaarii hoti. yo so, aananda, bhikkhu satthari agaaravo viharati appatisso, dhamme... sa"nghe... sikkhaaya na paripuurakaarii hoti so ^a^T3.0053^ea^ sa"nghe vivaada.m janeti; yo hoti vivaado bahujanaahitaaya bahujanaasukhaaya, bahuno janassa anatthaaya ahitaaya dukkhaaya devamanussaana.m. evaruupa~nce tumhe, aananda, vivaadamuula.m ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa samanupasseyyaatha. tatra tumhe, aananda, tasseva paapakassa vivaadamuulassa pahaanaaya vaayameyyaatha. evaruupa~nce tumhe, aananda, vivaadamuula.m ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa na samanupasseyyaatha, tatra tumhe, aananda, tasseva paapakassa vivaadamuulassa aayati.m anavassavaaya pa.tipajjeyyaatha. evametassa paapakassa vivaadamuulassa pahaana.m hoti ^a^P2.0247^ea^, evametassa paapakassa vivaadamuulassa aayati.m anavassavo hoti. imaani kho, aananda, cha vivaadamuulaani.

[03] 46^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarimaani ^a^M3.0035^ea^, aananda, adhikara.naani. katamaani cattaari? vivaadaadhikara.na.m, anuvaadaadhikara.na.m, aapattaadhikara.na.m, kiccaadhikara.na.m -- imaani kho, aananda, cattaari adhikara.naani. satta kho panime, aananda, adhikara.nasamathaa -- uppannuppannaana.m adhikara.naana.m samathaaya vuupasamaaya sammukhaavinayo daatabbo, sativinayo daatabbo, amuu.lhavinayo daatabbo, pa.ti~n~naaya kaaretabba.m, yebhuyyasikaa, tassapaapiyasikaa, ti.navatthaarako.

[03] 47^b^.^eb^ ``katha~ncaananda, sammukhaavinayo hoti? idhaananda, bhikkhuu vivadanti dhammoti vaa adhammoti vaa vinayoti vaa avinayoti vaa. tehaananda, bhikkhuuhi sabbeheva samaggehi sannipatitabba.m. sannipatitvaa dhammanetti samanumajjitabbaa ^a^T3.0054^ea^. dhammanetti.m samanumajjitvaa yathaa tattha sameti ^a^V3.0033^ea^ tathaa ta.m adhikara.na.m vuupasametabba.m. eva.m kho, aananda, sammukhaavinayo hoti; eva~nca panidhekaccaana.m adhikara.naana.m vuupasamo hoti yadida.m -- sammukhaavinayena.

[03] 48^b^.^eb^ ``katha~ncaananda, yebhuyyasikaa hoti? te ce, aananda, bhikkhuu na sakkonti ta.m adhikara.na.m tasmi.m aavaase vuupasametu.m. tehaananda, bhikkhuuhi yasmi.m aavaase bahutaraa bhikkhuu so aavaaso gantabbo. tattha sabbeheva samaggehi sannipatitabba.m. sannipatitvaa dhammanetti samanumajjitabbaa. dhammanetti.m samanumajjitvaa yathaa tattha sameti tathaa ta.m adhikara.na.m vuupasametabba.m. eva.m kho, aananda, yebhuyyasikaa hoti, eva~nca panidhekaccaana.m adhikara.naana.m vuupasamo hoti yadida.m -- yebhuyyasikaaya.

[03] 49^b^.^eb^ ``katha~ncaananda, sativinayo hoti? idhaananda, bhikkhuu bhikkhu.m evaruupaaya garukaaya aapattiyaa codenti paaraajikena vaa paaraajikasaamantena vaa -- `sarataayasmaa evaruupi.m {evaruupa.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0) evaruupaaya-iti vuccamaanavacanena sameti. vinayenapi sa.msandetabba.m} garuka.m aapatti.m aapajjitaa paaraajika.m vaa paaraajikasaamanta.m vaa'ti? so evamaaha -- `na kho aha.m, aavuso, saraami evaruupi.m garuka.m aapatti.m aapajjitaa paaraajika.m vaa paaraajikasaamanta.m ^a^P2.0248^ea^ vaa'ti. tassa kho {tassa kho eva.m (sabbattha)}, aananda, bhikkhuno sativinayo daatabbo. eva.m kho, aananda, sativinayo hoti, eva~nca panidhekaccaana.m adhikara.naana.m vuupasamo hoti yadida.m -- sativinayena.

[03] 50^b^.^eb^ ``katha~ncaananda ^a^M3.0036^ea^ ^a^T3.0055^ea^, amuu.lhavinayo hoti? idhaananda, bhikkhuu bhikkhu.m evaruupaaya garukaaya aapattiyaa codenti paaraajikena vaa paaraajikasaamantena vaa -- `sarataayasmaa evaruupi.m garuka.m aapatti.m aapajjitaa paaraajika.m vaa paaraajikasaamanta.m vaa'ti?
