(so evamaaha -- `na kho aha.m, aavuso, saraami evaruupi.m garuka.m aapatti.m aapajjitaa paaraajika.m vaa paaraajikasaamanta.m vaa'ti. tamena.m so nibbe.thenta.m ative.theti -- `i"nghaayasmaa saadhukameva jaanaahi yadi sarasi evaruupi.m garuka.m aapatti.m aapajjitaa paaraajika.m vaa paaraajikasaamanta.m vaa'ti.) {( ) etthantare paa.tho cuu.lava0 237 natthi tassapaapiyasikaavaareevetena bhavitabba.m} so evamaaha -- `aha.m kho, aavuso, ummaada.m paapu.ni.m cetaso vipariyaasa.m. tena me ummattakena bahu.m assaama.naka.m ajjhaaci.n.na.m bhaasitaparikkanta.m {bhaasitaparikanta.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}. naaha.m ta.m saraami. muu.lhena me eta.m kata'nti. tassa kho {tassa kho eva.m (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)}, aananda, bhikkhuno amuu.lhavinayo daatabbo. eva.m kho, aananda ^a^V3.0034^ea^, amuu.lhavinayo hoti, eva~nca panidhekaccaana.m adhikara.naana.m vuupasamo hoti yadida.m -- amuu.lhavinayena.

[03] 51^b^.^eb^ ``katha~ncaananda, pa.ti~n~naatakara.na.m hoti? idhaananda, bhikkhu codito vaa acodito vaa aapatti.m sarati, vivarati uttaaniikaroti {uttaani.m karoti (ka0)}. tena, aananda, bhikkhunaa vu.d.dhatara.m bhikkhu.m {vu.d.dhataro bhikkhu (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} upasa"nkamitvaa eka.msa.m ciivara.m katvaa paade vanditvaa ukku.tika.m nisiiditvaa a~njali.m paggahetvaa evamassa vacaniiyo -- `aha.m, bhante, itthannaama.m aapatti.m aapanno, ta.m pa.tidesemii'ti. so evamaaha -- `passasii'ti? `aama passaamii'ti. `aayati.m ^a^T3.0056^ea^ sa.mvareyyaasii'ti. (`sa.mvarissaamii'ti.) {( ) vinaye natthi} eva.m kho, aananda, pa.ti~n~naatakara.na.m hoti, eva~nca panidhekaccaana.m adhikara.naana.m vuupasamo hoti yadida.m -- pa.ti~n~naatakara.nena.

[03] 52^b^.^eb^ ``katha~ncaananda ^a^P2.0249^ea^, tassapaapiyasikaa hoti? idhaananda, bhikkhu bhikkhu.m evaruupaaya garukaaya aapattiyaa codeti paaraajikena vaa paaraajikasaamantena vaa -- `sarataayasmaa evaruupi.m garuka.m aapatti.m aapajjitaa paaraajika.m vaa paaraajikasaamanta.m vaa'ti? so evamaaha -- `na kho aha.m, aavuso, saraami evaruupi.m garuka.m aapatti.m aapajjitaa paaraajika.m vaa paaraajikasaamanta.m ^a^M3.0037^ea^ vaa'ti. tamena.m so nibbe.thenta.m ative.theti -- `i"nghaayasmaa saadhukameva jaanaahi yadi sarasi evaruupi.m garuka.m aapatti.m aapajjitaa paaraajika.m vaa paaraajikasaamanta.m vaa'ti. so evamaaha -- `na kho aha.m, aavuso, saraami evaruupi.m garuka.m aapatti.m aapajjitaa paaraajika.m vaa paaraajikasaamanta.m vaa; saraami ca kho aha.m, aavuso, evaruupi.m appamattika.m aapatti.m aapajjitaa'ti. tamena.m so nibbe.thenta.m ative.theti -- `i"nghaayasmaa saadhukameva jaanaahi yadi sarasi evaruupi.m garuka.m aapatti.m aapajjitaa paaraajika.m vaa paaraajikasaamanta.m vaa'ti? so evamaaha -- `ima~nhi naamaaha.m, aavuso, appamattika.m aapatti.m aapajjitvaa apu.t.tho pa.tijaanissaami. ki.m panaaha.m evaruupi.m garuka.m aapatti.m aapajjitvaa paaraajika.m vaa paaraajikasaamanta.m vaa pu.t.tho napa.tijaanissaamii'ti? so evamaaha -- `ima~nhi naama tva.m, aavuso ^a^T3.0057^ea^, appamattika.m aapatti.m aapajjitvaa apu.t.tho napa.tijaanissasi, ki.m pana tva.m evaruupi.m garuka.m aapatti.m aapajjitvaa paaraajika.m vaa paaraajikasaamanta.m vaa pu.t.tho {apu.t.tho (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} pa.tijaanissasi? i"nghaayasmaa saadhukameva jaanaahi yadi sarasi evaruupi.m garuka.m aapatti.m aapajjitaa paaraajika.m vaa paaraajikasaamanta.m vaa'ti. so evamaaha -- `saraami kho aha.m, aavuso, evaruupi.m garuka.m aapatti.m ^a^V3.0035^ea^ aapajjitaa paaraajika.m vaa paaraajikasaamanta.m vaa. davaa me eta.m vutta.m, ravaa me eta.m vutta.m -- naaha.m ta.m saraami evaruupi.m garuka.m aapatti.m aapajjitaa paaraajika.m vaa paaraajikasaamanta.m vaa'ti. eva.m kho, aananda, tassapaapiyasikaa hoti, eva~nca panidhekaccaana.m adhikara.naana.m vuupasamo hoti yadida.m -- tassapaapiyasikaaya.

[03] 53^b^.^eb^ ``katha~ncaananda ^a^P2.0250^ea^, ti.navatthaarako hoti? idhaananda, bhikkhuuna.m bha.n.danajaataana.m kalahajaataana.m vivaadaapannaana.m viharata.m bahu.m assaama.naka.m ajjhaaci.n.na.m hoti bhaasitaparikkanta.m. tehaananda, bhikkhuuhi sabbeheva samaggehi sannipatitabba.m. sannipatitvaa ekatopakkhikaana.m bhikkhuuna.m byattena {byattatarena (sii0 pii0 ka0)} bhikkhunaa u.t.thaayaasanaa eka.msa.m ciivara.m katvaa a~njali.m pa.naametvaa sa"ngho ~naapetabbo --

[03] `su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. ida.m amhaaka.m bha.n.danajaataana.m kalahajaataana.m vivaadaapannaana.m viharata.m bahu.m assaama.naka.m ajjhaaci.n.na.m bhaasitaparikkanta.m ^a^M3.0038^ea^. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, aha.m yaa ceva imesa.m aayasmantaana.m aapatti yaa ca attano aapatti, imesa~nceva aayasmantaana.m atthaaya attano ca atthaaya, sa"nghamajjhe ^a^T3.0058^ea^ ti.navatthaarakena deseyya.m, .thapetvaa thullavajja.m .thapetvaa gihipa.tisa.myutta'''nti.
[03] ``athaaparesa.m ekatopakkhikaana.m bhikkhuuna.m byattena bhikkhunaa u.t.thaayaasanaa eka.msa.m ciivara.m katvaa a~njali.m pa.naametvaa sa"ngho ~naapetabbo --

[03] `su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. ida.m amhaaka.m bha.n.danajaataana.m kalahajaataana.m vivaadaapannaana.m viharata.m bahu.m assaama.naka.m ajjhaaci.n.na.m bhaasitaparikkanta.m. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, aha.m yaa ceva imesa.m aayasmantaana.m aapatti yaa ca attano aapatti, imesa~nceva aayasmantaana.m atthaaya attano ca atthaaya, sa"nghamajjhe ti.navatthaarakena deseyya.m, .thapetvaa thullavajja.m .thapetvaa gihipa.tisa.myutta'''nti.
[03] ``eva.m kho, aananda, ti.navatthaarako hoti, eva~nca panidhekaccaana.m adhikara.naana.m vuupasamo hoti yadida.m -- ti.navatthaarakena.

[03] 54^b^.^eb^ ``chayime ^a^V3.0036^ea^, aananda, dhammaa saara.niiyaa piyakara.naa garukara.naa sa"ngahaaya avivaadaaya saamaggiyaa ekiibhaavaaya sa.mvattanti. katame cha? idhaananda, bhikkhuno metta.m kaayakamma.m paccupa.t.thita.m hoti sabrahmacaariisu aavi ceva raho ca. ayampi dhammo saara.niiyo piyakara.no garukara.no sa"ngahaaya avivaadaaya saamaggiyaa ekiibhaavaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aananda, bhikkhuno metta.m vaciikamma.m paccupa.t.thita.m hoti sabrahmacaariisu aavi ceva raho ca. ayampi dhammo saara.niiyo piyakara.no garukara.no ^a^P2.0251^ea^ sa"ngahaaya avivaadaaya saamaggiyaa ^a^T3.0059^ea^ ekiibhaavaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aananda, bhikkhuno metta.m manokamma.m paccupa.t.thita.m hoti sabrahmacaariisu aavi ceva raho ca. ayampi dhammo saara.niiyo piyakara.no garukara.no sa"ngahaaya avivaadaaya saamaggiyaa ekiibhaavaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aananda, bhikkhu -- ye te laabhaa dhammikaa dhammaladdhaa antamaso pattapariyaapannamattampi tathaaruupehi laabhehi -- apa.tivibhattabhogii hoti, siilavantehi sabrahmacaariihi saadhaara.nabhogii. ayampi dhammo ^a^M3.0039^ea^ saara.niiyo piyakara.no garukara.no sa"ngahaaya avivaadaaya saamaggiyaa ekiibhaavaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aananda, bhikkhu -- yaani taani siilaani akha.n.daani acchiddaani asabalaani akammaasaani bhujissaani vi~n~nuppasatthaani aparaama.t.thaani samaadhisa.mvattanikaani tathaaruupesu siilesu -- siilasaama~n~nagato viharati sabrahmacaariihi aavi ceva raho ca. ayampi dhammo saara.niiyo piyakara.no garukara.no sa"ngahaaya avivaadaaya saamaggiyaa ekiibhaavaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aananda, bhikkhu -- yaaya.m di.t.thi ariyaa niyyaanikaa niyyaati takkarassa sammaa dukkhakkhayaa tathaaruupaaya di.t.thiyaa -- di.t.thisaama~n~nagato viharati sabrahmacaariihi aavi ceva raho ca. ayampi dhammo saara.niiyo piyakara.no garukara.no sa"ngahaaya avivaadaaya saamaggiyaa ^a^V3.0037^ea^ ekiibhaavaaya sa.mvattati. ime kho, aananda, cha saara.niiyaa dhammaa piyakara.naa garukara.naa sa"ngahaaya avivaadaaya saamaggiyaa ekiibhaavaaya sa.mvattanti.

[03] ``ime ce tumhe, aananda, cha saara.niiye dhamme samaadaaya vatteyyaatha, passatha no tumhe, aananda, ta.m vacanapatha.m a.nu.m vaa thuula.m vaa ya.m tumhe naadhivaaseyyaathaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``tasmaatihaananda ^a^T3.0060^ea^, ime cha saara.niiye dhamme samaadaaya vattatha. ta.m vo bhavissati diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaayaa''ti.
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamano aayasmaa aanando bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandiiti.
[06] saamagaamasutta.m ni.t.thita.m catuttha.m.

[03] 55^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T3.0061^ea^ ^a^V3.0038^ea^ ^a^P2.0252^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa vesaaliya.m viharati mahaavane kuu.taagaarasaalaaya.m. tena kho pana samayena sambahulehi bhikkhuuhi ^a^M3.0040^ea^ bhagavato santike a~n~naa byaakataa hoti -- ```khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaamaa''ti. assosi kho sunakkhatto licchaviputto -- ``sambahulehi kira bhikkhuuhi bhagavato santike a~n~naa byaakataa hoti -- `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaamaa''ti. atha kho sunakkhatto licchaviputto yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho sunakkhatto licchaviputto bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``suta.m meta.m, bhante -- `sambahulehi kira bhikkhuuhi bhagavato santike a~n~naa byaakataa -- khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaamaa''ti. ``ye te, bhante, bhikkhuu bhagavato santike a~n~na.m byaaka.msu -- `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaamaa''ti, kacci te, bhante, bhikkhuu sammadeva a~n~na.m byaaka.msu udaahu santetthekacce bhikkhuu adhimaanena a~n~na.m byaaka.msuuti?

[03] 56^b^.^eb^ ``ye te, sunakkhatta, bhikkhuu mama santike a~n~na.m byaaka.msu -- `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaamaa''ti ^a^T3.0062^ea^. ``santetthekacce bhikkhuu sammadeva a~n~na.m byaaka.msu, santi panidhekacce bhikkhuu adhimaanenapi {adhimaanena (?)} a~n~na.m byaaka.msu. tatra, sunakkhatta, ye te bhikkhuu sammadeva a~n~na.m byaaka.msu tesa.m ta.m tatheva hoti; ye pana te bhikkhuu adhimaanena a~n~na.m byaaka.msu tatra, sunakkhatta, tathaagatassa eva.m hoti -- `dhamma.m nesa.m desessa'nti {deseyyanti (pii0 ka0)}. eva~ncettha, sunakkhatta, tathaagatassa hoti -- `dhamma.m nesa.m desessa'nti. atha ca panidhekacce moghapurisaa pa~nha.m abhisa"nkharitvaa abhisa"nkharitvaa tathaagata.m upasa"nkamitvaa pucchanti. tatra, sunakkhatta, yampi ^a^P2.0253^ea^ tathaagatassa eva.m hoti -- `dhamma.m nesa.m desessa'nti tassapi hoti a~n~nathatta''nti. ``etassa bhagavaa kaalo, etassa sugata kaalo, ya.m bhagavaa dhamma.m deseyya. bhagavato sutvaa bhikkhuu dhaaressantii''ti. ``tena hi, sunakkhatta su.naahi, saadhuka.m manasi karohi ^a^V3.0039^ea^; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho sunakkhatto licchaviputto bhagavato paccassosi. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] 57^b^.^eb^ ``pa~nca ^a^M3.0041^ea^ kho ime, sunakkhatta, kaamagu.naa. katame pa~nca? cakkhuvi~n~neyyaa ruupaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa, sotavi~n~neyyaa saddaa...pe0... ghaanavi~n~neyyaa gandhaa... jivhaavi~n~neyyaa rasaa... kaayavi~n~neyyaa pho.t.thabbaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa -- ime kho, sunakkhatta, pa~nca kaamagu.naa.

[03] 58^b^.^eb^ ``.thaana.m kho paneta.m, sunakkhatta, vijjati ya.m idhekacco purisapuggalo ^a^T3.0063^ea^ lokaamisaadhimutto assa. lokaamisaadhimuttassa kho, sunakkhatta, purisapuggalassa tappatiruupii ceva kathaa sa.n.thaati, tadanudhamma~nca anuvitakketi, anuvicaareti, ta~nca purisa.m bhajati, tena ca vitti.m aapajjati; aane~njapa.tisa.myuttaaya ca pana kathaaya kacchamaanaaya na sussuusati, na sota.m odahati, na a~n~naa citta.m upa.t.thaapeti {upa.t.thapeti (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}, na ca ta.m purisa.m bhajati, na ca tena vitti.m aapajjati. seyyathaapi, sunakkhatta, puriso sakamhaa gaamaa vaa nigamaa vaa ciravippavuttho assa. so a~n~natara.m purisa.m passeyya tamhaa gaamaa vaa nigamaa vaa acirapakkanta.m. so ta.m purisa.m tassa gaamassa vaa nigamassa vaa khemata~nca subhikkhata~nca appaabaadhata~nca puccheyya; tassa so puriso tassa gaamassa vaa nigamassa vaa khemata~nca subhikkhata~nca ^a^P2.0254^ea^ appaabaadhata~nca sa.mseyya. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, sunakkhatta, api nu so puriso tassa purisassa sussuuseyya, sota.m odaheyya, a~n~naa citta.m upa.t.thaapeyya, ta~nca purisa.m bhajeyya, tena ca vitti.m aapajjeyyaa''ti? ``eva.m, bhante''. ``evameva kho, sunakkhatta, .thaanameta.m vijjati ya.m idhekacco purisapuggalo lokaamisaadhimutto assa. lokaamisaadhimuttassa kho, sunakkhatta, purisapuggalassa tappatiruupii ceva kathaa sa.n.thaati, tadanudhamma~nca anuvitakketi, anuvicaareti, ta~nca purisa.m bhajati, tena ca vitti.m aapajjati; aane~njapa.tisa.myuttaaya ca pana kathaaya kacchamaanaaya na ^a^T3.0064^ea^ sussuusati, na sota.m odahati, na a~n~naa citta.m upa.t.thaapeti, na ca ta.m purisa.m bhajati, na ca tena vitti.m aapajjati. so evamassa veditabbo -- `aane~njasa.myojanena hi kho visa.myutto {aane~njasa.myojanena hi kho visa.myutto-iti paa.tho sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 potthakesu natthi, a.t.thakathaasu pana tabba.n.nanaa dissatiyeva} lokaamisaadhimutto purisapuggalo'''ti.

[03] 59^b^.^eb^ ``.thaana.m ^a^M3.0042^ea^ kho paneta.m, sunakkhatta, vijjati ya.m idhekacco purisapuggalo aane~njaadhimutto ^a^V3.0040^ea^ assa. aane~njaadhimuttassa kho, sunakkhatta, purisapuggalassa tappatiruupii ceva kathaa sa.n.thaati, tadanudhamma~nca anuvitakketi, anuvicaareti, ta~nca purisa.m bhajati, tena ca vitti.m aapajjati; lokaamisapa.tisa.myuttaaya ca pana kathaaya kacchamaanaaya na sussuusati, na sota.m odahati, na a~n~naa citta.m upa.t.thaapeti, na ca ta.m purisa.m bhajati, na ca tena vitti.m aapajjati. seyyathaapi, sunakkhatta, pa.n.dupalaaso bandhanaa pavutto abhabbo haritattaaya; evameva kho, sunakkhatta, aane~njaadhimuttassa purisapuggalassa ye lokaamisasa.myojane se pavutte. so evamassa veditabbo -- `lokaamisasa.myojanena hi kho visa.myutto aane~njaadhimutto purisapuggalo'''ti.

[03] 60^b^.^eb^ ``.thaana.m kho paneta.m, sunakkhatta, vijjati ya.m idhekacco purisapuggalo aaki~nca~n~naayatanaadhimutto assa. aaki~nca~n~naayatanaadhimuttassa kho, sunakkhatta, purisapuggalassa tappatiruupii ceva kathaa sa.n.thaati, tadanudhamma~nca anuvitakketi, anuvicaareti, ta~nca purisa.m bhajati, tena ca vitti.m aapajjati ^a^P2.0255^ea^; aane~njapa.tisa.myuttaaya ca pana kathaaya kacchamaanaaya na sussuusati, na sota.m odahati, na a~n~naa citta.m upa.t.thaapeti ^a^T3.0065^ea^, na ca ta.m purisa.m bhajati, na ca tena vitti.m aapajjati. seyyathaapi, sunakkhatta, puthusilaa dvedhaabhinnaa appa.tisandhikaa hoti; evameva kho, sunakkhatta, aaki~nca~n~naayatanaadhimuttassa purisapuggalassa ye aane~njasa.myojane se bhinne. so evamassa veditabbo -- `aane~njasa.myojanena hi kho visa.myutto aaki~nca~n~naayatanaadhimutto purisapuggalo'''ti.

[03] 61^b^.^eb^ ``.thaana.m kho paneta.m, sunakkhatta, vijjati ya.m idhekacco purisapuggalo nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanaadhimutto assa. nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanaadhimuttassa kho, sunakkhatta, purisapuggalassa tappatiruupii ceva kathaa sa.n.thaati, tadanudhamma~nca anuvitakketi, anuvicaareti, ta~nca purisa.m bhajati, tena ca vitti.m aapajjati; aaki~nca~n~naayatanapa.tisa.myuttaaya ca pana kathaaya kacchamaanaaya na sussuusati, na sota.m odahati, na a~n~naa citta.m upa.t.thaapeti, na ca ta.m purisa.m bhajati, na ca tena vitti.m aapajjati. seyyathaapi, sunakkhatta, puriso manu~n~nabhojana.m bhuttaavii cha.d.deyya {chaddeyya (?)}. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, sunakkhatta, api ^a^M3.0043^ea^ nu tassa purisassa tasmi.m bhatte {vante (ka0 sii0), bhutte (ka0 sii0 ka0)} puna bhottukamyataa assaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``ta.m kissa hetu''? ``adu~nhi, bhante, bhatta.m {vanta.m (sii0)} pa.tikuulasammata''nti. ``evameva kho, sunakkhatta, nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanaadhimuttassa ^a^V3.0041^ea^ purisapuggalassa ye aaki~nca~n~naayatanasa.myojane se vante. so evamassa veditabbo -- `aaki~nca~n~naayatanasa.myojanena hi kho visa.myutto nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanaadhimutto ^a^T3.0066^ea^ purisapuggalo'ti.

[03] 62^b^.^eb^ ``.thaana.m kho paneta.m, sunakkhatta, vijjati ya.m idhekacco purisapuggalo sammaa nibbaanaadhimutto assa. sammaa nibbaanaadhimuttassa kho, sunakkhatta, purisapuggalassa tappatiruupii ceva kathaa sa.n.thaati, tadanudhamma~nca anuvitakketi, anuvicaareti, ta~nca purisa.m bhajati, tena ca vitti.m aapajjati; nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanapa.tisa.myuttaaya ca pana kathaaya ^a^P2.0256^ea^ kacchamaanaaya na sussuusati, na sota.m odahati, na a~n~naa citta.m upa.t.thaapeti, na ca ta.m purisa.m bhajati, na ca tena vitti.m aapajjati. seyyathaapi, sunakkhatta, taalo matthakacchinno abhabbo puna viru.lhiyaa; evameva kho, sunakkhatta, sammaa nibbaanaadhimuttassa purisapuggalassa ye nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanasa.myojane se ucchinnamuule taalaavatthukate anabhaava.mkate {anabhaavakate (sii0 pii0), anabhaava"ngate (syaa0 ka.m0)} aayati.m anuppaadadhamme. so evamassa veditabbo -- `nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanasa.myojanena hi kho visa.myutto sammaa nibbaanaadhimutto purisapuggalo'''ti.

[03] 63^b^.^eb^ ``.thaana.m kho paneta.m, sunakkhatta, vijjati ya.m idhekaccassa bhikkhuno evamassa -- `ta.nhaa kho salla.m sama.nena vutta.m, avijjaavisadoso, chandaraagabyaapaadena ruppati. ta.m me ta.nhaasalla.m pahiina.m, apaniito avijjaavisadoso, sammaa nibbaanaadhimuttohamasmii'ti. eva.mmaani {eva.mmaanii (sii0 pii0 ka0), evamaadi (syaa0 ka.m0)} assa atatha.m samaana.m {attha.m samaana.m (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0), atthasamaana.m (sii0)}. so yaani sammaa nibbaanaadhimuttassa asappaayaani taani anuyu~njeyya; asappaaya.m cakkhunaa ruupadassana.m anuyu~njeyya, asappaaya.m sotena ^a^T3.0067^ea^ sadda.m anuyu~njeyya, asappaaya.m ghaanena gandha.m anuyu~njeyya, asappaaya.m jivhaaya rasa.m anuyu~njeyya, asappaaya.m kaayena pho.t.thabba.m anuyu~njeyya ^a^M3.0044^ea^, asappaaya.m manasaa dhamma.m anuyu~njeyya. tassa asappaaya.m cakkhunaa ruupadassana.m anuyuttassa, asappaaya.m sotena sadda.m anuyuttassa, asappaaya.m ghaanena gandha.m anuyuttassa, asappaaya.m jivhaaya rasa.m anuyuttassa, asappaaya.m kaayena pho.t.thabba.m anuyuttassa, asappaaya.m manasaa dhamma.m anuyuttassa raago citta.m anuddha.mseyya. so raagaanuddha.msitena cittena mara.na.m vaa nigaccheyya mara.namatta.m vaa dukkha.m.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, sunakkhatta, puriso sallena viddho assa savisena gaa.lhuupalepanena. tassa mittaamaccaa ^a^V3.0042^ea^ ~naatisaalohitaa bhisakka.m sallakatta.m upa.t.thaapeyyu.m. tassa so bhisakko sallakatto satthena va.namukha.m parikanteyya. satthena va.namukha.m parikantitvaa esaniyaa salla.m eseyya. esaniyaa salla.m esitvaa salla.m ^a^P2.0257^ea^ abbuheyya, apaneyya visadosa.m saupaadisesa.m. saupaadisesoti {anupaadisesoti (sabbattha) aya.m hi tathaagatassa visayo} jaanamaano so eva.m vadeyya -- `ambho purisa, ubbhata.m kho te salla.m, apaniito visadoso saupaadiseso {anupaadiseso (sabbattha) ayampi tathaagatassa visayo}. anala~nca te antaraayaaya. sappaayaani ceva bhojanaani bhu~njeyyaasi, maa te asappaayaani bhojanaani bhu~njato va.no assaavii assa. kaalena kaala~nca va.na.m dhoveyyaasi, kaalena kaala.m va.namukha.m aalimpeyyaasi, maa te na kaalena kaala.m va.na.m dhovato na kaalena kaala.m va.namukha.m ^a^T3.0068^ea^ aalimpato pubbalohita.m va.namukha.m pariyonandhi. maa ca vaataatape caaritta.m anuyu~nji, maa te vaataatape caaritta.m anuyuttassa rajosuuka.m va.namukha.m anuddha.msesi. va.naanurakkhii ca, ambho purisa, vihareyyaasi va.nasaaropii'ti {va.nassaaropiiti (ka0) va.na + sa.m + ropii = va.nasaaropii-iti padavibhaago}. tassa evamassa -- `ubbhata.m kho me salla.m, apaniito visadoso anupaadiseso. anala~nca me antaraayaayaa'ti. so asappaayaani ceva bhojanaani bhu~njeyya. tassa asappaayaani bhojanaani bhu~njato va.no assaavii assa. na ca kaalena kaala.m va.na.m dhoveyya, na ca kaalena kaala.m va.namukha.m aalimpeyya. tassa na kaalena kaala.m va.na.m dhovato, na kaalena kaala.m va.namukha.m aalimpato pubbalohita.m va.namukha.m pariyonandheyya. vaataatape ca caaritta.m anuyu~njeyya. tassa vaataatape caaritta.m anuyuttassa rajosuuka.m va.namukha.m ^a^M3.0045^ea^ anuddha.mseyya. na ca va.naanurakkhii vihareyya na va.nasaaropii. tassa imissaa ca asappaayakiriyaaya, asuci visadoso apaniito saupaadiseso tadubhayena va.no puthutta.m gaccheyya. so puthutta.m gatena va.nena mara.na.m vaa nigaccheyya mara.namatta.m vaa dukkha.m.

[03] ``evameva kho, sunakkhatta, .thaanameta.m vijjati ya.m idhekaccassa bhikkhuno evamassa -- `ta.nhaa kho salla.m sama.nena vutta.m, avijjaavisadoso chandaraagabyaapaadena ruppati. ta.m me ta.nhaasalla.m pahiina.m, apaniito ^a^P2.0258^ea^ avijjaavisadoso, sammaa nibbaanaadhimuttohamasmii'ti. eva.mmaani assa atatha.m samaana.m. so yaani sammaa nibbaanaadhimuttassa asappaayaani taani anuyu~njeyya, asappaaya.m cakkhunaa ^a^T3.0069^ea^ ruupadassana.m anuyu~njeyya, asappaaya.m sotena sadda.m anuyu~njeyya, asappaaya.m ghaanena gandha.m anuyu~njeyya, asappaaya.m jivhaaya rasa.m anuyu~njeyya, asappaaya.m kaayena pho.t.thabba.m anuyu~njeyya, asappaaya.m manasaa dhamma.m anuyu~njeyya. tassa asappaaya.m cakkhunaa ruupadassana.m anuyuttassa, asappaaya.m sotena sadda.m anuyuttassa, asappaaya.m ghaanena ^a^V3.0043^ea^ gandha.m anuyuttassa, asappaaya.m jivhaaya rasa.m anuyuttassa, asappaaya.m kaayena pho.t.thabba.m anuyuttassa, asappaaya.m manasaa dhamma.m anuyuttassa raago citta.m anuddha.mseyya. so raagaanuddha.msitena cittena mara.na.m vaa nigaccheyya mara.namatta.m vaa dukkha.m. mara.na~nheta.m, sunakkhatta, ariyassa vinaye yo sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattati; mara.namatta~nheta.m, sunakkhatta, dukkha.m ya.m a~n~natara.m sa.mkili.t.tha.m aapatti.m aapajjati.

[03] 64^b^.^eb^ ``.thaana.m kho paneta.m, sunakkhatta, vijjati ya.m idhekaccassa bhikkhuno evamassa -- `ta.nhaa kho salla.m sama.nena vutta.m, avijjaavisadoso chandaraagabyaapaadena ruppati. ta.m me ta.nhaasalla.m pahiina.m, apaniito avijjaavisadoso, sammaa nibbaanaadhimuttohamasmii'ti. sammaa nibbaanaadhimuttasseva sato so yaani sammaa nibbaanaadhimuttassa asappaayaani taani naanuyu~njeyya, asappaaya.m cakkhunaa ruupadassana.m naanuyu~njeyya, asappaaya.m sotena sadda.m naanuyu~njeyya, asappaaya.m ghaanena gandha.m naanuyu~njeyya, asappaaya.m jivhaaya rasa.m naanuyu~njeyya, asappaaya.m kaayena ^a^T3.0070^ea^ pho.t.thabba.m naanuyu~njeyya, asappaaya.m manasaa dhamma.m naanuyu~njeyya. tassa asappaaya.m cakkhunaa ruupadassana.m naanuyuttassa, asappaaya.m sotena sadda.m naanuyuttassa, asappaaya.m ghaanena gandha.m naanuyuttassa, asappaaya.m jivhaaya rasa.m naanuyuttassa, asappaaya.m ^a^M3.0046^ea^ kaayena pho.t.thabba.m naanuyuttassa, asappaaya.m manasaa dhamma.m naanuyuttassa raago citta.m naanuddha.mseyya. so na raagaanuddha.msitena ^a^P2.0259^ea^ cittena neva mara.na.m vaa nigaccheyya na mara.namatta.m vaa dukkha.m.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, sunakkhatta, puriso sallena viddho assa savisena gaa.lhuupalepanena. tassa mittaamaccaa ~naatisaalohitaa bhisakka.m sallakatta.m upa.t.thaapeyyu.m. tassa so bhisakko sallakatto satthena va.namukha.m parikanteyya. satthena va.namukha.m parikantitvaa esaniyaa salla.m eseyya. esaniyaa salla.m esitvaa salla.m abbuheyya, apaneyya visadosa.m anupaadisesa.m. anupaadisesoti jaanamaano so eva.m vadeyya -- `ambho purisa, ubbhata.m kho te salla.m, apaniito visadoso anupaadiseso. anala~nca te antaraayaaya. sappaayaani ceva bhojanaani bhu~njeyyaasi, maa te asappaayaani bhojanaani bhu~njato va.no assaavii assa. kaalena kaala~nca va.na.m dhoveyyaasi, kaalena kaala.m va.namukha.m aalimpeyyaasi. maa te na kaalena kaala.m va.na.m dhovato na kaalena kaala.m va.namukha.m aalimpato pubbalohita.m va.namukha.m pariyonandhi. maa ca vaataatape caaritta.m anuyu~nji, maa te vaataatape caaritta.m anuyuttassa rajosuuka.m va.namukha.m anuddha.msesi ^a^T3.0071^ea^ ^a^V3.0044^ea^. va.naanurakkhii ca, ambho purisa, vihareyyaasi va.nasaaropii'ti. tassa evamassa -- `ubbhata.m kho me salla.m, apaniito visadoso anupaadiseso. anala~nca me antaraayaayaa'ti. so sappaayaani ceva bhojanaani bhu~njeyya. tassa sappaayaani bhojanaani bhu~njato va.no na assaavii assa. kaalena kaala~nca va.na.m dhoveyya, kaalena kaala.m va.namukha.m aalimpeyya. tassa kaalena kaala.m va.na.m dhovato kaalena kaala.m va.namukha.m aalimpato na pubbalohita.m va.namukha.m pariyonandheyya. na ca vaataatape caaritta.m anuyu~njeyya. tassa vaataatape caaritta.m ananuyuttassa rajosuuka.m va.namukha.m naanuddha.mseyya. va.naanurakkhii ca vihareyya va.nasaaropii. tassa imissaa ca sappaayakiriyaaya asu ca {asuci (sabbattha) socaati tabba.n.nanaa manasikaatabbaa} visadoso apaniito anupaadiseso tadubhayena va.no viruheyya. so ru.lhena va.nena sa~nchavinaa neva mara.na.m vaa nigaccheyya na mara.namatta.m vaa dukkha.m.

[03] ``evameva ^a^M3.0047^ea^ kho, sunakkhatta, .thaanameta.m vijjati ya.m idhekaccassa bhikkhuno evamassa -- `ta.nhaa kho salla.m sama.nena vutta.m, avijjaavisadoso ^a^P2.0260^ea^ chandaraagabyaapaadena ruppati. ta.m me ta.nhaasalla.m pahiina.m, apaniito avijjaavisadoso, sammaa nibbaanaadhimuttohamasmii'ti. sammaa nibbaanaadhimuttasseva sato so yaani sammaa nibbaanaadhimuttassa asappaayaani taani naanuyu~njeyya, asappaaya.m cakkhunaa ruupadassana.m naanuyu~njeyya, asappaaya.m sotena sadda.m naanuyu~njeyya, asappaaya.m ghaanena gandha.m naanuyu~njeyya, asappaaya.m jivhaaya rasa.m naanuyu~njeyya, asappaaya.m kaayena ^a^T3.0072^ea^ pho.t.thabba.m naanuyu~njeyya, asappaaya.m manasaa dhamma.m naanuyu~njeyya. tassa asappaaya.m cakkhunaa ruupadassana.m naanuyuttassa, asappaaya.m sotena sadda.m naanuyuttassa, asappaaya.m ghaanena gandha.m naanuyuttassa, asappaaya.m jivhaaya rasa.m naanuyuttassa, asappaaya.m kaayena pho.t.thabba.m naanuyuttassa, asappaaya.m manasaa dhamma.m naanuyuttassa, raago citta.m naanuddha.mseyya. so na raagaanuddha.msitena cittena neva mara.na.m vaa nigaccheyya na mara.namatta.m vaa dukkha.m.

[03] 65^b^.^eb^ ``upamaa kho me aya.m, sunakkhatta, kataa atthassa vi~n~naapanaaya. aya.myevettha attho -- va.noti kho, sunakkhatta, channeta.m ajjhattikaana.m aayatanaana.m adhivacana.m; visadosoti kho, sunakkhatta, avijjaayeta.m adhivacana.m; sallanti kho, sunakkhatta, ta.nhaayeta.m adhivacana.m; esaniiti kho, sunakkhatta, satiyaayeta.m adhivacana.m; satthanti kho, sunakkhatta, ariyaayeta.m pa~n~naaya ^a^V3.0045^ea^ adhivacana.m; bhisakko sallakattoti kho, sunakkhatta, tathaagatasseta.m adhivacana.m arahato sammaasambuddhassa.

[03] ``so vata, sunakkhatta, bhikkhu chasu phassaayatanesu sa.mvutakaarii `upadhi dukkhassa muula'nti -- iti viditvaa nirupadhi upadhisa"nkhaye vimutto upadhismi.m vaa kaaya.m upasa.mharissati citta.m vaa uppaadessatiiti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. seyyathaapi, sunakkhatta, aapaaniiyaka.mso va.n.nasampanno gandhasampanno rasasampanno; so ca kho visena sa.msa.t.tho. atha puriso aagaccheyya jiivitukaamo amaritukaamo sukhakaamo dukkhapa.tikuulo. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, sunakkhatta, api nu so puriso amu.m aapaaniiyaka.msa.m ^a^T3.0073^ea^ piveyya ya.m ja~n~naa -- `imaaha.m pivitvaa mara.na.m vaa nigacchaami mara.namatta.m vaa dukkha'''nti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``evameva ^a^P2.0261^ea^ kho, sunakkhatta, so vata bhikkhu chasu phassaayatanesu sa.mvutakaarii `upadhi dukkhassa muula'nti -- iti viditvaa nirupadhi upadhisa"nkhaye vimutto ^a^M3.0048^ea^ upadhismi.m vaa kaaya.m upasa.mharissati citta.m vaa uppaadessatiiti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. seyyathaapi, sunakkhatta, aasiiviso {aasiviso (ka0)} ghoraviso. atha puriso aagaccheyya jiivitukaamo amaritukaamo sukhakaamo dukkhapa.tikuulo. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, sunakkhatta, api nu so puriso amussa aasiivisassa ghoravisassa hattha.m vaa a"ngu.t.tha.m vaa dajjaa {yu~njeyya (ka0)} ya.m ja~n~naa -- `iminaaha.m da.t.tho mara.na.m vaa nigacchaami mara.namatta.m vaa dukkha'''nti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``evameva kho, sunakkhatta, so vata bhikkhu chasu phassaayatanesu sa.mvutakaarii `upadhi dukkhassa muula'nti -- iti viditvaa nirupadhi upadhisa"nkhaye vimutto upadhismi.m vaa kaaya.m upasa.mharissati citta.m vaa uppaadessatiiti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjatii''ti.
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamano sunakkhatto licchaviputto bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandiiti.
[06] sunakkhattasutta.m ni.t.thita.m pa~ncama.m.

[03] 66^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T3.0074^ea^ ^a^V3.0046^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa kuruusu viharati kammaasadhamma.m naama kuruuna.m nigamo. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``aniccaa, bhikkhave, kaamaa tucchaa musaa mosadhammaa. maayaakatame ta.m, bhikkhave, baalalaapana.m. ye ca di.t.thadhammikaa kaamaa, ye ca samparaayikaa kaamaa; yaa ca di.t.thadhammikaa ^a^P2.0262^ea^ kaamasa~n~naa, yaa ca samparaayikaa kaamasa~n~naa -- ubhayameta.m maaradheyya.m, maarassesa {maarasseva (ka0)} visayo, maarassesa nivaapo, maarassesa gocaro. etthete paapakaa akusalaa maanasaa abhijjhaapi byaapaadaapi saarambhaapi sa.mvattanti. teva ariyasaavakassa idhamanusikkhato antaraayaaya sambhavanti. tatra, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `ye ca di.t.thadhammikaa kaamaa, ye ca samparaayikaa kaamaa; yaa ca di.t.thadhammikaa kaamasa~n~naa, yaa ca samparaayikaa kaamasa~n~naa -- ubhayameta.m maaradheyya.m, maarassesa visayo, maarassesa nivaapo, maarassesa gocaro. etthete ^a^M3.0049^ea^ paapakaa akusalaa maanasaa abhijjhaapi byaapaadaapi saarambhaapi sa.mvattanti, teva ariyasaavakassa idhamanusikkhato antaraayaaya sambhavanti. ya.mnuunaaha.m vipulena mahaggatena cetasaa vihareyya.m abhibhuyya loka.m adhi.t.thaaya manasaa. vipulena hi me mahaggatena cetasaa viharato abhibhuyya loka.m adhi.t.thaaya manasaa ^a^T3.0075^ea^ ye paapakaa akusalaa maanasaa abhijjhaapi byaapaadaapi saarambhaapi te na bhavissanti. tesa.m pahaanaa aparitta~nca me citta.m bhavissati appamaa.na.m subhaavita'nti. tassa eva.mpa.tipannassa tabbahulavihaarino aayatane citta.m pasiidati. sampasaade sati etarahi vaa aane~nja.m samaapajjati pa~n~naaya vaa adhimuccati kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa. .thaanameta.m vijjati ya.m ta.msa.mvattanika.m vi~n~naa.na.m assa aane~njuupaga.m. aya.m, bhikkhave, pa.thamaa aane~njasappaayaa pa.tipadaa akkhaayati''.

[03] 67^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `ye ca di.t.thadhammikaa kaamaa, ye ca samparaayikaa kaamaa; yaa ca di.t.thadhammikaa kaamasa~n~naa ^a^T3.0076^ea^, yaa ca samparaayikaa kaamasa~n~naa; ya.m ki~nci ruupa.m (sabba.m ruupa.m) {( ) natthi sii0 pii0 potthakesu} cattaari ca mahaabhuutaani, catunna~nca mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaayaruupa'nti. tassa eva.mpa.tipannassa tabbahulavihaarino aayatane citta.m pasiidati. sampasaade sati etarahi vaa aane~nja.m samaapajjati pa~n~naaya vaa adhimuccati kaayassa ^a^V3.0047^ea^ bhedaa para.m mara.naa. .thaanameta.m vijjati ya.m ta.msa.mvattanika.m vi~n~naa.na.m assa aane~njuupaga.m. aya.m, bhikkhave, dutiyaa aane~njasappaayaa pa.tipadaa akkhaayati.

[01] ``puna ^a^P2.0263^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `ye ca di.t.thadhammikaa kaamaa, ye ca samparaayikaa kaamaa; yaa ca di.t.thadhammikaa kaamasa~n~naa, yaa ca samparaayikaa kaamasa~n~naa; ye ca di.t.thadhammikaa ruupaa, ye ca samparaayikaa ruupaa; yaa ca di.t.thadhammikaa ruupasa~n~naa, yaa ca samparaayikaa ruupasa~n~naa -- ubhayameta.m anicca.m. yadanicca.m ta.m naala.m abhinanditu.m, naala.m abhivaditu.m, naala.m ajjhositu'nti. tassa eva.mpa.tipannassa tabbahulavihaarino aayatane citta.m pasiidati. sampasaade sati etarahi vaa aane~nja.m samaapajjati pa~n~naaya vaa adhimuccati kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa. .thaanameta.m vijjati ya.m ta.msa.mvattanika.m vi~n~naa.na.m assa aane~njuupaga.m. aya.m, bhikkhave, tatiyaa aane~njasappaayaa pa.tipadaa akkhaayati.

[03] 68^b^.^eb^ ``puna ^a^M3.0050^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `ye ca di.t.thadhammikaa kaamaa, ye ca samparaayikaa kaamaa; yaa ca di.t.thadhammikaa kaamasa~n~naa, yaa ca samparaayikaa kaamasa~n~naa; ye ca di.t.thadhammikaa ruupaa, ye ca samparaayikaa ruupaa; yaa ca di.t.thadhammikaa ruupasa~n~naa, yaa ca samparaayikaa ruupasa~n~naa; yaa ca aane~njasa~n~naa -- sabbaa sa~n~naa. yatthetaa aparisesaa nirujjhanti eta.m santa.m eta.m pa.niita.m -- yadida.m aaki~nca~n~naayatana'nti. tassa eva.mpa.tipannassa tabbahulavihaarino aayatane citta.m pasiidati. sampasaade sati etarahi vaa aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m samaapajjati pa~n~naaya vaa adhimuccati kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa. .thaanameta.m vijjati ya.m ta.msa.mvattanika.m vi~n~naa.na.m assa aaki~nca~n~naayatanuupaga.m. aya.m, bhikkhave, pa.thamaa aaki~nca~n~naayatanasappaayaa ^a^T3.0077^ea^ pa.tipadaa akkhaayati.

[03] 69^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako ara~n~nagato vaa rukkhamuulagato vaa su~n~naagaaragato vaa iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `su~n~namida.m attena vaa attaniyena vaa'ti. tassa eva.mpa.tipannassa tabbahulavihaarino aayatane citta.m pasiidati. sampasaade sati etarahi vaa aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m samaapajjati pa~n~naaya vaa adhimuccati kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa. .thaanameta.m vijjati ya.m ta.msa.mvattanika.m vi~n~naa.na.m assa aaki~nca~n~naayatanuupaga.m. aya.m, bhikkhave, dutiyaa aaki~nca~n~naayatanasappaayaa pa.tipadaa akkhaayati.

[03] 70^b^.^eb^ ``puna ^a^V3.0048^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `naaha.m kvacani {kvacini (syaa0 ka.m0 sii0 a.t.tha0)} kassaci ki~ncanatasmi.m {ki~ncanatasmi (?)}, na ca mama ^a^P2.0264^ea^ kvacani kismi~nci ki~ncana.m natthii'ti. tassa eva.mpa.tipannassa tabbahulavihaarino aayatane citta.m pasiidati. sampasaade sati etarahi vaa aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m samaapajjati pa~n~naaya vaa adhimuccati kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa. .thaanameta.m vijjati ya.m ta.msa.mvattanika.m vi~n~naa.na.m assa aaki~nca~n~naayatanuupaga.m. aya.m, bhikkhave, tatiyaa aaki~nca~n~naayatanasappaayaa pa.tipadaa akkhaayati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `ye ca di.t.thadhammikaa kaamaa, ye ca samparaayikaa kaamaa; yaa ca di.t.thadhammikaa kaamasa~n~naa, yaa ca samparaayikaa kaamasa~n~naa; ye ca di.t.thadhammikaa ruupaa, ye ca samparaayikaa ruupaa; yaa ca di.t.thadhammikaa ruupasa~n~naa, yaa ^a^T3.0078^ea^ ca samparaayikaa ruupasa~n~naa ^a^M3.0051^ea^; yaa ca aane~njasa~n~naa, yaa ca aaki~nca~n~naayatanasa~n~naa -- sabbaa sa~n~naa. yatthetaa aparisesaa nirujjhanti eta.m santa.m eta.m pa.niita.m -- yadida.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana'nti. tassa eva.mpa.tipannassa tabbahulavihaarino aayatane citta.m pasiidati. sampasaade sati etarahi vaa nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m samaapajjati pa~n~naaya vaa adhimuccati kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa. .thaanameta.m vijjati ya.m ta.msa.mvattanika.m vi~n~naa.na.m assa nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanuupaga.m. aya.m, bhikkhave, nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanasappaayaa pa.tipadaa akkhaayatii''ti.

[03] 71^b^.^eb^ eva.m vutte, aayasmaa aanando bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``idha, bhante, bhikkhu eva.m pa.tipanno hoti -- `no cassa, no ca me siyaa; na bhavissati, na me bhavissati; yadatthi ya.m, bhuuta.m -- ta.m pajahaamii'ti. eva.m upekkha.m pa.tilabhati. parinibbaayeyya nu kho so, bhante, bhikkhu na vaa parinibbaayeyyaa''ti? ``apetthekacco, aananda, bhikkhu parinibbaayeyya, apetthekacco bhikkhu na parinibbaayeyyaa''ti. ``ko nu kho, bhante, hetu ko paccayo yenapetthekacco bhikkhu parinibbaayeyya, apetthekacco bhikkhu na parinibbaayeyyaa''ti? ``idhaananda, bhikkhu eva.m pa.tipanno hoti -- `no cassa, no ca me siyaa; na bhavissati, na me bhavissati; yadatthi, ya.m ^a^P2.0265^ea^ bhuuta.m -- ta.m pajahaamii'ti. eva.m upekkha.m pa.tilabhati. so ta.m upekkha.m abhinandati, abhivadati, ajjhosaaya ti.t.thati. tassa ^a^T3.0079^ea^ ta.m upekkha.m abhinandato abhivadato ajjhosaaya ti.t.thato tannissita.m hoti vi~n~naa.na.m tadupaadaana.m. saupaadaano, aananda, bhikkhu ^a^V3.0049^ea^ na parinibbaayatii''ti. ``kaha.m pana so, bhante, bhikkhu upaadiyamaano upaadiyatii''ti? ``nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m, aanandaa''ti. ``upaadaanase.t.tha.m kira so, bhante, bhikkhu upaadiyamaano upaadiyatii''ti? ``upaadaanase.t.tha~nhi so, aananda, bhikkhu upaadiyamaano upaadiyati. upaadaanase.t.tha~nheta.m, aananda, yadida.m -- nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m''.

[03] 72^b^.^eb^ ``idhaananda, bhikkhu eva.m pa.tipanno hoti -- `no cassa, no ca me siyaa; na bhavissati, na me bhavissati; yadatthi, ya.m bhuuta.m -- ta.m pajahaamii'ti. eva.m upekkha.m pa.tilabhati. so ta.m upekkha.m naabhinandati, naabhivadati, na ajjhosaaya ti.t.thati. tassa ta.m upekkha.m anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosaaya ^a^M3.0052^ea^ ti.t.thato na tannissita.m hoti vi~n~naa.na.m na tadupaadaana.m. anupaadaano, aananda, bhikkhu parinibbaayatii''ti.

[03] 73^b^.^eb^ ``acchariya.m, bhante, abbhuta.m, bhante! nissaaya nissaaya kira no, bhante, bhagavataa oghassa nitthara.naa akkhaataa. katamo pana, bhante, ariyo vimokkho''ti? ``idhaananda, bhikkhu ariyasaavako iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `ye ca di.t.thadhammikaa kaamaa, ye ca samparaayikaa kaamaa; yaa ca di.t.thadhammikaa kaamasa~n~naa, yaa ca samparaayikaa kaamasa~n~naa; ye ca di.t.thadhammikaa ruupaa, ye ca samparaayikaa ruupaa; yaa ca di.t.thadhammikaa ruupasa~n~naa, yaa ca samparaayikaa ruupasa~n~naa; yaa ca aane~njasa~n~naa, yaa ca aaki~nca~n~naayatanasa~n~naa ^a^T3.0080^ea^, yaa ca nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanasa~n~naa -- esa sakkaayo yaavataa sakkaayo. eta.m amata.m yadida.m anupaadaa cittassa vimokkho. iti, kho, aananda, desitaa mayaa aane~njasappaayaa pa.tipadaa, desitaa aaki~nca~n~naayatanasappaayaa pa.tipadaa, desitaa nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanasappaayaa pa.tipadaa, desitaa nissaaya nissaaya oghassa nitthara.naa, desito ariyo vimokkho. ya.m kho, aananda, satthaaraa kara.niiya.m saavakaana.m hitesinaa anukampakena anukampa.m upaadaaya, kata.m ^a^P2.0266^ea^ vo ta.m mayaa. etaani, aananda, rukkhamuulaani, etaani su~n~naagaaraani. jhaayathaananda, maa pamaadattha, maa pacchaa vippa.tisaarino ahuvattha. aya.m vo amhaaka.m anusaasanii'''ti.
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamano aayasmaa aanando bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandiiti.
[06] aane~njasappaayasutta.m ni.t.thita.m cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 74^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T3.0081^ea^ ^a^V3.0050^ea^ ^a^P3.0001^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati pubbaaraame migaaramaatupaasaade. atha kho ga.nakamoggallaano {ga.nakamoggalaano (ka0)} braahma.no yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m ^a^M3.0053^ea^ saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho ga.nakamoggallaano braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca --

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bho gotama, imassa migaaramaatupaasaadassa dissati anupubbasikkhaa anupubbakiriyaa anupubbapa.tipadaa yadida.m -- yaava pacchimasopaanaka.levaraa: imesampi hi, bho gotama, braahma.naana.m dissati anupubbasikkhaa anupubbakiriyaa anupubbapa.tipadaa yadida.m -- ajjhene: imesampi hi, bho gotama, issaasaana.m dissati anupubbasikkhaa anupubbakiriyaa anupubbapa.tipadaa yadida.m -- issatthe {issatte (ka0)}. amhaakampi hi, bho gotama, ga.nakaana.m ga.nanaajiivaana.m dissati anupubbasikkhaa anupubbakiriyaa anupubbapa.tipadaa yadida.m -- sa"nkhaane. maya~nhi, bho gotama, antevaasi.m labhitvaa pa.thama.m eva.m ga.naapema -- `eka.m ekaka.m, dve dukaa, tii.ni tikaa, cattaari catukkaa, pa~nca pa~ncakaa, cha chakkaa, satta sattakaa, a.t.tha a.t.thakaa, nava navakaa, dasa dasakaa'ti; satampi maya.m, bho gotama, ga.naapema, bhiyyopi ga.naapema. sakkaa nu kho, bho gotama, imasmimpi dhammavinaye evameva anupubbasikkhaa anupubbakiriyaa anupubbapa.tipadaa pa~n~napetu''nti?

[03] 75^b^.^eb^ ``sakkaa ^a^T3.0082^ea^ ^a^P3.0002^ea^, braahma.na, imasmimpi dhammavinaye anupubbasikkhaa anupubbakiriyaa anupubbapa.tipadaa pa~n~napetu.m. seyyathaapi, braahma.na, dakkho assadammako bhadda.m assaajaaniiya.m labhitvaa pa.thameneva mukhaadhaane kaara.na.m kaareti, atha uttari.m kaara.na.m kaareti; evameva kho, braahma.na, tathaagato purisadamma.m labhitvaa pa.thama.m eva.m vineti -- `ehi tva.m, bhikkhu, siilavaa hohi, paatimokkhasa.mvarasa.mvuto viharaahi aacaaragocarasampanno a.numattesu vajjesu bhayadassaavii, samaadaaya sikkhassu sikkhaapadesuu'''ti.

[03] ``yato ^a^V3.0051^ea^ kho, braahma.na, bhikkhu siilavaa hoti, paatimokkhasa.mvarasa.mvuto viharati aacaaragocarasampanno a.numattesu vajjesu bhayadassaavii, samaadaaya sikkhati sikkhaapadesu, tamena.m tathaagato uttari.m vineti -- `ehi tva.m, bhikkhu, indriyesu guttadvaaro hohi, cakkhunaa ruupa.m disvaa maa nimittaggaahii hohi maanubya~njanaggaahii. yatvaadhikara.namena.m cakkhundriya.m asa.mvuta.m viharanta.m abhijjhaadomanassaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa anvaassaveyyu.m tassa sa.mvaraaya pa.tipajjaahi; rakkhaahi cakkhundriya.m, cakkhundriye sa.mvara.m ^a^M3.0054^ea^ aapajjaahi. sotena sadda.m sutvaa...pe0... ghaanena gandha.m ghaayitvaa...pe0... jivhaaya rasa.m saayitvaa...pe0... kaayena pho.t.thabba.m phusitvaa...pe0... manasaa dhamma.m vi~n~naaya maa nimittaggaahii hohi maanubya~njanaggaahii. yatvaadhikara.namena.m manindriya.m asa.mvuta.m viharanta.m abhijjhaadomanassaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa anvaassaveyyu.m tassa sa.mvaraaya pa.tipajjaahi; rakkhaahi manindriya.m, manindriye sa.mvara.m aapajjaahii'''ti.

[03] ``yato ^a^T3.0083^ea^ kho, braahma.na, bhikkhu indriyesu guttadvaaro hoti, tamena.m tathaagato uttari.m vineti -- `ehi tva.m, bhikkhu, bhojane matta~n~nuu hohi. pa.tisa"nkhaa yoniso aahaara.m aahaareyyaasi -- neva davaaya na madaaya na ma.n.danaaya na vibhuusanaaya, yaavadeva imassa kaayassa .thitiyaa yaapanaaya vihi.msuuparatiyaa brahmacariyaanuggahaaya -- iti puraa.na~nca vedana.m pa.tiha"nkhaami, nava~nca vedana.m na uppaadessaami, yaatraa ca me bhavissati anavajjataa ca phaasuvihaaro caa'''ti.

[03] ``yato kho, braahma.na ^a^P3.0003^ea^, bhikkhu bhojane matta~n~nuu hoti, tamena.m tathaagato uttari.m vineti -- `ehi tva.m, bhikkhu, jaagariya.m anuyutto viharaahi, divasa.m ca"nkamena nisajjaaya aavara.niiyehi dhammehi citta.m parisodhehi, rattiyaa pa.thama.m yaama.m ca"nkamena nisajjaaya aavara.niiyehi dhammehi citta.m parisodhehi, rattiyaa majjhima.m yaama.m dakkhi.nena passena siihaseyya.m kappeyyaasi paade paada.m accaadhaaya sato sampajaano u.t.thaanasa~n~na.m manasikaritvaa, rattiyaa pacchima.m yaama.m paccu.t.thaaya ca"nkamena nisajjaaya aavara.niiyehi dhammehi citta.m parisodhehii'''ti.

[03] ``yato kho, braahma.na, bhikkhu jaagariya.m anuyutto hoti, tamena.m tathaagato uttari.m vineti -- `ehi tva.m, bhikkhu, satisampaja~n~nena samannaagato hohi, abhikkante pa.tikkante sampajaanakaarii ^a^V3.0052^ea^, aalokite vilokite sampajaanakaarii, sami~njite pasaarite sampajaanakaarii, sa"nghaa.tipattaciivaradhaara.ne sampajaanakaarii, asite piite khaayite saayite sampajaanakaarii ^a^T3.0084^ea^, uccaarapassaavakamme sampajaanakaarii, gate .thite nisinne sutte jaagarite bhaasite tu.nhiibhaave sampajaanakaarii'''ti.

[03] ``yato kho, braahma.na, bhikkhu satisampaja~n~nena samannaagato hoti, tamena.m tathaagato uttari.m vineti -- `ehi tva.m, bhikkhu, vivitta.m senaasana.m bhajaahi ^a^M3.0055^ea^ ara~n~na.m rukkhamuula.m pabbata.m kandara.m giriguha.m susaana.m vanapattha.m abbhokaasa.m palaalapu~nja'nti. so vivitta.m senaasana.m bhajati ara~n~na.m rukkhamuula.m pabbata.m kandara.m giriguha.m susaana.m vanappattha.m abbhokaasa.m palaalapu~nja.m. so pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto nisiidati palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa, uju.m kaaya.m pa.nidhaaya, parimukha.m sati.m upa.t.thapetvaa. so abhijjha.m loke pahaaya vigataabhijjhena cetasaa viharati, abhijjhaaya citta.m parisodheti; byaapaadapadosa.m pahaaya abyaapannacitto viharati sabbapaa.nabhuutahitaanukampii, byaapaadapadosaa citta.m parisodheti; thinamiddha.m {thiinamiddha.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} pahaaya vigatathinamiddho viharati aalokasa~n~nii sato sampajaano, thinamiddhaa citta.m parisodheti; uddhaccakukkucca.m pahaaya anuddhato viharati ajjhatta.m vuupasantacitto, uddhaccakukkuccaa citta.m parisodheti; vicikiccha.m pahaaya ti.n.navicikiccho viharati akatha.mkathii kusalesu dhammesu, vicikicchaaya citta.m parisodheti.

[03] 76^b^.^eb^ ``so ^a^P3.0004^ea^ ime pa~nca niivara.ne pahaaya cetaso upakkilese pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.ne vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. vitakkavicaaraana.m ^a^T3.0085^ea^ vuupasamaa ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m...pe0... dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. piitiyaa ca viraagaa... tatiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. sukhassa ca pahaanaa... catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati.

[03] ``ye kho te, braahma.na, bhikkhuu sekkhaa {sekhaa (sabbattha)} apattamaanasaa anuttara.m yogakkhema.m patthayamaanaa viharanti ^a^V3.0053^ea^ tesu me aya.m evaruupii anusaasanii hoti. ye pana te bhikkhuu arahanto khii.naasavaa vusitavanto katakara.niiyaa ohitabhaaraa anuppattasadatthaa parikkhii.nabhavasa.myojanaa sammada~n~naa vimuttaa tesa.m ime dhammaa di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraaya ceva sa.mvattanti, satisampaja~n~naaya caa''ti.

[03] eva.m vutte, ga.nakamoggallaano braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ki.m nu kho bhoto gotamassa saavakaa bhotaa gotamena eva.m ovadiiyamaanaa eva.m anusaasiiyamaanaa sabbe accanta.m ni.t.tha.m nibbaana.m aaraadhentntti udaahu ekacce naaraadhentii''ti? ``appekacce kho, braahma.na, mama saavakaa mayaa ^a^M3.0056^ea^ eva.m ovadiiyamaanaa eva.m anusaasiiyamaanaa accanta.m ni.t.tha.m nibbaana.m aaraadhenti, ekacce naaraadhentii''ti.

[03] ``ko nu kho, bho gotama, hetu ko paccayo ya.m ti.t.thateva nibbaana.m, ti.t.thati nibbaanagaamii maggo, ti.t.thati bhava.m gotamo samaadapetaa; atha ca pana bhoto gotamassa saavakaa bhotaa gotamena eva.m ovadiiyamaanaa eva.m anusaasiiyamaanaa appekacce accanta.m ni.t.tha.m nibbaana.m aaraadhenti, ekacce naaraadhentii''ti?

[03] 77^b^.^eb^ ``tena ^a^T3.0086^ea^ hi, braahma.na, ta.myevettha pa.tipucchissaami. yathaa te khameyya tathaa na.m byaakareyyaasi. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi ^a^P3.0005^ea^, braahma.na, kusalo tva.m raajagahagaamissa maggassaa''ti? ``eva.m, bho, kusalo aha.m raajagahagaamissa maggassaa''ti. ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, braahma.na, idha puriso aagaccheyya raajagaha.m gantukaamo. so ta.m upasa"nkamitvaa eva.m vadeyya -- `icchaamaha.m, bhante, raajagaha.m gantu.m; tassa me raajagahassa magga.m upadisaa'ti. tamena.m tva.m eva.m vadeyyaasi -- `ehambho {eva.m bho (sii0 pii0)} purisa, aya.m maggo raajagaha.m gacchati. tena muhutta.m gaccha, tena muhutta.m gantvaa dakkhissasi amuka.m naama gaama.m, tena muhutta.m gaccha, tena muhutta.m gantvaa dakkhissasi amuka.m naama nigama.m; tena muhutta.m gaccha, tena muhutta.m gantvaa dakkhissasi raajagahassa aaraamaraama.neyyaka.m vanaraama.neyyaka.m bhuumiraama.neyyaka.m pokkhara.niiraama.neyyaka'nti. so tayaa eva.m ovadiiyamaano eva.m anusaasiiyamaano ummagga.m gahetvaa pacchaamukho gaccheyya. atha dutiyo puriso aagaccheyya raajagaha.m gantukaamo. so ta.m upasa"nkamitvaa eva.m vadeyya -- `icchaamaha.m, bhante, raajagaha.m gantu.m; tassa me raajagahassa magga.m upadisaa'ti. tamena.m tva.m eva.m vadeyyaasi -- `ehambho purisa, aya.m maggo raajagaha.m gacchati. tena muhutta.m gaccha, tena muhutta.m gantvaa dakkhissasi ^a^V3.0054^ea^ amuka.m naama gaama.m; tena muhutta.m gaccha, tena muhutta.m gantvaa dakkhissasi amuka.m naama nigama.m; tena muhutta.m gaccha, tena muhutta.m gantvaa dakkhissasi raajagahassa aaraamaraama.neyyaka.m ^a^T3.0087^ea^ vanaraama.neyyaka.m bhuumiraama.neyyaka.m pokkhara.niiraama.neyyaka'nti. so tayaa eva.m ovadiiyamaano eva.m anusaasiiyamaano sotthinaa raajagaha.m gaccheyya. ko nu kho, braahma.na, hetu ko paccayo ya.m ti.t.thateva raajagaha.m ^a^M3.0057^ea^, ti.t.thati raajagahagaamii maggo, ti.t.thasi tva.m samaadapetaa; atha ca pana tayaa eva.m ovadiiyamaano eva.m anusaasiiyamaano eko puriso ummagga.m gahetvaa pacchaamukho gaccheyya, eko sotthinaa raajagaha.m gaccheyyaa''ti? ``ettha ^a^P3.0006^ea^ kyaaha.m, bho gotama, karomi? maggakkhaayiiha.m, bho gotamaa''ti.

[03] ``evameva kho, braahma.na, ti.t.thateva nibbaana.m, ti.t.thati nibbaanagaamii maggo, ti.t.thaamaha.m samaadapetaa; atha ca pana mama saavakaa mayaa eva.m ovadiiyamaanaa eva.m anusaasiiyamaanaa appekacce accanta.m ni.t.tha.m nibbaana.m aaraadhenti, ekacce naaraadhenti. ettha kyaaha.m, braahma.na, karomi? maggakkhaayiiha.m, braahma.na, tathaagato''ti.

[03] 78^b^.^eb^ eva.m vutte, ga.nakamoggallaano braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``yeme, bho gotama, puggalaa assaddhaa jiivikatthaa na saddhaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitaa sa.thaa maayaavino ketabino {ke.tubhino (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} uddhataa unna.laa capalaa mukharaa viki.n.navaacaa indriyesu aguttadvaaraa bhojane amatta~n~nuno jaagariya.m ananuyuttaa saama~n~ne anapekkhavanto sikkhaaya na tibbagaaravaa baahulikaa {baahullikaa (syaa0 ka.m0)} saathalikaa okkamane pubba"ngamaa paviveke nikkhittadhuraa kusiitaa hiinaviiriyaa mu.t.thassatino asampajaanaa asamaahitaa vibbhantacittaa ^a^T3.0088^ea^ duppa~n~naa e.lamuugaa, na tehi bhava.m gotamo saddhi.m sa.mvasati''.

[03] ``ye pana te kulaputtaa saddhaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitaa asa.thaa amaayaavino aketabino anuddhataa anunna.laa acapalaa amukharaa aviki.n.navaacaa indriyesu guttadvaaraa bhojane matta~n~nuno jaagariya.m anuyuttaa saama~n~ne apekkhavanto sikkhaaya tibbagaaravaa nabaahulikaa nasaathalikaa okkamane nikkhittadhuraa paviveke pubba"ngamaa aaraddhaviiriyaa pahitattaa upa.t.thitassatino sampajaanaa samaahitaa ekaggacittaa pa~n~navanto ane.lamuugaa, tehi bhava.m gotamo saddhi.m sa.mvasati.

[03] ``seyyathaapi ^a^V3.0055^ea^, bho gotama, ye keci muulagandhaa, kaalaanusaari tesa.m aggamakkhaayati; ye keci saaragandhaa, lohitacandana.m tesa.m aggamakkhaayati; ye keci pupphagandhaa, vassika.m ^a^P3.0007^ea^ tesa.m aggamakkhaayati; evameva bhoto gotamassa ovaado paramajjadhammesu.

[03] ``abhikkanta.m ^a^M3.0058^ea^, bho gotama, abhikkanta.m, bho gotama! seyyathaapi, bho gotama, nikkujjita.m vaa ukkujjeyya, pa.ticchanna.m vaa vivareyya, muu.lhassa vaa magga.m aacikkheyya, andhakaare vaa telapajjota.m dhaareyya -- `cakkhumanto ruupaani dakkhantii'ti; evameva.m bhotaa gotamena anekapariyaayena dhammo pakaasito. esaaha.m bhavanta.m gotama.m sara.na.m gacchaami dhamma~nca bhikkhusa"ngha~nca. upaasaka.m ma.m bhava.m gotamo dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti.
[06] ga.nakamoggallaanasutta.m ni.t.thita.m sattama.m.

[03] 79^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T3.0089^ea^ ^a^V3.0056^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m aayasmaa aanando raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape aciraparinibbute bhagavati. tena kho pana samayena raajaa maagadho ajaatasattu vedehiputto raajagaha.m pa.tisa"nkhaaraapeti ra~n~no pajjotassa aasa"nkamaano. atha kho aayasmaa aanando pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya raajagaha.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. atha kho aayasmato aanandassa etadahosi -- ``atippago kho taava raajagahe pi.n.daaya caritu.m. ya.mnuunaaha.m yena gopakamoggallaanassa braahma.nassa kammanto, yena gopakamoggallaano braahma.no tenupasa"nkameyya''nti.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa aanando yena gopakamoggallaanassa braahma.nassa kammanto, yena gopakamoggallaano braahma.no tenupasa"nkami. addasaa kho gopakamoggallaano braahma.no aayasmanta.m aananda.m duuratova aagacchanta.m. disvaana aayasmanta.m aananda.m etadavoca -- ``etu kho bhava.m aanando. svaagata.m bhoto aanandassa. cirassa.m kho bhava.m aanando ima.m pariyaayamakaasi yadida.m idhaagamanaaya. nisiidatu bhava.m aanando, idamaasana.m pa~n~natta''nti. nisiidi kho aayasmaa aanando pa~n~natte aasane. gopakamoggallaanopi ^a^P3.0008^ea^ kho braahma.no a~n~natara.m niica.m aasana.m gahetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m ^a^T3.0090^ea^ nisinno kho gopakamoggallaano braahma.no aayasmanta.m aananda.m etadavoca -- ``atthi nu kho, bho aananda, ekabhikkhupi tehi ^a^M3.0059^ea^ dhammehi sabbenasabba.m sabbathaasabba.m samannaagato yehi dhammehi samannaagato so bhava.m gotamo ahosi araha.m sammaasambuddho''ti? ``natthi kho, braahma.na, ekabhikkhupi tehi dhammehi sabbenasabba.m sabbathaasabba.m samannaagato yehi dhammehi samannaagato so bhagavaa ahosi araha.m sammaasambuddho. so hi, braahma.na, bhagavaa anuppannassa maggassa uppaadetaa, asa~njaatassa maggassa sa~njanetaa, anakkhaatassa maggassa akkhaataa, magga~n~nuu, maggaviduu, maggakovido; maggaanugaa ca pana etarahi saavakaa viharanti pacchaa samannaagataa''ti. aya~nca hida.m aayasmato aanandassa gopakamoggallaanena braahma.nena saddhi.m antaraakathaa vippakataa ahosi.

[03] atha ^a^V3.0057^ea^ kho vassakaaro braahma.no magadhamahaamatto raajagahe kammante anusa~n~naayamaano yena gopakamoggallaanassa braahma.nassa kammanto, yenaayasmaa aanando tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmataa aanandena saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho vassakaaro braahma.no magadhamahaamatto aayasmanta.m aananda.m etadavoca -- ``kaayanuttha, bho aananda, etarahi kathaaya sannisinnaa, kaa ca pana vo antaraakathaa vippakataa''ti? ``idha ma.m, braahma.na, gopakamoggallaano ^a^T3.0091^ea^ braahma.no evamaaha -- `atthi nu kho, bho aananda, ekabhikkhupi tehi dhammehi sabbenasabba.m sabbathaasabba.m samannaagato yehi dhammehi samannaagato so bhava.m gotamo ahosi araha.m sammaasambuddho'ti. eva.m vutte aha.m, braahma.na, gopakamoggallaana.m braahma.na.m etadavoca.m -- `natthi kho, braahma.na, ekabhikkhupi tehi dhammehi sabbenasabba.m sabbathaasabba.m samannaagato yehi dhammehi samannaagato so bhagavaa ahosi araha.m sammaasambuddho. so hi, braahma.na, bhagavaa anuppannassa maggassa uppaadetaa, asa~njaatassa ^a^P3.0009^ea^ maggassa sa~njanetaa, anakkhaatassa maggassa akkhaataa, magga~n~nuu, maggaviduu, maggakovido; maggaanugaa ca pana etarahi saavakaa viharanti pacchaa samannaagataa'ti. aya.m kho no, braahma.na, gopakamoggallaanena braahma.nena saddhi.m antaraakathaa vippakataa. atha tva.m anuppatto''ti.

[03] 80^b^.^eb^ ``atthi nu kho, bho aananda, ekabhikkhupi tena bhotaa gotamena .thapito -- `aya.m vo mamaccayena pa.tisara.na.m bhavissatii'ti, ya.m tumhe etarahi ^a^M3.0060^ea^ pa.tipaadeyyaathaa''ti {pa.tidhaaveyyaathaati (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}? ``natthi kho, braahma.na, ekabhikkhupi tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena .thapito -- `aya.m vo mamaccayena pa.tisara.na.m bhavissatii'ti, ya.m maya.m etarahi pa.tipaadeyyaamaa''ti. ``atthi pana, bho aananda, ekabhikkhupi sa"nghena sammato, sambahulehi ^a^T3.0092^ea^ therehi bhikkhuuhi .thapito -- `aya.m no bhagavato accayena pa.tisara.na.m bhavissatii'ti, ya.m tumhe etarahi pa.tipaadeyyaathaa''ti? ``natthi kho, braahma.na, ekabhikkhupi sa"nghena sammato, sambahulehi therehi bhikkhuuhi .thapito -- `aya.m no bhagavato accayena pa.tisara.na.m bhavissatii'ti, ya.m maya.m etarahi pa.tipaadeyyaamaa''ti. ``eva.m appa.tisara.ne ca pana, bho aananda, ko hetu saamaggiyaa''ti? ``na kho maya.m, braahma.na, appa.tisara.naa; sappa.tisara.naa maya.m, braahma.na; dhammappa.tisara.naa''ti.

[03] ```atthi ^a^V3.0058^ea^ nu kho, bho aananda, ekabhikkhupi tena bhotaa gotamena .thapito -- aya.m vo mamaccayena pa.tisara.na.m bhavissatiiti, ya.m tumhe etarahi pa.tipaadeyyaathaa'ti -- iti pu.t.tho samaano `natthi kho, braahma.na, ekabhikkhupi tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena .thapito -- aya.m vo mamaccayena pa.tisara.na.m bhavissatiiti, ya.m maya.m etarahi pa.tipaadeyyaamaa'ti vadesi; `atthi pana, bho aananda, ekabhikkhupi sa"nghena sammato, sambahulehi therehi bhikkhuuhi .thapito -- aya.m no bhagavato accayena pa.tisara.na.m bhavissatiiti, ya.m tumhe etarahi pa.tipaadeyyaathaa'ti -- iti pu.t.tho samaano `natthi kho, braahma.na, ekabhikkhupi sa"nghena sammato, sambahulehi therehi bhikkhuuhi ^a^P3.0010^ea^ .thapito -- aya.m no bhagavato accayena pa.tisara.na.m bhavissatiiti, ya.m maya.m etarahi pa.tipaadeyyaamaa'ti -- vadesi; `eva.m appa.tisara.ne ca pana, bho aananda, ko hetu saamaggiyaa'ti iti pu.t.tho samaano `na kho maya.m, braahma.na ^a^T3.0093^ea^, appa.tisara.naa; sappa.tisara.naa maya.m, braahma.na; dhammappa.tisara.naa'ti vadesi. imassa pana, bho aananda, bhaasitassa katha.m attho da.t.thabbo''ti?

[03] 81^b^.^eb^ ``atthi kho, braahma.na, tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena bhikkhuuna.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~natta.m, paatimokkha.m uddi.t.tha.m. te maya.m tadahuposathe yaavatikaa eka.m gaamakhetta.m upanissaaya viharaama te sabbe ^a^M3.0061^ea^ ekajjha.m sannipataama; sannipatitvaa yassa ta.m pavattati ta.m ajjhesaama. tasmi.m ce bha~n~namaane hoti bhikkhussa aapatti hoti viitikkamo ta.m maya.m yathaadhamma.m yathaanusi.t.tha.m kaaremaati.

[03] ``na kira no bhavanto kaarenti; dhammo no kaareti''. ``atthi nu kho, bho aananda, ekabhikkhupi ya.m tumhe etarahi sakkarotha garu.m karotha {garukarotha (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} maanetha puujetha; sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa {garukatvaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} upanissaaya viharathaa''ti? ``natthi kho, braahma.na, ekabhikkhupi ya.m maya.m etarahi sakkaroma garu.m karoma maanema puujema; sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa upanissaaya viharaamaa''ti.

[03] ```atthi nu kho, bho aananda, ekabhikkhupi tena bhotaa gotamena .thapito -- aya.m vo mamaccayena pa.tisara.na.m bhavissatiiti ya.m tumhe etarahi pa.tipaadeyyaathaa'ti -- iti pu.t.tho samaano `natthi kho, braahma.na, ekabhikkhupi tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena .thapito -- aya.m vo mamaccayena pa.tisara.na.m bhavissatiiti ya.m maya.m etarahi pa.tipaadeyyaamaa'ti ^a^V3.0059^ea^ vadesi; `atthi pana, bho aananda, ekabhikkhupi sa"nghena ^a^T3.0094^ea^ sammato, sambahulehi therehi bhikkhuuhi .thapito -- aya.m no bhagavato accayena pa.tisara.na.m bhavissatiiti ya.m tumhe etarahi pa.tipaadeyyaathaa'ti ^a^P3.0011^ea^ -- iti pu.t.tho samaano `natthi kho, braahma.na, ekabhikkhupi sa"nghena sammato, sambahulehi therehi bhikkhuuhi .thapito -- aya.m no bhagavato accayena pa.tisara.na.m bhavissatiiti ya.m maya.m etarahi pa.tipaadeyyaamaa'ti vadesi; `atthi nu kho, bho aananda, ekabhikkhupi ya.m tumhe etarahi sakkarotha garu.m karotha maanetha puujetha; sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa upanissaaya viharathaa'ti -- iti pu.t.tho samaano `natthi kho, braahma.na, ekabhikkhupi ya.m maya.m etarahi sakkaroma garu.m karoma maanema puujema; sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa upanissaaya viharaamaa'ti vadesi. imassa pana, bho aananda, bhaasitassa katha.m attho da.t.thabbo''ti?

[03] 82^b^.^eb^ ``atthi kho, braahma.na, tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena dasa pasaadaniiyaa dhammaa akkhaataa. yasmi.m no ime dhammaa sa.mvijjanti ta.m maya.m etarahi sakkaroma garu.m karoma maanema puujema; sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa upanissaaya viharaama. katame dasa?
[03] ``idha ^a^M3.0062^ea^, braahma.na, bhikkhu siilavaa hoti, paatimokkhasa.mvarasa.mvuto viharati aacaaragocarasampanno, a.numattesu vajjesu bhayadassaavii, samaadaaya sikkhati sikkhaapadesu.

[03] ``bahussuto hoti sutadharo sutasannicayo. ye te dhammaa aadikalyaa.naa, majjhekalyaa.naa, pariyosaanakalyaa.naa, saattha.m, sabya~njana.m {saatthaa sabya~njanaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)}, kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m abhivadantntti tathaaruupaassa ^a^T3.0095^ea^ dhammaa bahussutaa honti dhaataa {dhataa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} vacasaa paricitaa manasaanupekkhitaa di.t.thiyaa suppa.tividdhaa.
[03] ``santu.t.tho hoti ( ) {(itariitarehi) dii0 ni0 3.345} ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaarehi.
[03] ``catunna.m jhaanaana.m aabhicetasikaana.m di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraana.m nikaamalaabhii hoti akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii.

[03] ``anekavihita.m ^a^V3.0060^ea^ iddhividha.m paccanubhoti -- ekopi hutvaa bahudhaa hoti, bahudhaapi hutvaa eko hoti; aavibhaava.m tirobhaava.m; tiroku.t.ta.m {tiroku.d.da.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} tiropaakaara.m tiropabbata.m asajjamaano gacchati, seyyathaapi aakaase; pathaviyaapi ummujjanimujja.m karoti, seyyathaapi udake; udakepi abhijjamaane gacchati, seyyathaapi pathaviya.m; aakaasepi palla"nkena ^a^P3.0012^ea^ kamati, seyyathaapi pakkhii saku.no; imepi candimasuuriye eva.mmahiddhike eva.mmahaanubhaave paa.ninaa parimasati {paraamasati (ka0)} parimajjati, yaava brahmalokaapi kaayena vasa.m vatteti.
[03] ``dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa visuddhaaya atikkantamaanusikaaya ubho sadde su.naati -- dibbe ca maanuse ca, ye duure santike ca.

[03] ``parasattaana.m parapuggalaana.m cetasaa ceto paricca pajaanaati. saraaga.m vaa citta.m `saraaga.m citta'nti pajaanaati, viitaraaga.m vaa citta.m `viitaraaga.m citta'nti pajaanaati, sadosa.m vaa citta.m `sadosa.m citta'nti pajaanaati, viitadosa.m vaa citta.m `viitadosa.m citta'nti pajaanaati, samoha.m vaa citta.m `samoha.m citta'nti pajaanaati, viitamoha.m vaa citta.m `viitamoha.m citta'nti pajaanaati, sa.mkhitta.m vaa citta.m `sa.mkhitta.m citta'nti pajaanaati, vikkhitta.m vaa citta.m `vikkhitta.m citta'nti pajaanaati ^a^T3.0096^ea^, mahaggata.m vaa citta.m `mahaggata.m ^a^M3.0063^ea^ citta'nti pajaanaati, amahaggata.m vaa citta.m `amahaggata.m citta'nti pajaanaati, sauttara.m vaa citta.m `sauttara.m citta'nti pajaanaati, anuttara.m vaa citta.m `anuttara.m citta'nti pajaanaati, samaahita.m vaa citta.m `samaahita.m citta'nti pajaanaati, asamaahita.m vaa citta.m `asamaahita.m citta'nti pajaanaati, vimutta.m vaa citta.m `vimutta.m citta'nti pajaanaati, avimutta.m vaa citta.m `avimutta.m citta'nti pajaanaati.

[03] ``anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati, seyyathida.m -- ekampi jaati.m dvepi jaatiyo tissopi jaatiyo catassopi jaatiyo pa~ncapi jaatiyo dasapi jaatiyo viisampi jaatiyo ti.msampi jaatiyo cattaariisampi jaatiyo pa~n~naasampi jaatiyo jaatisatampi jaatisahassampi jaatisatasahassampi anekepi sa.mva.t.takappe anekepi viva.t.takappe anekepi sa.mva.t.taviva.t.takappe -- `amutraasi.m eva.mnaamo eva.mgotto eva.mva.n.no evamaahaaro eva.msukhadukkhappa.tisa.mvedii evamaayupariyanto, so tato cuto amutra udapaadi.m; tatraapaasi.m eva.mnaamo eva.mgotto eva.mva.n.no evamaahaaro ^a^V3.0061^ea^ eva.msukhadukkhappa.tisa.mvedii evamaayupariyanto, so tato cuto idhuupapanno'ti. iti saakaara.m sauddesa.m anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati.
[03] ``dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte passati cavamaane upapajjamaane hiine pa.niite suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne, sugate duggate yathaakammuupage satte pajaanaati.
[03] ``aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m ^a^T3.0097^ea^ pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharati.

[03] ``ime kho, braahma.na, tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena dasa pasaadaniiyaa dhammaa akkhaataa. yasmi.m no ime dhammaa sa.mvijjanti ta.m maya.m etarahi sakkaroma garu.m karoma maanema puujema; sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa upanissaaya viharaamaa''ti.

[03] 83^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^P3.0013^ea^ vutte vassakaaro braahma.no magadhamahaamatto upananda.m senaapati.m aamantesi -- ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nati bhava.m senaapati {ma~n~nasi eva.m senaapati (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0), ma~n~nasi senaapati (sii0), ma~n~nasi bhava.m senaapati (ka0)} yadime bhonto sakkaatabba.m sakkaronti, garu.m kaatabba.m garu.m karonti, maanetabba.m maanenti ^a^M3.0064^ea^, puujetabba.m puujenti''? ``tagghime {taggha me (ka0)} bhonto sakkaatabba.m sakkaronti, garu.m kaatabba.m garu.m karonti, maanetabba.m maanenti, puujetabba.m puujenti. ima~nca hi te bhonto na sakkareyyu.m na garu.m kareyyu.m na maaneyyu.m na puujeyyu.m; atha ki~ncarahi te bhonto sakkareyyu.m garu.m kareyyu.m maaneyyu.m puujeyyu.m, sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa maanetvaa puujetvaa upanissaaya vihareyyu''nti? atha kho vassakaaro braahma.no magadhamahaamatto aayasmanta.m aananda.m etadavoca -- ``kaha.m pana bhava.m aanando etarahi viharatii''ti? ``ve.luvane khoha.m, braahma.na, etarahi viharaamii''ti. ``kacci pana, bho aananda, ve.luvana.m rama.niiya~nceva appasadda~nca appanigghosa~nca vijanavaata.m ^a^T3.0098^ea^ manussaraahasseyyaka.m {manussaraahaseyyaka.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} pa.tisallaanasaaruppa''nti? ``taggha, braahma.na, ve.luvana.m rama.niiya~nceva appasadda~nca appanigghosa~nca vijanavaata.m manussaraahasseyyaka.m pa.tisallaanasaaruppa.m, yathaa ta.m tumhaadisehi rakkhakehi gopakehii''ti. ``taggha, bho aananda, ve.luvana.m rama.niiya~nceva appasadda~nca appanigghosa~nca vijanavaata.m manussaraahasseyyaka.m pa.tisallaanasaaruppa.m, yathaa ta.m bhavantehi jhaayiihi jhaanasiiliihi. jhaayino ceva bhavanto jhaanasiilino ca''.

[03] ``ekamidaaha.m ^a^V3.0062^ea^, bho aananda, samaya.m so bhava.m gotamo vesaaliya.m viharati mahaavane kuu.taagaarasaalaaya.m. atha khvaaha.m, bho aananda, yena mahaavana.m kuu.taagaarasaalaa yena so bhava.m gotamo tenupasa"nkami.m. tatra ca pana so {tatra ca so (sii0 pii0)} bhava.m gotamo anekapariyaayena jhaanakatha.m kathesi. jhaayii ceva so bhava.m gotamo ahosi jhaanasiilii ca. sabba~nca pana so bhava.m gotamo jhaana.m va.n.nesii''ti.

[03] 84^b^.^eb^ ``na ca kho, braahma.na, so bhagavaa sabba.m jhaana.m va.n.nesi, napi so bhagavaa sabba.m jhaana.m na va.n.nesiiti. katha.m ruupa~nca ^a^P3.0014^ea^, braahma.na, so bhagavaa jhaana.m na va.n.nesi? idha, braahma.na, ekacco kaamaraagapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati kaamaraagaparetena, uppannassa ca kaamaraagassa nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati; so kaamaraaga.myeva antara.m karitvaa jhaayati pajjhaayati nijjhaayati apajjhaayati. byaapaadapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati byaapaadaparetena, uppannassa ca byaapaadassa nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati; so byaapaada.myeva antara.m karitvaa jhaayati pajjhaayati nijjhaayati apajjhaayati. thinamiddhapariyu.t.thitena ^a^T3.0099^ea^ ^a^M3.0065^ea^ cetasaa viharati thinamiddhaparetena, uppannassa ca thinamiddhassa nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati; so thinamiddha.myeva antara.m karitvaa jhaayati pajjhaayati nijjhaayati apajjhaayati. uddhaccakukkuccapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati uddhaccakukkuccaparetena, uppannassa ca uddhaccakukkuccassa nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati; so uddhaccakukkucca.myeva antara.m karitvaa jhaayati pajjhaayati nijjhaayati apajjhaayati. vicikicchaapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati vicikicchaaparetena, uppannaaya ca vicikicchaaya nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati; so vicikiccha.myeva antara.m karitvaa jhaayati pajjhaayati nijjhaayati apajjhaayati. evaruupa.m kho, braahma.na, so bhagavaa jhaana.m na va.n.nesi.

[03] ``katha.m ruupa~nca, braahma.na, so bhagavaa jhaana.m va.n.nesi? idha, braahma.na, bhikkhu vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m cetaso ekodibhaava.m avitakka.m avicaara.m samaadhija.m piitisukha.m dutiya.m jhaana.m...pe0... tatiya.m jhaana.m... ^a^V3.0063^ea^ catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. evaruupa.m kho, braahma.na, so bhagavaa jhaana.m va.n.nesii''ti.

[03] ``gaarayha.m kira, bho aananda, so bhava.m gotamo jhaana.m garahi, paasa.msa.m pasa.msi. handa, ca daani maya.m, bho aananda, gacchaama; bahukiccaa maya.m bahukara.niiyaa''ti. ``yassadaani tva.m, braahma.na, kaala.m ma~n~nasii''ti. atha ^a^P3.0015^ea^ kho ^a^T3.0100^ea^ vassakaaro braahma.no magadhamahaamatto aayasmato aanandassa bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkaami.

[03] atha kho gopakamoggallaano braahma.no acirapakkante vassakaare braahma.ne magadhamahaamatte aayasmanta.m aananda.m etadavoca -- ``ya.m no maya.m bhavanta.m aananda.m apucchimhaa ta.m no bhava.m aanando na byaakaasii''ti. ``nanu te, braahma.na, avocumhaa -- `natthi kho, braahma.na, ekabhikkhupi tehi dhammehi sabbenasabba.m sabbathaasabba.m samannaagato yehi dhammehi samannaagato so bhagavaa ahosi araha.m sammaasambuddho. so hi, braahma.na, bhagavaa anuppannassa maggassa uppaadetaa, asa~njaatassa maggassa sa~njanetaa, anakkhaatassa maggassa akkhaataa, magga~n~nuu, maggaviduu, maggakovido ^a^M3.0066^ea^. maggaanugaa ca pana etarahi saavakaa viharanti pacchaa samannaagataa'''ti.
[06] gopakamoggallaanasutta.m ni.t.thita.m a.t.thama.m.

[03] 85^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T3.0101^ea^ ^a^V3.0064^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati pubbaaraame migaaramaatupaasaade. tena kho pana samayena bhagavaa tadahuposathe pannarase pu.n.naaya pu.n.namaaya rattiyaa bhikkhusa"nghaparivuto abbhokaase nisinno hoti. atha kho a~n~nataro bhikkhu u.t.thaayaasanaa eka.msa.m ciivara.m katvaa yena bhagavaa tena~njali.m pa.naametvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca --

[03] ``puccheyyaaha.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m ki~ncideva desa.m, sace me bhagavaa okaasa.m karoti pa~nhassa veyyaakara.naayaa''ti. ``tena hi tva.m, bhikkhu, sake aasane nisiiditvaa puccha yadaaka"nkhasii''ti.

[03] 86^b^.^eb^ atha kho so bhikkhu sake aasane nisiiditvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ime nu kho, bhante, pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhaa, seyyathida.m ^a^P3.0016^ea^ -- ruupupaadaanakkhandho, vedanupaadaanakkhandho, sa~n~nupaadaanakkhandho, sa"nkhaarupaadaanakkhandho, vi~n~naa.nupaadaanakkhandho''ti? ``ime kho, bhikkhu, pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhaa, seyyathida.m -- ruupupaadaanakkhandho, vedanupaadaanakkhandho, sa~n~nupaadaanakkhandho, sa"nkhaarupaadaanakkhandho, vi~n~naa.nupaadaanakkhandho''ti.

[03] ``saadhu, bhante''ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa bhagavanta.m uttari.m pa~nha.m pucchi -- ``ime pana, bhante, pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhaa ki.mmuulakaa''ti? ``ime kho, bhikkhu, pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhaa chandamuulakaa''ti. ``ta.myeva nu kho, bhante, upaadaana.m te pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhaa, udaahu ^a^T3.0102^ea^ a~n~natra pa~ncahupaadaanakkhandhehi upaadaana''nti? ``na kho, bhikkhu, ta.myeva upaadaana.m te pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhaa, naapi a~n~natra pa~ncahupaadaanakkhandhehi upaadaana.m. yo kho, bhikkhu, pa~ncasu upaadaanakkhandhesu chandaraago ta.m tattha upaadaana''nti.

[03] ``siyaa pana, bhante, pa~ncasu upaadaanakkhandhesu chandaraagavemattataa''ti? ``siyaa bhikkhuu''ti bhagavaa avoca ``idha, bhikkhu, ekaccassa eva.m hoti -- `eva.mruupo ^a^M3.0067^ea^ siya.m anaagatamaddhaana.m ^a^V3.0065^ea^, eva.mvedano siya.m anaagatamaddhaana.m, eva.msa~n~no siya.m anaagatamaddhaana.m, eva.msa"nkhaaro siya.m anaagatamaddhaana.m, eva.mvi~n~naa.no siya.m anaagatamaddhaana'nti. eva.m kho, bhikkhu, siyaa pa~ncasu upaadaanakkhandhesu chandaraagavemattataa''ti.

[03] ``kittaavataa pana, bhante, khandhaana.m khandhaadhivacana.m hotii''ti? ``ya.m ki~nci, bhikkhu, ruupa.m -- atiitaanaagatapaccuppanna.m ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa, o.laarika.m vaa sukhuma.m vaa, hiina.m vaa pa.niita.m vaa, ya.m duure santike vaa -- aya.m ruupakkhandho. yaa ^a^P3.0017^ea^ kaaci vedanaa -- atiitaanaagatapaccuppannaa ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa, o.laarikaa vaa sukhumaa vaa, hiinaa vaa pa.niitaa vaa, yaa duure santike vaa -- aya.m vedanaakkhandho. yaa kaaci sa~n~naa -- atiitaanaagatapaccuppannaa...pe0... yaa duure santike vaa -- aya.m sa~n~naakkhandho. ye keci sa"nkhaaraa -- atiitaanaagatapaccuppannaa ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa, o.laarikaa vaa sukhumaa vaa, hiinaa vaa pa.niitaa vaa, ye duure santike vaa -- aya.m sa"nkhaarakkhandho. ya.m ki~nci vi~n~naa.na.m -- atiitaanaagatapaccuppanna.m ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa, o.laarika.m vaa sukhuma.m vaa, hiina.m vaa pa.niita.m vaa, ya.m duure santike vaa -- aya.m vi~n~naa.nakkhandho. ettaavataa kho, bhikkhu, khandhaana.m khandhaadhivacana.m hotii''ti.

[03] ``ko nu kho, bhante, hetu ko paccayo ruupakkhandhassa pa~n~naapanaaya? ko hetu ko paccayo vedanaakkhandhassa pa~n~naapanaaya? ko hetu ko paccayo sa~n~naakkhandhassa pa~n~naapanaaya? ko ^a^T3.0103^ea^ hetu ko paccayo sa"nkhaarakkhandhassa pa~n~naapanaaya? ko hetu ko paccayo vi~n~naa.nakkhandhassa pa~n~naapanaayaa''ti?

[03] ``cattaaro kho, bhikkhu, mahaabhuutaa hetu, cattaaro mahaabhuutaa paccayo ruupakkhandhassa pa~n~naapanaaya. phasso hetu, phasso paccayo vedanaakkhandhassa pa~n~naapanaaya. phasso hetu, phasso paccayo sa~n~naakkhandhassa pa~n~naapanaaya. phasso hetu, phasso paccayo sa"nkhaarakkhandhassa pa~n~naapanaaya. naamaruupa.m kho, bhikkhu, hetu, naamaruupa.m paccayo vi~n~naa.nakkhandhassa pa~n~naapanaayaa''ti.

[03] 87^b^.^eb^ ``katha.m pana, bhante, sakkaayadi.t.thi hotii''ti? ``idha, bhikkhu, assutavaa puthujjano ariyaana.m adassaavii ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme aviniito ^a^M3.0068^ea^ sappurisaana.m adassaavii ^a^V3.0066^ea^ sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme aviniito ruupa.m attato samanupassati ruupavanta.m vaa attaana.m attani vaa ruupa.m ruupasmi.m vaa attaana.m; vedana.m attato samanupassati vedanaavanta.m vaa attaana.m attani vaa vedana.m vedanaaya vaa attaana.m; sa~n~na.m attato samanupassati sa~n~naavanta.m vaa attaana.m attani vaa sa~n~na.m sa~n~naaya vaa attaana.m; sa"nkhaare attato samanupassati sa"nkhaaravanta.m vaa attaana.m attani vaa sa"nkhaare sa"nkhaaresu vaa attaana.m; vi~n~naa.na.m attato samanupassati vi~n~naa.navanta.m vaa attaana.m attani ^a^P3.0018^ea^ vaa vi~n~naa.na.m vi~n~naa.nasmi.m vaa attaana.m. eva.m kho ^a^T3.0104^ea^, bhikkhu, sakkaayadi.t.thi hotii''ti.

[03] ``katha.m pana, bhante, sakkaayadi.t.thi na hotii''ti? ``idha, bhikkhu, sutavaa ariyasaavako ariyaana.m dassaavii ariyadhammassa kovido ariyadhamme suviniito sappurisaana.m dassaavii sappurisadhammassa kovido sappurisadhamme suviniito na ruupa.m attato samanupassati na ruupavanta.m vaa attaana.m na attani vaa ruupa.m na ruupasmi.m vaa attaana.m; na vedana.m attato samanupassati na vedanaavanta.m vaa attaana.m na attani vaa vedana.m na vedanaaya vaa attaana.m; na sa~n~na.m attato samanupassati na sa~n~naavanta.m vaa attaana.m na attani vaa sa~n~na.m na sa~n~naaya vaa attaana.m; na sa"nkhaare attato samanupassati na sa"nkhaaravanta.m vaa attaana.m na attani vaa sa"nkhaare na sa"nkhaaresu vaa attaana.m; na vi~n~naa.na.m attato samanupassati na vi~n~naa.navanta.m vaa attaana.m na attani vaa vi~n~naa.na.m na vi~n~naa.nasmi.m vaa attaana.m. eva.m kho, bhikkhu, sakkaayadi.t.thi na hotii''ti.

[03] 88^b^.^eb^ ``ko nu kho, bhante, ruupe assaado, ko aadiinavo, ki.m nissara.na.m? ko vedanaaya assaado, ko aadiinavo, ki.m nissara.na.m? ko sa~n~naaya assaado, ko aadiinavo, ki.m nissara.na.m? ko sa"nkhaaresu assaado, ko aadiinavo, ki.m nissara.na.m? ko vi~n~naa.ne assaado, ko aadiinavo, ki.m nissara.na''nti? ``ya.m kho, bhikkhu, ruupa.m pa.ticca uppajjati sukha.m somanassa.m, aya.m ruupe assaado. ya.m ruupa.m anicca.m dukkha.m ^a^T3.0105^ea^ vipari.naamadhamma.m, aya.m ruupe aadiinavo. yo ruupe chandaraagavinayo chandaraagappahaana.m, ida.m ruupe nissara.na.m. ya.m kho {ya~nca (syaa0 ka.m0)}, bhikkhu, vedana.m pa.ticca... sa~n~na.m ^a^M3.0069^ea^ pa.ticca... sa"nkhaare pa.ticca... vi~n~naa.na.m pa.ticca uppajjati sukha.m somanassa.m, aya.m vi~n~naa.ne assaado. ya.m vi~n~naa.na.m anicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, aya.m vi~n~naa.ne aadiinavo. yo vi~n~naa.ne chandaraagavinayo chandaraagappahaana.m, ida.m vi~n~naa.ne nissara.na''nti.

[03] 89^b^.^eb^ ``katha.m ^a^V3.0067^ea^ pana, bhante, jaanato katha.m passato imasmi~nca savi~n~naa.nake kaaye bahiddhaa ca sabbanimittesu aha.mkaaramama.mkaaramaanaanusayaa na hontii''ti? ``ya.m ki~nci, bhikkhu, ruupa.m -- atiitaanaagatapaccuppanna.m ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa o.laarika.m vaa sukhuma.m vaa hiina.m vaa ^a^P3.0019^ea^ pa.niita.m vaa ^a^T3.0106^ea^ ya.m duure santike vaa -- sabba.m ruupa.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti -- evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya passati. yaa kaaci vedanaa... yaa kaaci sa~n~naa... ye keci sa"nkhaaraa... ya.m ki~nci vi~n~naa.na.m -- atiitaanaagatapaccuppanna.m ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa o.laarika.m vaa sukhuma.m vaa hiina.m vaa pa.niita.m vaa ya.m duure santike vaa -- sabba.m vi~n~naa.na.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti -- evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya passati. eva.m kho, bhikkhu, jaanato eva.m passato imasmi~nca savi~n~naa.nake kaaye bahiddhaa ca sabbanimittesu aha.mkaaramama.mkaaramaanaanusayaa na hontii''ti.

[03] 90^b^.^eb^ atha kho a~n~natarassa bhikkhuno eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi -- ``iti kira, bho, ruupa.m anattaa, vedanaa anattaa, sa~n~naa anattaa, sa"nkhaaraa anattaa, vi~n~naa.na.m anattaa; anattakataani kammaani kamattaana.m {kathamattaana.m (sa.m0 ni0 3.82)} phusissantii''ti? atha kho bhagavaa tassa bhikkhuno cetasaa cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``.thaana.m kho paneta.m, bhikkhave, vijjati ya.m idhekacco moghapuriso avidvaa avijjaagato ta.nhaadhipateyyena cetasaa satthu saasana.m atidhaavitabba.m ma~n~neyya -- `iti kira, bho, ruupa.m anattaa, vedanaa anattaa, sa~n~naa anattaa, sa"nkhaaraa anattaa, vi~n~naa.na.m anattaa; anattakataani kammaani kamattaana.m phusissantii'ti. pa.tiviniitaa {pa.ticca viniitaa (sii0 pii0), pa.tipucchaami viniitaa (syaa0 ka.m0)} kho me tumhe, bhikkhave ^a^T3.0107^ea^, tatra tatra dhammesu''.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, ruupa.m nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti? ``anicca.m, bhante''. ``ya.m ^a^P3.0020^ea^ panaanicca.m dukkha.m vaa ta.m sukha.m vaa''ti? ``dukkha.m, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, kalla.m nu ta.m samanupassitu.m -- `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'''ti? ``no heta.m ^a^M3.0070^ea^, bhante''. ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, vedanaa... sa~n~naa... sa"nkhaaraa... vi~n~naa.na.m nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti? ``anicca.m, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vaa ta.m sukha.m vaa''ti? ``dukkha.m, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, kalla.m nu ta.m samanupassitu.m -- `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, ya.m ki~nci ruupa.m atiitaanaagatapaccuppanna.m ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa o.laarika.m vaa sukhuma.m vaa hiina.m vaa pa.niita.m vaa ya.m duure santike vaa sabba.m ruupa.m -- `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya da.t.thabba.m. yaa kaaci vedanaa... yaa kaaci sa~n~naa... ye keci sa"nkhaaraa... ya.m ki~nci vi~n~naa.na.m atiitaanaagatapaccuppanna.m ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa ^a^V3.0068^ea^ o.laarika.m vaa sukhuma.m vaa hiina.m vaa pa.niita.m vaa ya.m duure santike vaa sabba.m vi~n~naa.na.m -- `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya da.t.thabba.m. eva.m passa.m, bhikkhave, sutavaa ariyasaavako ruupasmimpi nibbindati, vedanaayapi nibbindati, sa~n~naayapi nibbindati, sa"nkhaaresupi nibbindati, vi~n~naa.nasmimpi nibbindati; nibbinda.m virajjati ^a^T3.0108^ea^, viraagaa vimuccati. vimuttasmi.m vimuttamiti ~naa.na.m hoti. `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaatii''ti.

[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamanaa te bhikkhuu bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandunti. imasmi~nca pana veyyaakara.nasmi.m bha~n~namaane sa.t.thimattaana.m bhikkhuuna.m anupaadaaya aasavehi cittaani vimucci.msuuti.
[06] mahaapu.n.namasutta.m ni.t.thita.m navama.m.

[03] 91^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T3.0109^ea^ ^a^V3.0069^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati pubbaaraame migaaramaatupaasaade. tena kho pana samayena bhagavaa tadahuposathe pannarase pu.n.naaya pu.n.namaaya ^a^P3.0021^ea^ rattiyaa bhikkhusa"nghaparivuto abbhokaase nisinno hoti. atha kho bhagavaa tu.nhiibhuuta.m tu.nhiibhuuta.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m anuviloketvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``jaaneyya nu kho, bhikkhave, asappuriso asappurisa.m -- `asappuriso aya.m bhava'''nti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``saadhu, bhikkhave; a.t.thaanameta.m, bhikkhave, anavakaaso ^a^M3.0071^ea^ ya.m asappuriso asappurisa.m jaaneyya -- `asappuriso aya.m bhava'nti. jaaneyya pana, bhikkhave, asappuriso sappurisa.m -- `sappuriso aya.m bhava'''nti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``saadhu, bhikkhave; etampi kho, bhikkhave, a.t.thaana.m anavakaaso ya.m asappuriso sappurisa.m jaaneyya -- `sappuriso aya.m bhava'nti. asappuriso, bhikkhave, assaddhammasamannaagato hoti, asappurisabhatti {asappurisabhattii (sabbattha)} hoti, asappurisacintii hoti, asappurisamantii hoti, asappurisavaaco hoti, asappurisakammanto hoti, asappurisadi.t.thi {asappurisadi.t.thii (sabbattha)} hoti; asappurisadaana.m deti''.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, asappuriso assaddhammasamannaagato hoti? idha, bhikkhave, asappuriso assaddho hoti, ahiriko hoti, anottappii hoti, appassuto hoti ^a^T3.0110^ea^, kusiito hoti, mu.t.thassati hoti, duppa~n~no hoti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, asappuriso assaddhammasamannaagato hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, asappuriso asappurisabhatti hoti? idha, bhikkhave, asappurisassa ye te sama.nabraahma.naa assaddhaa ahirikaa anottappino appassutaa kusiitaa mu.t.thassatino duppa~n~naa tyaassa mittaa honti te sahaayaa. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, asappuriso asappurisabhatti hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, asappuriso asappurisacintii hoti? idha, bhikkhave, asappuriso ^a^V3.0070^ea^ attabyaabaadhaayapi ceteti, parabyaabaadhaayapi ceteti, ubhayabyaabaadhaayapi ceteti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, asappuriso asappurisacintii hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, asappuriso asappurisamantii hoti? idha, bhikkhave, asappuriso attabyaabaadhaayapi manteti, parabyaabaadhaayapi manteti, ubhayabyaabaadhaayapi ^a^P3.0022^ea^ manteti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, asappuriso asappurisamantii hoti.
