[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, asappuriso asappurisavaaco hoti? idha, bhikkhave, asappuriso musaavaadii hoti, pisu.navaaco hoti, pharusavaaco hoti ^a^M3.0072^ea^, samphappalaapii hoti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, asappuriso asappurisavaaco hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, asappuriso asappurisakammanto hoti? idha ^a^T3.0111^ea^, bhikkhave, asappuriso paa.naatipaatii hoti, adinnaadaayii hoti, kaamesumicchaacaarii hoti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, asappuriso asappurisakammanto hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, asappuriso asappurisadi.t.thi hoti? idha, bhikkhave, asappuriso eva.mdi.t.thi {eva.mdi.t.thii (sii0 pii0), eva.mdi.t.thiko (syaa0 ka.m0)} hoti -- `natthi dinna.m, natthi yi.t.tha.m, natthi huta.m, natthi sukatadukka.taana.m {sukka.tadukka.taana.m (sii0 pii0)} kammaana.m phala.m vipaako, natthi aya.m loko, natthi paro loko, natthi maataa, natthi pitaa, natthi sattaa opapaatikaa, natthi loke sama.nabraahma.naa sammaggataa {samaggataa (ka0)} sammaapa.tipannaa, ye ima~nca loka.m para~nca loka.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa pavedentii'ti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, asappuriso asappurisadi.t.thi hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, asappuriso asappurisadaana.m deti? idha, bhikkhave, asappuriso asakkacca.m daana.m deti, asahatthaa daana.m deti, acittiikatvaa daana.m deti, apavi.t.tha.m daana.m deti anaagamanadi.t.thiko daana.m deti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, asappuriso asappurisadaana.m deti.

[01] ``so, bhikkhave, asappuriso eva.m assaddhammasamannaagato, eva.m asappurisabhatti, eva.m asappurisacintii, eva.m asappurisamantii, eva.m asappurisavaaco, eva.m asappurisakammanto, eva.m ^a^V3.0071^ea^ asappurisadi.t.thi; eva.m asappurisadaana.m datvaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa yaa asappurisaana.m gati ^a^T3.0112^ea^ tattha upapajjati. kaa ca, bhikkhave, asappurisaana.m gati? nirayo vaa tiracchaanayoni vaa.

[03] 92^b^.^eb^ ``jaaneyya nu kho, bhikkhave, sappuriso sappurisa.m -- `sappuriso aya.m bhava'''nti? ``eva.m ^a^P3.0023^ea^, bhante''. ``saadhu, bhikkhave; .thaanameta.m, bhikkhave, vijjati ya.m sappuriso sappurisa.m jaaneyya -- `sappuriso aya.m bhava'nti. jaaneyya pana, bhikkhave, sappuriso asappurisa.m -- `asappuriso aya.m bhava'''nti? ``eva.m, bhante''. ``saadhu, bhikkhave; etampi kho, bhikkhave, .thaana.m vijjati ya.m sappuriso asappurisa.m jaaneyya -- `asappuriso aya.m bhava'nti. sappuriso, bhikkhave, saddhammasamannaagato hoti, sappurisabhatti hoti, sappurisacintii ^a^M3.0073^ea^ hoti, sappurisamantii hoti, sappurisavaaco hoti, sappurisakammanto hoti, sappurisadi.t.thi hoti; sappurisadaana.m deti''.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, sappuriso saddhammasamannaagato hoti? idha, bhikkhave, sappuriso saddho hoti, hirimaa hoti, ottappii hoti, bahussuto hoti, aaraddhaviiriyo hoti, upa.t.thitassati hoti, pa~n~navaa hoti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, sappuriso saddhammasamannaagato hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, sappuriso sappurisabhatti hoti? idha, bhikkhave, sappurisassa ye te sama.nabraahma.naa saddhaa hirimanto ottappino bahussutaa aaraddhaviiriyaa upa.t.thitassatino pa~n~navanto tyaassa mittaa honti, te sahaayaa. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, sappuriso sappurisabhatti ^a^T3.0113^ea^ hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, sappuriso sappurisacintii hoti? idha, bhikkhave, sappuriso nevattabyaabaadhaaya ceteti, na parabyaabaadhaaya ceteti, na ubhayabyaabaadhaaya ceteti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, sappuriso sappurisacintii hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, sappuriso sappurisamantii hoti? idha, bhikkhave, sappuriso nevattabyaabaadhaaya ^a^V3.0072^ea^ manteti, na parabyaabaadhaaya manteti, na ubhayabyaabaadhaaya manteti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, sappuriso sappurisamantii hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, sappuriso sappurisavaaco hoti? idha, bhikkhave, sappuriso musaavaadaa pa.tivirato hoti, pisu.naaya vaacaaya pa.tivirato hoti, pharusaaya vaacaaya pa.tivirato hoti, samphappalaapaa pa.tivirato hoti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, sappuriso sappurisavaaco hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, sappuriso sappurisakammanto hoti? idha, bhikkhave, sappuriso paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato hoti, adinnaadaanaa pa.tivirato ^a^P3.0024^ea^ hoti, kaamesumicchaacaaraa pa.tivirato hoti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, sappuriso sappurisakammanto hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca ^a^M3.0074^ea^, bhikkhave, sappuriso sappurisadi.t.thi hoti? idha, bhikkhave, sappuriso eva.mdi.t.thi hoti -- `atthi dinna.m, atthi yi.t.tha.m, atthi huta.m, atthi sukatadukka.taana.m kammaana.m phala.m vipaako, atthi aya.m loko ^a^T3.0114^ea^, atthi paro loko, atthi maataa, atthi pitaa, atthi sattaa opapaatikaa, atthi loke sama.nabraahma.naa sammaggataa sammaapa.tipannaa ye ima~nca loka.m para~nca loka.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa pavedentii'ti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, sappuriso sappurisadi.t.thi hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, sappuriso sappurisadaana.m deti? idha, bhikkhave, sappuriso sakkacca.m daana.m deti, sahatthaa daana.m deti, cittiikatvaa daana.m deti, anapavi.t.tha.m daana.m deti, aagamanadi.t.thiko daana.m deti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, sappuriso sappurisadaana.m deti.

[03] ``so, bhikkhave, sappuriso eva.m saddhammasamannaagato, eva.m sappurisabhatti, eva.m sappurisacintii, eva.m sappurisamantii, eva.m sappurisavaaco, eva.m sappurisakammanto, eva.m sappurisadi.t.thi; eva.m sappurisadaana.m datvaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa yaa sappurisaana.m gati tattha upapajjati. kaa ca, bhikkhave, sappurisaana.m gati? devamahattataa vaa manussamahattataa vaa''ti.
[03] idamavoca ^a^V3.0073^ea^ bhagavaa. attamanaa te bhikkhuu bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandunti.
[06] cuu.lapu.n.namasutta.m ni.t.thita.m dasama.m.
[06] devadahavaggo ni.t.thito pa.thamo.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] devadaha.m pa~ncattaya.m, kinti-saama-sunakkhatta.m.
[22] sappaaya-ga.na-gopaka-mahaapu.n.nacuu.lapu.n.na~ncaati..

[03] 93^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T3.0116^ea^ ^a^M3.0075^ea^ ^a^V3.0074^ea^ ^a^P3.0025^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``pa.n.dito, bhikkhave, saariputto; mahaapa~n~no, bhikkhave, saariputto; puthupa~n~no, bhikkhave, saariputto; haasapa~n~no {haasupa~n~no (sii0 pii0)}, bhikkhave, saariputto; javanapa~n~no, bhikkhave, saariputto; tikkhapa~n~no, bhikkhave, saariputto; nibbedhikapa~n~no, bhikkhave, saariputto; saariputto, bhikkhave, a.d.dhamaasa.m anupadadhammavipassana.m vipassati. tatrida.m, bhikkhave, saariputtassa anupadadhammavipassanaaya hoti.

[03] 94^b^.^eb^ ``idha, bhikkhave, saariputto vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. ye ca pa.thame jhaane {pa.thamajjhaane (ka0 sii0 pii0 ka0)} dhammaa vitakko ca vicaaro ca piiti ca sukha~nca cittekaggataa ca, phasso vedanaa sa~n~naa cetanaa citta.m chando adhimokkho viiriya.m sati upekkhaa manasikaaro -- tyaassa dhammaa anupadavavatthitaa honti. tyaassa dhammaa viditaa uppajjanti, viditaa upa.t.thahanti, viditaa abbhattha.m gacchanti. so eva.m pajaanaati -- `eva.m ^a^T3.0117^ea^ kirame dhammaa ahutvaa sambhonti, hutvaa pa.tiventii'ti. so tesu dhammesu anupaayo anapaayo anissito appa.tibaddho {appa.tibandho (ka0)} vippamutto visa.myutto vimariyaadiikatena cetasaa viharati. so `atthi uttari nissara.na'nti pajaanaati. tabbahuliikaaraa atthitvevassa {atthitevassa (sii0 pii0)} hoti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, saariputto vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m ^a^V3.0075^ea^ cetaso ekodibhaava.m avitakka.m ^a^P3.0026^ea^ avicaara.m samaadhija.m piitisukha.m dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. ye ca dutiye jhaane dhammaa -- ajjhatta.m sampasaado ca piiti ca sukha~nca cittekaggataa ca, phasso vedanaa sa~n~naa cetanaa ^a^M3.0076^ea^ citta.m chando adhimokkho viiriya.m sati upekkhaa manasikaaro -- tyaassa dhammaa anupadavavatthitaa honti. tyaassa dhammaa viditaa uppajjanti, viditaa upa.t.thahanti, viditaa abbhattha.m gacchanti. so eva.m pajaanaati -- `eva.m kirame dhammaa ahutvaa sambhonti, hutvaa pa.tiventii'ti. so tesu dhammesu anupaayo anapaayo anissito appa.tibaddho vippamutto visa.myutto vimariyaadiikatena cetasaa viharati. so `atthi uttari nissara.na'nti pajaanaati. tabbahuliikaaraa atthitvevassa hoti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, saariputto piitiyaa ca viraagaa upekkhako ca viharati sato ca sampajaano, sukha~nca kaayena pa.tisa.mvedeti. ya.m ta.m ariyaa aacikkhanti -- `upekkhako satimaa sukhavihaarii'ti tatiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. ye ca tatiye jhaane dhammaa -- sukha~nca ^a^T3.0118^ea^ sati ca sampaja~n~na~nc cittekaggataa ca, phasso vedanaa sa~n~naa cetanaa citta.m chando adhimokkho viiriya.m sati upekkhaa manasikaaro -- tyaassa dhammaa anupadavavatthitaa honti, tyaassa dhammaa viditaa uppajjanti, viditaa upa.t.thahanti, viditaa abbhattha.m gacchanti. so eva.m pajaanaati -- `eva.m kirame dhammaa ahutvaa sambhonti, hutvaa pa.tiventii'ti. so tesu dhammesu anupaayo anapaayo anissito appa.tibaddho vippamutto visa.myutto vimariyaadiikatena cetasaa viharati. so `atthi uttari nissara.na'nti pajaanaati. tabbahuliikaaraa atthitvevassa hoti.

[01] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, saariputto sukhassa ca pahaanaa dukkhassa ca pahaanaa pubbeva somanassadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaa adukkhamasukha.m upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. ye ca catutthe jhaane dhammaa -- upekkhaa adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa passaddhattaa cetaso anaabhogo satipaarisuddhi cittekaggataa ca, phasso vedanaa sa~n~naa cetanaa citta.m chando adhimokkho viiriya.m sati upekkhaa manasikaaro -- tyaassa dhammaa anupadavavatthitaa honti. tyaassa dhammaa viditaa uppajjanti, viditaa upa.t.thahanti, viditaa ^a^P3.0027^ea^ abbhattha.m gacchanti. so eva.m pajaanaati -- `eva.m kirame dhammaa ahutvaa sambhonti, hutvaa pa.tiventii'ti. so tesu dhammesu anupaayo anapaayaae anissito appa.tibaddho vippamutto visa.myutto vimariyaadiikatena ^a^T3.0119^ea^ cetasaa viharati. so `atthi uttari nissara.na'nti pajaanaati. tabbahuliikaaraa atthitvevassa hoti.

[03] ``puna ^a^M3.0077^ea^ ^a^V3.0076^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, saariputto sabbaso ruupasa~n~naana.m samatikkamaa pa.tighasa~n~naana.m attha"ngamaa naanattasa~n~naana.m amanasikaaraa `ananto aakaaso'ti aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m upasampajja viharati. ye ca aakaasaana~ncaayatane dhammaa -- aakaasaana~ncaayatanasa~n~naa ca cittekaggataa ca phasso vedanaa sa~n~naa cetanaa citta.m chando adhimokkho viiriya.m sati upekkhaa manasikaaro -- tyaassa dhammaa anupadavavatthitaa honti. tyaassa dhammaa viditaa uppajjanti, viditaa upa.t.thahanti, viditaa abbhattha.m gacchanti. so eva.m pajaanaati -- `eva.m kirame dhammaa ahutvaa sambhonti, hutvaa pa.tiventii'ti. so tesu dhammesu anupaayo anapaayo anissito appa.tibaddho vippamutto visa.myutto vimariyaadiikatena cetasaa viharati. so `atthi uttari nissara.na'nti pajaanaati. tabbahuliikaaraa atthitvevassa hoti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, saariputto sabbaso aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m samatikkamma `ananta.m vi~n~naa.na'nti vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m upasampajja viharati. ye ca vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatane dhammaa -- vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanasa~n~naa ca cittekaggataa ca, phasso vedanaa sa~n~naa cetanaa citta.m chando adhimokkho viiriya.m sati upekkhaa manasikaaro -- tyaassa dhammaa anupadavavatthitaa honti. tyaassa dhammaa viditaa uppajjanti, viditaa ^a^T3.0120^ea^ upa.t.thahanti, viditaa abbhattha.m gacchanti. so eva.m pajaanaati -- `eva.m kirame dhammaa ahutvaa sambhonti, hutvaa pa.tiventii'ti. so tesu dhammesu anupaayo anapaayo anissito appa.tibaddho vippamutto visa.myutto vimariyaadiikatena cetasaa viharati. so `atthi uttari nissara.na'nti pajaanaati. tabbahuliikaaraa atthitvevassa hoti.

[03] ``puna ^a^P3.0028^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, saariputto sabbaso vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m samatikkamma `natthi ki~ncii'ti aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m upasampajja viharati. ye ca aaki~nca~n~naayatane dhammaa -- aaki~nca~n~naayatanasa~n~naa ca cittekaggataa ca, phasso vedanaa sa~n~naa cetanaa citta.m chando adhimokkho viiriya.m sati upekkhaa manasikaaro -- tyaassa dhammaa anupadavavatthitaa honti. tyaassa dhammaa viditaa uppajjanti, viditaa upa.t.thahanti, viditaa abbhattha.m gacchanti. so eva.m pajaanaati -- `eva.m kirame dhammaa ahutvaa sambhonti, hutvaa pa.tiventii'ti. so tesu dhammesu anupaayo anapaayo anissito appa.tibaddho vippamutto ^a^M3.0078^ea^ visa.myutto vimariyaadiikatena cetasaa viharati. so `atthi uttari nissara.na'nti pajaanaati. tabbahuliikaaraa atthitvevassa hoti.

[03] 95^b^.^eb^ ``puna ^a^V3.0077^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, saariputto sabbaso aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m samatikkamma nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m upasampajja viharati. so taaya samaapattiyaa sato vu.t.thahati. so taaya samaapattiyaa sato vu.t.thahitvaa ye dhammaa {ye te dhammaa (sii0)} atiitaa niruddhaa vipari.nataa te dhamme samanupassati ^a^T3.0121^ea^ -- `eva.m kirame dhammaa ahutvaa sambhonti, hutvaa pa.tiventii'ti. so tesu dhammesu anupaayo anapaayo anissito appa.tibaddho vippamutto visa.myutto vimariyaadiikatena cetasaa viharati. so `atthi uttari nissara.na'nti pajaanaati. tabbahuliikaaraa atthitvevassa hoti.

[03] 96^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, saariputto sabbaso nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m samatikkamma sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m upasampajja viharati. pa~n~naaya cassa disvaa aasavaa parikkhii.naa honti. so taaya samaapattiyaa sato vu.t.thahati. so taaya samaapattiyaa sato vu.t.thahitvaa ye dhammaa atiitaa niruddhaa vipari.nataa te dhamme samanupassati -- `eva.m kirame dhammaa ahutvaa sambhonti, hutvaa pa.tiventii'ti. so tesu dhammesu anupaayo anapaayo anissito appa.tibaddho vippamutto visa.myutto vimariyaadiikatena cetasaa viharati. so `natthi uttari nissara.na'nti pajaanaati. tabbahuliikaaraa natthitvevassa hoti.

[03] 97^b^.^eb^ ``ya.m kho ta.m, bhikkhave, sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `vasippatto paaramippatto ariyasmi.m siilasmi.m, vasippatto paaramippatto ^a^P3.0029^ea^ ariyasmi.m samaadhismi.m, vasippatto paaramippatto ariyaaya pa~n~naaya ^a^T3.0122^ea^, vasippatto paaramippatto ariyaaya vimuttiyaa'ti, saariputtameva ta.m sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `vasippatto paaramippatto ariyasmi.m siilasmi.m, vasippatto paaramippatto ariyasmi.m samaadhismi.m, vasippatto paaramippatto ariyaaya pa~n~naaya, vasippatto paaramippatto ariyaaya vimuttiyaa'ti. ya.m kho ta.m, bhikkhave ^a^M3.0079^ea^, sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `bhagavato putto oraso mukhato jaato dhammajo dhammanimmito dhammadaayaado no aamisadaayaado'ti, saariputtameva ta.m sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `bhagavato putto oraso mukhato jaato dhammajo dhammanimmito dhammadaayaado no aamisadaayaado'ti. saariputto, bhikkhave, tathaagatena anuttara.m dhammacakka.m pavattita.m sammadeva anuppavattetii''ti.
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamanaa te bhikkhuu bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandunti.
[06] anupadasutta.m ni.t.thita.m pa.thama.m.

[03] 98^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T3.0123^ea^ ^a^V3.0078^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[01] ``idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu a~n~na.m byaakaroti -- `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaati pajaanaamii'ti. tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno bhaasita.m neva abhinanditabba.m nappa.tikkositabba.m. anabhinanditvaa appa.tikkositvaa pa~nho pucchitabbo -- `cattaarome, aavuso, vohaaraa tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena sammadakkhaataa. katame cattaaro? di.t.the di.t.thavaaditaa, sute sutavaaditaa, mute mutavaaditaa, vi~n~naate vi~n~naatavaaditaa ^a^P3.0030^ea^ -- ime kho, aavuso, cattaaro vohaaraa tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena sammadakkhaataa. katha.m jaanato panaayasmato, katha.m passato imesu catuusu vohaaresu anupaadaaya aasavehi citta.m vimutta'nti? khii.naasavassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno vusitavato katakara.niiyassa ohitabhaarassa anuppattasadatthassa parikkhii.nabhavasa.myojanassa sammada~n~naavimuttassa ayamanudhammo hoti veyyaakara.naaya -- `di.t.the kho aha.m ^a^T3.0124^ea^, aavuso, anupaayo anapaayo anissito ^a^M3.0080^ea^ appa.tibaddho vippamutto visa.myutto vimariyaadiikatena cetasaa viharaami. sute kho aha.m, aavuso...pe0... mute kho aha.m, aavuso... vi~n~naate kho aha.m, aavuso, anupaayo anapaayo anissito appa.tibaddho vippamutto visa.myutto vimariyaadiikatena cetasaa viharaami. eva.m kho me, aavuso, jaanato eva.m passato imesu catuusu vohaaresu anupaadaaya aasavehi citta.m vimutta'nti. tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno `saadhuu'ti bhaasita.m abhinanditabba.m anumoditabba.m. `saadhuu'ti bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa uttari.m pa~nho pucchitabbo.

[03] 99^b^.^eb^ ```pa~ncime, aavuso, upaadaanakkhandhaa tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena ^a^V3.0079^ea^ sammadakkhaataa. katame pa~nca? seyyathida.m -- ruupupaadaanakkhandho, vedanupaadaanakkhandho, sa~n~nupaadaanakkhandho, sa"nkhaarupaadaanakkhandho, vi~n~naa.nupaadaanakkhandho -- ime kho, aavuso, pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhaa tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena sammadakkhaataa. katha.m jaanato panaayasmato, katha.m passato imesu pa~ncasu upaadaanakkhandhesu anupaadaaya aasavehi citta.m vimutta'nti? khii.naasavassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno vusitavato katakara.niiyassa ohitabhaarassa anuppattasadatthassa parikkhii.nabhavasa.myojanassa sammada~n~naavimuttassa ayamanudhammo hoti veyyaakara.naaya -- `ruupa.m kho aha.m, aavuso, abala.m viraaguna.m {viraaga.m (sii0 pii0), viraaguta.m (.tiikaa)} anassaasikanti viditvaa ye ruupe upaayuupaadaanaa {upayuupaadaanaa (ka0)} cetaso ^a^P3.0031^ea^ adhi.t.thaanaabhinivesaanusayaa tesa.m khayaa viraagaa nirodhaa ^a^T3.0125^ea^ caagaa pa.tinissaggaa vimutta.m me cittanti pajaanaami. vedana.m kho aha.m, aavuso...pe0... sa~n~na.m kho aha.m, aavuso... sa"nkhaare kho aha.m, aavuso... vi~n~naa.na.m kho aha.m, aavuso, abala.m viraaguna.m anassaasikanti viditvaa ye vi~n~naa.ne upaayuupaadaanaa cetaso adhi.t.thaanaabhinivesaanusayaa tesa.m khayaa viraagaa nirodhaa caagaa pa.tinissaggaa vimutta.m me cittanti pajaanaami. eva.m kho me, aavuso, jaanato eva.m passato imesu pa~ncasu upaadaanakkhandhesu anupaadaaya aasavehi citta.m vimutta'nti. tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno `saadhuu'ti bhaasita.m abhinanditabba.m, anumoditabba.m. `saadhuu'ti bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa uttari.m pa~nho pucchitabbo.

[03] 100^b^.^eb^ ```chayimaa ^a^M3.0081^ea^, aavuso, dhaatuyo tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena sammadakkhaataa. katamaa cha? pathaviidhaatu, aapodhaatu, tejodhaatu, vaayodhaatu, aakaasadhaatu, vi~n~naa.nadhaatu -- imaa kho, aavuso, cha dhaatuyo tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena sammadakkhaataa. katha.m jaanato panaayasmato, katha.m passato imaasu chasu dhaatuusu anupaadaaya aasavehi citta.m vimutta'nti? khii.naasavassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno vusitavato katakara.niiyassa ohitabhaarassa ^a^T3.0126^ea^ anuppattasadatthassa parikkhii.nabhavasa.myojanassa sammada~n~naavimuttassa ayamanudhammo hoti veyyaakara.naaya -- `pathaviidhaatu.m kho aha.m, aavuso, na attato upagacchi.m, na ca pathaviidhaatunissita.m attaana.m. ye ca pathaviidhaatunissitaa upaayuupaadaanaa cetaso adhi.t.thaanaabhinivesaanusayaa tesa.m ^a^T3.0127^ea^ khayaa viraagaa nirodhaa caagaa pa.tinissaggaa vimutta.m me cittanti pajaanaami. aapodhaatu.m kho aha.m, aavuso...pe0... ^a^V3.0080^ea^ tejodhaatu.m kho aha.m, aavuso... vaayodhaatu.m kho aha.m, aavuso... aakaasadhaatu.m kho aha.m, aavuso... vi~n~naa.nadhaatu.m kho aha.m, aavuso, na attato upagacchi.m, na ca vi~n~naa.nadhaatunissita.m attaana.m. ye ca vi~n~naa.nadhaatunissitaa upaayuupaadaanaa cetaso adhi.t.thaanaabhinivesaanusayaa tesa.m khayaa viraagaa nirodhaa caagaa pa.tinissaggaa vimutta.m me cittanti pajaanaami. eva.m kho me, aavuso, jaanato, eva.m passato imaasu chasu dhaatuusu anupaadaaya aasavehi citta.m vimutta'nti. tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno `saadhuu'ti bhaasita.m ^a^P3.0032^ea^ abhinanditabba.m, anumoditabba.m. `saadhuu'ti bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa uttari.m pa~nho pucchitabbo.

[03] 101^b^.^eb^ ```cha kho panimaani, aavuso, ajjhattikabaahiraani {ajjhattikaani baahiraani (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} aayatanaani tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena sammadakkhaataani. katamaani cha? cakkhu ceva ruupaa ca, sota~nca saddaa ca, ghaana~nca gandhaa ca, jivhaa ca rasaa ca, kaayo ca pho.t.thabbaa ca, mano ca dhammaa ca -- imaani kho, aavuso, cha ajjhattikabaahiraani aayatanaani tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena sammadakkhaataani. katha.m jaanato panaayasmato, katha.m passato imesu chasu ajjhattikabaahiresu aayatanesu ^a^M3.0082^ea^ anupaadaaya aasavehi citta.m vimutta'nti? khii.naasavassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno vusitavato katakara.niiyassa ohitabhaarassa ^a^T3.0128^ea^ anuppattasadatthassa parikkhii.nabhavasa.myojanassa sammada~n~naavimuttassa ayamanudhammo hoti veyyaakara.naaya ^a^V3.0081^ea^ -- `cakkhusmi.m, aavuso, ruupe cakkhuvi~n~naa.ne cakkhuvi~n~naa.navi~n~naatabbesu dhammesu yo chando yo raago yaa nandii {nandi (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} yaa ta.nhaa ye ca upaayuupaadaanaa cetaso adhi.t.thaanaabhinivesaanusayaa tesa.m khayaa viraagaa nirodhaa caagaa pa.tinissaggaa vimutta.m me cittanti pajaanaami. sotasmi.m, aavuso, sadde sotavi~n~naa.ne...pe0... ghaanasmi.m, aavuso, gandhe ghaanavi~n~naa.ne... jivhaaya, aavuso, rase jivhaavi~n~naa.ne... kaayasmi.m, aavuso, pho.t.thabbe kaayavi~n~naa.ne... manasmi.m, aavuso, dhamme manovi~n~naa.ne manovi~n~naa.navi~n~naatabbesu dhammesu yo chando yo raago yaa nandii yaa ta.nhaa ye ca upaayuupaadaanaa cetaso adhi.t.thaanaabhinivesaanusayaa tesa.m khayaa viraagaa nirodhaa caagaa pa.tinissaggaa vimutta.m me cittanti pajaanaami. eva.m kho me, aavuso, jaanato eva.m passato imesu chasu ajjhattikabaahiresu aayatanesu anupaadaaya aasavehi citta.m vimutta'nti. tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno `saadhuu'ti bhaasita.m abhinanditabba.m anumoditabba.m. `saadhuu'ti bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa uttari.m pa~nho pucchitabbo.

[03] 102^b^.^eb^ ```katha.m jaanato panaayasmato, katha.m passato imasmi~nca savi~n~naa.nake kaaye bahiddhaa ca sabbanimittesu aha.mkaaramama.mkaaramaanaanusayaa samuuhataa'ti {susamuuhataati (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}? khii.naasavassa ^a^P3.0033^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno vusitavato katakara.niiyassa ohitabhaarassa anuppattasadatthassa parikkhii.nabhavasa.myojanassa sammada~n~naavimuttass ayamanudhammo hoti veyyaakara.naaya -- `pubbe kho aha.m, aavuso, agaariyabhuuto samaano aviddasu ahosi.m. tassa me tathaagato vaa tathaagatasaavako vaa dhamma.m desesi. taaha.m dhamma.m sutvaa tathaagate saddha.m pa.tilabhi.m. so tena saddhaapa.tilaabhena samannaagato iti pa.tisa~ncikkhi.m -- sambaadho gharaavaaso rajaapatho, abbhokaaso pabbajjaa. nayida.m sukara.m agaara.m ajjhaavasataa ekantaparipu.n.na.m ekantaparisuddha.m sa"nkhalikhita.m brahmacariya.m caritu.m. ya.mnuunaaha.m kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa ^a^M3.0083^ea^ anagaariya.m pabbajeyya'''nti.

[03] ``so kho aha.m, aavuso, aparena samayena appa.m vaa bhogakkhandha.m pahaaya mahanta.m vaa bhogakkhandha.m pahaaya, appa.m vaa ~naatipariva.t.ta.m pahaaya mahanta.m vaa ~naatipariva.t.ta.m pahaaya kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbaji.m. so eva.m pabbajito samaano bhikkhuuna.m sikkhaasaajiivasamaapanno paa.naatipaata.m pahaaya paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato ahosi.m nihitada.n.do nihitasattho, lajjii dayaapanno sabbapaa.nabhuutahitaanukampii vihaasi.m. adinnaadaana.m pahaaya adinnaadaanaa pa.tivirato ahosi.m dinnaadaayii dinnapaa.tika"nkhii, athenena ^a^V3.0082^ea^ sucibhuutena attanaa vihaasi.m. abrahmacariya.m pahaaya brahmacaarii ahosi.m aaraacaarii virato methunaa gaamadhammaa. musaavaada.m pahaaya musaavaadaa pa.tivirato ahosi.m saccavaadii saccasandho theto paccayiko avisa.mvaadako ^a^T3.0129^ea^ lokassa. pisu.na.m vaaca.m pahaaya pisu.naaya vaacaaya pa.tivirato ahosi.m, ito sutvaa na amutra akkhaataa imesa.m bhedaaya, amutra vaa sutvaa na imesa.m akkhaataa amuusa.m bhedaaya; iti bhinnaana.m vaa sandhaataa sahitaana.m vaa anuppadaataa samaggaaraamo samaggarato samagganandii samaggakara.ni.m vaaca.m bhaasitaa ahosi.m. pharusa.m vaaca.m pahaaya pharusaaya vaacaaya pa.tivirato ahosi.m; yaa saa vaacaa nelaa ka.n.nasukhaa pemaniiyaa ^a^P3.0034^ea^ hadaya"ngamaa porii bahujanakantaa bahujanamanaapaa tathaaruupi.m vaaca.m bhaasitaa ahosi.m. samphappalaapa.m pahaaya samphappalaapaa pa.tivirato ahosi.m; kaalavaadii bhuutavaadii atthavaadii dhammavaadii vinayavaadii nidhaanavati.m vaaca.m bhaasitaa ahosi.m kaalena saapadesa.m pariyantavati.m atthasa.mhita.m.

[03] ``so biijagaamabhuutagaamasamaarambhaa pa.tivirato ahosi.m, ekabhattiko ahosi.m rattuuparato virato vikaalabhojanaa. naccagiitavaaditavisuukadassanaa pa.tivirato ahosi.m. maalaagandhavilepanadhaara.nama.n.danavibhuusana.t.thaanaa pa.tivirato ahosi.m. uccaasayanamahaasayanaa pa.tivirato ahosi.m. jaataruuparajatapa.tiggaha.naa pa.tivirato ahosi.m, aamakadha~n~napa.tiggaha.naa pa.tivirato ahosi.m, aamakama.msapa.tiggaha.naa pa.tivirato ahosi.m; itthikumaarikapa.tiggaha.naa pa.tivirato ahosi.m, daasidaasapa.tiggaha.naa pa.tivirato ahosi.m, aje.lakapa.tiggaha.naa pa.tivirato ahosi.m, kukku.tasuukarapa.tiggaha.naa pa.tivirato ahosi.m ^a^M3.0084^ea^, hatthigavassava.lavapa.tiggaha.naa pa.tivirato ahosi.m, khettavatthupa.tiggaha.naa pa.tivirato ahosi.m. duuteyyapahi.nagamanaanuyogaa ^a^T3.0130^ea^ pa.tivirato ahosi.m, kayavikkayaa pa.tivirato ahosi.m, tulaakuu.taka.msakuu.tamaanakuu.taa pa.tivirato ahosi.m, ukko.tanava~ncananikatisaaciyogaa pa.tivirato ahosi.m, chedanavadhabandhanaviparaamosaaalopasahasaakaaraa pa.tivirato ahosi.m.

[03] ``so santu.t.tho ahosi.m kaayaparihaarikena ciivarena, kucchiparihaarikena pi.n.dapaatena. so yena yeneva {yena yena ca (ka0)} pakkami.m samaadaayeva pakkami.m. seyyathaapi naama pakkhii saku.no yena yeneva .deti sapattabhaarova .deti; evameva kho aha.m, aavuso; santu.t.tho ahosi.m kaayaparihaarikena ciivarena, kucchiparihaarikena pi.n.dapaatena. so yena yeneva pakkami.m samaadaayeva pakkami.m. so iminaa ariyena siilakkhandhena samannaagato ajjhatta.m anavajjasukha.m pa.tisa.mvedesi.m.

[03] 103^b^.^eb^ ``so ^a^V3.0083^ea^ cakkhunaa ruupa.m disvaa na nimittaggaahii ahosi.m naanubya~njanaggaahii; yatvaadhikara.namena.m cakkhundriya.m asa.mvuta.m viharanta.m abhijjhaadomanassaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa anvaassaveyyu.m, tassa sa.mvaraaya pa.tipajji.m ^a^P3.0035^ea^; rakkhi.m cakkhundriya.m, cakkhundriye sa.mvara.m aapajji.m. sotena sadda.m sutvaa...pe0... ghaanena gandha.m ghaayitvaa...pe0... jivhaaya rasa.m saayitvaa...pe0... kaayena pho.t.thabba.m phusitvaa...pe0... manasaa dhamma.m vi~n~naaya na nimittaggaahii ahosi.m naanubya~njanaggaahii; yatvaadhikara.namena.m manindriya.m asa.mvuta.m viharanta.m abhijjhaadomanassaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa anvaassaveyyu.m, tassa sa.mvaraaya pa.tipajji.m; rakkhi.m manindriya.m, manindriye sa.mvara.m aapajji.m. so ^a^T3.0131^ea^ iminaa ariyena indriyasa.mvarena samannaagato ajjhatta.m abyaasekasukha.m pa.tisa.mvedesi.m.

[03] ``so abhikkante pa.tikkante sampajaanakaarii ahosi.m, aalokite vilokite sampajaanakaarii ahosi.m, sami~njite pasaarite sampajaanakaarii ahosi.m, sa"nghaa.tipattaciivaradhaara.ne sampajaanakaarii ahosi.m, asite piite khaayite saayite sampajaanakaarii ahosi.m, uccaarapassaavakamme sampajaanakaarii ahosi.m, gate .thite nisinne sutte jaagarite bhaasite tu.nhiibhaave sampajaanakaarii ahosi.m.

[03] ``so ^a^M3.0085^ea^ iminaa ca ariyena siilakkhandhena samannaagato, (imaaya ca ariyaaya santu.t.thiyaa samannaagato,) {passa ma0 ni0 1.296 cuu.lahatthipadopame} iminaa ca ariyena indriyasa.mvarena samannaagato, iminaa ca ariyena satisampaja~n~nena samannaagato vivitta.m senaasana.m bhaji.m ara~n~na.m rukkhamuula.m pabbata.m kandara.m giriguha.m susaana.m vanapattha.m abbhokaasa.m palaalapu~nja.m. so pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto nisiidi.m palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa uju.m kaaya.m pa.nidhaaya parimukha.m sati.m upa.t.thapetvaa.

[03] ``so abhijjha.m loke pahaaya vigataabhijjhena cetasaa vihaasi.m, abhijjhaaya citta.m parisodhesi.m. byaapaadapadosa.m pahaaya abyaapannacitto vihaasi.m sabbapaa.nabhuutahitaanukampii, byaapaadapadosaa citta.m parisodhesi.m. thinamiddha.m pahaaya vigatathinamiddho vihaasi.m aalokasa~n~nii sato sampajaano, thinamiddhaa citta.m parisodhesi.m. uddhaccakukkucca.m pahaaya anuddhato vihaasi.m ajjhatta.m, vuupasantacitto, uddhaccakukkuccaa citta.m parisodhesi.m. vicikiccha.m pahaaya ti.n.navicikiccho vihaasi.m akatha.mkathii kusalesu dhammesu, vicikicchaaya citta.m parisodhesi.m.

[03] 104^b^.^eb^ ``so ^a^T3.0132^ea^ ^a^V3.0084^ea^ ime ^a^P3.0036^ea^ pa~nca niivara.ne pahaaya cetaso upakkilese pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.ne vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja vihaasi.m. vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m cetaso ekodibhaava.m avitakka.m avicaara.m samaadhija.m piitisukha.m dutiya.m jhaana.m...pe0... tatiya.m jhaana.m... catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja vihaasi.m.

[01] ``so eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe pariyodaate ana"nga.ne vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite aane~njappatte aasavaana.m khaya~naa.naaya citta.m abhininnaamesi.m. so ida.m dukkhanti yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naasi.m, aya.m dukkhasamudayoti yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naasi.m, aya.m dukkhanirodhoti yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naasi.m, aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaati yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naasi.m; ime aasavaati yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naasi.m, aya.m aasavasamudayoti yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naasi.m, aya.m aasavanirodhoti yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naasi.m, aya.m aasavanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaati yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naasi.m. tassa me eva.m jaanato eva.m ^a^M3.0086^ea^ passato kaamaasavaapi citta.m vimuccittha, bhavaasavaapi citta.m vimuccittha, avijjaasavaapi citta.m vimuccittha: vimuttasmi.m vimuttamiti ~naa.na.m ahosi. khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaati abbha~n~naasi.m. eva.m kho me, aavuso, jaanato eva.m passato imasmi~nca savi~n~naa.nake kaaye bahiddhaa ca sabbanimittesu aha.mkaaramama.mkaaramaanaanusayaa samuuhataa''ti ^a^T3.0133^ea^. ``tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno `saadhuu'ti bhaasita.m abhinanditabba.m anumoditabba.m. `saadhuu'ti bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa evamassa vacaniiyo -- `laabhaa no, aavuso, suladdha.m ^a^P3.0037^ea^ no, aavuso, ye maya.m aayasmanta.m taadisa.m sabrahmacaari.m samanupassaamaa'''ti {passaamaati (sii0)}.
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamanaa te bhikkhuu bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandunti.
[06] chabbisodhanasutta.m ni.t.thita.m dutiya.m.

[03] 105^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T3.0134^ea^ ^a^V3.0085^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``sappurisadhamma~nca vo, bhikkhave, desessaami asappurisadhamma~nca. ta.m su.naatha, saadhuka.m manasi karotha; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, asappurisadhammo? idha, bhikkhave, asappuriso uccaakulaa pabbajito hoti. so iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `aha.m khomhi uccaakulaa pabbajito, ime pana~n~ne bhikkhuu na uccaakulaa pabbajitaa'ti. so taaya uccaakuliinataaya attaanukka.mseti, para.m vambheti. aya.m {ayampi (sii0 pii0)}, bhikkhave, asappurisadhammo. sappuriso ca kho, bhikkhave, iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `na kho uccaakuliinataaya lobhadhammaa vaa parikkhaya.m gacchanti, dosadhammaa vaa parikkhaya.m gacchanti ^a^M3.0087^ea^, mohadhammaa vaa parikkhaya.m gacchanti. no cepi uccaakulaa pabbajito hoti; so ca hoti dhammaanudhammappa.tipanno saamiicippa.tipanno anudhammacaarii ^a^P3.0038^ea^, so tattha pujjo, so tattha paasa.mso'ti. so pa.tipada.myeva antara.m karitvaa taaya uccaakuliinataaya nevattaanukka.mseti na para.m vambheti. aya.m, bhikkhave, sappurisadhammo.

[03] ``puna ^a^T3.0135^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, asappuriso mahaakulaa pabbajito hoti...pe0... {yathaa uccaakulavaare tathaa vitthaaretabba.m} mahaabhogakulaa pabbajito hoti...pe0... u.laarabhogakulaa pabbajito hoti. so iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `aha.m khomhi u.laarabhogakulaa pabbajito, ime pana~n~ne bhikkhuu na u.laarabhogakulaa pabbajitaa'ti. so taaya u.laarabhogataaya attaanukka.mseti, para.m vambheti. ayampi, bhikkhave, asappurisadhammo. sappuriso ca kho, bhikkhave, iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `na kho u.laarabhogataaya lobhadhammaa vaa parikkhaya.m gacchanti, dosadhammaa vaa parikkhaya.m gacchanti, mohadhammaa vaa parikkhaya.m gacchanti. no cepi u.laarabhogakulaa pabbajito hoti; so ^a^V3.0086^ea^ ca hoti dhammaanudhammappa.tipanno saamiicippa.tipanno anudhammacaarii, so tattha pujjo, so tattha paasa.mso'ti. so pa.tipada.myeva antara.m karitvaa taaya u.laarabhogataaya nevattaanukka.mseti, na para.m vambheti. ayampi, bhikkhave, sappurisadhammo.

[03] 106^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, asappuriso ~naato hoti yasassii. so iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `aha.m khomhi ~naato yasassii, ime pana~n~ne bhikkhuu appa~n~naataa appesakkhaa'ti. so tena ~nattena {~naatena (sii0 ka0), ~naatattena (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} attaanukka.mseti, para.m vambheti. ayampi, bhikkhave, asappurisadhammo. sappuriso ca kho, bhikkhave, iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `na kho ~nattena lobhadhammaa vaa parikkhaya.m gacchanti, dosadhammaa vaa parikkhaya.m gacchanti, mohadhammaa vaa parikkhaya.m gacchanti. no cepi ~naato hoti yasassii; so ca hoti dhammaanudhammappa.tipanno saamiicippa.tipanno anudhammacaarii, so tattha pujjo ^a^T3.0136^ea^, so tattha paasa.mso'ti. so pa.tipada.myeva antara.m karitvaa tena ~nattena nevattaanukka.mseti, na para.m vambheti. ayampi, bhikkhave, sappurisadhammo.

[01] ``puna ^a^P3.0039^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, asappuriso laabhii hoti ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraana.m. so iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `aha.m khomhi ^a^M3.0088^ea^ laabhii ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraana.m, ime pana~n~ne bhikkhuu na laabhino ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraana'nti. so tena laabhena attaanukka.mseti, para.m vambheti. ayampi, bhikkhave, asappurisadhammo. sappuriso ca kho, bhikkhave, iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `na kho laabhena lobhadhammaa vaa parikkhaya.m gacchanti, dosadhammaa vaa parikkhaya.m gacchanti, mohadhammaa vaa parikkhaya.m gacchanti. no cepi laabhii hoti ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraana.m; so ca hoti dhammaanudhammappa.tipanno saamiicippa.tipanno anudhammacaarii, so tattha pujjo, so tattha paasa.mso'ti. so pa.tipada.myeva antara.m karitvaa tena laabhena nevattaanukka.mseti, na para.m vambheti. ayampi, bhikkhave, sappurisadhammo.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, asappuriso bahussuto hoti. so iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `aha.m khomhi bahussuto, ime pana~n~ne bhikkhuu na bahussutaa'ti. so tena baahusaccena attaanukka.mseti, para.m vambheti. ayampi, bhikkhave, asappurisadhammo. sappuriso ca kho, bhikkhave ^a^V3.0087^ea^, iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `na kho baahusaccena lobhadhammaa vaa parikkhaya.m gacchanti ^a^T3.0137^ea^, dosadhammaa vaa parikkhaya.m gacchanti, mohadhammaa vaa parikkhaya.m gacchanti. no cepi bahussuto hoti; so ca hoti dhammaanudhammappa.tipanno saamiicippa.tipanno anudhammacaarii, so tattha pujjo, so tattha paasa.mso'ti. so pa.tipada.myeva antara.m karitvaa tena baahusaccena nevattaanukka.mseti, na para.m vambheti. ayampi, bhikkhave, sappurisadhammo.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, asappuriso vinayadharo hoti. so iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `aha.m khomhi vinayadharo, ime pana~n~ne bhikkhuu na vinayadharaa'ti. so tena vinayadharattena attaanukka.mseti, para.m vambheti. ayampi, bhikkhave, asappurisadhammo. sappuriso ca kho, bhikkhave, iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `na kho vinayadharattena lobhadhammaa ^a^P3.0040^ea^ vaa parikkhaya.m gacchanti, dosadhammaa vaa parikkhaya.m gacchanti, mohadhammaa vaa parikkhaya.m gacchanti. no cepi vinayadharo hoti; so ca hoti dhammaanudhammappa.tipanno saamiicippa.tipanno anudhammacaarii, so tattha pujjo, so tattha paasa.mso'ti. so pa.tipada.myeva antara.m karitvaa tena vinayadharattena nevattaanukka.mseti, na para.m vambheti. ayampi, bhikkhave, sappurisadhammo.

[03] ``puna ^a^M3.0089^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, asappuriso dhammakathiko hoti. so iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `aha.m khomhi dhammakathiko, ime pana~n~ne bhikkhuu na dhammakathikaa'ti. so tena dhammakathikattena attaanukka.mseti, para.m vambheti. ayampi, bhikkhave, asappurisadhammo. sappuriso ca kho, bhikkhave, iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `na kho dhammakathikattena lobhadhammaa vaa ^a^T3.0138^ea^ parikkhaya.m gacchanti, dosadhammaa vaa parikkhaya.m gacchanti, mohadhammaa vaa parikkhaya.m gacchanti. no cepi dhammakathiko hoti; so ca hoti dhammaanudhammappa.tipanno saamiicippa.tipanno anudhammacaarii, so tattha pujjo, so tattha paasa.mso'ti. so pa.tipada.myeva antara.m karitvaa tena dhammakathikattena nevattaanukka.mseti, na para.m vambheti. ayampi, bhikkhave, sappurisadhammo.

[03] 107^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, asappuriso aara~n~niko hoti. so iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `aha.m khomhi aara~n~niko ime pana~n~ne bhikkhuu na aara~n~nikaa'ti. so tena aara~n~nikattena attaanukka.mseti, para.m vambheti. ayampi, bhikkhave, asappurisadhammo. sappuriso ca kho, bhikkhave, iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `na kho aara~n~nikattena lobhadhammaa vaa ^a^V3.0088^ea^ parikkhaya.m gacchanti, dosadhammaa vaa parikkhaya.m gacchanti, mohadhammaa vaa parikkhaya.m gacchanti. no cepi aara~n~niko hoti; so ca hoti dhammaanudhammappa.tipanno saamiicippa.tipanno anudhammacaarii, so tattha pujjo, so tattha paasa.mso'ti. so pa.tipada.myeva antara.m karitvaa tena aara~n~nikattena nevattaanukka.mseti, na para.m vambheti. ayampi, bhikkhave, sappurisadhammo.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, asappuriso pa.msukuuliko hoti. so ^a^P3.0041^ea^ iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `aha.m khomhi pa.msukuuliko, ime pana~n~ne bhikkhuu na pa.msukuulikaa'ti. so tena pa.msukuulikattena attaanukka.mseti, para.m vambheti ^a^T3.0139^ea^. ayampi, bhikkhave, asappurisadhammo. sappuriso ca kho, bhikkhave, iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `na kho pa.msukuulikattena lobhadhammaa vaa parikkhaya.m gacchanti, dosadhammaa vaa parikkhaya.m gacchanti, mohadhammaa vaa parikkhaya.m gacchanti. no cepi pa.msukuuliko hoti; so ca hoti dhammaanudhammappa.tipanno saamiicippa.tipanno anudhammacaarii, so tattha pujjo, so tattha paasa.mso'ti. so pa.tipada.myeva antara.m karitvaa tena pa.msukuulikattena nevattaanukka.mseti, na para.m vambheti. ayampi, bhikkhave, sappurisadhammo.

[03] ``puna ^a^M3.0090^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, asappuriso pi.n.dapaatiko hoti. so iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `aha.m khomhi pi.n.dapaatiko, ime pana~n~ne bhikkhuu na pi.n.dapaatikaa'ti. so tena pi.n.dapaatikattena attaanukka.mseti, para.m vambheti. ayampi, bhikkhave, asappurisadhammo. sappuriso ca kho, bhikkhave, iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `na kho pi.n.dapaatikattena lobhadhammaa vaa parikkhaya.m gacchanti, dosadhammaa vaa parikkhaya.m gacchanti, mohadhammaa vaa parikkhaya.m gacchanti. no cepi pi.n.dapaatiko hoti; so ca hoti dhammaanudhammappa.tipanno saamiicippa.tipanno anudhammacaarii, so tattha pujjo, so tattha paasa.mso'ti. so pa.tipada.myeva antara.m karitvaa tena pi.n.dapaatikattena nevattaanukka.mseti, na para.m vambheti. ayampi, bhikkhave, sappurisadhammo.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, asappuriso rukkhamuuliko hoti. so iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `aha.m khomhi rukkhamuuliko, ime pana~n~ne bhikkhuu na ^a^T3.0140^ea^ rukkhamuulikaa'ti. so tena rukkhamuulikattena attaanukka.mseti, para.m vambheti. ayampi, bhikkhave, asappurisadhammo. sappuriso ca kho, bhikkhave, iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `na kho rukkhamuulikattena ^a^V3.0089^ea^ lobhadhammaa vaa parikkhaya.m gacchanti, dosadhammaa vaa parikkhaya.m gacchanti, mohadhammaa vaa parikkhaya.m gacchanti. no cepi rukkhamuuliko hoti; so ca hoti dhammaanudhammappa.tipanno saamiicippa.tipanno anudhammacaarii, so tattha pujjo, so tattha paasa.mso'ti. so pa.tipada.myeva ^a^P3.0042^ea^ antara.m karitvaa tena rukkhamuulikattena nevattaanukka.mseti, na para.m vambheti. ayampi, bhikkhave, sappurisadhammo.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, asappuriso sosaaniko hoti...pe0... abbhokaasiko hoti... nesajjiko hoti... ^a^V3.0090^ea^ yathaasanthatiko hoti... ekaasaniko hoti. so iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `aha.m khomhi ekaasaniko, ime pana~n~ne bhikkhuu na ekaasanikaa'ti. so tena ekaasanikattena attaanukka.mseti, para.m vambheti. ayampi, bhikkhave, asappurisadhammo. sappuriso ca kho, bhikkhave, iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `na kho ekaasanikattena lobhadhammaa vaa parikkhaya.m gacchanti, dosadhammaa vaa parikkhaya.m gacchanti, mohadhammaa vaa parikkhaya.m gacchanti. no cepi ekaasaniko hoti; so ca hoti dhammaanudhammappa.tipanno saamiicippa.tipanno anudhammacaarii, so tattha pujjo, so tattha paasa.mso'ti. so pa.tipada.myeva antara.m karitvaa ^a^M3.0091^ea^ tena ekaasanikattena nevattaanukka.mseti, na para.m vambheti. ayampi, bhikkhave, sappurisadhammo.

[03] 108^b^.^eb^ ``puna ^a^T3.0141^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, asappuriso vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. so iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `aha.m khomhi pa.thamajjhaanasamaapattiyaa laabhii, ime pana~n~ne bhikkhuu pa.thamajjhaanasamaapattiyaa na laabhino'ti. so taaya pa.thamajjhaanasamaapattiyaa attaanukka.mseti, para.m vambheti. ayampi, bhikkhave, asappurisadhammo. sappuriso ca kho, bhikkhave, iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati ^a^V3.0091^ea^ -- `pa.thamajjhaanasamaapattiyaapi kho atammayataa vuttaa bhagavataa. yena yena hi ma~n~nanti tato ta.m hoti a~n~nathaa'ti. so atammayata~n~neva ^a^P3.0043^ea^ antara.m karitvaa taaya pa.thamajjhaanasamaapattiyaa nevattaanukka.mseti, na para.m vambheti. ayampi, bhikkhave, sappurisadhammo.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, asappuriso vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m cetaso ekodibhaava.m avitakka.m avicaara.m samaadhija.m piitisukha.m dutiya.m jhaana.m...pe0... tatiya.m jhaana.m... catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. so iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `aha.m khomhi catutthajjhaanasamaapattiyaa laabhii, ime pana~n~ne bhikkhuu catutthajjhaanasamaapattiyaa na laabhino'ti. so taaya catutthajjhaanasamaapattiyaa attaanukka.mseti, para.m vambheti. ayampi, bhikkhave, asappurisadhammo. sappuriso ca kho ^a^T3.0142^ea^, bhikkhave, iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `catutthajjhaanasamaapattiyaapi kho atammayataa vuttaa bhagavataa. yena yena hi ma~n~nanti tato ta.m hoti a~n~nathaa'ti. so atammayata~n~neva antara.m karitvaa taaya catutthajjhaanasamaapattiyaa nevattaanukka.mseti, na para.m vambheti. ayampi, bhikkhave, sappurisadhammo.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, asappuriso sabbaso ruupasa~n~naana.m samatikkamaa pa.tighasa~n~naana.m attha"ngamaa naanattasa~n~naana.m amanasikaaraa `ananto aakaaso'ti aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m upasampajja viharati. so iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `aha.m khomhi aakaasaana~ncaayatanasamaapattiyaa laabhii, ime pana~n~ne bhikkhuu aakaasaana~ncaayatanasamaapattiyaa na laabhino'ti. so taaya aakaasaana~ncaayatanasamaapattiyaa attaanukka.mseti, para.m vambheti. ayampi, bhikkhave, asappurisadhammo. sappuriso ca kho, bhikkhave, iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati ^a^M3.0092^ea^ -- `aakaasaana~ncaayatanasamaapattiyaapi kho atammayataa vuttaa bhagavataa. yena yena hi ma~n~nanti tato ta.m hoti a~n~nathaa'ti. so atammayata~n~neva antara.m karitvaa taaya aakaasaana~ncaayatanasamaapattiyaa ^a^V3.0092^ea^ nevattaanukka.mseti, na para.m vambheti. ayampi, bhikkhave, sappurisadhammo.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, asappuriso sabbaso aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m samatikkamma `ananta.m vi~n~naa.na'nti vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m upasampajja viharati. so iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `aha.m khomhi vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanasamaapattiyaa ^a^T3.0143^ea^ laabhii, ime pana~n~ne bhikkhuu ^a^P3.0044^ea^ vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanasamaapattiyaa na laabhino'ti. so taaya vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanasamaapattiyaa attaanukka.mseti, para.m vambheti. ayampi, bhikkhave, asappurisadhammo. sappuriso ca kho, bhikkhave, iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanasamaapattiyaapi kho atammayataa vuttaa bhagavataa. yena yena hi ma~n~nanti tato ta.m hoti a~n~nathaa'ti. so atammayata~n~neva antara.m karitvaa taaya vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanasamaapattiyaa nevattaanukka.mseti, na para.m vambheti. ayampi, bhikkhave, sappurisadhammo.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, asappuriso sabbaso vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m samatikkamma `natthi ki~ncii'ti aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m upasampajja viharati. so iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `aha.m khomhi aaki~nca~n~naayatanasamaapattiyaa laabhii, ime pana~n~ne bhikkhuu aaki~nca~n~naayatanasamaapattiyaa na laabhino'ti. so taaya aaki~nca~n~naayatanasamaapattiyaa attaanukka.mseti, para.m vambheti. ayampi, bhikkhave, asappurisadhammo. sappuriso ca kho, bhikkhave, iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `aaki~nca~n~naayatanasamaapattiyaapi kho atammayataa vuttaa bhagavataa. yena yena hi ma~n~nanti tato ta.m hoti a~n~nathaa'ti. so atammayata~n~neva antara.m karitvaa taaya aaki~nca~n~naayatanasamaapattiyaa nevattaanukka.mseti, na para.m vambheti. ayampi, bhikkhave, sappurisadhammo.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, asappuriso sabbaso aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m samatikkamma ^a^T3.0144^ea^ nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m upasampajja viharati. so iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `aha.m khomhi nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanasamaapattiyaa laabhii, ime pana~n~ne bhikkhuu nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanasamaapattiyaa na laabhino'ti. so taaya nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanasamaapattiyaa attaanukka.mseti ^a^M3.0093^ea^, para.m vambheti. ayampi, bhikkhave, asappurisadhammo. sappuriso ca kho, bhikkhave ^a^V3.0093^ea^, iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanasamaapattiyaapi kho atammayataa vuttaa bhagavataa. yena yena hi ma~n~nanti tato ta.m hoti a~n~nathaa'ti. so atammayata~n~neva antara.m karitvaa taaya nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanasamaapattiyaa nevattaanukka.mseti, na para.m vambheti. ayampi, bhikkhave, sappurisadhammo.

[03] ``puna ^a^P3.0045^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, sappuriso sabbaso nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m samatikkamma sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m upasampajja viharati. pa~n~naaya cassa disvaa aasavaa {ekacce aasavaa (ka0)} parikkhii.naa honti. aya.m {aya.m kho (syaa0 ka.m0)}, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na ki~nci ma~n~nati, na kuhi~nci ma~n~nati, na kenaci ma~n~natii''ti.
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamanaa te bhikkhuu bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandunti.
[06] sappurisasutta.m ni.t.thita.m tatiya.m.

[03] 109^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T3.0145^ea^ ^a^V3.0094^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``sevitabbaasevitabba.m vo, bhikkhave, dhammapariyaaya.m desessaami. ta.m su.naatha, saadhuka.m manasi karotha; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[01] ``kaayasamaacaara.mpaaha.m {paha.m (sabbattha)}, bhikkhave, duvidhena vadaami -- sevitabbampi, asevitabbampi; ta~nca a~n~nama~n~na.m kaayasamaacaara.m. vaciisamaacaara.mpaaha.m, bhikkhave, duvidhena vadaami -- sevitabbampi, asevitabbampi; ta~nca a~n~nama~n~na.m vaciisamaacaara.m. manosamaacaara.mpaaha.m, bhikkhave, duvidhena vadaami -- sevitabbampi, asevitabbampi; ta~nca a~n~nama~n~na.m manosamaacaara.m. cittuppaada.mpaaha.m, bhikkhave, duvidhena vadaami -- sevitabbampi, asevitabbampi; ta~nca a~n~nama~n~na.m ^a^P3.0046^ea^ cittuppaada.m. sa~n~naapa.tilaabha.mpaaha.m, bhikkhave, duvidhena vadaami -- sevitabbampi ^a^M3.0094^ea^, asevitabbampi; ta~nca a~n~nama~n~na.m sa~n~naapa.tilaabha.m. di.t.thipa.tilaabha.mpaaha.m, bhikkhave, duvidhena vadaami -- sevitabbampi, asevitabbampi; ta~nca a~n~nama~n~na.m di.t.thipa.tilaabha.m. attabhaavapa.tilaabha.mpaaha.m, bhikkhave, duvidhena vadaami -- sevitabbampi, asevitabbampi; ta~nca a~n~nama~n~na.m attabhaavapa.tilaabha''nti.

[03] eva.m ^a^T3.0146^ea^ vutte aayasmaa saariputto bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``imassa kho aha.m, bhante, bhagavataa sa.mkhittena bhaasitassa, vitthaarena attha.m avibhattassa, eva.m vitthaarena attha.m aajaanaami.

[03] 110^b^.^eb^ ```kaayasamaacaara.mpaaha.m, bhikkhave, duvidhena vadaami -- sevitabbampi, asevitabbampi; ta~nca a~n~nama~n~na.m kaayasamaacaara'nti -- iti kho paneta.m vutta.m bhagavataa. ki~nceta.m ^a^V3.0095^ea^ pa.ticca vutta.m? yathaaruupa.m, bhante, kaayasamaacaara.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, kusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti, evaruupo kaayasamaacaaro na sevitabbo; yathaaruupa~nca kho, bhante, kaayasamaacaara.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti, kusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, evaruupo kaayasamaacaaro sevitabbo.

[03] 111^b^.^eb^ ``katha.mruupa.m, bhante, kaayasamaacaara.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, kusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti? idha, bhante, ekacco paa.naatipaatii hoti luddo lohitapaa.ni hatappahate nivi.t.tho adayaapanno paa.nabhuutesu; adinnaadaayii kho pana hoti, ya.m ta.m parassa paravittuupakara.na.m gaamagata.m vaa ara~n~nagata.m vaa ta.m adinna.m theyyasa"nkhaata.m aadaataa hoti; kaamesumicchaacaarii kho pana hoti, yaa taa maaturakkhitaa piturakkhitaa maataapiturakkhitaa bhaaturakkhitaa bhaginirakkhitaa ~naatirakkhitaa gottarakkhitaa dhammarakkhitaa sassaamikaa saparida.n.daa antamaso maalaagu.laparikkhittaapi tathaaruupaasu caaritta.m aapajjitaa hoti -- evaruupa.m, bhante, kaayasamaacaara.m ^a^P3.0047^ea^ sevato akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, kusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti.

[03] ``katha.mruupa.m ^a^T3.0147^ea^, bhante, kaayasamaacaara.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti, kusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti? idha, bhante, ekacco paa.naatipaata.m pahaaya paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato hoti nihitada.n.do nihitasattho, lajjii dayaapanno sabbapaa.nabhuutahitaanukampii viharati; adinnaadaana.m pahaaya adinnaadaanaa pa.tivirato hoti, ya.m ta.m parassa paravittuupakara.na.m ^a^M3.0095^ea^ gaamagata.m vaa ara~n~nagata.m vaa ta.m naadinna.m theyyasa"nkhaata.m aadaataa hoti; kaamesumicchaacaara.m pahaaya kaamesumicchaacaaraa pa.tivirato hoti, yaa taa maaturakkhitaa piturakkhitaa maataapiturakkhitaa bhaaturakkhitaa bhaginirakkhitaa ~naatirakkhitaa gottarakkhitaa dhammarakkhitaa sassaamikaa saparida.n.daa antamaso maalaagu.laparikkhittaapi tathaaruupaasu na caaritta.m aapajjitaa hoti -- evaruupa.m, bhante, kaayasamaacaara.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti, kusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti. `kaayasamaacaara.mpaaha.m, bhikkhave, duvidhena vadaami -- sevitabbampi, asevitabbampi; ta~nca a~n~nama~n~na.m kaayasamaacaara'nti -- iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m bhagavataa idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] ```vaciisamaacaara.mpaaha.m, bhikkhave, duvidhena vadaami -- sevitabbampi, asevitabbampi; ta~nca a~n~nama~n~na.m vaciisamaacaara'nti -- iti kho paneta.m vutta.m bhagavataa. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m ^a^V3.0096^ea^? yathaaruupa.m, bhante, vaciisamaacaara.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, kusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti, evaruupo vaciisamaacaaro na sevitabbo; yathaaruupa~nca kho, bhante, vaciisamaacaara.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti, kusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti ^a^T3.0148^ea^ evaruupo vaciisamaacaaro sevitabbo.

[03] 112^b^.^eb^ ``katha.mruupa.m, bhante, vaciisamaacaara.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, kusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti? idha, bhante, ekacco musaavaadii hoti, sabhaagato {sabhaggato (bahuusu)} vaa parisaagato {parisaggato (bahuusu)} vaa ~naatimajjhagato ^a^P3.0048^ea^ vaa puugamajjhagato vaa raajakulamajjhagato vaa abhiniito sakkhipu.t.tho -- `ehambho purisa, ya.m jaanaasi ta.m vadehii'ti so ajaana.m vaa aaha -- `jaanaamii'ti, jaana.m vaa aaha -- `na jaanaamii'ti; apassa.m vaa aaha -- `passaamii'ti, passa.m vaa aaha -- `na passaamii'ti -- iti {passa ma0 ni0 1.440 saaleyyakasutte} attahetu vaa parahetu vaa aamisaki~ncikkhahetu {ki~ncakkhahetu (sii0)} vaa sampajaanamusaa bhaasitaa hoti; pisu.navaaco kho pana hoti, ito sutvaa amutra akkhaataa imesa.m bhedaaya, amutra vaa sutvaa imesa.m akkhaataa amuusa.m bhedaaya -- iti samaggaana.m vaa bhettaa, bhinnaana.m vaa anuppadaataa, vaggaaraamo, vaggarato, vagganandii, vaggakara.ni.m vaaca.m bhaasitaa ^a^M3.0096^ea^ hoti; pharusavaaco kho pana hoti, yaa saa vaacaa ka.n.dakaa kakkasaa pharusaa paraka.tukaa paraabhisajjanii kodhasaamantaa asamaadhisa.mvattanikaa, tathaaruupi.m vaaca.m bhaasitaa hoti; samphappalaapii kho pana hoti akaalavaadii abhuutavaadii anatthavaadii adhammavaadii avinayavaadii, anidhaanavati.m vaaca.m bhaasitaa hoti akaalena anapadesa.m apariyantavati.m anatthasa.mhita.m -- evaruupa.m, bhante, vaciisamaacaara.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, kusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti.

[01] ``katha.mruupa.m, bhante, vaciisamaacaara.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti ^a^T3.0149^ea^, kusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti? idha, bhante, ekacco musaavaada.m pahaaya musaavaadaa pa.tivirato hoti sabhaagato vaa parisaagato vaa ~naatimajjhagato vaa puugamajjhagato vaa raajakulamajjhagato vaa abhiniito sakkhipu.t.tho -- `ehambho purisa, ya.m jaanaasi ta.m vadehii'ti so ajaana.m vaa aaha -- `na jaanaamii'ti, jaana.m vaa aaha -- `jaanaamii'ti, apassa.m vaa aaha -- `na passaamii'ti, passa.m vaa aaha -- `passaamii'ti ^a^P3.0049^ea^ -- iti attahetu vaa parahetu vaa aamisaki~ncikkhahetu vaa na sampajaanamusaa bhaasitaa hoti; pisu.na.m vaaca.m pahaaya pisu.naaya vaacaaya pa.tivirato hoti, ito sutvaa na amutra akkhaataa imesa.m bhedaaya, amutra ^a^V3.0097^ea^ vaa sutvaa na imesa.m akkhaataa amuusa.m bhedaaya -- iti bhinnaana.m vaa sandhaataa sahitaana.m vaa anuppadaataa samaggaaraamo samaggarato samagganandii samaggakara.ni.m vaaca.m bhaasitaa hoti; pharusa.m vaaca.m pahaaya pharusaaya vaacaaya pa.tivirato hoti, yaa saa vaacaa nelaa ka.n.nasukhaa pemaniiyaa hadaya"ngamaa porii bahujanakantaa bahujanamanaapaa tathaaruupi.m vaaca.m bhaasitaa hoti; samphappalaapa.m pahaaya samphappalaapaa pa.tivirato hoti kaalavaadii bhuutavaadii atthavaadii dhammavaadii vinayavaadii, nidhaanavati.m vaaca.m bhaasitaa hoti kaalena saapadesa.m pariyantavati.m atthasa.mhita.m -- evaruupa.m, bhante, vaciisamaacaara.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti, kusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti. `vaciisamaacaara.mpaaha.m, bhikkhave, duvidhena vadaami -- sevitabbampi, asevitabbampi; ta~nca a~n~nama~n~na.m vaciisamaacaara'nti ^a^T3.0150^ea^ -- iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m bhagavataa idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] ```manosamaacaara.mpaaha.m, bhikkhave, duvidhena vadaami -- sevitabbampi, asevitabbampi; ta~nca a~n~nama~n~na.m manosamaacaara'nti -- iti kho paneta.m vutta.m bhagavataa. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? yathaaruupa.m, bhante, manosamaacaara.m sevato akusalaa ^a^M3.0097^ea^ dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, kusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti evaruupo manosamaacaaro na sevitabbo; yathaaruupa~nca kho, bhante, manosamaacaara.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti, kusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti evaruupo manosamaacaaro sevitabbo.

[03] 113^b^.^eb^ ``katha.mruupa.m, bhante, manosamaacaara.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, kusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti? idha, bhante, ekacco abhijjhaalu hoti, ya.m ta.m parassa paravittuupakara.na.m ta.m abhijjhaataa hoti -- `aho vata ya.m parassa ta.m mamassaa'ti; byaapannacitto kho pana hoti padu.t.thamanasa"nkappo ^a^P3.0050^ea^ -- `ime sattaa ha~n~nantu vaa vajjhantu vaa ucchijjantu vaa vinassantu vaa maa vaa ahesu'nti -- evaruupa.m, bhante, manosamaacaara.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, kusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti.

[03] ``katha.mruupa.m, bhante, manosamaacaara.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti, kusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti? idha, bhante, ekacco anabhijjhaalu hoti, ya.m ta.m parassa paravittuupakara.na.m ta.m naabhijjhaataa hoti -- `aho vata ya.m parassa ta.m mamassaa'ti; abyaapannacitto kho ^a^T3.0151^ea^ pana hoti appadu.t.thamanasa"nkappo ^a^V3.0098^ea^ -- `ime sattaa averaa abyaabajjhaa {abyaapajjhaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0)} aniighaa sukhii attaana.m pariharantuu'ti -- evaruupa.m, bhante, manosamaacaara.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti, kusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti. `manosamaacaara.mpaaha.m, bhikkhave, duvidhena vadaami -- sevitabbampi, asevitabbampi; ta~nca a~n~nama~n~na.m manosamaacaara'nti -- iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m bhagavataa idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] 114^b^.^eb^ ```cittuppaada.mpaaha.m, bhikkhave, duvidhena vadaami -- sevitabbampi, asevitabbampi; ta~nca a~n~nama~n~na.m cittuppaada'nti -- iti kho paneta.m vutta.m bhagavataa. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? yathaaruupa.m, bhante, cittuppaada.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, kusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti evaruupo cittuppaado na sevitabbo; yathaaruupa~nca kho, bhante, cittuppaada.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti, kusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti evaruupo cittuppaado sevitabbo.

[03] ``katha.mruupa.m, bhante, cittuppaada.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, kusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti? idha, bhante, ekacco abhijjhaalu hoti, abhijjhaasahagatena ^a^M3.0098^ea^ cetasaa viharati; byaapaadavaa hoti, byaapaadasahagatena cetasaa viharati; vihesavaa hoti, vihesaasahagatena cetasaa viharati -- evaruupa.m, bhante, cittuppaada.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, kusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti.

[03] ``katha.mruupa.m, bhante, cittuppaada.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti ^a^T3.0152^ea^, kusalaa ^a^P3.0051^ea^ dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti? idha, bhante, ekacco anabhijjhaalu hoti, anabhijjhaasahagatena cetasaa viharati; abyaapaadavaa hoti, abyaapaadasahagatena cetasaa viharati; avihesavaa hoti, avihesaasahagatena cetasaa viharati -- evaruupa.m, bhante, cittuppaada.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti, kusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti. `cittuppaada.mpaaha.m, bhikkhave, duvidhena vadaami -- sevitabbampi, asevitabbampi; ta~nca a~n~nama~n~na.m cittuppaada'nti -- iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m bhagavataa idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] 115^b^.^eb^ ```sa~n~naapa.tilaabha.mpaaha.m, bhikkhave, duvidhena vadaami -- sevitabbampi, asevitabbampi; ta~nca a~n~nama~n~na.m sa~n~naapa.tilaabha'nti -- iti kho paneta.m vutta.m bhagavataa. ki~nceta.m ^a^V3.0099^ea^ pa.ticca vutta.m? yathaaruupa.m, bhante, sa~n~naapa.tilaabha.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, kusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti evaruupo sa~n~naapa.tilaabho na sevitabbo; yathaaruupa~nca kho, bhante, sa~n~naapa.tilaabha.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti, kusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti evaruupo sa~n~naapa.tilaabho sevitabbo.

[03] ``katha.mruupa.m, bhante, sa~n~naapa.tilaabha.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, kusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti? idha, bhante, ekacco abhijjhaalu hoti, abhijjhaasahagataaya sa~n~naaya viharati; byaapaadavaa hoti, byaapaadasahagataaya sa~n~naaya viharati; vihesavaa hoti, vihesaasahagataaya sa~n~naaya viharati -- evaruupa.m, bhante, sa~n~naapa.tilaabha.m sevato ^a^T3.0153^ea^ akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, kusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti.

[03] ``katha.mruupa.m, bhante, sa~n~naapa.tilaabha.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti, kusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti? idha, bhante, ekacco anabhijjhaalu hoti, anabhijjhaasahagataaya sa~n~naaya viharati; abyaapaadavaa hoti, abyaapaadasahagataaya sa~n~naaya viharati; avihesavaa hoti, avihesaasahagataaya sa~n~naaya viharati -- evaruupa.m, bhante, sa~n~naapa.tilaabha.m sevato ^a^M3.0099^ea^ akusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti, kusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti. `sa~n~naapa.tilaabha.mpaaha.m, bhikkhave, duvidhena vadaami -- sevitabbampi, asevitabbampi; ta~nca a~n~nama~n~na.m sa~n~naapa.tilaabha'nti -- iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m bhagavataa idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] 116^b^.^eb^ ```di.t.thipa.tilaabha.mpaaha.m ^a^P3.0052^ea^, bhikkhave, duvidhena vadaami -- sevitabbampi, asevitabbampi; ta~nca a~n~nama~n~na.m di.t.thipa.tilaabha'nti -- iti kho paneta.m vutta.m bhagavataa. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? yathaaruupa.m, bhante, di.t.thipa.tilaabha.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, kusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti evaruupo di.t.thipa.tilaabho na sevitabbo; yathaaruupa~nca kho, bhante, di.t.thipa.tilaabha.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti, kusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti -- evaruupo di.t.thipa.tilaabho sevitabbo.

[03] ``katha.mruupa.m, bhante, di.t.thipa.tilaabha.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, kusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti? idha, bhante, ekacco eva.mdi.t.thiko hoti -- `natthi dinna.m, natthi yi.t.tha.m, natthi huta.m ^a^V3.0100^ea^, natthi sukatadukka.taana.m ^a^T3.0154^ea^ kammaana.m phala.m vipaako, natthi aya.m loko, natthi paro loko, natthi maataa, natthi pitaa, natthi sattaa opapaatikaa, natthi loke sama.nabraahma.naa sammaggataa sammaapa.tipannaa ye ima~nca loka.m para~nca loka.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa pavedentii'ti -- evaruupa.m, bhante, di.t.thipa.tilaabha.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, kusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti.

[01] ``katha.mruupa.m, bhante, di.t.thipa.tilaabha.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti, kusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti? idha, bhante, ekacco eva.mdi.t.thiko hoti -- `atthi dinna.m, atthi yi.t.tha.m, atthi huta.m, atthi sukatadukka.taana.m kammaana.m phala.m vipaako, atthi aya.m loko, atthi paro loko, atthi maataa, atthi pitaa, atthi sattaa opapaatikaa, atthi loke sama.nabraahma.naa sammaggataa sammaapa.tipannaa ye ima~nca loka.m para~nca loka.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa pavedentii'ti -- evaruupa.m, bhante, di.t.thipa.tilaabha.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti, kusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti. `di.t.thipa.tilaabha.mpaaha.m, bhikkhave, duvidhena vadaami -- sevitabbampi, asevitabbampi; ta~nca a~n~nama~n~na.m di.t.thipa.tilaabha'nti -- iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m bhagavataa idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] 117^b^.^eb^ ```attabhaavapa.tilaabha.mpaaha.m ^a^M3.0100^ea^, bhikkhave, duvidhena vadaami -- sevitabbampi, asevitabbampi; ta~nca a~n~nama~n~na.m attabhaavapa.tilaabha'nti -- iti kho paneta.m vutta.m bhagavataa. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? yathaaruupa.m, bhante, attabhaavapa.tilaabha.m ^a^T3.0155^ea^ ^a^P3.0053^ea^ sevato akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, kusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti -- evaruupo attabhaavapa.tilaabho na sevitabbo; yathaaruupa~nca kho, bhante, attabhaavapa.tilaabha.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti, kusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti -- evaruupo attabhaavapa.tilaabho sevitabbo.

[03] ``katha.mruupa.m, bhante, attabhaavapa.tilaabha.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, kusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti? sabyaabajjha.m {sabyaapajjha.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0)}, bhante, attabhaavapa.tilaabha.m abhinibbattayato aparini.t.thitabhaavaaya akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, kusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti; abyaabajjha.m, bhante, attabhaavapa.tilaabha.m abhinibbattayato parini.t.thitabhaavaaya akusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti, kusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti. `attabhaavapa.tilaabha.mpaaha.m, bhikkhave, duvidhena vadaami -- sevitabbampi ^a^V3.0101^ea^, asevitabbampi; ta~nca a~n~nama~n~na.m attabhaavapa.tilaabha'nti -- iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m bhagavataa idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.
[03] ``imassa kho aha.m, bhante, bhagavataa sa.mkhittena bhaasitassa, vitthaarena attha.m avibhattassa, eva.m vitthaarena attha.m aajaanaamii''ti.
[03] 118^b^.^eb^ ``saadhu saadhu, saariputta! saadhu kho tva.m, saariputta, imassa mayaa sa.mkhittena bhaasitassa, vitthaarena attha.m avibhattassa, eva.m vitthaarena attha.m aajaanaasi.

[03] ```kaayasamaacaara.mpaaha.m, bhikkhave, duvidhena vadaami ^a^T3.0156^ea^ -- sevitabbampi, asevitabbampi; ta~nca a~n~nama~n~na.m kaayasamaacaara'nti -- iti kho paneta.m vutta.m mayaa. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? yathaaruupa.m, saariputta, kaayasamaacaara.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, kusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti evaruupo kaayasamaacaaro na sevitabbo; yathaaruupa~nca kho, saariputta, kaayasamaacaara.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti, kusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti -- evaruupo kaayasamaacaaro sevitabbo.

[03] ``katha.mruupa.m ^a^P3.0054^ea^, saariputta, kaayasamaacaara.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, kusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti? idha, saariputta, ekacco paa.naatipaatii hoti ^a^M3.0101^ea^ luddo lohitapaa.ni hatappahate nivi.t.tho adayaapanno paa.nabhuutesu; adinnaadaayii kho pana hoti, ya.m ta.m parassa paravittuupakara.na.m gaamagata.m vaa ara~n~nagata.m vaa ta.m adinna.m theyyasa"nkhaata.m aadaataa hoti; kaamesumicchaacaarii kho pana hoti, yaa taa maaturakkhitaa piturakkhitaa maataapiturakkhitaa bhaaturakkhitaa bhaginirakkhitaa ~naatirakkhitaa gottarakkhitaa dhammarakkhitaa sassaamikaa saparida.n.daa antamaso maalaagu.laparikkhittaapi tathaaruupaasu caaritta.m aapajjitaa hoti -- evaruupa.m, saariputta, kaayasamaacaara.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, kusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti.

[03] ```attabhaavapa.tilaabha.mpaaha.m, bhikkhave, duvidhena vadaami -- sevitabbampi, asevitabbampi; ta~nca a~n~nama~n~na.m attabhaavapa.tilaabha'nti -- iti kho paneta.m vutta.m mayaa. ki~nceta.m ^a^M3.0102^ea^ pa.ticca vutta.m? yathaaruupa.m, saariputta, attabhaavapa.tilaabha.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, kusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti evaruupo attabhaavapa.tilaabho na sevitabbo; yathaaruupa~nca kho, saariputta, attabhaavapa.tilaabha.m ^a^T3.0158^ea^ sevato akusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti, kusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti -- evaruupo attabhaavapa.tilaabho sevitabbo.

[03] 124^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T3.0166^ea^ ^a^V3.0108^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``yaani kaanici, bhikkhave, bhayaani uppajjanti sabbaani taani baalato uppajjanti, no pa.n.ditato; ye keci upaddavaa uppajjanti sabbe te baalato uppajjanti, no pa.n.ditato; ye keci upasaggaa uppajjanti sabbe te baalato uppajjanti, no pa.n.ditato. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave ^a^M3.0107^ea^, na.laagaaraa vaa ti.naagaaraa vaa aggi mutto {aggimukko (sii0 pii0)} kuu.taagaaraanipi dahati ullittaavalittaani nivaataani phusitagga.laani pihitavaatapaanaani; evameva kho, bhikkhave, yaani kaanici bhayaani uppajjanti sabbaani taani baalato uppajjanti, no pa.n.ditato; ye keci upaddavaa uppajjanti sabbe te baalato uppajjanti, no pa.n.ditato; ye keci upasaggaa uppajjanti sabbe te baalato uppajjanti, no pa.n.ditato. iti kho, bhikkhave, sappa.tibhayo baalo, appa.tibhayo pa.n.dito; saupaddavo baalo, anupaddavo pa.n.dito; saupasaggo baalo, anupasaggo pa.n.dito. natthi, bhikkhave, pa.n.ditato bhaya.m, natthi pa.n.ditato upaddavo, natthi pa.n.ditato upasaggo. tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, `pa.n.ditaa bhavissaama viima.msakaa'ti -- eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba''nti.

[03] eva.m ^a^T3.0167^ea^ ^a^P3.0062^ea^ vutte, aayasmaa aanando bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``kittaavataa nu kho, bhante, pa.n.dito bhikkhu `viima.msako'ti ala.m vacanaayaa''ti? ``yato kho, aananda, bhikkhu dhaatukusalo ca hoti, aayatanakusalo ca hoti, pa.ticcasamuppaadakusalo ca hoti, .thaanaa.thaanakusalo ca hoti -- ettaavataa kho, aananda, pa.n.dito bhikkhu `viima.msako'ti ala.m vacanaayaa''ti.

[03] 125^b^.^eb^ ``kittaavataa pana, bhante, `dhaatukusalo bhikkhuu'ti ala.m vacanaayaa''ti? ``a.t.thaarasa ^a^V3.0109^ea^ kho imaa, aananda, dhaatuyo -- cakkhudhaatu, ruupadhaatu, cakkhuvi~n~naa.nadhaatu; sotadhaatu, saddadhaatu, sotavi~n~naa.nadhaatu; ghaanadhaatu, gandhadhaatu, ghaanavi~n~naa.nadhaatu; jivhaadhaatu, rasadhaatu, jivhaavi~n~naa.nadhaatu; kaayadhaatu, pho.t.thabbadhaatu, kaayavi~n~naa.nadhaatu; manodhaatu, dhammadhaatu, manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu. imaa kho, aananda, a.t.thaarasa dhaatuyo yato jaanaati passati -- ettaavataapi kho, aananda, `dhaatukusalo bhikkhuu'ti ala.m vacanaayaa''ti.

[03] ``siyaa pana, bhante, a~n~nopi pariyaayo, yathaa `dhaatukusalo bhikkhuu'ti ala.m vacanaayaa''ti? ``siyaa, aananda. chayimaa, aananda, dhaatuyo -- pathaviidhaatu, aapodhaatu, tejodhaatu, vaayodhaatu, aakaasadhaatu, vi~n~naa.nadhaatu. imaa kho, aananda, cha dhaatuyo yato jaanaati ^a^M3.0108^ea^ passati -- ettaavataapi kho, aananda, `dhaatukusalo bhikkhuu'ti ala.m vacanaayaa''ti.

[03] ``siyaa pana, bhante, a~n~nopi pariyaayo, yathaa `dhaatukusalo bhikkhuu'ti ala.m vacanaayaa''ti? ``siyaa, aananda. chayimaa, aananda, dhaatuyo -- sukhadhaatu ^a^T3.0168^ea^, dukkhadhaatu, somanassadhaatu, domanassadhaatu, upekkhaadhaatu, avijjaadhaatu. imaa kho, aananda, cha dhaatuyo yato jaanaati passati -- ettaavataapi kho, aananda, `dhaatukusalo bhikkhuu'ti ala.m vacanaayaa''ti.

[03] ``siyaa pana, bhante, a~n~nopi pariyaayo, yathaa `dhaatukusalo bhikkhuu'ti ala.m vacanaayaa''ti? ``siyaa, aananda. chayimaa, aananda, dhaatuyo -- kaamadhaatu, nekkhammadhaatu, byaapaadadhaatu, abyaapaadadhaatu, vihi.msaadhaatu ^a^P3.0063^ea^, avihi.msaadhaatu. imaa kho, aananda, cha dhaatuyo yato jaanaati passati -- ettaavataapi kho, aananda, `dhaatukusalo bhikkhuu'ti ala.m vacanaayaa''ti.

[03] ``siyaa pana, bhante, a~n~nopi pariyaayo, yathaa `dhaatukusalo bhikkhuu'ti ala.m vacanaayaa''ti? ``siyaa, aananda. tisso imaa, aananda, dhaatuyo -- kaamadhaatu, ruupadhaatu, aruupadhaatu. imaa kho, aananda, tisso dhaatuyo yato jaanaati passati -- ettaavataapi kho, aananda, `dhaatukusalo bhikkhuu'ti ala.m vacanaayaa''ti.

[03] ``siyaa ^a^V3.0110^ea^ pana, bhante, a~n~nopi pariyaayo, yathaa `dhaatukusalo bhikkhuu'ti ala.m vacanaayaa''ti? ``siyaa, aananda. dve imaa, aananda, dhaatuyo -- sa"nkhataadhaatu, asa"nkhataadhaatu. imaa kho, aananda, dve dhaatuyo yato jaanaati passati -- ettaavataapi kho, aananda, `dhaatukusalo bhikkhuu'ti ala.m vacanaayaa''ti.

[03] 126^b^.^eb^ ``kittaavataa pana, bhante, `aayatanakusalo bhikkhuu'ti ala.m vacanaayaa''ti? ``cha kho panimaani, aananda, ajjhattikabaahiraani aayatanaani -- cakkhuceva ^a^T3.0169^ea^ ruupaa ca sota~nca saddaa ca ghaana~nca gandhaa ca jivhaa ca rasaa ca kaayo ca pho.t.thabbaa ca mano ca dhammaa ca. imaani kho, aananda, cha ajjhattikabaahiraani aayatanaani yato jaanaati passati -- ettaavataa kho, aananda, `aayatanakusalo bhikkhuu'ti ala.m vacanaayaa''ti.

[03] ``kittaavataa ^a^M3.0109^ea^ pana, bhante, `pa.ticcasamuppaadakusalo bhikkhuu'ti ala.m vacanaayaa''ti? ``idhaananda, bhikkhu eva.m pajaanaati -- `imasmi.m sati ida.m hoti, imassuppaadaa ida.m uppajjati, imasmi.m asati ida.m na hoti, imassa nirodhaa ida.m nirujjhati, yadida.m -- avijjaapaccayaa sa"nkhaaraa, sa"nkhaarapaccayaa vi~n~naa.na.m, vi~n~naa.napaccayaa naamaruupa.m, naamaruupapaccayaa sa.laayatana.m, sa.laayatanapaccayaa phasso, phassapaccayaa vedanaa, vedanaapaccayaa ta.nhaa, ta.nhaapaccayaa upaadaana.m, upaadaanapaccayaa bhavo ^a^P3.0064^ea^, bhavapaccayaa jaati, jaatipaccayaa jaraamara.na.m sokaparidevadukkhadomanassuupaayaasaa sambhavanti. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti. avijjaayatveva asesaviraaganirodhaa sa"nkhaaranirodho, sa"nkhaaranirodhaa vi~n~naa.nanirodho, vi~n~naa.nanirodhaa naamaruupanirodho, naamaruupanirodhaa sa.laayatananirodho, sa.laayatananirodhaa phassanirodho, phassanirodhaa vedanaanirodho, vedanaanirodhaa ta.nhaanirodho, ta.nhaanirodhaa upaadaananirodho, upaadaananirodhaa bhavanirodho, bhavanirodhaa jaatinirodho, jaatinirodhaa jaraamara.na.m sokaparidevadukkhadomanassuupaayaasaa ^a^T3.0170^ea^ nirujjhanti. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hoti'. ettaavataa kho, aananda, `pa.ticcasamuppaadakusalo bhikkhuu'ti ala.m vacanaayaa''ti.

[03] 127^b^.^eb^ ``kittaavataa pana, bhante, `.thaanaa.thaanakusalo bhikkhuu'ti ala.m vacanaayaa''ti? ``idhaananda, bhikkhu `a.t.thaanameta.m anavakaaso ya.m di.t.thisampanno puggalo ka~nci {ki~nci (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} sa"nkhaara.m niccato upagaccheyya, neta.m .thaana.m vijjatii'ti pajaanaati; `.thaana~nca kho eta.m vijjati ya.m puthujjano ka~nci ^a^V3.0111^ea^ sa"nkhaara.m niccato upagaccheyya, .thaanameta.m vijjatii'ti pajaanaati; `a.t.thaanameta.m anavakaaso ya.m di.t.thisampanno puggalo ka~nci sa"nkhaara.m sukhato upagaccheyya, neta.m .thaana.m vijjatii'ti pajaanaati; `.thaana~nca kho eta.m vijjati ya.m puthujjano ka~nci sa"nkhaara.m sukhato upagaccheyya, .thaanameta.m vijjatii'ti pajaanaati. `a.t.thaanameta.m anavakaaso ya.m di.t.thisampanno puggalo ka~nci dhamma.m attato upagaccheyya, neta.m .thaana.m vijjatii'ti pajaanaati, `.thaana~nca kho eta.m vijjati ya.m puthujjano ka~nci dhamma.m attato upagaccheyya, .thaanameta.m vijjatii'ti pajaanaati.

[03] 128^b^.^eb^ ```a.t.thaanameta.m ^a^M3.0110^ea^ anavakaaso ya.m di.t.thisampanno puggalo maatara.m jiivitaa voropeyya, neta.m .thaana.m vijjatii'ti pajaanaati; `.thaana~nca kho eta.m vijjati ya.m puthujjano maatara.m jiivitaa voropeyya, .thaanameta.m vijjatii'ti pajaanaati. `a.t.thaanameta.m anavakaaso ya.m di.t.thisampanno ^a^P3.0065^ea^ puggalo pitara.m jiivitaa voropeyya...pe0... ^a^T3.0171^ea^ arahanta.m jiivitaa voropeyya, .thaanameta.m vijjatii'ti pajaanaati; `a.t.thaanameta.m anavakaaso ya.m di.t.thisampanno puggalo du.t.thacitto tathaagatassa lohita.m uppaadeyya, neta.m .thaana.m vijjatii'ti pajaanaati; `.thaana~nca kho eta.m vijjati ya.m puthujjano du.t.thacitto tathaagatassa lohita.m uppaadeyya, .thaanameta.m vijjatii'ti pajaanaati. `a.t.thaanameta.m anavakaaso ya.m di.t.thisampanno puggalo sa"ngha.m bhindeyya, neta.m .thaana.m vijjatii'ti pajaanaati; `.thaana~nca kho eta.m vijjati ya.m puthujjano sa"ngha.m bhindeyya, .thaanameta.m vijjatii'ti pajaanaati. `a.t.thaanameta.m anavakaaso ya.m di.t.thisampanno puggalo a~n~na.m satthaara.m uddiseyya, neta.m .thaana.m vijjatii'ti pajaanaati; `.thaana~nca kho eta.m vijjati ya.m puthujjano a~n~na.m satthaara.m uddiseyya, .thaanameta.m vijjatii'ti pajaanaati.

[03] 129^b^.^eb^ ```a.t.thaanameta.m anavakaaso ya.m ekissaa lokadhaatuyaa dve arahanto sammaasambuddhaa apubba.m acarima.m uppajjeyyu.m, neta.m .thaana.m vijjatii'ti pajaanaati; `.thaana~nca kho eta.m vijjati ya.m ekissaa lokadhaatuyaa eko araha.m sammaasambuddho uppajjeyya, .thaanameta.m vijjatii'ti pajaanaati. `a.t.thaanameta.m anavakaaso ya.m ekissaa lokadhaatuyaa dve raajaano cakkavattino apubba.m acarima.m uppajjeyyu.m, neta.m .thaana.m vijjatii'ti pajaanaati; `.thaana~nca kho eta.m vijjati ya.m ekissaa lokadhaatuyaa eko raajaa cakkavattii uppajjeyya, .thaanameta.m vijjatii'ti pajaanaati.

[03] 130^b^.^eb^ ```a.t.thaanameta.m ^a^V3.0112^ea^ anavakaaso ya.m itthii araha.m assa sammaasambuddho ^a^T3.0172^ea^, neta.m .thaana.m vijjatii'ti pajaanaati; `.thaana~nca kho eta.m vijjati ya.m puriso araha.m assa sammaasambuddho, .thaanameta.m vijjatii'ti pajaanaati. `a.t.thaanameta.m anavakaaso ya.m itthii raajaa assa cakkavattii, neta.m .thaana.m vijjatii'ti pajaanaati; `.thaana~nca kho eta.m vijjati ya.m puriso raajaa assa cakkavattii, .thaanameta.m vijjatii'ti pajaanaati. `a.t.thaanameta.m anavakaaso ya.m itthii sakkatta.m kareyya ^a^P3.0066^ea^... maaratta.m kareyya... brahmatta.m kareyya, neta.m .thaana.m vijjatii'ti pajaanaati; `.thaana~nca kho eta.m vijjati ya.m puriso sakkatta.m ^a^M3.0111^ea^ kareyya... maaratta.m kareyya... brahmatta.m kareyya, .thaanameta.m vijjatii'ti pajaanaati.

[03] 131^b^.^eb^ ```a.t.thaanameta.m anavakaaso ya.m kaayaduccaritassa i.t.tho kanto manaapo vipaako nibbatteyya, neta.m .thaana.m vijjatii'ti pajaanaati; `.thaana~nca kho eta.m vijjati ya.m kaayaduccaritassa ani.t.tho akanto amanaapo vipaako nibbatteyya, .thaanameta.m vijjatii'ti pajaanaati. `a.t.thaanameta.m anavakaaso ya.m vaciiduccaritassa...pe0... ya.m manoduccaritassa i.t.tho kanto manaapo vipaako nibbatteyya, neta.m .thaana.m vijjatii'ti pajaanaati; .thaana~nca kho eta.m vijjati ya.m vaciiduccaritassa...pe0... ya.m manoduccaritassa ani.t.tho akanto amanaapo vipaako nibbatteyya, .thaanameta.m vijjatiiti pajaanaati. `a.t.thaanameta.m anavakaaso ya.m kaayasucaritassa ani.t.tho akanto amanaapo vipaako nibbatteyya, neta.m .thaana.m vijjatii'ti pajaanaati; `.thaana~nca kho eta.m vijjati ya.m kaayasucaritassa ^a^T3.0173^ea^ i.t.tho kanto manaapo vipaako nibbatteyya, .thaanameta.m vijjatii'ti pajaanaati. `a.t.thaanameta.m anavakaaso ya.m vaciisucaritassa...pe0... ya.m manosucaritassa ani.t.tho akanto amanaapo vipaako nibbatteyya, neta.m .thaana.m vijjatii'ti pajaanaati; `.thaana~nca kho eta.m vijjati ya.m vaciisucaritassa...pe0... ya.m manosucaritassa i.t.tho kanto manaapo vipaako nibbatteyya, .thaanameta.m vijjatii'ti pajaanaati.

[03] ```a.t.thaanameta.m anavakaaso ya.m kaayaduccaritasama"ngii ta.mnidaanaa tappaccayaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjeyya, neta.m .thaana.m vijjatii'ti pajaanaati; `.thaana~nca kho eta.m vijjati ya.m kaayaduccaritasama"ngii ^a^P3.0067^ea^ ta.mnidaanaa tappaccayaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjeyya, .thaanameta.m vijjatii'ti pajaanaati. `a.t.thaanameta.m anavakaaso ^a^V3.0113^ea^ ya.m vaciiduccaritasama"ngii...pe0... ya.m manoduccaritasama"ngii ta.mnidaanaa tappaccayaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjeyya, neta.m .thaana.m vijjatii'ti pajaanaati; `.thaana~nca kho eta.m vijjati ya.m vaciiduccaritasama"ngii...pe0... ya.m manoduccaritasama"ngii ta.mnidaanaa tappaccayaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjeyya, .thaanameta.m vijjatii'ti pajaanaati. `a.t.thaanameta.m anavakaaso ya.m kaayasucaritasama"ngii ta.mnidaanaa tappaccayaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m ^a^M3.0112^ea^ vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjeyya, neta.m .thaana.m vijjatii'ti pajaanaati; `.thaana~nca kho eta.m vijjati ya.m kaayasucaritasama"ngii ta.mnidaanaa tappaccayaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m ^a^T3.0174^ea^ sagga.m loka.m upapajjeyya, .thaanameta.m vijjatii'ti pajaanaati. `a.t.thaanameta.m anavakaaso ya.m vaciisucaritasama"ngii...pe0... ya.m manosucaritasama"ngii ta.mnidaanaa tappaccayaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjeyya, neta.m .thaana.m vijjatii'ti pajaanaati; `.thaana~nca kho eta.m vijjati ya.m vaciisucaritasama"ngii...pe0... ya.m manosucaritasama"ngii ta.mnidaanaa tappaccayaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjeyya, .thaanameta.m vijjatii'ti pajaanaati. ettaavataa kho, aananda, `.thaanaa.thaanakusalo bhikkhuu'ti ala.m vacanaayaa''ti.

[03] 132^b^.^eb^ eva.m vutte aayasmaa aanando bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``acchariya.m, bhante, abbhuta.m, bhante! konaamo aya.m, bhante, dhammapariyaayo''ti? ``tasmaatiha tva.m, aananda, ima.m dhammapariyaaya.m `bahudhaatuko'tipi na.m dhaarehi, `catupariva.t.to'tipi na.m dhaarehi, `dhammaadaaso'tipi na.m dhaarehi, `amatadundubhii'tipi {dudrabhiitipi (ka0)} na.m dhaarehi, `anuttaro sa"ngaamavijayo'tipi na.m dhaarehii''ti.
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamano aayasmaa aanando bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandiiti.
[06] bahudhaatukasutta.m ni.t.thita.m pa~ncama.m.

[03] 133^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T3.0175^ea^ ^a^V3.0114^ea^ ^a^P3.0068^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati isigilismi.m pabbate. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --
[03] ``passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, eta.m vebhaara.m pabbata''nti? ``eva.m, bhante''. ``etassapi kho, bhikkhave, vebhaarassa pabbatassa a~n~naava sama~n~naa ahosi a~n~naa pa~n~natti''.

[03] ``passatha ^a^M3.0113^ea^ no tumhe, bhikkhave, eta.m pa.n.dava.m pabbata''nti? ``eva.m, bhante''. ``etassapi kho, bhikkhave, pa.n.davassa pabbatassa a~n~naava sama~n~naa ahosi a~n~naa pa~n~natti''.
[03] ``passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, eta.m vepulla.m pabbata''nti? ``eva.m, bhante''. ``etassapi kho, bhikkhave, vepullassa pabbatassa a~n~naava sama~n~naa ahosi a~n~naa pa~n~natti''.
[01] ``passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, eta.m gijjhakuu.ta.m pabbata''nti? ``eva.m, bhante''. ``etassapi kho, bhikkhave, gijjhakuu.tassa pabbatassa a~n~naava sama~n~naa ahosi a~n~naa pa~n~natti''.
[03] ``passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, ima.m isigili.m pabbata''nti? ``eva.m, bhante''. ``imassa kho pana, bhikkhave, isigilissa pabbatassa esaava sama~n~naa ahosi esaa pa~n~natti''.
