[03] ``bhuutapubba.m, bhikkhave, pa~nca paccekabuddhasataani imasmi.m isigilismi.m pabbate ciranivaasino ahesu.m. te ima.m pabbata.m pavisantaa dissanti ^a^T3.0176^ea^, pavi.t.thaa na dissanti. tamena.m manussaa disvaa evamaaha.msu -- `aya.m pabbato ime isii {isayo (ka0)} gilatii'ti; `isigili isigili' tveva sama~n~naa udapaadi. aacikkhissaami {acikkhissaami vo (ka0)}, bhikkhave, paccekabuddhaana.m naamaani; kittayissaami, bhikkhave, paccekabuddhaana.m naamaani; desessaami, bhikkhave ^a^P3.0069^ea^, paccekabuddhaana.m naamaani ^a^V3.0115^ea^. ta.m su.naatha, saadhuka.m manasi karotha; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] 134^b^.^eb^ ``ari.t.tho naama, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho {paccekabuddho (ka0 sii0 pii0)} imasmi.m isigilismi.m pabbate ciranivaasii ahosi; upari.t.tho naama, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmi.m isigilismi.m pabbate ciranivaasii ahosi; tagarasikhii {taggarasikhii (ka0)} naama, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmi.m isigilismi.m pabbate ciranivaasii ahosi; yasassii naama, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmi.m isigilismi.m pabbate ciranivaasii ahosi; sudassano naama, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmi.m isigilismi.m pabbate ciranivaasii ahosi; piyadassii naama, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho ^a^M3.0114^ea^ imasmi.m isigilismi.m pabbate ciranivaasii ahosi; gandhaaro naama, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmi.m isigilismi.m pabbate ciranivaasii ahosi; pi.n.dolo naama, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmi.m isigilismi.m pabbate ciranivaasii ahosi; upaasabho naama, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmi.m isigilismi.m pabbate ciranivaasii ahosi; niito naama, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmi.m isigilismi.m pabbate ciranivaasii ahosi; tatho naama, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho ^a^T3.0177^ea^ imasmi.m isigilismi.m pabbate ciranivaasii ahosi, sutavaa naama, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmi.m isigilismi.m pabbate ciranivaasii ahosi; bhaavitatto naama, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmi.m isigilismi.m pabbate ciranivaasii ahosi.
[21] ``ye sattasaaraa aniighaa niraasaa,
[27] paccekamevajjhagama.msu bodhi.m {paccekamevajjhagamu.m subodhi.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}.
[26] tesa.m visallaana naruttamaana.m,
[22] naamaani me kittayato su.naatha..
[21] ``ari.t.tho upari.t.tho tagarasikhii yasassii,
[27] sudassano piyadassii ca susambuddho {buddho (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}.
[26] gandhaaro pi.n.dolo upaasabho ca,
[22] niito tatho sutavaa bhaavitatto..
[21] ``sumbho ^a^V3.0116^ea^ ^a^P3.0070^ea^ subho matulo {methulo (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} a.t.thamo ca,
[27] athassumegho {a.t.thasumedho (ka0)} aniigho sudaa.tho.
[26] paccekabuddhaa bhavanettikhii.naa,
[22] hi"nguu ca hi"ngo ca mahaanubhaavaa..
[21] ``dve jaalino munino a.t.thako ca,
[27] atha kosallo buddho atho subaahu.
[26] upanemiso nemiso santacitto,
[22] sacco tatho virajo pa.n.dito ca..
[21] ``kaa.luupakaa.laa ^a^T3.0178^ea^ ^a^M3.0115^ea^ vijito jito ca,
[27] a"ngo ca pa"ngo ca guttijito ca.
[26] passi jahi upadhidukkhamuula.m {passii jahii upadhi.m dukkhamuula.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)},
[22] aparaajito maarabala.m ajesi..
[21] ``satthaa pavattaa sarabha"ngo lomaha.mso,
[27] ucca"ngamaayo asito anaasavo.
[26] manomayo maanacchido ca bandhumaa,
[22] tadaadhimutto vimalo ca ketumaa..
[21] ``ketumbharaago ca maata"ngo ariyo,
[27] athaccuto accutagaamabyaamako.
[26] suma"ngalo dabbilo supati.t.thito,
[22] asayho khemaabhirato ca sorato..
[21] ``durannayo sa"ngho athopi ujjayo,
[27] aparo muni sayho anomanikkamo.
[26] aanando ^a^V3.0117^ea^ nando upanando dvaadasa,
[22] bhaaradvaajo antimadehadhaarii {antimadehadhaari (sii0)}..
[21] ``bodhi mahaanaamo athopi uttaro,
[27] kesii sikhii sundaro dvaarabhaajo.
[26] tissuupatissaa ^a^T3.0179^ea^ bhavabandhanacchidaa,
[22] upasikhi ta.nhacchido ca sikhari {upasiidarii ta.nhacchido ca siidarii (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}..
[21] ``buddho ahu ma"ngalo viitaraago,
[27] usabhacchidaa jaalini.m dukkhamuula.m.
[26] santa.m pada.m ajjhagamopaniito,
[22] uposatho sundaro saccanaamo..
[21] ``jeto jayanto padumo uppalo ca,
[27] padumuttaro rakkhito pabbato ca.
[26] maanatthaddho ^a^P3.0071^ea^ sobhito viitaraago,
[22] ka.nho ca buddho suvimuttacitto..
[21] ``ete ^a^M3.0116^ea^ ca a~n~ne ca mahaanubhaavaa,
[27] paccekabuddhaa bhavanettikhii.naa.
[26] te sabbasa"ngaatigate mahesii,
[22] parinibbute vandatha appameyye''ti..
[06] isigilisutta.m ni.t.thita.m cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 136^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T3.0180^ea^ ^a^V3.0118^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``ariya.m vo, bhikkhave, sammaasamaadhi.m desessaami saupanisa.m saparikkhaara.m. ta.m su.naatha, saadhuka.m manasi karotha; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, ariyo sammaasamaadhi saupaniso saparikkhaaro? seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi, sammaasa"nkappo, sammaavaacaa, sammaakammanto, sammaaaajiivo, sammaavaayaamo, sammaasati; yaa kho, bhikkhave, imehi sattaha"ngehi cittassa ekaggataa parikkhataa -- aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, ariyo sammaasamaadhi saupaniso itipi, saparikkhaaro itipi. tatra, bhikkhave, sammaadi.t.thi pubba"ngamaa hoti. katha~nca, bhikkhave, sammaadi.t.thi pubba"ngamaa hoti? micchaadi.t.thi.m `micchaadi.t.thii'ti pajaanaati, sammaadi.t.thi.m `sammaadi.t.thii'ti pajaanaati -- saassa hoti sammaadi.t.thi.

[03] ``katamaa ca, bhikkhave, micchaadi.t.thi? `natthi dinna.m, natthi yi.t.tha.m, natthi huta.m, natthi sukatadukka.taana.m kammaana.m phala.m vipaako, natthi ^a^T3.0181^ea^ aya.m loko, natthi paro loko, natthi maataa, natthi pitaa, natthi sattaa opapaatikaa, natthi ^a^P3.0072^ea^ loke sama.nabraahma.naa sammaggataa sammaapa.tipannaa ye ima~nca loka.m para~nca loka.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa pavedentii'ti -- aya.m, bhikkhave, micchaadi.t.thi.

[03] ``katamaa ^a^M3.0117^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, sammaadi.t.thi? sammaadi.t.thi.mpaha.m {sammaadi.t.thimaha.m (ka0) eva.m sammaasa"nkappa.mpaha.mkyaadiisupi}, bhikkhave, dvaaya.m {dvaya.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0) .tiikaa oloketabbaa} vadaami -- atthi, bhikkhave, sammaadi.t.thi saasavaa pu~n~nabhaagiyaa upadhivepakkaa; atthi, bhikkhave, sammaadi.t.thi ariyaa anaasavaa lokuttaraa magga"ngaa. katamaa ca, bhikkhave, sammaadi.t.thi saasavaa pu~n~nabhaagiyaa upadhivepakkaa ^a^V3.0119^ea^? `atthi dinna.m, atthi yi.t.tha.m, atthi huta.m, atthi sukatadukka.taana.m kammaana.m phala.m vipaako, atthi aya.m loko, atthi paro loko, atthi maataa, atthi pitaa, atthi sattaa opapaatikaa, atthi loke sama.nabraahma.naa sammaggataa sammaapa.tipannaa ye ima~nca loka.m para~nca loka.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa pavedentii'ti -- aya.m, bhikkhave, sammaadi.t.thi saasavaa pu~n~nabhaagiyaa upadhivepakkaa.

[03] ``katamaa ca, bhikkhave, sammaadi.t.thi ariyaa anaasavaa lokuttaraa magga"ngaa? yaa kho, bhikkhave, ariyacittassa anaasavacittassa ariyamaggasama"ngino ariyamagga.m bhaavayato pa~n~naa pa~n~nindriya.m pa~n~naabala.m dhammavicayasambojjha"ngo sammaadi.t.thi magga"nga.m {magga"ngaa (sii0 pii0)} -- aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, sammaadi.t.thi ariyaa anaasavaa lokuttaraa magga"ngaa. so micchaadi.t.thiyaa pahaanaaya ^a^T3.0182^ea^ vaayamati, sammaadi.t.thiyaa, upasampadaaya, svaassa {svaaya.m (ka0)} hoti sammaavaayaamo. so sato micchaadi.t.thi.m pajahati, sato sammaadi.t.thi.m upasampajja viharati, saassa {saaya.m (ka0)} hoti sammaasati. itiyime {itime (sii0), itissime (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} tayo dhammaa sammaadi.t.thi.m anuparidhaavanti anuparivattanti, seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi, sammaavaayaamo, sammaasati.

[03] 137^b^.^eb^ ``tatra, bhikkhave, sammaadi.t.thi pubba"ngamaa hoti. katha~nca, bhikkhave, sammaadi.t.thi pubba"ngamaa hoti? micchaasa"nkappa.m `micchaasa"nkappo'ti pajaanaati, sammaasa"nkappa.m `sammaasa"nkappo'ti pajaanaati, saassa hoti sammaadi.t.thi ^a^P3.0073^ea^.
[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, micchaasa"nkappo? kaamasa"nkappo, byaapaadasa"nkappo, vihi.msaasa"nkappo -- aya.m, bhikkhave, micchaasa"nkappo.

[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, sammaasa"nkappo? sammaasa"nkappa.mpaha.m, bhikkhave, dvaaya.m vadaami -- atthi, bhikkhave, sammaasa"nkappo saasavo pu~n~nabhaagiyo upadhivepakko; atthi, bhikkhave, sammaasa"nkappo ariyo anaasavo lokuttaro magga"ngo. katamo ca, bhikkhave, sammaasa"nkappo saasavo pu~n~nabhaagiyo ^a^M3.0118^ea^ upadhivepakko? nekkhammasa"nkappo, abyaapaadasa"nkappo, avihi.msaasa"nkappo -- `aya.m, bhikkhave, sammaasa"nkappo saasavo pu~n~nabhaagiyo upadhivepakko'''.

[03] ``katamo ^a^V3.0120^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, sammaasa"nkappo ariyo anaasavo lokuttaro ^a^T3.0183^ea^ magga"ngo? yo kho, bhikkhave, ariyacittassa anaasavacittassa ariyamaggasama"ngino ariyamagga.m bhaavayato takko vitakko sa"nkappo appanaa byappanaa cetaso abhiniropanaa vaciisa"nkhaaro -- aya.m, bhikkhave, sammaasa"nkappo ariyo anaasavo lokuttaro magga"ngo. so micchaasa"nkappassa pahaanaaya vaayamati, sammaasa"nkappassa upasampadaaya, svaassa hoti sammaavaayaamo. so sato micchaasa"nkappa.m pajahati, sato sammaasa"nkappa.m upasampajja viharati; saassa hoti sammaasati. itiyime tayo dhammaa sammaasa"nkappa.m anuparidhaavanti anuparivattanti, seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi, sammaavaayaamo, sammaasati.

[03] 138^b^.^eb^ ``tatra, bhikkhave, sammaadi.t.thi pubba"ngamaa hoti. katha~nca, bhikkhave, sammaadi.t.thi pubba"ngamaa hoti? micchaavaaca.m `micchaavaacaa'ti pajaanaati, sammaavaaca.m `sammaavaacaa'ti pajaanaati; saassa hoti sammaadi.t.thi. katamaa ca, bhikkhave, micchaavaacaa? musaavaado, pisu.naa vaacaa, pharusaa vaacaa, samphappalaapo -- aya.m, bhikkhave, micchaavaacaa. katamaa ca, bhikkhave, sammaavaacaa? sammaavaaca.mpaha.m, bhikkhave, dvaaya.m vadaami -- atthi, bhikkhave, sammaavaacaa saasavaa pu~n~nabhaagiyaa upadhivepakkaa; atthi, bhikkhave ^a^P3.0074^ea^, sammaavaacaa ariyaa anaasavaa lokuttaraa magga"ngaa. katamaa ^a^T3.0184^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, sammaavaacaa saasavaa pu~n~nabhaagiyaa upadhivepakkaa? musaavaadaa verama.nii, pisu.naaya vaacaaya verama.nii, pharusaaya vaacaaya verama.nii, samphappalaapaa verama.nii -- aya.m, bhikkhave, sammaavaacaa saasavaa pu~n~nabhaagiyaa upadhivepakkaa. katamaa ca, bhikkhave, sammaavaacaa ariyaa anaasavaa lokuttaraa magga"ngaa? yaa kho, bhikkhave, ariyacittassa anaasavacittassa ariyamaggasama"ngino ariyamagga.m bhaavayato catuuhi vaciiduccaritehi aarati virati pa.tivirati verama.nii -- aya.m, bhikkhave, sammaavaacaa ariyaa anaasavaa lokuttaraa magga"ngaa. so micchaavaacaaya pahaanaaya vaayamati, sammaavaacaaya upasampadaaya; svaassa hoti sammaavaayaamo. so sato micchaavaaca.m pajahati, sato sammaavaaca.m upasampajja viharati; saassa hoti ^a^M3.0119^ea^ sammaasati. itiyime tayo dhammaa sammaavaaca.m anuparidhaavanti anuparivattanti, seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi, sammaavaayaamo, sammaasati.

[03] 139^b^.^eb^ ``tatra, bhikkhave, sammaadi.t.thi pubba"ngamaa hoti. katha~nca, bhikkhave, sammaadi.t.thi pubba"ngamaa hoti? micchaakammanta.m `micchaakammanto'ti pajaanaati, sammaakammanta.m `sammaakammanto'ti pajaanaati ^a^V3.0121^ea^; saassa hoti sammaadi.t.thi. katamo ca, bhikkhave, micchaakammanto? paa.naatipaato, adinnaadaana.m, kaamesumicchaacaaro -- aya.m, bhikkhave, micchaakammanto. katamo ca, bhikkhave, sammaakammanto? sammaakammanta.mpaha.m, bhikkhave ^a^T3.0185^ea^, dvaaya.m vadaami -- atthi, bhikkhave, sammaakammanto saasavo pu~n~nabhaagiyo upadhivepakko; atthi, bhikkhave, sammaakammanto ariyo anaasavo lokuttaro magga"ngo. katamo ca, bhikkhave, sammaakammanto saasavo pu~n~nabhaagiyo upadhivepakko? paa.naatipaataa verama.nii, adinnaadaanaa verama.nii, kaamesumicchaacaaraa verama.nii -- aya.m, bhikkhave, sammaakammanto saasavo pu~n~nabhaagiyo upadhivepakko. katamo ca, bhikkhave, sammaakammanto ariyo anaasavo lokuttaro magga"ngo? yaa kho, bhikkhave, ariyacittassa anaasavacittassa ariyamaggasama"ngino ariyamagga.m bhaavayato tiihi kaayaduccaritehi aarati virati pa.tivirati verama.nii -- aya.m, bhikkhave, sammaakammanto ariyo ^a^P3.0075^ea^ anaasavo lokuttaro magga"ngo. so micchaakammantassa pahaanaaya vaayamati, sammaakammantassa upasampadaaya; svaassa hoti sammaavaayaamo. so sato micchaakammanta.m pajahati, sato sammaakammanta.m upasampajja viharati; saassa hoti sammaasati. itiyime tayo dhammaa sammaakammanta.m anuparidhaavanti anuparivattanti, seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi, sammaavaayaamo, sammaasati.

[03] 140^b^.^eb^ ``tatra, bhikkhave, sammaadi.t.thi pubba"ngamaa hoti. katha~nca, bhikkhave, sammaadi.t.thi pubba"ngamaa hoti? micchaaaajiiva.m `micchaaaajiivo'ti pajaanaati, sammaaaajiiva.m `sammaaaajiivo'ti pajaanaati; saassa ^a^T3.0186^ea^ hoti sammaadi.t.thi. katamo ca, bhikkhave, micchaaaajiivo? kuhanaa, lapanaa, nemittikataa, nippesikataa, laabhena laabha.m nijigiisanataa {nijigi.m sanataa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} -- aya.m, bhikkhave, micchaaaajiivo. katamo ca, bhikkhave, sammaaaajiivo? sammaaaajiiva.mpaha.m, bhikkhave ^a^M3.0120^ea^, dvaaya.m vadaami -- atthi, bhikkhave, sammaaaajiivo saasavo pu~n~nabhaagiyo upadhivepakko; atthi, bhikkhave, sammaaaajiivo ariyo anaasavo lokuttaro magga"ngo. katamo ca, bhikkhave, sammaaaajiivo saasavo pu~n~nabhaagiyo upadhivepakko? idha, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako micchaaaajiiva.m pahaaya sammaaaajiivena jiivika.m kappeti -- aya.m, bhikkhave, sammaaaajiivo saasavo pu~n~nabhaagiyo upadhivepakko. katamo ca, bhikkhave, sammaaaajiivo ariyo anaasavo lokuttaro magga"ngo? yaa kho, bhikkhave, ariyacittassa anaasavacittassa ariyamaggasama"ngino ariyamagga.m bhaavayato micchaaaajiivaa aarati virati pa.tivirati verama.nii -- aya.m, bhikkhave, sammaaaajiivo ariyo anaasavo lokuttaro magga"ngo. so micchaaaajiivassa pahaanaaya vaayamati, sammaaaajiivassa upasampadaaya ^a^V3.0122^ea^; svaassa hoti sammaavaayaamo. so sato micchaaaajiiva.m pajahati, sato sammaaaajiiva.m upasampajja viharati; saassa hoti sammaasati. itiyime tayo dhammaa sammaaaajiiva.m anuparidhaavanti ^a^T3.0187^ea^ anuparivattanti, seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi, sammaavaayaamo, sammaasati.

[03] 141^b^.^eb^ ``tatra, bhikkhave, sammaadi.t.thi pubba"ngamaa hoti. katha~nca, bhikkhave, sammaadi.t.thi pubba"ngamaa hoti? sammaadi.t.thiss ^a^P3.0076^ea^, bhikkhave, sammaasa"nkappo pahoti, sammaasa"nkappassa sammaavaacaa pahoti, sammaavaacassa sammaakammanto pahoti, sammaakammantassa sammaaaajiivo pahoti, sammaaaajiivassa sammaavaayaamo pahoti, sammaavaayaamassa sammaasati pahoti, sammaasatissa sammaasamaadhi pahoti, sammaasamaadhissa sammaa~naa.na.m pahoti, sammaa~naa.nassa sammaavimutti pahoti. iti kho, bhikkhave, a.t.tha"ngasamannaagato sekkho {a.t.tha"ngasamannaagataa sekhaa pa.tipadaa (sii0), a.t.tha"ngasamannaagato sekho paa.tipado (pii0 ka0) ( ) natthi sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 potthakesu}, dasa"ngasamannaagato arahaa hoti. (tatrapi sammaa~naa.nena aneke paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa vigataa bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchanti).

[03] 142^b^.^eb^ ``tatra, bhikkhave, sammaadi.t.thi pubba"ngamaa hoti. katha~nca, bhikkhave, sammaadi.t.thi pubba"ngamaa hoti? sammaadi.t.thissa, bhikkhave, micchaadi.t.thi nijji.n.naa hoti. ye ca micchaadi.t.thipaccayaa aneke paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa sambhavanti te ^a^M3.0121^ea^ cassa nijji.n.naa honti. sammaadi.t.thipaccayaa aneke kusalaa dhammaa bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchanti. sammaasa"nkappassa, bhikkhave, micchaasa"nkappo nijji.n.no hoti...pe0... sammaavaacassa, bhikkhave, micchaavaacaa nijji.n.naa hoti... sammaakammantassa, bhikkhave, micchaakammanto nijji.n.no hoti... sammaaaajiivassa, bhikkhave, micchaaaajiivo nijji.n.no hoti... sammaavaayaamassa ^a^P3.0077^ea^, bhikkhave ^a^T3.0188^ea^, micchaavaayaamo nijji.n.no hoti... sammaasatissa, bhikkhave, micchaasati nijji.n.naa hoti... sammaasamaadhissa, bhikkhave, micchaasamaadhi nijji.n.no hoti... sammaa~naa.nassa, bhikkhave, micchaa~naa.na.m nijji.n.na.m hoti... sammaavimuttassa, bhikkhave, micchaavimutti nijji.n.naa hoti. ye ca micchaavimuttipaccayaa aneke paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa sambhavanti te cassa nijji.n.naa honti. sammaavimuttipaccayaa ca aneke kusalaa dhammaa bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchanti.

[03] ``iti kho, bhikkhave, viisati kusalapakkhaa, viisati akusalapakkhaa -- mahaacattaariisako ^a^V3.0123^ea^ dhammapariyaayo pavattito appa.tivattiyo sama.nena vaa braahma.nena vaa devena vaa maarena vaa brahmunaa vaa kenaci vaa lokasmi.m.

[03] 143^b^.^eb^ ``yo hi koci, bhikkhave, sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa ima.m mahaacattaariisaka.m dhammapariyaaya.m garahitabba.m pa.tikkositabba.m ma~n~neyya tassa di.t.theva dhamme dasasahadhammikaa vaadaanuvaadaa gaarayha.m .thaana.m aagacchanti -- sammaadi.t.thi.m ce bhava.m garahati, ye ca micchaadi.t.thii sama.nabraahma.naa te bhoto pujjaa, te bhoto paasa.msaa; sammaasa"nkappa.m ce bhava.m garahati ^a^P3.0078^ea^, ye ca micchaasa"nkappaa sama.nabraahma.naa te bhoto pujjaa, te bhoto paasa.msaa; sammaavaaca.m ce bhava.m garahati...pe0... sammaakammanta.m ce bhava.m garahati... sammaaaajiiva.m ce bhava.m garahati... sammaavaayaama.m ce bhava.m garahati... sammaasati.m ce bhava.m garahati... sammaasamaadhi.m ce bhava.m garahati... sammaa~naa.na.m ce bhava.m garahati ^a^T3.0189^ea^... sammaavimutti.m ce bhava.m garahati, ye ca micchaavimuttii sama.nabraahma.naa te bhoto pujjaa, te bhoto paasa.msaa. yo koci, bhikkhave, sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa ima.m mahaacattaariisaka.m dhammapariyaaya.m garahitabba.m pa.tikkositabba.m ma~n~neyya tassa di.t.theva dhamme ime dasasahadhammikaa vaadaanuvaadaa gaarayha.m .thaana.m aagacchanti. yepi te, bhikkhave, ahesu.m okkalaa vassabha~n~naa {vayabhi~n~naa (ka0) sa.m0 ni0 3.62; a0 ni0 4.30 passitabba.m} ahetuvaadaa akiriyavaadaa natthikavaadaa tepi mahaacattaariisaka.m dhammapariyaaya.m na garahitabba.m ^a^M3.0122^ea^ napa.tikkositabba.m ama~n~ni.msu {ma~n~neyyu.m (ka0)}. ta.m kissa hetu? nindaabyaarosaupaarambhabhayaa''ti.
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamanaa te bhikkhuu bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandunti.
[06] mahaacattaariisakasutta.m ni.t.thita.m sattama.m.

[03] 144^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T3.0190^ea^ ^a^V3.0124^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati pubbaaraame migaaramaatupaasaade sambahulehi abhi~n~naatehi abhi~n~naatehi therehi saavakehi saddhi.m -- aayasmataa ca saariputtena aayasmataa ca mahaamoggallaanena {mahaamoggalaanena (ka0)} aayasmataa ca mahaakassapena aayasmataa ca mahaakaccaayanena aayasmataa ca mahaako.t.thikena aayasmataa ca mahaakappinena aayasmataa ca mahaacundena aayasmataa ca anuruddhena ^a^P3.0079^ea^ aayasmataa ca revatena aayasmataa ca aanandena, a~n~nehi ca abhi~n~naatehi abhi~n~naatehi therehi saavakehi saddhi.m.

[03] tena kho pana samayena theraa bhikkhuu nave bhikkhuu ovadanti anusaasanti. appekacce theraa bhikkhuu dasapi bhikkhuu ovadanti anusaasanti, appekacce theraa bhikkhuu viisampi bhikkhuu ovadanti anusaasanti, appekacce theraa bhikkhuu ti.msampi bhikkhuu ovadanti anusaasanti, appekacce theraa bhikkhuu cattaariisampi bhikkhuu ovadanti anusaasanti. te ca navaa bhikkhuu therehi bhikkhuuhi ovadiyamaanaa anusaasiyamaanaa u.laara.m pubbenaapara.m visesa.m jaananti {pajaananti (syaa0 ka.m0), sa~njaananti (ka0)}.

[03] 145^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena bhagavaa tadahuposathe pannarase pavaara.naaya pu.n.naaya pu.n.namaaya rattiyaa bhikkhusa"nghaparivuto abbhokaase nisinno hoti. atha kho bhagavaa tu.nhiibhuuta.m tu.nhiibhuuta.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m anuviloketvaa ^a^T3.0191^ea^ bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``aaraddhosmi, bhikkhave, imaaya pa.tipadaaya; aaraddhacittosmi, bhikkhave, imaaya pa.tipadaaya. tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, bhiyyosomattaaya viiriya.m aarabhatha appattassa pattiyaa, anadhigatassa adhigamaaya ^a^M3.0123^ea^, asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaaya. idhevaaha.m saavatthiya.m komudi.m caatumaasini.m aagamessaamii''ti. assosu.m kho jaanapadaa bhikkhuu -- ``bhagavaa kira tattheva saavatthiya.m komudi.m caatumaasini.m aagamessatii''ti. te jaanapadaa bhikkhuu saavatthi.m {saavatthiya.m (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0)} osaranti bhagavanta.m dassanaaya. te ca kho theraa bhikkhuu bhiyyosomattaaya nave bhikkhuu ovadanti anusaasanti. appekacce theraa bhikkhuu dasapi bhikkhuu ovadanti anusaasanti, appekacce theraa bhikkhuu viisampi bhikkhuu ovadanti anusaasanti ^a^V3.0125^ea^, appekacce theraa bhikkhuu ti.msampi bhikkhuu ovadanti anusaasanti, appekacce theraa bhikkhuu cattaariisampi bhikkhuu ovadanti anusaasanti. te ca navaa bhikkhuu therehi bhikkhuuhi ovadiyamaanaa anusaasiyamaanaa u.laara.m ^a^P3.0080^ea^ pubbenaapara.m visesa.m jaananti.

[03] 146^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena bhagavaa tadahuposathe pannarase komudiyaa caatumaasiniyaa pu.n.naaya pu.n.namaaya rattiyaa bhikkhusa"nghaparivuto abbhokaase nisinno hoti. atha kho bhagavaa tu.nhiibhuuta.m tu.nhiibhuuta.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m anuviloketvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``apalaapaaya.m, bhikkhave, parisaa; nippalaapaaya.m, bhikkhave, parisaa; suddhaa saare {suddhasaare pati.t.thitaa (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} pati.t.thitaa. tathaaruupo aya.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhusa"ngho; tathaaruupaa aya.m, bhikkhave, parisaa yathaaruupaa ^a^T3.0192^ea^ parisaa aahuneyyaa paahuneyyaa dakkhi.neyyaa a~njalikara.niiyaa anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassa. tathaaruupo aya.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhusa"ngho; tathaaruupaa aya.m, bhikkhave, parisaa yathaaruupaaya parisaaya appa.m dinna.m bahu hoti, bahu dinna.m bahutara.m. tathaaruupo aya.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhusa"ngho; tathaaruupaa aya.m, bhikkhave, parisaa yathaaruupaa parisaa dullabhaa dassanaaya lokassa. tathaaruupo aya.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhusa"ngho; tathaaruupaa aya.m, bhikkhave, parisaa yathaaruupa.m parisa.m ala.m yojanaga.nanaani dassanaaya gantu.m pu.tosenaapi'' {pu.tosenaapi, tathaaruupo aya.m bhikkhave bhikkhusa.mgho, tathaaruupaa aya.m parisaa (sii0 pii0 ka0)}.

[03] 147^b^.^eb^ ``santi, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu imasmi.m bhikkhusa"nghe arahanto khii.naasavaa vusitavanto katakara.niiyaa ohitabhaaraa anuppattasadatthaa parikkhii.nabhavasa.myojanaa sammada~n~naavimuttaa -- evaruupaapi, bhikkhave, santi bhikkhuu imasmi.m bhikkhusa"nghe ^a^M3.0124^ea^. santi, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu imasmi.m bhikkhusa"nghe pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa opapaatikaa tattha parinibbaayino anaavattidhammaa tasmaa lokaa -- evaruupaapi, bhikkhave, santi bhikkhuu imasmi.m bhikkhusa"nghe. santi, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu imasmi.m bhikkhusa"nghe ti.n.na.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa raagadosamohaana.m tanuttaa sakadaagaamino sakideva {saki.m deva (ka0)} ima.m loka.m aagantvaa dukkhassanta.m ^a^P3.0081^ea^ karissanti -- evaruupaapi, bhikkhave, santi bhikkhuu imasmi.m bhikkhusa"nghe ^a^T3.0193^ea^. santi, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu imasmi.m bhikkhusa"nghe ti.n.na.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa sotaapannaa avinipaatadhammaa niyataa sambodhiparaayanaa -- evaruupaapi, bhikkhave, santi bhikkhuu imasmi.m bhikkhusa"nghe.

[03] ``santi, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu imasmi.m bhikkhusa"nghe catunna.m satipa.t.thaanaana.m bhaavanaanuyogamanuyuttaa viharanti ^a^V3.0126^ea^ -- evaruupaapi, bhikkhave, santi bhikkhuu imasmi.m bhikkhusa"nghe. santi, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu imasmi.m bhikkhusa"nghe catunna.m sammappadhaanaana.m bhaavanaanuyogamanuyuttaa viharanti...pe0... catunna.m iddhipaadaana.m... pa~ncanna.m indriyaana.m... pa~ncanna.m balaana.m... sattanna.m bojjha"ngaana.m... ariyassa a.t.tha"ngikassa maggassa bhaavanaanuyogamanuyuttaa viharanti -- evaruupaapi, bhikkhave, santi bhikkhuu imasmi.m bhikkhusa"nghe. santi, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu imasmi.m bhikkhusa"nghe mettaabhaavanaanuyogamanuyuttaa viharanti... karu.naabhaavanaanuyogamanuyuttaa ^a^P3.0082^ea^ viharanti... muditaabhaavanaanuyogamanuyuttaa viharanti... upekkhaabhaavanaanuyogamanuyuttaa viharanti... asubhabhaavanaanuyogamanuyuttaa viharanti... aniccasa~n~naabhaavanaanuyogamanuyuttaa viharanti -- evaruupaapi, bhikkhave, santi bhikkhuu imasmi.m bhikkhusa"nghe. santi, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu imasmi.m bhikkhusa"nghe aanaapaanassatibhaavanaanuyogamanuyuttaa viharanti. aanaapaanassati, bhikkhave, bhaavitaa bahuliikataa mahapphalaa hoti mahaanisa.msaa. aanaapaanassati, bhikkhave, bhaavitaa bahuliikataa cattaaro satipa.t.thaane paripuureti. cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa ^a^T3.0194^ea^ bhaavitaa bahuliikataa satta bojjha"nge paripuurenti. satta bojjha"ngaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa vijjaavimutti.m paripuurenti.

[03] 148^b^.^eb^ ``katha.m bhaavitaa ca, bhikkhave, aanaapaanassati katha.m bahuliikataa mahapphalaa hoti mahaanisa.msaa? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ara~n~nagato vaa rukkhamuulagato vaa su~n~naagaaragato vaa nisiidati palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa uju.m ^a^M3.0125^ea^ kaaya.m pa.nidhaaya parimukha.m sati.m upa.t.thapetvaa. so satova assasati satova {sato (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} passasati.

[03] ``diigha.m vaa assasanto `diigha.m assasaamii'ti pajaanaati, diigha.m vaa passasanto `diigha.m passasaamii'ti pajaanaati; rassa.m vaa assasanto `rassa.m assasaamii'ti pajaanaati, rassa.m vaa passasanto `rassa.m passasaamii'ti pajaanaati; `sabbakaayapa.tisa.mvedii assasissaamii'ti sikkhati, `sabbakaayapa.tisa.mvedii passasissaamii'ti sikkhati; `passambhaya.m kaayasa"nkhaara.m assasissaamii'ti sikkhati, `passambhaya.m kaayasa"nkhaara.m passasissaamii'ti sikkhati.

[03] ```piitipa.tisa.mvedii assasissaamii'ti sikkhati, `piitipa.tisa.mvedii passasissaamii'ti sikkhati; `sukhapa.tisa.mvedii assasissaamii'ti ^a^P3.0083^ea^ sikkhati, `sukhapa.tisa.mvedii passasissaamii'ti sikkhati; `cittasa"nkhaarapa.tisa.mvedii assasissaamii'ti sikkhati, `cittasa"nkhaarapa.tisa.mvedii passasissaamii'ti ^a^V3.0127^ea^ sikkhati; `passambhaya.m cittasa"nkhaara.m assasissaamii'ti sikkhati, `passambhaya.m cittasa"nkhaara.m passasissaamii'ti sikkhati.

[03] ```cittapa.tisa.mvedii assasissaamii'ti sikkhati, `cittapa.tisa.mvedii passasissaamii'ti sikkhati; `abhippamodaya.m citta.m assasissaamii'ti sikkhati, `abhippamodaya.m citta.m passasissaamii'ti sikkhati ^a^T3.0195^ea^; `samaadaha.m citta.m assasissaamii'ti sikkhati, `samaadaha.m citta.m passasissaamii'ti sikkhati; `vimocaya.m citta.m assasissaamii'ti sikkhati, `vimocaya.m citta.m passasissaamii'ti sikkhati.

[03] ```aniccaanupassii assasissaamii'ti sikkhati, `aniccaanupassii passasissaamii'ti sikkhati; `viraagaanupassii assasissaamii'ti sikkhati, `viraagaanupassii passasissaamii'ti sikkhati; `nirodhaanupassii assasissaamii'ti sikkhati, `nirodhaanupassii passasissaamii'ti sikkhati; `pa.tinissaggaanupassii assasissaamii'ti sikkhati, `pa.tinissaggaanupassii passasissaamii'ti sikkhati. eva.m bhaavitaa kho, bhikkhave, aanaapaanassati eva.m bahuliikataa mahapphalaa hoti mahaanisa.msaa.

[03] 149^b^.^eb^ ``katha.m ^a^M3.0126^ea^ bhaavitaa ca, bhikkhave, aanaapaanassati katha.m bahuliikataa cattaaro satipa.t.thaane paripuureti? yasmi.m samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhu diigha.m vaa assasanto `diigha.m assasaamii'ti pajaanaati, diigha.m vaa passasanto `diigha.m passasaamii'ti pajaanaati; rassa.m vaa assasanto `rassa.m assasaamii'ti pajaanaati, rassa.m vaa passasanto `rassa.m passasaamii'ti pajaanaati; `sabbakaayapa.tisa.mvedii assasissaamii'ti sikkhati, `sabbakaayapa.tisa.mvedii passasissaamii'ti sikkhati; `passambhaya.m kaayasa"nkhaara.m assasissaamii'ti sikkhati, `passambhaya.m kaayasa"nkhaara.m passasissaamii'ti sikkhati; kaaye kaayaanupassii, bhikkhave, tasmi.m samaye bhikkhu viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. kaayesu kaaya~n~nataraaha.m, bhikkhave, eva.m vadaami yadida.m -- assaasapassaasaa. tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, kaaye ^a^T3.0196^ea^ kaayaanupassii tasmi.m samaye bhikkhu viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m.

[03] ``yasmi.m samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ^a^P3.0084^ea^ `piitipa.tisa.mvedii assasissaamii'ti sikkhati, `piitipa.tisa.mvedii ^a^V3.0128^ea^ passasissaamii'ti sikkhati; `sukhapa.tisa.mvedii assasissaamii'ti sikkhati, `sukhapa.tisa.mvedii passasissaamii'ti sikkhati; `cittasa"nkhaarapa.tisa.mvedii assasissaamii'ti sikkhati, `cittasa"nkhaarapa.tisa.mvedii passasissaamii'ti sikkhati; `passambhaya.m cittasa"nkhaara.m assasissaamii'ti sikkhati, `passambhaya.m cittasa"nkhaara.m passasissaamii'ti sikkhati; vedanaasu vedanaanupassii, bhikkhave, tasmi.m samaye bhikkhu viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. vedanaasu vedanaa~n~nataraaha.m, bhikkhave, eva.m vadaami yadida.m -- assaasapassaasaana.m saadhuka.m manasikaara.m. tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, vedanaasu vedanaanupassii tasmi.m samaye bhikkhu viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m.

[03] ``yasmi.m samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhu `cittapa.tisa.mvedii assasissaamii'ti sikkhati, `cittapa.tisa.mvedii passasissaamii'ti sikkhati; `abhippamodaya.m citta.m assasissaamii'ti sikkhati, `abhippamodaya.m citta.m passasissaamii'ti sikkhati; `samaadaha.m citta.m assasissaamii'ti sikkhati, `samaadaha.m citta.m passasissaamii'ti sikkhati; `vimocaya.m citta.m assasissaamii'ti sikkhati, `vimocaya.m ^a^M3.0127^ea^ citta.m passasissaamii'ti sikkhati; citte cittaanupassii, bhikkhave, tasmi.m samaye bhikkhu viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. naaha.m, bhikkhave, mu.t.thassatissa asampajaanassa ^a^T3.0197^ea^ aanaapaanassati.m vadaami. tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, citte cittaanupassii tasmi.m samaye bhikkhu viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m.

[03] ``yasmi.m samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhu `aniccaanupassii assasissaamii'ti sikkhati, `aniccaanupassii passasissaamii'ti sikkhati; `viraagaanupassii assasissaamii'ti sikkhati, `viraagaanupassii passasissaamii'ti sikkhati; `nirodhaanupassii assasissaamii'ti sikkhati, `nirodhaanupassii passasissaamii'ti sikkhati; `pa.tinissaggaanupassii assasissaamii'ti sikkhati, `pa.tinissaggaanupassii passasissaamii'ti sikkhati; dhammesu dhammaanupassii, bhikkhave, tasmi.m samaye bhikkhu viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. so ya.m ta.m abhijjhaadomanassaana.m ^a^P3.0085^ea^ pahaana.m ta.m pa~n~naaya disvaa saadhuka.m ajjhupekkhitaa hoti. tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, dhammesu dhammaanupassii tasmi.m samaye bhikkhu viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m.
[03] ``eva.m ^a^V3.0129^ea^ bhaavitaa kho, bhikkhave, aanaapaanassati eva.m bahuliikataa cattaaro satipa.t.thaane paripuureti.

[03] 150^b^.^eb^ ``katha.m bhaavitaa ca, bhikkhave, cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa katha.m bahuliikataa satta bojjha"nge paripuurenti? yasmi.m samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m, upa.t.thitaassa tasmi.m samaye sati hoti asammu.t.thaa {appammu.t.thaa (syaa0 ka.m0)}. yasmi.m samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno upa.t.thitaa sati hoti ^a^T3.0198^ea^ asammu.t.thaa, satisambojjha"ngo tasmi.m samaye bhikkhuno aaraddho hoti. satisambojjha"nga.m tasmi.m samaye bhikkhu bhaaveti, satisambojjha"ngo tasmi.m samaye bhikkhuno bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchati.

[03] ``so tathaasato viharanto ta.m dhamma.m pa~n~naaya pavicinati pavicayati {pavicarati (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} pariviima.msa.m aapajjati. yasmi.m samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhu tathaasato viharanto ^a^M3.0128^ea^ ta.m dhamma.m pa~n~naaya pavicinati pavicayati pariviima.msa.m aapajjati, dhammavicayasambojjha"ngo tasmi.m samaye bhikkhuno aaraddho hoti, dhammavicayasambojjha"nga.m tasmi.m samaye bhikkhu bhaaveti, dhammavicayasambojjha"ngo tasmi.m samaye bhikkhuno bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchati.

[03] ``tassa ta.m dhamma.m pa~n~naaya pavicinato pavicayato pariviima.msa.m aapajjato aaraddha.m hoti viiriya.m asalliina.m. yasmi.m samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ta.m dhamma.m pa~n~naaya pavicinato pavicayato pariviima.msa.m aapajjato aaraddha.m hoti viiriya.m asalliina.m, viiriyasambojjha"ngo tasmi.m samaye bhikkhuno aaraddho hoti, viiriyasambojjha"nga.m tasmi.m samaye bhikkhu bhaaveti, viiriyasambojjha"ngo tasmi.m samaye bhikkhuno bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchati.

[03] ``aaraddhaviiriyassa uppajjati piiti niraamisaa. yasmi.m samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno aaraddhaviiriyassa uppajjati piiti ^a^P3.0086^ea^ niraamisaa, piitisambojjha"ngo tasmi.m samaye bhikkhuno aaraddho hoti, piitisambojjha"nga.m tasmi.m samaye bhikkhu bhaaveti, piitisambojjha"ngo tasmi.m samaye bhikkhuno bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchati.

[03] ``piitimanassa kaayopi passambhati, cittampi passambhati. yasmi.m ^a^T3.0199^ea^ samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ^a^V3.0130^ea^ piitimanassa kaayopi passambhati, cittampi passambhati, passaddhisambojjha"ngo tasmi.m samaye bhikkhuno aaraddho hoti, passaddhisambojjha"nga.m tasmi.m samaye bhikkhu bhaaveti, passaddhisambojjha"ngo tasmi.m samaye bhikkhuno bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchati.

[03] ``passaddhakaayassa sukhino citta.m samaadhiyati. yasmi.m samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno passaddhakaayassa sukhino citta.m samaadhiyati, samaadhisambojjha"ngo tasmi.m samaye bhikkhuno aaraddho hoti, samaadhisambojjha"nga.m tasmi.m samaye bhikkhu bhaaveti, samaadhisambojjha"ngo tasmi.m samaye bhikkhuno bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchati.

[03] ``so tathaasamaahita.m citta.m saadhuka.m ajjhupekkhitaa hoti. yasmi.m samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhu tathaasamaahita.m citta.m saadhuka.m ajjhupekkhitaa hoti, upekkhaasambojjha"ngo tasmi.m samaye bhikkhuno aaraddho hoti, upekkhaasambojjha"nga.m tasmi.m samaye bhikkhu bhaaveti, upekkhaasambojjha"ngo tasmi.m samaye bhikkhuno bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchati.

[03] 151^b^.^eb^ ``yasmi.m ^a^M3.0129^ea^ samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vedanaasu...pe0... citte... dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m, upa.t.thitaassa tasmi.m samaye sati hoti asammu.t.thaa. yasmi.m samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno upa.t.thitaa sati hoti asammu.t.thaa, satisambojjha"ngo tasmi.m samaye bhikkhuno aaraddho hoti, satisambojjha"nga.m tasmi.m samaye bhikkhu bhaaveti, satisambojjha"ngo tasmi.m samaye bhikkhuno bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchati.

[03] ``so ^a^T3.0200^ea^ tathaasato viharanto ta.m dhamma.m pa~n~naaya pavicinati pavicayati pariviima.msa.m aapajjati. yasmi.m samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhu tathaasato viharanto ta.m dhamma.m pa~n~naaya pavicinati pavicayati pariviima.msa.m aapajjati, dhammavicayasambojjha"ngo tasmi.m samaye bhikkhuno aaraddho hoti, dhammavicayasambojjha"nga.m ^a^P3.0087^ea^ tasmi.m samaye bhikkhu bhaaveti, dhammavicayasambojjha"ngo tasmi.m samaye bhikkhuno bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchati.

[03] ``tassa ^a^V3.0131^ea^ ta.m dhamma.m pa~n~naaya pavicinato pavicayato pariviima.msa.m aapajjato aaraddha.m hoti viiriya.m asalliina.m. yasmi.m samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ta.m dhamma.m pa~n~naaya pavicinato pavicayato pariviima.msa.m aapajjato aaraddha.m hoti viiriya.m asalliina.m, viiriyasambojjha"ngo tasmi.m samaye bhikkhuno aaraddho hoti, viiriyasambojjha"nga.m tasmi.m samaye bhikkhu bhaaveti, viiriyasambojjha"ngo tasmi.m samaye bhikkhuno bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchati.

[03] ``aaraddhaviiriyassa uppajjati piiti niraamisaa. yasmi.m samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno aaraddhaviiriyassa uppajjati piiti niraamisaa, piitisambojjha"ngo tasmi.m samaye bhikkhuno aaraddho hoti, piitisambojjha"nga.m tasmi.m samaye bhikkhu bhaaveti, piitisambojjha"ngo tasmi.m samaye bhikkhuno bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchati.

[03] ``piitimanassa kaayopi passambhati, cittampi passambhati. yasmi.m samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno piitimanassa kaayopi passambhati, cittampi passambhati, passaddhisambojjha"ngo tasmi.m samaye bhikkhuno aaraddho hoti, passaddhisambojjha"nga.m tasmi.m samaye ^a^T3.0201^ea^ bhikkhu bhaaveti, passaddhisambojjha"ngo tasmi.m samaye bhikkhuno bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchati.

[03] ``passaddhakaayassa ^a^M3.0130^ea^ sukhino citta.m samaadhiyati. yasmi.m samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno passaddhakaayassa sukhino citta.m samaadhiyati, samaadhisambojjha"ngo tasmi.m samaye bhikkhuno aaraddho hoti, samaadhisambojjha"nga.m tasmi.m samaye bhikkhu bhaaveti, samaadhisambojjha"ngo tasmi.m samaye bhikkhuno bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchati.

[03] ``so tathaasamaahita.m citta.m saadhuka.m ajjhupekkhitaa hoti. yasmi.m samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhu tathaasamaahita.m citta.m saadhuka.m ajjhupekkhitaa hoti, upekkhaasambojjha"ngo tasmi.m samaye bhikkhuno aaraddho hoti, upekkhaasambojjha"nga.m tasmi.m samaye bhikkhu bhaaveti, upekkhaasambojjha"ngo tasmi.m samaye bhikkhuno bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchati. eva.m bhaavitaa kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa eva.m bahuliikataa satta sambojjha"nge paripuurenti.

[03] 152^b^.^eb^ ``katha.m ^a^P3.0088^ea^ bhaavitaa ca, bhikkhave, satta bojjha"ngaa katha.m bahuliikataa vijjaavimutti.m paripuurenti ^a^V3.0132^ea^? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu satisambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m. dhammavicayasambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti...pe0... viiriyasambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti... piitisambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti... passaddhisambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti... samaadhisambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti... upekkhaasambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m. eva.m bhaavitaa kho, bhikkhave, satta bojjha"ngaa eva.m bahuliikataa vijjaavimutti.m paripuurentii''ti.
[03] idamavoca ^a^T3.0202^ea^ bhagavaa. attamanaa te bhikkhuu bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandunti.
[06] aanaapaanassatisutta.m ni.t.thita.m a.t.thama.m.

[03] 153^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T3.0203^ea^ ^a^V3.0133^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. atha kho sambahulaana.m bhikkhuuna.m pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkantaana.m upa.t.thaanasaalaaya.m sannisinnaana.m sannipatitaana.m ayamantaraakathaa ^a^M3.0131^ea^ udapaadi -- ``acchariya.m, aavuso, abbhuta.m, aavuso! yaava~ncida.m tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena kaayagataasati {kaayagataa sati (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} bhaavitaa bahuliikataa mahapphalaa vuttaa mahaanisa.msaa''ti. aya~nca hida.m tesa.m bhikkhuuna.m antaraakathaa vippakataa hoti, atha kho bhagavaa saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito yena upa.t.thaanasaalaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. nisajja kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``kaaya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathaaya sannisinnaa, kaa ca pana vo antaraakathaa vippakataa''ti? ``idha ^a^P3.0089^ea^, bhante, amhaaka.m pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkantaana.m upa.t.thaanasaalaaya.m sannisinnaana.m sannipatitaana.m ayamantaraakathaa udapaadi -- `acchariya.m, aavuso, abbhuta.m, aavuso! yaava~ncida.m tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena kaayagataasati bhaavitaa bahuliikataa mahapphalaa vuttaa mahaanisa.msaa'ti. aya.m kho no, bhante, antaraakathaa vippakataa, atha bhagavaa anuppatto''ti.

[03] 154^b^.^eb^ ``katha.m ^a^T3.0204^ea^ bhaavitaa ca, bhikkhave, kaayagataasati katha.m bahuliikataa mahapphalaa hoti mahaanisa.msaa? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ara~n~nagato vaa rukkhamuulagato vaa su~n~naagaaragato vaa nisiidati palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa uju.m kaaya.m pa.nidhaaya parimukha.m sati.m upa.t.thapetvaa. so satova assasati satova passasati; diigha.m vaa assasanto `diigha.m assasaamii'ti pajaanaati, diigha.m vaa passasanto `diigha.m passasaamii'ti pajaanaati; rassa.m vaa assasanto `rassa.m assasaamii'ti pajaanaati, rassa.m vaa passasanto `rassa.m passasaamii'ti pajaanaati; `sabbakaayapa.tisa.mvedii assasissaamii'ti sikkhati, `sabbakaayapa.tisa.mvedii passasissaamii'ti sikkhati; `passambhaya.m kaayasa"nkhaara.m assasissaamii'ti sikkhati, `passambhaya.m kaayasa"nkhaara.m passasissaamii'ti sikkhati. tassa eva.m appamattassa aataapino pahitattassa viharato ye gehasitaa {gehassitaa (.tiikaa)} sarasa"nkappaa te pahiiyanti ^a^V3.0134^ea^. tesa.m pahaanaa ajjhattameva citta.m santi.t.thati sannisiidati ekodi hoti {ekodii hoti (sii0), ekodibhoti (syaa0 ka.m0)} samaadhiyati. eva.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaayagataasati.m {kaayagata.m sati.m (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} bhaaveti.

[03] ``puna ^a^M3.0132^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu gacchanto vaa `gacchaamii'ti pajaanaati, .thito vaa `.thitomhii'ti pajaanaati, nisinno vaa `nisinnomhii'ti pajaanaati, sayaano vaa `sayaanomhii'ti pajaanaati. yathaa yathaa vaa panassa kaayo pa.nihito hoti, tathaa tathaa na.m pajaanaati. tassa eva.m appamattassa aataapino pahitattassa viharato ye gehasitaa sarasa"nkappaa te pahiiyanti. tesa.m pahaanaa ajjhattameva citta.m ^a^T3.0205^ea^ santi.t.thati sannisiidati ekodi hoti samaadhiyati. evampi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaayagataasati.m bhaaveti.

[03] ``puna ^a^P3.0090^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu abhikkante pa.tikkante sampajaanakaarii hoti, aalokite vilokite sampajaanakaarii hoti, sami~njite pasaarite sampajaanakaarii hoti, sa"nghaa.tipattaciivaradhaara.ne sampajaanakaarii hoti, asite piite khaayite saayite sampajaanakaarii hoti, uccaarapassaavakamme sampajaanakaarii hoti, gate .thite nisinne sutte jaagarite bhaasite tu.nhiibhaave sampajaanakaarii hoti. tassa eva.m appamattassa aataapino pahitattassa viharato ye gehasitaa sarasa"nkappaa te pahiiyanti. tesa.m pahaanaa ajjhattameva citta.m santi.t.thati sannisiidati ekodi hoti samaadhiyati. evampi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaayagataasati.m bhaaveti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu imameva kaaya.m uddha.m paadatalaa adho kesamatthakaa tacapariyanta.m puura.m naanappakaarassa asucino paccavekkhati -- `atthi imasmi.m kaaye kesaa lomaa nakhaa dantaa taco ma.msa.m nhaaru {nahaaru (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} a.t.thi a.t.thimi~nja.m vakka.m hadaya.m yakana.m kilomaka.m pihaka.m papphaasa.m anta.m antagu.na.m udariya.m kariisa.m pitta.m semha.m pubbo lohita.m sedo medo assu vasaa khe.lo si"nghaa.nikaa lasikaa mutta'nti.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, ubhatomukhaa puto.li {muuto.lii (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} puuraa naanaavihitassa dha~n~nassa, seyyathida.m -- saaliina.m viihiina.m muggaana.m maasaana.m tilaana.m ta.n.dulaana.m, tamena.m ^a^T3.0206^ea^ cakkhumaa puriso mu~ncitvaa paccavekkheyya -- `ime saalii ime viihii ime muggaa ime maasaa ime tilaa ime ta.n.dulaa'ti; evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu imameva kaaya.m uddha.m paadatalaa adho kesamatthakaa tacapariyanta.m puura.m ^a^M3.0133^ea^ ^a^V3.0135^ea^ naanappakaarassa asucino paccavekkhati -- `atthi imasmi.m kaaye kesaa lomaa nakhaa dantaa taco ma.msa.m nhaaru a.t.thi a.t.thimi~nja.m vakka.m hadaya.m yakana.m kilomaka.m pihaka.m papphaasa.m anta.m antagu.na.m udariya.m kariisa.m pitta.m semha.m pubbo lohita.m sedo medo assu vasaa khe.lo si"nghaa.nikaa lasikaa mutta'nti. tassa eva.m appamattassa aataapino pahitattassa viharato ye gehasitaa sarasa"nkappaa te pahiiyanti. tesa.m pahaanaa ajjhattameva citta.m santi.t.thati sannisiidati ekodi hoti samaadhiyati. evampi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaayagataasati.m bhaaveti.

[03] ``puna ^a^P3.0091^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu imameva kaaya.m yathaa.thita.m yathaapa.nihita.m dhaatuso paccavekkhati -- `atthi imasmi.m kaaye pathaviidhaatu aapodhaatu tejodhaatu vaayodhaatuu'ti.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, dakkho goghaatako vaa goghaatakantevaasii vaa gaavi.m vadhitvaa catumahaapathe {caatummahaapathe (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} bilaso vibhajitvaa {pa.tivibhajitvaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} nisinno assa; evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu imameva kaaya.m yathaa.thita.m yathaapa.nihita.m dhaatuso paccavekkhati -- `atthi imasmi.m kaaye pathaviidhaatu aapodhaatu tejodhaatu vaayodhaatuu'ti. tassa eva.m appamattassa aataapino pahitattassa viharato ye gehasitaa ^a^T3.0207^ea^ sarasa"nkappaa te pahiiyanti. tesa.m pahaanaa ajjhattameva citta.m santi.t.thati sannisiidati ekodi hoti samaadhiyati. evampi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaayagataasati.m bhaaveti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu seyyathaapi passeyya sariira.m sivathikaaya {siivathikaaya (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} cha.d.dita.m ekaahamata.m vaa dviihamata.m vaa tiihamata.m vaa uddhumaataka.m viniilaka.m vipubbakajaata.m. so imameva kaaya.m upasa.mharati -- `ayampi kho kaayo eva.mdhammo eva.mbhaavii eva.manatiito'ti {eta.m anatiitoti (sii0)}. tassa eva.m appamattassa aataapino pahitattassa viharato ye gehasitaa sarasa"nkappaa te pahiiyanti. tesa.m pahaanaa ajjhattameva citta.m santi.t.thati sannisiidati ekodi hoti samaadhiyati. evampi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaayagataasati.m bhaaveti.

[03] ``puna ^a^M3.0134^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu seyyathaapi passeyya sariira.m sivathikaaya cha.d.dita.m kaakehi vaa khajjamaana.m kulalehi vaa khajjamaana.m gijjhehi vaa khajjamaana.m ka"nkehi vaa khajjamaana.m sunakhehi vaa khajjamaana.m byagghehi vaa khajjamaana.m diipiihi vaa khajjamaana.m si"ngaalehi vaa {gijjhehi vaa khajjamaana.m suvaanehi vaa khajjamaana.m sigaalehi vaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} khajjamaana.m vividhehi vaa paa.nakajaatehi khajjamaana.m. so imameva kaaya.m upasa.mharati -- `ayampi ^a^V3.0136^ea^ kho kaayo eva.mdhammo eva.mbhaavii eva.manatiito'ti. tassa eva.m appamattassa...pe0... evampi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaayagataasati.m bhaaveti.

[03] ``puna ^a^P3.0092^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu seyyathaapi passeyya sariira.m sivathikaaya cha.d.dita.m a.t.thikasa"nkhalika.m sama.msalohita.m nhaarusambandha.m...pe0... a.t.thikasa"nkhalika.m ^a^T3.0208^ea^ nimma.msalohitamakkhita.m nhaarusambandha.m...pe0... a.t.thikasa"nkhalika.m apagatama.msalohita.m nhaarusambandha.m...pe0... a.t.thikaani apagatasambandhaani {apagatanahaaruusambandhaani (syaa0 ka.m0)} disaavidisaavikkhittaani {disaavidisaasu vikkhitaani (sii0 pii0)} a~n~nena hattha.t.thika.m a~n~nena paada.t.thika.m a~n~nena gopphaka.t.thika.m {a~n~nena gopphaka.t.thikanti ida.m sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 potthakesu natthi} a~n~nena ja"ngha.t.thika.m a~n~nena uuru.t.thika.m a~n~nena ka.ti.t.thika.m {a~n~nena ka.ta.t.thika.m a~n~nena pi.t.thika.n.daka.m a~n~nena siisaka.taaha.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} a~n~nena phaasuka.t.thika.m a~n~nena pi.t.thi.t.thika.m a~n~nena khandha.t.thika.m a~n~nena giiva.t.thika.m a~n~nena hanuka.t.thika.m a~n~nena danta.t.thika.m a~n~nena siisaka.taaha.m {a~n~nena ka.ta.t.thika.m a~n~nena pi.t.thika.n.daka.m a~n~nena siisaka.taaha.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}. so imameva kaaya.m upasa.mharati -- `ayampi kho kaayo eva.mdhammo eva.mbhaavii eva.manatiito'ti. tassa eva.m appamattassa...pe0... evampi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaayagataasati.m bhaaveti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu seyyathaapi passeyya sariira.m sivathikaaya cha.d.dita.m -- a.t.thikaani setaani sa"nkhava.n.napa.tibhaagaani {sa"nkhava.n.nuupanibhaani (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} ...pe0... a.t.thikaani pu~njakitaani terovassikaani...pe0... a.t.thikaani puutiini cu.n.nakajaataani. so imameva kaaya.m upasa.mharati -- `ayampi kho kaayo eva.mdhammo eva.mbhaavii eva.manatiito'ti. tassa eva.m appamattassa...pe0... evampi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaayagataasati.m bhaaveti.

[03] 155^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva kaamehi...pe0... pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. so imameva kaaya.m vivekajena piitisukhena abhisandeti ^a^M3.0135^ea^ parisandeti paripuureti parippharati, naassa ki~nci sabbaavato kaayassa vivekajena piitisukhena apphu.ta.m hoti. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, dakkho nhaapako {nahaapako (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} vaa nhaapakantevaasii vaa ka.msathaale nhaaniiyacu.n.naani {nahaaniiyacu.n.naani (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} aakiritvaa ^a^T3.0209^ea^ udakena paripphosaka.m paripphosaka.m sanneyya, saaya.m nhaaniiyapi.n.di {saassa nahaaniiyapi.n.dii (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} snehaanugataa snehaparetaa santarabaahiraa phu.taa snehena na ca pagghari.nii; evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu imameva kaaya.m vivekajena piitisukhena ^a^P3.0093^ea^ abhisandeti parisandeti paripuureti parippharati; naassa ki~nci sabbaavato kaayassa ^a^V3.0137^ea^ vivekajena piitisukhena apphu.ta.m hoti. tassa eva.m appamattassa...pe0... evampi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaayagataasati.m bhaaveti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa...pe0... dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. so imameva kaaya.m samaadhijena piitisukhena abhisandeti parisandeti paripuureti parippharati; naassa ki~nci sabbaavato kaayassa samaadhijena piitisukhena apphu.ta.m hoti. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, udakarahado gambhiiro ubbhidodako {ubbhitodako (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)}. tassa nevassa puratthimaaya disaaya udakassa aayamukha.m na pacchimaaya disaaya udakassa aayamukha.m na uttaraaya disaaya udakassa aayamukha.m na dakkhi.naaya disaaya udakassa aayamukha.m; devo ca na kaalena kaala.m sammaa dhaara.m anuppaveccheyya; atha kho tamhaava udakarahadaa siitaa vaaridhaaraa ubbhijjitvaa tameva udakarahada.m siitena vaarinaa abhisandeyya parisandeyya paripuureyya paripphareyya, naassa ki~nci sabbaavato udakarahadassa siitena vaarinaa apphu.ta.m assa; evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu imameva kaaya.m samaadhijena piitisukhena abhisandeti parisandeti paripuureti parippharati, naassa ki~nci sabbaavato kaayassa samaadhijena ^a^T3.0210^ea^ piitisukhena apphu.ta.m hoti. tassa eva.m appamattassa...pe0... evampi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaayagataasati.m bhaaveti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu piitiyaa ca viraagaa...pe0... tatiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. so imameva kaaya.m nippiitikena sukhena abhisandeti parisandeti paripuureti parippharati, naassa ki~nci sabbaavato kaayassa nippiitikena sukhena apphu.ta.m hoti. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, uppaliniya.m vaa paduminiya.m vaa pu.n.dariikiniya.m vaa appekaccaani uppalaani vaa padumaani vaa pu.n.dariikaani vaa ^a^M3.0136^ea^ udake jaataani udake sa.mva.d.dhaani udakaanuggataani antonimuggaposiini ^a^P3.0094^ea^, taani yaava caggaa yaava ca muulaa siitena vaarinaa abhisannaani parisannaani {abhisandaani parisandaani (ka0)} paripuuraani paripphu.taani, naassa {na nesa.m (?)} ki~nci sabbaavata.m uppalaana.m vaa padumaana.m vaa pu.n.dariikaana.m vaa siitena vaarinaa apphu.ta.m assa; evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu imameva kaaya.m nippiitikena sukhena abhisandeti parisandeti paripuureti ^a^V3.0138^ea^ parippharati, naassa ki~nci sabbaavato kaayassa nippiitikena sukhena apphu.ta.m hoti. tassa eva.m appamattassa...pe0... evampi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaayagataasati.m bhaaveti.

[01] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahaanaa...pe0... catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. so imameva kaaya.m parisuddhena cetasaa pariyodaatena pharitvaa nisinno hoti; naassa ki~nci sabbaavato kaayassa parisuddhena cetasaa pariyodaatena apphu.ta.m hoti. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave ^a^T3.0211^ea^, puriso odaatena vatthena sasiisa.m paarupitvaa nisinno assa, naassa ki~nci sabbaavato kaayassa odaatena vatthena apphu.ta.m assa; evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu imameva kaaya.m parisuddhena cetasaa pariyodaatena pharitvaa nisinno hoti, naassa ki~nci sabbaavato kaayassa parisuddhena cetasaa pariyodaatena apphu.ta.m hoti. tassa eva.m appamattassa aataapino pahitattassa viharato ye gehasitaa sarasa"nkappaa te pahiiyanti. tesa.m pahaanaa ajjhattameva citta.m santi.t.thati, sannisiidati ekodi hoti samaadhiyati. evampi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaayagataasati.m bhaaveti.

[03] 156^b^.^eb^ ``yassa kassaci, bhikkhave, kaayagataasati bhaavitaa bahuliikataa, antogadhaavaassa {antogadhaa tassa (sii0 pii0)} kusalaa dhammaa ye keci vijjaabhaagiyaa. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, yassa kassaci mahaasamuddo cetasaa phu.to, antogadhaavaassa kunnadiyo yaa kaaci samudda"ngamaa; evameva kho, bhikkhave, yassa kassaci kaayagataasati bhaavitaa bahuliikataa, antogadhaavaassa kusalaa dhammaa ye keci vijjaabhaagiyaa.

[03] ``yassa kassaci, bhikkhave, kaayagataasati abhaavitaa abahuliikataa, labhati tassa maaro otaara.m, labhati tassa maaro aaramma.na.m {aarama.na.m (?)}. seyyathaapi ^a^M3.0137^ea^, bhikkhave, puriso garuka.m silaagu.la.m allamattikaapu~nje pakkhipeyya. ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, api nu ta.m garuka.m silaagu.la.m allamattikaapu~nje labhetha otaara''nti? ``eva.m, bhante''. ``evameva ^a^P3.0095^ea^ kho ^a^T3.0212^ea^, bhikkhave, yassa kassaci kaayagataasati abhaavitaa abahuliikataa, labhati tassa maaro otaara.m, labhati tassa maaro aaramma.na.m. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, sukkha.m ka.t.tha.m ko.laapa.m {ko.laapa.m aarakaa udakaa thale nikkhitta.m (ka0)}; atha puriso aagaccheyya uttaraara.ni.m aadaaya -- `aggi.m abhinibbattessaami, tejo paatukarissaamii'ti. ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, api nu so puriso amu.m sukkha.m ka.t.tha.m ko.laapa.m uttaraara.ni.m aadaaya abhimanthento {abhimanthento (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0)} aggi.m abhinibbatteyya, tejo paatukareyyaa''ti? ``eva.m ^a^V3.0139^ea^, bhante''. ``evameva kho, bhikkhave, yassa kassaci kaayagataasati abhaavitaa abahuliikataa, labhati tassa maaro otaara.m, labhati tassa maaro aaramma.na.m. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, udakama.niko ritto tuccho aadhaare .thapito; atha puriso aagaccheyya udakabhaara.m aadaaya. ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, api nu so puriso labhetha udakassa nikkhepana''nti? ``eva.m, bhante''. ``evameva kho, bhikkhave, yassa kassaci kaayagataasati abhaavitaa abahuliikataa, labhati tassa maaro otaara.m, labhati tassa maaro aaramma.na.m''.

[03] 157^b^.^eb^ ``yassa kassaci, bhikkhave, kaayagataasati bhaavitaa bahuliikataa, na tassa labhati maaro otaara.m, na tassa labhati maaro aaramma.na.m. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, puriso lahuka.m suttagu.la.m sabbasaaramaye agga.laphalake pakkhipeyya. ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, api nu so puriso ta.m lahuka.m suttagu.la.m sabbasaaramaye agga.laphalake labhetha otaara''nti? ``no ^a^T3.0213^ea^ heta.m, bhante''. ``evameva kho, bhikkhave, yassa kassaci kaayagataasati bhaavitaa bahuliikataa, na tassa labhati maaro otaara.m, na tassa labhati maaro aaramma.na.m. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, alla.m ka.t.tha.m sasneha.m {sasneha.m aarakaa udakaa thale nikkhitta.m (ka0)}; atha puriso aagaccheyya uttaraara.ni.m aadaaya -- `aggi.m abhinibbattessaami, tejo paatukarissaamii'ti. ta.m ki.m ^a^P3.0096^ea^ ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, api nu so puriso amu.m alla.m ka.t.tha.m sasneha.m uttaraara.ni.m aadaaya abhimanthento aggi.m abhinibbatteyya, tejo paatukareyyaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``evameva kho, bhikkhave ^a^M3.0138^ea^, yassa kassaci kaayagataasati bhaavitaa bahuliikataa, na tassa labhati maaro otaara.m, na tassa labhati maaro aaramma.na.m. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, udakama.niko puuro udakassa samatittiko kaakapeyyo aadhaare .thapito; atha puriso aagaccheyya udakabhaara.m aadaaya. ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, api nu so puriso labhetha udakassa nikkhepana''nti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``evameva kho, bhikkhave, yassa kassaci kaayagataasati bhaavitaa bahuliikataa, na tassa labhati maaro otaara.m, na tassa labhati maaro aaramma.na.m''.

[03] 158^b^.^eb^ ``yassa kassaci, bhikkhave, kaayagataasati bhaavitaa bahuliikataa, so yassa yassa abhi~n~naasacchikara.niiyassa dhammassa citta.m abhininnaameti abhi~n~naasacchikiriyaaya, ta tatre sakkhibhabbata.m paapu.naati sati satiaayatane. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, udakama.niko puuro udakassa samatittiko ^a^T3.0214^ea^ kaakapeyyo aadhaare .thapito. tamena.m balavaa puriso yato yato aavi~ncheyya, aagaccheyya udaka''nti? ``eva.m, bhante''. ``evameva kho, bhikkhave, yassa kassaci kaayagataasati bhaavitaa ^a^V3.0140^ea^ bahuliikataa so, yassa yassa abhi~n~naasacchikara.niiyassa dhammassa citta.m abhininnaameti abhi~n~naasacchikiriyaaya, tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbata.m paapu.naati sati satiaayatane. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, same bhuumibhaage caturassaa pokkhara.nii {pokkhari.nii (sii0)} assa aa.libandhaa puuraa udakassa samatittikaa kaakapeyyaa. tamena.m balavaa puriso yato yato aa.li.m mu~nceyya aagaccheyya udaka''nti? ``eva.m ^a^P3.0097^ea^, bhante''. ``evameva kho, bhikkhave, yassa kassaci kaayagataasati bhaavitaa bahuliikataa, so yassa yassa abhi~n~naasacchikara.niiyassa dhammassa citta.m abhininnaameti abhi~n~naasacchikiriyaaya, tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbata.m paapu.naati sati satiaayatane. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, subhuumiya.m catumahaapathe aaja~n~naratho yutto assa .thito odhastapatodo {obhastapatodo (ka0), ubhantarapa.todo (syaa0 ka.m0) ava + dha.msu + ta = odhasta-itipadavibhaago}; tamena.m dakkho yoggaacariyo assadammasaarathi abhiruhitvaa vaamena hatthena rasmiyo gahetvaa dakkhi.nena hatthena patoda.m gahetvaa yenicchaka.m yadicchaka.m saareyyaapi ^a^M3.0139^ea^ paccaasaareyyaapi; evameva kho, bhikkhave, yassa kassaci kaayagataasati bhaavitaa bahuliikataa, so yassa yassa abhi~n~naasacchikara.niiyassa dhammassa citta.m abhininnaameti abhi~n~naasacchikiriyaaya ^a^T3.0215^ea^, tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbata.m paapu.naati sati satiaayatane''.

[03] 159^b^.^eb^ ``kaayagataaya, bhikkhave, satiyaa aasevitaaya bhaavitaaya bahuliikataaya yaaniikataaya vatthukataaya anu.t.thitaaya paricitaaya susamaaraddhaaya dasaanisa.msaa paa.tika"nkhaa. aratiratisaho hoti, na ca ta.m arati sahati, uppanna.m arati.m abhibhuyya viharati.
[01] ``bhayabheravasaho hoti, na ca ta.m bhayabherava.m sahati, uppanna.m bhayabherava.m abhibhuyya viharati.

[01] ``khamo hoti siitassa u.nhassa jighacchaaya pipaasaaya .da.msamakasavaataatapasariisapasamphassaana.m duruttaana.m duraagataana.m vacanapathaana.m, uppannaana.m saariirikaana.m vedanaana.m dukkhaana.m tibbaana.m kharaana.m ka.tukaana.m asaataana.m amanaapaana.m paa.naharaana.m adhivaasakajaatiko hoti.
[01] ``catunna.m jhaanaana.m aabhicetasikaana.m di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraana.m ^a^P3.0098^ea^ nikaamalaabhii hoti akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii.
[03] ``so anekavihita.m iddhividha.m paccaanubhoti. ekopi hutvaa bahudhaa hoti, bahudhaapi hutvaa eko hoti, aavibhaava.m...pe0... yaava brahmalokaapi kaayena vasa.m vatteti.
[03] ``dibbaaya ^a^V3.0141^ea^ sotadhaatuyaa visuddhaaya atikkantamaanusikaaya ubho sadde su.naati dibbe ca maanuse ca, ye duure santike ca...pe0....

[03] ``parasattaana.m parapuggalaana.m cetasaa ceto paricca pajaanaati. saraaga.m vaa citta.m `saraaga.m citta'nti pajaanaati, viitaraaga.m vaa citta.m...pe0... sadosa.m vaa citta.m... viitadosa.m vaa citta.m... samoha.m vaa citta.m... viitamoha.m vaa citta.m... sa.mkhitta.m vaa ^a^T3.0216^ea^ citta.m... vikkhitta.m vaa citta.m... mahaggata.m vaa citta.m... amahaggata.m vaa citta.m... sauttara.m vaa citta.m... anuttara.m vaa citta.m... samaahita.m vaa citta.m... asamaahita.m vaa citta.m... vimutta.m vaa citta.m... avimutta.m vaa citta.m `avimutta.m citta'nti pajaanaati.
[03] ``so anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati, seyyathida.m -- ekampi ^a^P3.0099^ea^ jaati.m dvepi jaatiyo...pe0... iti saakaara.m sauddesa.m anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati.
[03] ``dibbena ^a^M3.0140^ea^ cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte passati cavamaane upapajjamaane hiine pa.niite suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne, sugate duggate yathaakammuupage satte pajaanaati.
[03] ``aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharati.
[03] ``kaayagataaya, bhikkhave, satiyaa aasevitaaya bhaavitaaya bahuliikataaya yaaniikataaya vatthukataaya anu.t.thitaaya paricitaaya susamaaraddhaaya ime dasaanisa.msaa paa.tika"nkhaa''ti.
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamanaa te bhikkhuu bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandunti.
[06] kaayagataasatisutta.m ni.t.thita.m navama.m.

[03] 160^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T3.0217^ea^ ^a^V3.0142^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``sa"nkhaarupapatti.m {sa"nkhaaruupapatti.m (syaa0 ka.m0), sa"nkhaaruppatti.m (sii0 pii0)} vo, bhikkhave, desessaami, ta.m su.naatha, saadhuka.m manasi karotha; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] 161^b^.^eb^ ``idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddhaaya samannaagato hoti, siilena samannaagato hoti, sutena samannaagato hoti, caagena samannaagato hoti, pa~n~naaya samannaagato hoti. tassa eva.m hoti -- `aho vataaha.m kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa khattiyamahaasaalaana.m {khattiyamahaasaalaana.m vaa (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} sahabyata.m upapajjeyya'nti. so ta.m citta.m dahati, ta.m citta.m adhi.t.thaati, ta.m citta.m bhaaveti ^a^P3.0100^ea^. tassa te sa"nkhaaraa ca vihaaraa {vihaaro (sii0 pii0)} ca eva.m bhaavitaa eva.m bahuliikataa ^a^M3.0141^ea^ tatrupapattiyaa {tatruupapattiyaa (syaa0 ka.m0), tatruppattiyaa (sii0 pii0)} sa.mvattanti. aya.m, bhikkhave, maggo aya.m pa.tipadaa tatrupapattiyaa sa.mvattati.

[03] 162^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddhaaya samannaagato hoti, siilena samannaagato hoti, sutena samannaagato hoti, caagena samannaagato hoti, pa~n~naaya samannaagato hoti. tassa eva.m hoti -- `aho vataaha.m kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa braahma.namahaasaalaana.m...pe0... gahapatimahaasaalaana.m ^a^T3.0218^ea^ {braahma.namahaasaalaana.m vaa gahapatimahaasaalaana.m vaa (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} sahabyata.m upapajjeyya'nti. so ta.m citta.m dahati, ta.m citta.m adhi.t.thaati, ta.m citta.m bhaaveti. tassa te sa"nkhaaraa ca vihaaraa ca eva.m bhaavitaa eva.m bahuliikataa tatrupapattiyaa sa.mvattanti. aya.m, bhikkhave, maggo aya.m pa.tipadaa tatrupapattiyaa sa.mvattati.

[03] 163^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddhaaya samannaagato hoti, siilena samannaagato hoti, sutena samannaagato hoti, caagena samannaagato hoti, pa~n~naaya samannaagato hoti. tassa suta.m hoti -- `caatumahaaraajikaa {caatummahaaraajikaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} devaa diighaayukaa va.n.navanto sukhabahulaa'ti. tassa eva.m hoti -- `aho vataaha.m kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa caatumahaaraajikaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjeyya'nti ^a^V3.0143^ea^. so ta.m citta.m dahati, ta.m citta.m adhi.t.thaati, ta.m citta.m bhaaveti. tassa te sa"nkhaaraa ca vihaaraa ca eva.m bhaavitaa eva.m bahuliikataa tatrupapattiyaa sa.mvattanti. aya.m, bhikkhave, maggo aya.m pa.tipadaa tatrupapattiyaa sa.mvattati.

[03] 164^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddhaaya samannaagato hoti, siilena samannaagato hoti, sutena samannaagato hoti, caagena samannaagato hoti, pa~n~naaya samannaagato hoti. tassa suta.m hoti -- taavati.msaa devaa...pe0... yaamaa devaa... tusitaa devaa... nimmaanaratii devaa... paranimmitavasavattii devaa diighaayukaa va.n.navanto sukhabahulaati. tassa eva.m hoti -- `aho vataaha.m kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa paranimmitavasavattiina.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjeyya'nti ^a^T3.0219^ea^. so ta.m citta.m dahati, ta.m citta.m adhi.t.thaati, ta.m citta.m bhaaveti. tassa te sa"nkhaaraa ca vihaaraa ca eva.m ^a^M3.0142^ea^ bhaavitaa eva.m bahuliikataa tatrupapattiyaa sa.mvattanti. aya.m, bhikkhave, maggo aya.m pa.tipadaa tatrupapattiyaa sa.mvattati.

[03] 165^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddhaaya samannaagato ^a^P3.0101^ea^ hoti, siilena samannaagato hoti, sutena samannaagato hoti, caagena samannaagato hoti, pa~n~naaya samannaagato hoti. tassa suta.m hoti -- `sahasso brahmaa diighaayuko va.n.navaa sukhabahulo'ti. sahasso, bhikkhave, brahmaa sahassilokadhaatu.m {sahassi.m lokadhaatu.m (sii0)} pharitvaa adhimuccitvaa {adhimu~ncitvaa (ka0)} viharati. yepi tattha sattaa upapannaa tepi pharitvaa adhimuccitvaa viharati. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, cakkhumaa puriso eka.m aama.n.da.m hatthe karitvaa paccavekkheyya; evameva kho, bhikkhave, sahasso brahmaa sahassilokadhaatu.m pharitvaa adhimuccitvaa viharati. yepi tattha sattaa upapannaa tepi pharitvaa adhimuccitvaa viharati. tassa eva.m hoti -- `aho vataaha.m kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sahassassa brahmuno sahabyata.m upapajjeyya'nti. so ta.m citta.m dahati, ta.m citta.m adhi.t.thaati, ta.m citta.m bhaaveti. tassa te sa"nkhaaraa ca vihaaraa ca eva.m bhaavitaa eva.m bahuliikataa tatrupapattiyaa sa.mvattanti. aya.m, bhikkhave, maggo aya.m pa.tipadaa tatrupapattiyaa sa.mvattati.

[03] 166^b^.^eb^ ``puna ^a^T3.0220^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddhaaya samannaagato hoti, siilena samannaagato hoti, sutena... caagena... pa~n~naaya samannaagato hoti. tassa suta.m hoti -- dvisahasso brahmaa...pe0... tisahasso brahmaa... catusahasso brahmaa... pa~ncasahasso brahmaa diighaayuko va.n.navaa ^a^V3.0144^ea^ sukhabahuloti. pa~ncasahasso, bhikkhave, brahmaa pa~ncasahassilokadhaatu.m pharitvaa adhimuccitvaa viharati. yepi tattha sattaa upapannaa tepi pharitvaa adhimuccitvaa viharati. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, cakkhumaa puriso pa~nca aama.n.daani hatthe karitvaa paccavekkheyya; evameva kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncasahasso brahmaa pa~ncasahassilokadhaatu.m pharitvaa adhimuccitvaa viharati. yepi tattha sattaa upapannaa tepi pharitvaa adhimuccitvaa viharati. tassa eva.m hoti -- `aho vataaha.m kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa pa~ncasahassassa brahmuno sahabyata.m upapajjeyya'nti. so ta.m citta.m dahati, ta.m citta.m adhi.t.thaati, ta.m citta.m bhaaveti. tassa ^a^M3.0143^ea^ te sa"nkhaaraa ca vihaaraa ca eva.m bhaavitaa eva.m bahuliikataa tatrupapattiyaa sa.mvattanti. aya.m, bhikkhave, maggo aya.m pa.tipadaa tatrupapattiyaa sa.mvattati.

[03] 167^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddhaaya samannaagato hoti, siilena samannaagato hoti, sutena... caagena... pa~n~naaya samannaagato hoti. tassa suta.m hoti -- `dasasahasso ^a^T3.0221^ea^ brahmaa diighaayuko va.n.navaa sukhabahulo'ti. dasasahasso, bhikkhave, brahmaa dasasahassilokadhaatu.m pharitvaa adhimuccitvaa ^a^P3.0102^ea^ viharati. yepi tattha sattaa upapannaa tepi pharitvaa adhimuccitvaa viharati. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, ma.ni ve.luriyo subho jaatimaa a.t.tha.mso suparikammakato pa.n.dukambale nikkhitto bhaasate ca tapate ca {bhaasati ca tapati ca (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} virocati ca; evameva kho, bhikkhave, dasasahasso brahmaa dasasahassilokadhaatu.m pharitvaa adhimuccitvaa viharati. yepi tattha sattaa upapannaa tepi pharitvaa adhimuccitvaa viharati. tassa eva.m hoti -- `aho vataaha.m kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa dasasahassassa brahmuno sahabyata.m upapajjeyya'nti. so ta.m citta.m dahati, ta.m citta.m adhi.t.thaati, ta.m citta.m bhaaveti. tassa te sa"nkhaaraa ca vihaaraa ca eva.m bhaavitaa eva.m bahuliikataa tatrupapattiyaa sa.mvattanti. aya.m, bhikkhave, maggo aya.m pa.tipadaa tatrupapattiyaa sa.mvattati.

[03] 168^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddhaaya samannaagato hoti, siilena... sutena... caagena... pa~n~naaya samannaagato hoti. tassa suta.m hoti -- `satasahasso brahmaa diighaayuko va.n.navaa sukhabahulo'ti. satasahasso, bhikkhave, brahmaa satasahassilokadhaatu.m pharitvaa adhimuccitvaa viharati. yepi tattha sattaa upapannaa tepi pharitvaa adhimuccitvaa viharati. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, nikkha.m jambonada.m {nekkha.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} dakkhakammaaraputtaukkaamukhasukusalasampaha.t.tha.m ^a^T3.0222^ea^ pa.n.dukambale ^a^V3.0145^ea^ nikkhitta.m bhaasate ca tapate ca virocati ca; evameva kho, bhikkhave, satasahasso brahmaa satasahassilokadhaatu.m pharitvaa adhimuccitvaa viharati. yepi tattha sattaa upapannaa tepi pharitvaa adhimuccitvaa viharati. tassa eva.m hoti -- `aho vataaha.m kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa satasahassassa brahmuno sahabyata.m upapajjeyya'nti ^a^M3.0144^ea^. so ta.m citta.m dahati, ta.m citta.m adhi.t.thaati, ta.m citta.m bhaaveti. tassa te sa"nkhaaraa ca vihaaraa ca eva.m bhaavitaa eva.m bahuliikataa tatrupapattiyaa sa.mvattanti. aya.m, bhikkhave, maggo aya.m pa.tipadaa tatrupapattiyaa sa.mvattati.

[03] 169^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddhaaya samannaagato hoti, siilena... sutena... caagena... pa~n~naaya samannaagato hoti. tassa suta.m hoti -- aabhaa devaa...pe0... parittaabhaa devaa... appamaa.naabhaa devaa... aabhassaraa devaa diighaayukaa va.n.navanto sukhabahulaati. tassa eva.m hoti -- `aho vataaha.m kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa aabhassaraana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjeyya'nti. so ta.m citta.m dahati, ta.m citta.m adhi.t.thaati, ta.m citta.m bhaaveti. tassa te sa"nkhaaraa ca vihaaraa ca eva.m bhaavitaa eva.m bahuliikataa tatrupapattiyaa sa.mvattanti. aya.m, bhikkhave, maggo aya.m pa.tipadaa tatrupapattiyaa sa.mvattati.

[03] 170^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddhaaya samannaagato hoti, siilena ^a^T3.0223^ea^... sutena... caagena... pa~n~naaya samannaagato hoti. tassa suta.m hoti -- parittasubhaa devaa...pe0... appamaa.nasubhaa devaa... subhaki.nhaa devaa diighaayukaa va.n.navanto sukhabahulaati. tassa eva.m hoti -- `aho vataaha.m kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa subhaki.nhaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjeyya'nti. so ta.m citta.m dahati, ta.m citta.m adhi.t.thaati, ta.m citta.m bhaaveti. tassa te sa"nkhaaraa ca vihaaraa ca eva.m bhaavitaa eva.m bahuliikataa tatrupapattiyaa sa.mvattanti. aya.m, bhikkhave, maggo aya.m pa.tipadaa tatrupapattiyaa sa.mvattati.

[03] 171^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddhaaya samannaagato hoti, siilena... sutena... caagena... pa~n~naaya samannaagato hoti. tassa ^a^P3.0103^ea^ suta.m hoti -- vehapphalaa devaa...pe0... avihaa devaa... atappaa devaa... sudassaa devaa... sudassii devaa... akani.t.thaa devaa diighaayukaa va.n.navanto sukhabahulaati. tassa eva.m hoti -- `aho vataaha.m kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa ^a^V3.0146^ea^ akani.t.thaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjeyya'nti. so ta.m citta.m dahati, ta.m citta.m adhi.t.thaati, ta.m citta.m bhaaveti. tassa te sa"nkhaaraa ca vihaaraa ^a^M3.0145^ea^ ca eva.m bhaavitaa eva.m bahuliikataa tatrupapattiyaa sa.mvattanti. aya.m, bhikkhave, maggo aya.m pa.tipadaa tatrupapattiyaa sa.mvattati.

[03] 172^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddhaaya samannaagato hoti, siilena... sutena... caagena... pa~n~naaya samannaagato hoti. tassa suta.m hoti -- `aakaasaana~ncaayatanuupagaa devaa diighaayukaa cira.t.thitikaa sukhabahulaa'ti ^a^T3.0224^ea^. tassa eva.m hoti -- `aho vataaha.m kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa aakaasaana~ncaayatanuupagaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjeyya'nti. so ta.m citta.m dahati, ta.m citta.m adhi.t.thaati, ta.m citta.m bhaaveti. tassa te sa"nkhaaraa ca vihaaraa ca eva.m bhaavitaa eva.m bahuliikataa tatrupapattiyaa sa.mvattanti. aya.m, bhikkhave, maggo aya.m pa.tipadaa tatrupapattiyaa sa.mvattati.

[03] 173^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddhaaya samannaagato hoti, siilena... sutena... caagena... pa~n~naaya samannaagato hoti. tassa suta.m hoti -- `vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanuupagaa devaa diighaayukaa cira.t.thitikaa sukhabahulaa'ti. tassa eva.m hoti -- `aho vataaha.m kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanuupagaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjeyya'nti. so ta.m citta.m dahati, ta.m citta.m adhi.t.thaati, ta.m citta.m bhaaveti. tassa te sa"nkhaaraa ca vihaaraa ca eva.m bhaavitaa eva.m bahuliikataa tatrupapattiyaa sa.mvattanti. aya.m, bhikkhave, maggo aya.m pa.tipadaa tatrupapattiyaa sa.mvattati.

[03] 174^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddhaaya samannaagato hoti, siilena... sutena... caagena... pa~n~naaya samannaagato hoti. tassa suta.m hoti -- aaki~nca~n~naayatanuupagaa devaa...pe0... nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanuupagaa devaa diighaayukaa cira.t.thitikaa sukhabahulaati. tassa eva.m hoti -- `aho vataaha.m kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanuupagaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjeyya'nti. so ta.m citta.m dahati, ta.m citta.m adhi.t.thaati, ta.m citta.m bhaaveti. tassa te sa"nkhaaraa ca vihaaraa ca eva.m bhaavitaa eva.m bahuliikataa tatrupapattiyaa sa.mvattanti. aya.m, bhikkhave, maggo aya.m pa.tipadaa tatrupapattiyaa sa.mvattati.

[03] 175^b^.^eb^ ``puna ^a^T3.0225^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddhaaya samannaagato hoti, siilena... sutena... caagena... ^a^V3.0147^ea^ pa~n~naaya samannaagato hoti. tassa eva.m hoti ^a^M3.0146^ea^ -- `aho vataaha.m aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihareyya'nti. so aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharati. aya.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na katthaci upapajjatii''ti {na katthaci upapajjati, na kuhi~nci upapajjatiiti (sii0 pii0), na katthaci upapajjati, na kuhi~nci upasampajja viharatiiti. (ka0)}.

[03] 176^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T3.0226^ea^ ^a^M3.0147^ea^ ^a^V3.0148^ea^ ^a^P3.0104^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati pubbaaraame migaaramaatupaasaade. atha kho aayasmaa aanando saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ekamida.m, bhante, samaya.m bhagavaa sakkesu viharati nagaraka.m naama sakyaana.m nigamo. tattha me, bhante, bhagavato sammukhaa suta.m, sammukhaa pa.tiggahita.m -- `su~n~nataavihaarenaaha.m, aananda, etarahi bahula.m viharaamii'ti. kacci meta.m, bhante, sussuta.m suggahita.m sumanasikata.m suupadhaarita''nti? ``taggha te eta.m, aananda, sussuta.m suggahita.m sumanasikata.m suupadhaarita.m. pubbepaaha.m {pubbecaaha.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}, aananda, etarahipi {etarahi ca (sabbattha)} su~n~nataavihaarena bahula.m viharaami. seyyathaapi, aananda, aya.m migaaramaatupaasaado su~n~no hatthigavassava.lavena, su~n~no jaataruuparajatena, su~n~no itthipurisasannipaatena atthi cevida.m asu~n~nata.m yadida.m -- bhikkhusa"ngha.m pa.ticca ekatta.m; evameva kho, aananda, bhikkhu amanasikaritvaa gaamasa~n~na.m, amanasikaritvaa manussasa~n~na.m, ara~n~nasa~n~na.m pa.ticca manasi karoti ekatta.m ^a^T3.0227^ea^. tassa ara~n~nasa~n~naaya citta.m pakkhandati pasiidati santi.t.thati adhimuccati. so eva.m pajaanaati -- `ye assu darathaa gaamasa~n~na.m pa.ticca tedha na santi, ye assu darathaa manussasa~n~na.m pa.ticca tedha na santi, atthi cevaaya.m darathamattaa yadida.m -- ara~n~nasa~n~na.m pa.ticca ekatta'nti. so `su~n~namida.m sa~n~naagata.m gaamasa~n~naayaa'ti pajaanaati, `su~n~namida.m sa~n~naagata.m manussasa~n~naayaa'ti pajaanaati, `atthi cevida.m asu~n~nata.m yadida.m -- ara~n~nasa~n~na.m pa.ticca ekatta'nti. iti ya~nhi kho tattha na hoti tena ta.m su~n~na.m samanupassati, ya.m pana tattha avasi.t.tha.m ^a^P3.0105^ea^ hoti ta.m `santamida.m ^a^V3.0149^ea^ atthii'''ti pajaanaati. evampissa esaa, aananda, yathaabhuccaa avipallatthaa parisuddhaa su~n~nataavakkanti bhavati.

[03] 177^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, aananda, bhikkhu amanasikaritvaa manussasa~n~na.m, amanasikaritvaa ara~n~nasa~n~na.m, pathaviisa~n~na.m pa.ticca manasi karoti ekatta.m. tassa pathaviisa~n~naaya ^a^M3.0148^ea^ citta.m pakkhandati pasiidati santi.t.thati adhimuccati. seyyathaapi, aananda, aasabhacamma.m sa"nkusatena suvihata.m vigatavalika.m; evameva kho, aananda, bhikkhu ya.m imissaa pathaviyaa ukkuulavikkuula.m nadiividugga.m khaa.nuka.n.taka.t.thaana.m pabbatavisama.m ta.m sabba.m {sabba.m (ka0)} amanasikaritvaa pathaviisa~n~na.m pa.ticca manasi karoti ekatta.m. tassa pathaviisa~n~naaya citta.m pakkhandati pasiidati santi.t.thati adhimuccati. so eva.m pajaanaati -- `ye assu darathaa manussasa~n~na.m pa.ticca tedha na santi, ye assu darathaa ara~n~nasa~n~na.m ^a^T3.0228^ea^ pa.ticca tedha na santi, atthi cevaaya.m darathamattaa yadida.m -- pathaviisa~n~na.m pa.ticca ekatta'nti. so `su~n~namida.m sa~n~naagata.m manussasa~n~naayaa'ti pajaanaati, `su~n~namida.m sa~n~naagata.m ara~n~nasa~n~naayaa'ti pajaanaati, `atthi cevida.m asu~n~nata.m yadida.m -- pathaviisa~n~na.m pa.ticca ekatta'nti. iti ya~nhi kho tattha na hoti tena ta.m su~n~na.m samanupassati, ya.m pana tattha avasi.t.tha.m hoti ta.m `santamida.m atthii'ti pajaanaati. evampissa esaa, aananda, yathaabhuccaa avipallatthaa parisuddhaa su~n~nataavakkanti bhavati.

[03] 178^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, aananda, bhikkhu amanasikaritvaa ara~n~nasa~n~na.m, amanasikaritvaa pathaviisa~n~na.m, aakaasaana~ncaayatanasa~n~na.m pa.ticca manasi karoti ekatta.m. tassa aakaasaana~ncaayatanasa~n~naaya citta.m pakkhandati pasiidati santi.t.thati adhimuccati. so eva.m pajaanaati -- `ye assu darathaa ara~n~nasa~n~na.m pa.ticca tedha na santi, ye assu darathaa pathaviisa~n~na.m ^a^P3.0106^ea^ pa.ticca tedha na santi, atthi cevaaya.m darathamattaa yadida.m -- aakaasaana~ncaayatanasa~n~na.m pa.ticca ekatta'nti. so `su~n~namida.m sa~n~naagata.m ara~n~nasa~n~naayaa'ti pajaanaati, `su~n~namida.m sa~n~naagata.m pathaviisa~n~naayaa'ti pajaanaati, `atthi cevida.m asu~n~nata.m yadida.m -- aakaasaana~ncaayatanasa~n~na.m pa.ticca ekatta'nti. iti ya~nhi kho tattha na hoti tena ta.m su~n~na.m samanupassati, ya.m pana tattha avasi.t.tha.m hoti ta.m `santamida.m atthii'ti pajaanaati. evampissa esaa, aananda ^a^T3.0229^ea^, yathaabhuccaa avipallatthaa parisuddhaa su~n~nataavakkanti bhavati.

[03] 179^b^.^eb^ ``puna ^a^V3.0150^ea^ capara.m, aananda, bhikkhu amanasikaritvaa pathaviisa~n~na.m, amanasikaritvaa aakaasaana~ncaayatanasa~n~na.m, vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanasa~n~na.m pa.ticca manasi karoti ekatta.m. tassa vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanasa~n~naaya citta.m pakkhandati pasiidati santi.t.thati adhimuccati. so eva.m pajaanaati -- `ye assu darathaa pathaviisa~n~na.m ^a^M3.0149^ea^ pa.ticca tedha na santi, ye assu darathaa aakaasaana~ncaayatanasa~n~na.m pa.ticca tedha na santi, atthi cevaaya.m darathamattaa yadida.m -- vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanasa~n~na.m pa.ticca ekatta'nti. so `su~n~namida.m sa~n~naagata.m pathaviisa~n~naayaa'ti pajaanaati, `su~n~namida.m sa~n~naagata.m aakaasaana~ncaayatanasa~n~naayaa'ti pajaanaati, `atthi cevida.m asu~n~nata.m yadida.m -- vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanasa~n~na.m pa.ticca ekatta'nti. iti ya~nhi kho tattha na hoti tena ta.m su~n~na.m samanupassati, ya.m pana tattha avasi.t.tha.m hoti ta.m `santamida.m atthii'ti pajaanaati. evampissa esaa, aananda, yathaabhuccaa avipallatthaa parisuddhaa su~n~nataavakkanti bhavati.

[03] 180^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, aananda, bhikkhu amanasikaritvaa aakaasaana~ncaayatanasa~n~na.m, amanasikaritvaa vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanasa~n~na.m, aaki~nca~n~naayatanasa~n~na.m pa.ticca manasi karoti ekatta.m. tassa aaki~nca~n~naayatanasa~n~naaya citta.m pakkhandati pasiidati santi.t.thati adhimuccati. so eva.m pajaanaati -- `ye assu darathaa aakaasaana~ncaayatanasa~n~na.m pa.ticca tedha na ^a^T3.0230^ea^ santi, ye assu darathaa vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanasa~n~na.m pa.ticca tedha na santi, atthi cevaaya.m darathamattaa yadida.m -- aaki~nca~n~naayatanasa~n~na.m pa.ticca ekatta'nti. so `su~n~namida.m sa~n~naagata.m aakaasaana~ncaayatanasa~n~naayaa'ti pajaanaati, `su~n~namida.m ^a^P3.0107^ea^ sa~n~naagata.m vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanasa~n~naayaa'ti pajaanaati, `atthi cevida.m asu~n~nata.m yadida.m -- aaki~nca~n~naayatanasa~n~na.m pa.ticca ekatta'nti. iti ya~nhi kho tattha na hoti tena ta.m su~n~na.m samanupassati, ya.m pana tattha avasi.t.tha.m hoti ta.m `santamida.m atthii'ti pajaanaati. evampissa esaa, aananda, yathaabhuccaa avipallatthaa parisuddhaa su~n~nataavakkanti bhavati.

[03] 181^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, aananda bhikkhu amanasikaritvaa vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanasa~n~na.m, amanasikaritvaa aaki~nca~n~naayatanasa~n~na.m, nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanasa~n~na.m pa.ticca manasi karoti ekatta.m. tassa nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanasa~n~naaya citta.m pakkhandati pasiidati santi.t.thati adhimuccati. so eva.m pajaanaati -- `ye assu darathaa vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanasa~n~na.m pa.ticca tedha na ^a^V3.0151^ea^ santi, ye assu darathaa aaki~nca~n~naayatanasa~n~na.m pa.ticca tedha na santi, atthi cevaaya.m darathamattaa yadida.m -- nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanasa~n~na.m pa.ticca ekatta'nti. so `su~n~namida.m sa~n~naagata.m vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanasa~n~naayaa'ti pajaanaati, `su~n~namida.m sa~n~naagata.m aaki~nca~n~naayatanasa~n~naayaa'ti pajaanaati, `atthi cevida.m asu~n~nata.m ^a^M3.0150^ea^ yadida.m -- nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanasa~n~na.m pa.ticca ekatta'nti ^a^T3.0231^ea^. iti ya~nhi kho tattha na hoti tena ta.m su~n~na.m samanupassati, ya.m pana tattha avasi.t.tha.m hoti ta.m `santamida.m atthii'ti pajaanaati. evampissa esaa, aananda, yathaabhuccaa avipallatthaa parisuddhaa su~n~nataavakkanti bhavati.

[03] 182^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, aananda, bhikkhu amanasikaritvaa aaki~nca~n~naayatanasa~n~na.m, amanasikaritvaa nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanasa~n~na.m, animitta.m cetosamaadhi.m pa.ticca manasi karoti ekatta.m. tassa animitte cetosamaadhimhi citta.m pakkhandati pasiidati santi.t.thati adhimuccati. so eva.m pajaanaati -- `ye assu darathaa aaki~nca~n~naayatanasa~n~na.m pa.ticca tedha na santi, ye assu darathaa nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanasa~n~na.m pa.ticca tedha na santi, atthi cevaaya.m darathamattaa yadida.m -- imameva kaaya.m pa.ticca sa.laayatanika.m jiivitapaccayaa'ti ^a^P3.0108^ea^. so `su~n~namida.m sa~n~naagata.m aaki~nca~n~naayatanasa~n~naayaa'ti pajaanaati, `su~n~namida.m sa~n~naagata.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanasa~n~naayaa'ti pajaanaati, `atthi cevida.m asu~n~nata.m yadida.m -- imameva kaaya.m pa.ticca sa.laayatanika.m jiivitapaccayaa'ti. iti ya~nhi kho tattha na hoti tena ta.m su~n~na.m samanupassati, ya.m pana tattha avasi.t.tha.m hoti ta.m `santamida.m atthii'ti pajaanaati. evampissa esaa, aananda, yathaabhuccaa avipallatthaa parisuddhaa su~n~nataavakkanti bhavati.
