[03] 183^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, aananda, bhikkhu amanasikaritvaa aaki~nca~n~naayatanasa~n~na.m, amanasikaritvaa nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanasa~n~na.m, animitta.m cetosamaadhi.m ^a^T3.0232^ea^ pa.ticca manasi karoti ekatta.m. tassa animitte cetosamaadhimhi citta.m pakkhandati pasiidati santi.t.thati adhimuccati. so eva.m pajaanaati -- `ayampi kho animitto cetosamaadhi abhisa"nkhato abhisa~ncetayito'. `ya.m kho pana ki~nci abhisa"nkhata.m abhisa~ncetayita.m tadanicca.m nirodhadhamma'nti pajaanaati. tassa eva.m jaanato eva.m passato kaamaasavaapi citta.m vimuccati, bhavaasavaapi citta.m vimuccati, avijjaasavaapi citta.m vimuccati. vimuttasmi.m vimuttamiti ~naa.na.m hoti. `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaati. so eva.m pajaanaati -- `ye assu darathaa ^a^V3.0152^ea^ kaamaasava.m pa.ticca tedha na santi, ye assu darathaa bhavaasava.m pa.ticca tedha na santi, ye assu darathaa avijjaasava.m pa.ticca tedha na santi, atthi cevaaya.m darathamattaa yadida.m -- imameva kaaya.m pa.ticca sa.laayatanika.m ^a^M3.0151^ea^ jiivitapaccayaa'ti. so `su~n~namida.m sa~n~naagata.m kaamaasavenaa'ti pajaanaati, `su~n~namida.m sa~n~naagata.m bhavaasavenaa'ti pajaanaati, `su~n~namida.m sa~n~naagata.m avijjaasavenaa'ti pajaanaati, `atthi cevida.m asu~n~nata.m yadida.m -- imameva kaaya.m pa.ticca sa.laayatanika.m jiivitapaccayaa'ti. iti ya~nhi kho tattha na hoti tena ta.m su~n~na.m samanupassati, ya.m pana tattha avasi.t.tha.m hoti ta.m `santamida.m atthii'ti pajaanaati. evampissa esaa, aananda, yathaabhuccaa avipallatthaa ^a^P3.0109^ea^ parisuddhaa paramaanuttaraa su~n~nataavakkanti bhavati.

[03] 184^b^.^eb^ ``yepi hi keci, aananda, atiitamaddhaana.m sama.naa vaa braahma.naa ^a^T3.0233^ea^ vaa parisuddha.m paramaanuttara.m su~n~nata.m upasampajja vihari.msu, sabbe te ima.myeva parisuddha.m paramaanuttara.m su~n~nata.m upasampajja vihari.msu. yepi {ye (sii0 pii0)} hi keci, aananda, anaagatamaddhaana.m sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa parisuddha.m paramaanuttara.m su~n~nata.m upasampajja viharissanti, sabbe te ima.myeva parisuddha.m paramaanuttara.m su~n~nata.m upasampajja viharissanti. yepi {ye (sii0 pii0)} hi keci, aananda, etarahi sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa parisuddha.m paramaanuttara.m su~n~nata.m upasampajja viharanti, sabbe te ima.myeva parisuddha.m paramaanuttara.m su~n~nata.m upasampajja viharanti. tasmaatiha, aananda, `parisuddha.m paramaanuttara.m su~n~nata.m upasampajja viharissaamaa'ti {viharissaamiiti (pii0 ka0)} -- eva~nhi vo {te (ka0)}, aananda, sikkhitabba''nti.
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamano aayasmaa aanando bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandiiti.
[06] cuu.lasu~n~natasutta.m ni.t.thita.m pa.thama.m.

[03] 185^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T3.0234^ea^ ^a^V3.0153^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmi.m nigrodhaaraame. atha kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya kapilavatthu.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. kapilavatthusmi.m pi.n.daaya caritvaa pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto yena kaa.lakhemakassa sakkassa vihaaro tenupasa"nkami divaavihaaraaya. tena kho pana samayena kaa.lakhemakassa ^a^M3.0152^ea^ sakkassa vihaare sambahulaani senaasanaani pa~n~nattaani honti. addasaa kho bhagavaa kaa.lakhemakassa sakkassa vihaare sambahulaani senaasanaani ^a^P3.0110^ea^ pa~n~nattaani. disvaana bhagavato etadahosi -- ``sambahulaani kho kaa.lakhemakassa sakkassa vihaare senaasanaani pa~n~nattaani. sambahulaa nu kho idha bhikkhuu viharantii''ti.

[03] 186^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa aanando sambahulehi bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m gha.taaya sakkassa vihaare ciivarakamma.m karoti. atha kho bhagavaa saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito yena gha.taaya sakkassa vihaaro tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. nisajja kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantesi -- ``sambahulaani kho, aananda, kaa.lakhemakassa ^a^T3.0235^ea^ sakkassa vihaare senaasanaani pa~n~nattaani. sambahulaa nu kho ettha bhikkhuu viharantii''ti? ``sambahulaani, bhante, kaa.lakhemakassa sakkassa vihaare senaasanaani pa~n~nattaani. sambahulaa bhikkhuu ettha viharanti. ciivarakaarasamayo no, bhante, vattatii''ti.

[03] ``na kho, aananda, bhikkhu sobhati sa"nga.nikaaraamo sa"nga.nikarato sa"nga.nikaaraamata.m anuyutto ga.naaraamo ga.narato ga.nasammudito. so vataananda, bhikkhu sa"nga.nikaaraamo sa"nga.nikarato sa"nga.nikaaraamata.m anuyutto ga.naaraamo ga.narato ga.nasammudito ya.m ta.m nekkhammasukha.m pavivekasukha.m upasamasukha.m sambodhisukha.m {sambodhasukha.m (sii0 pii0), sambodhasukha.m cittekaggataasukha.m (ka0) upari ara.navibha"ngasutte pana sambodhisukhantveva dissati} tassa sukhassa nikaamalaabhii bhavissati akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhiiti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. yo ca kho so, aananda, bhikkhu eko ga.nasmaa vuupaka.t.tho viharati tasseta.m bhikkhuno paa.tika"nkha.m ya.m ta.m nekkhammasukha.m pavivekasukha.m upasamasukha.m sambodhisukha.m ^a^V3.0154^ea^ tassa sukhassa nikaamalaabhii bhavissati akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhiiti -- .thaanameta.m vijjati.

[03] ``so vataananda, bhikkhu sa"nga.nikaaraamo sa"nga.nikarato sa"nga.nikaaraamata.m anuyutto ga.naaraamo ga.narato ga.nasammudito saamaayika.m vaa kanta.m cetovimutti.m upasampajja viharissati asaamaayika.m vaa akuppanti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. yo ca kho so, aananda, bhikkhu eko ga.nasmaa vuupaka.t.tho ^a^M3.0153^ea^ viharati tasseta.m bhikkhuno paa.tika"nkha.m saamaayika.m vaa kanta.m cetovimutti.m ^a^P3.0111^ea^ upasampajja viharissati asaamaayika.m vaa akuppanti -- .thaanameta.m vijjati.

[03] ``naaha.m, aananda, eka.m ruupampi {ekaruupampi (sii0)} samanupassaami yattha rattassa yathaabhiratassa ruupassa vipari.naama~n~nathaabhaavaa na uppajjeyyu.m sokaparidevadukkhadomanassuupaayaasaa.

[03] 187^b^.^eb^ ``aya.m ^a^T3.0236^ea^ kho panaananda, vihaaro tathaagatena abhisambuddho yadida.m -- sabbanimittaana.m amanasikaaraa ajjhatta.m su~n~nata.m upasampajja viharitu.m {viharata.m (ka0 sii0), viharati (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)}. tatra ce, aananda, tathaagata.m iminaa vihaarena viharanta.m bhavanti {bhagavanta.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} upasa"nkamitaaro bhikkhuu bhikkhuniyo upaasakaa upaasikaayo raajaano raajamahaamattaa titthiyaa titthiyasaavakaa. tatraananda, tathaagato vivekaninneneva cittena vivekapo.nena vivekapabbhaarena vuupaka.t.thena nekkhammaabhiratena byantiibhuutena sabbaso aasava.t.thaaniiyehi dhammehi a~n~nadatthu uyyojanikapa.tisa.myutta.myeva katha.m kattaa hoti. tasmaatihaananda, bhikkhu cepi aaka"nkheyya -- `ajjhatta.m su~n~nata.m upasampajja vihareyya'nti, tenaananda, bhikkhunaa ajjhattameva citta.m sa.n.thapetabba.m sannisaadetabba.m ekodi kaatabba.m samaadahaatabba.m.

[03] 188^b^.^eb^ ``katha~ncaananda, bhikkhu ajjhattameva citta.m sa.n.thapeti sannisaadeti ekodi.m karoti {ekodikaroti (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} samaadahati? idhaananda, bhikkhu vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi...pe0... pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati...pe0... dutiya.m jhaana.m... tatiya.m jhaana.m... catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. eva.m kho, aananda, bhikkhu ajjhattameva citta.m sa.n.thapeti sannisaadeti ekodi.m karoti samaadahati. so ^a^P3.0112^ea^ ajjhatta.m su~n~nata.m manasi karoti. tassa ajjhatta.m su~n~nata.m manasikaroto su~n~nataaya citta.m na pakkhandati nappasiidati na santi.t.thati na vimuccati ^a^V3.0155^ea^. eva.m santameta.m, aananda, bhikkhu eva.m pajaanaati -- `ajjhatta.m ^a^T3.0237^ea^ su~n~nata.m kho me manasikaroto ajjhatta.m su~n~nataaya citta.m na pakkhandati nappasiidati na santi.t.thati na vimuccatii'ti. itiha tattha sampajaano hoti. so bahiddhaa su~n~nata.m manasi karoti...pe0... so ajjhattabahiddhaa su~n~nata.m manasi karoti ^a^M3.0154^ea^ ...pe0... so aane~nja.m manasi karoti. tassa aane~nja.m manasikaroto aane~njaaya citta.m na pakkhandati nappasiidati na santi.t.thati na vimuccati. eva.m santameta.m, aananda, bhikkhu eva.m pajaanaati -- `aane~nja.m kho me manasikaroto aane~njaaya citta.m na pakkhandati nappasiidati na santi.t.thati na vimuccatii'ti. itiha tattha sampajaano hoti.

[03] ``tenaananda, bhikkhunaa tasmi.myeva purimasmi.m samaadhinimitte ajjhattameva citta.m sa.n.thapetabba.m sannisaadetabba.m ekodi kaatabba.m samaadahaatabba.m. so ajjhatta.m su~n~nata.m manasi karoti. tassa ajjhatta.m su~n~nata.m manasikaroto ajjhatta.m su~n~nataaya citta.m pakkhandati pasiidati santi.t.thati vimuccati. eva.m santameta.m, aananda, bhikkhu eva.m pajaanaati -- `ajjhatta.m su~n~nata.m kho me manasikaroto ajjhatta.m su~n~nataaya citta.m pakkhandati pasiidati santi.t.thati vimuccatii'ti. itiha tattha sampajaano hoti. so bahiddhaa su~n~nata.m manasi karoti...pe0... so ajjhattabahiddhaa su~n~nata.m manasi karoti...pe0... so aane~nja.m manasi karoti. tassa aane~nja.m manasikaroto aane~njaaya citta.m pakkhandati pasiidati santi.t.thati vimuccati. eva.m santameta.m, aananda, bhikkhu eva.m pajaanaati -- `aane~nja.m kho me ^a^T3.0238^ea^ manasikaroto aane~njaaya citta.m pakkhandati pasiidati santi.t.thati vimuccatii'ti. itiha tattha sampajaano hoti.

[03] 189^b^.^eb^ ``tassa ce, aananda, bhikkhuno iminaa vihaarena viharato ca"nkamaaya citta.m namati, so ca"nkamati -- `eva.m ma.m ca"nkamanta.m naabhijjhaadomanassaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa anvaassavissantii'ti ^a^P3.0113^ea^. itiha tattha sampajaano hoti. tassa ce, aananda, bhikkhuno iminaa vihaarena viharato .thaanaaya citta.m namati, so ti.t.thati -- `eva.m ma.m .thita.m naabhijjhaadomanassaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa anvaassavissantii'ti. itiha tattha sampajaano hoti. tassa ce, aananda, bhikkhuno iminaa vihaarena viharato nisajjaaya citta.m namati, so nisiidati -- `eva.m ma.m nisinna.m naabhijjhaadomanassaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa anvaassavissantii'ti. itiha tattha sampajaano hoti. tassa ce, aananda, bhikkhuno iminaa vihaarena viharato sayanaaya citta.m namati ^a^V3.0156^ea^, so sayati -- `eva.m ma.m sayanta.m naabhijjhaadomanassaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa anvaassavissantii'ti. itiha tattha sampajaano hoti.

[03] ``tassa ^a^M3.0155^ea^ ce, aananda, bhikkhuno iminaa vihaarena viharato kathaaya {bhassaaya (sii0), bhaasaaya (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} citta.m namati, so -- `yaaya.m kathaa hiinaa gammaa pothujjanikaa anariyaa anatthasa.mhitaa na nibbidaaya na viraagaaya na nirodhaaya na upasamaaya na abhi~n~naaya na sambodhaaya na nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati, seyyathida.m -- raajakathaa corakathaa mahaamattakathaa senaakathaa bhayakathaa yuddhakathaa ^a^T3.0239^ea^ annakathaa paanakathaa vatthakathaa sayanakathaa maalaakathaa gandhakathaa ~naatikathaa yaanakathaa gaamakathaa nigamakathaa nagarakathaa janapadakathaa itthikathaa suraakathaa visikhaakathaa kumbha.t.thaanakathaa pubbapetakathaa naanattakathaa lokakkhaayikaa samuddakkhaayikaa itibhavaabhavakathaa iti vaa iti -- evaruupi.m katha.m na kathessaamii'ti. itiha tattha sampajaano hoti. yaa ca kho aya.m, aananda, kathaa abhisallekhikaa cetoviniivara.nasappaayaa {cetovicaara.nasappaayaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0), cetovivara.nasappaayaa (pii0)} ekantanibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya upasamaaya abhi~n~naaya sambodhaaya nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati, seyyathida.m -- appicchakathaa santu.t.thikathaa pavivekakathaa asa.msaggakathaa viiriyaarambhakathaa siilakathaa samaadhikathaa pa~n~naakathaa vimuttikathaa vimutti~naa.nadassanakathaa iti -- `evaruupi.m katha.m kathessaamii'ti. itiha tattha sampajaano hoti.

[03] ``tassa ce, aananda, bhikkhuno iminaa vihaarena viharato vitakkaaya ^a^P3.0114^ea^ citta.m namati, so -- `ye te vitakkaa hiinaa gammaa pothujjanikaa anariyaa anatthasa.mhitaa na nibbidaaya na viraagaaya na nirodhaaya na upasamaaya na abhi~n~naaya na sambodhaaya na nibbaanaaya sa.mvattanti, seyyathida.m -- kaamavitakko byaapaadavitakko vihi.msaavitakko iti evaruupe vitakke {evaruupena vitakkena (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} na vitakkessaamii'ti. itiha tattha sampajaano hoti. ye ca kho ime, aananda, vitakkaa ariyaa niyyaanikaa niyyanti takkarassa sammaadukkhakkhayaaya, seyyathida.m -- nekkhammavitakko abyaapaadavitakko avihi.msaavitakko iti -- `evaruupe vitakke {evaruupena vitakkena (ka0)} vitakkessaamii'ti. itiha tattha sampajaano hoti.

[03] 190^b^.^eb^ ``pa~nca ^a^T3.0240^ea^ kho ime, aananda, kaamagu.naa. katame pa~nca? cakkhuvi~n~neyyaa ruupaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa, sotavi~n~neyyaa ^a^M3.0156^ea^ saddaa... ghaanavi~n~neyyaa gandhaa... jivhaavi~n~neyyaa rasaa... kaayavi~n~neyyaa pho.t.thabbaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa ^a^V3.0157^ea^ rajaniiyaa -- ime kho, aananda, pa~nca kaamagu.naa yattha bhikkhunaa abhikkha.na.m saka.m citta.m paccavekkhitabba.m -- `atthi nu kho me imesu pa~ncasu kaamagu.nesu a~n~natarasmi.m vaa a~n~natarasmi.m vaa aayatane uppajjati cetaso samudaacaaro'ti? sace, aananda, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m pajaanaati -- `atthi kho me imesu pa~ncasu kaamagu.nesu a~n~natarasmi.m vaa a~n~natarasmi.m vaa aayatane uppajjati cetaso samudaacaaro'ti, eva.m santameta.m {eva.m santa.m (a.t.tha0)}, aananda, bhikkhu eva.m pajaanaati -- `yo kho imesu pa~ncasu kaamagu.nesu chandaraago so me nappahiino'ti. itiha tattha sampajaano hoti. sace panaananda, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m pajaanaati -- `natthi kho me imesu pa~ncasu kaamagu.nesu a~n~natarasmi.m vaa a~n~natarasmi.m vaa aayatane uppajjati cetaso samudaacaaro'ti, eva.m santameta.m, aananda, bhikkhu eva.m pajaanaati -- `yo kho imesu pa~ncasu kaamagu.nesu chandaraago so me pahiino'ti. itiha tattha sampajaano hoti.

[03] 191^b^.^eb^ ``pa~nca kho ime, aananda, upaadaanakkhandhaa yattha bhikkhunaa udayabbayaanupassinaa vihaatabba.m -- `iti ruupa.m iti ruupassa samudayo ^a^T3.0241^ea^ iti ruupassa attha"ngamo, iti vedanaa... ^a^P3.0115^ea^ iti sa~n~naa... iti sa"nkhaaraa... iti vi~n~naa.na.m iti vi~n~naa.nassa samudayo iti vi~n~naa.nassa attha"ngamo'ti. tassa imesu pa~ncasu upaadaanakkhandhesu udayabbayaanupassino viharato yo pa~ncasu upaadaanakkhandhesu asmimaano so pahiiyati. eva.m santameta.m, aananda, bhikkhu eva.m pajaanaati -- `yo kho imesu pa~ncasu upaadaanakkhandhesu asmimaano so me pahiino'ti. itiha tattha sampajaano hoti. ime kho te, aananda, dhammaa ekantakusalaa kusalaayaatikaa {dhammaa ekantakusalaayatikaa (sabbattha) a.t.thakathaa.tiikaa oloketabbaa} ariyaa lokuttaraa anavakkantaa paapimataa. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, aananda, ka.m atthavasa.m sampassamaano arahati saavako satthaara.m anubandhitu.m api pa.nujjamaano''ti {api panujjamaanopiiti (ka0 sii0), api payujjamaanoti (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}? ``bhagava.mmuulakaa no, bhante, dhammaa bhagava.mnettikaa bhagava.mpa.tisara.naa ^a^M3.0157^ea^. saadhu vata, bhante, bhagavanta.myeva pa.tibhaatu etassa bhaasitassa attho. bhagavato sutvaa bhikkhuu dhaaressantii''ti.

[03] 192^b^.^eb^ ``na kho, aananda, arahati saavako satthaara.m anubandhitu.m, yadida.m sutta.m geyya.m veyyaakara.na.m tassa hetu {veyyaakara.nassa hetu (ka0)}. ta.m kissa hetu? diigharattassa {diigharatta.m + assaati padacchedo} hi te, aananda, dhammaa sutaa dhaataa vacasaa paricitaa manasaanupekkhitaa di.t.thiyaa suppa.tividdhaa. yaa ca kho aya.m, aananda, kathaa abhisallekhikaa cetoviniivara.nasappaayaa ekantanibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya upasamaa abhi~n~naaya sambodhaaya ^a^V3.0158^ea^ nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati, seyyathida.m -- appicchakathaa santu.t.thikathaa pavivekakathaa asa.msaggakathaa viiriyaarambhakathaa siilakathaa samaadhikathaa ^a^T3.0242^ea^ pa~n~naakathaa vimuttikathaa vimutti~naa.nadassanakathaa -- evaruupiyaa kho, aananda, kathaaya hetu arahati saavako satthaara.m anubandhitu.m api pa.nujjamaano.
[03] ``eva.m sante kho, aananda, aacariyuupaddavo hoti, eva.m sante antevaasuupaddavo hoti, eva.m sante brahmacaaruupaddavo hoti.

[03] 193^b^.^eb^ ``katha~ncaananda, aacariyuupaddavo hoti? idhaananda, ekacco satthaa vivitta.m senaasana.m bhajati ara~n~na.m rukkhamuula.m pabbata.m kandara.m giriguha.m susaana.m vanapattha.m ^a^P3.0116^ea^ abbhokaasa.m palaalapu~nja.m. tassa tathaavuupaka.t.thassa viharato anvaavattanti {anvaava.t.tanti (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} braahma.nagahapatikaa negamaa ceva jaanapadaa ca. so anvaavattantesu braahma.nagahapatikesu negamesu ceva jaanapadesu ca muccha.m nikaamayati {mucchati kaamayati (sii0 pii0) a.t.thakathaaya.m pana na tathaa dissati}, gedha.m aapajjati, aavattati baahullaaya. aya.m vuccataananda, upaddavo {upadduto (sii0 pii0)} aacariyo. aacariyuupaddavena avadhi.msu na.m paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa sa.mkilesikaa ponobbhavikaa {ponobhavikaa (sii0 pii0)} sadaraa dukkhavipaakaa aayati.m jaatijaraamara.niyaa. eva.m kho, aananda, aacariyuupaddavo hoti.

[03] 194^b^.^eb^ ``katha~ncaananda, antevaasuupaddavo hoti? tasseva kho panaananda, satthu saavako tassa satthu vivekamanubruuhayamaano vivitta.m senaasana.m bhajati ^a^M3.0158^ea^ ara~n~na.m rukkhamuula.m pabbata.m kandara.m giriguha.m susaana.m vanapattha.m abbhokaasa.m palaalapu~nja.m. tassa tathaavuupaka.t.thassa viharato anvaavattanti braahma.nagahapatikaa negamaa ceva jaanapadaa ca. so anvaavattantesu ^a^T3.0243^ea^ braahma.nagahapatikesu negamesu ceva jaanapadesu ca muccha.m nikaamayati, gedha.m aapajjati, aavattati baahullaaya. aya.m vuccataananda, upaddavo antevaasii. antevaasuupaddavena avadhi.msu na.m paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa sa.mkilesikaa ponobbhavikaa sadaraa dukkhavipaakaa aayati.m jaatijaraamara.niyaa. eva.m kho, aananda, antevaasuupaddavo hoti.

[03] 195^b^.^eb^ ``katha~ncaananda, brahmacaaruupaddavo hoti? idhaananda, tathaagato loke uppajjati araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu anuttaro purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m ^a^V3.0159^ea^ buddho bhagavaa. so vivitta.m senaasana.m bhajati ara~n~na.m rukkhamuula.m pabbata.m kandara.m giriguha.m susaana.m vanapattha.m abbhokaasa.m palaalapu~nja.m. tassa tathaavuupaka.t.thassa viharato anvaavattanti braahma.nagahapatikaa negamaa ceva jaanapadaa ca. so anvaavattantesu braahma.nagahapatikesu negamesu ceva jaanapadesu ca na muccha.m nikaamayati, na gedha.m aapajjati, na aavattati ^a^P3.0117^ea^ baahullaaya. tasseva kho panaananda, satthu saavako tassa satthu vivekamanubruuhayamaano vivitta.m senaasana.m bhajati ara~n~na.m rukkhamuula.m pabbata.m kandara.m giriguha.m susaana.m vanapattha.m abbhokaasa.m palaalapu~nja.m. tassa tathaavuupaka.t.thassa viharato anvaavattanti braahma.nagahapatikaa negamaa ceva jaanapadaa ca. so anvaavattantesu braahma.nagahapatikesu negamesu ceva jaanapadesu ca muccha.m nikaamayati, gedha.m ^a^T3.0244^ea^ aapajjati, aavattati baahullaaya. aya.m vuccataananda, upaddavo brahmacaarii. brahmacaaruupaddavena avadhi.msu na.m paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa sa.mkilesikaa ponobbhavikaa sadaraa dukkhavipaakaa aayati.m jaatijaraamara.niyaa. eva.m kho, aananda, brahmacaaruupaddavo hoti.
[03] ``tatraananda, yo cevaaya.m aacariyuupaddavo, yo ca antevaasuupaddavo aya.m tehi brahmacaaruupaddavo dukkhavipaakataro ceva ka.tukavipaakataro ca, api ca vinipaataaya sa.mvattati.
[03] 196^b^.^eb^ ``tasmaatiha ma.m, aananda, mittavataaya samudaacaratha, maa sapattavataaya. ta.m vo bhavissati diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaaya.

[03] ``katha~ncaananda ^a^M3.0159^ea^, satthaara.m saavakaa sapattavataaya samudaacaranti, no mittavataaya? idhaananda, satthaa saavakaana.m dhamma.m deseti anukampako hitesii anukampa.m upaadaaya -- `ida.m vo hitaaya, ida.m vo sukhaayaa'ti. tassa saavakaa na sussuusanti, na sota.m odahanti, na a~n~naa citta.m ^a^T3.0245^ea^ upa.t.thapenti, vokkamma ca satthusaasanaa vattanti. eva.m kho, aananda, satthaara.m saavakaa sapattavataaya samudaacaranti, no mittavataaya.

[03] ``katha~ncaananda, satthaara.m saavakaa mittavataaya samudaacaranti, no sapattavataaya? idhaananda, satthaa saavakaana.m dhamma.m deseti anukampako hitesii anukampa.m upaadaaya -- `ida.m vo hitaaya, ida.m vo sukhaayaa'ti. tassa saavakaa sussuusanti, sota.m odahanti, a~n~naa citta.m upa.t.thapenti, na ^a^V3.0160^ea^ ca vokkama satthusaasanaa vattanti. eva.m kho, aananda, satthaara.m saavakaa mittavataaya samudaacaranti, no sapattavataaya.

[03] ``tasmaatiha ^a^P3.0118^ea^ ma.m, aananda, mittavataaya samudaacaratha, maa sapattavataaya. ta.m vo bhavissati diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaaya. na vo aha.m, aananda, tathaa parakkamissaami yathaa kumbhakaaro aamake aamakamatte. niggayha niggayhaaha.m, aananda, vakkhaami; pavayha pavayha, aananda, vakkhaami {pavayha pavayha (sii0 pii0), paggayha paggayha aananda vakkhaami (ka0)}. yo saaro so .thassatii''ti.
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamano aayasmaa aanando bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandiiti.
[06] mahaasu~n~natasutta.m ni.t.thita.m dutiya.m.

[03] 197^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T3.0246^ea^ ^a^V3.0161^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. atha kho sambahulaana.m bhikkhuuna.m pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkantaana.m upa.t.thaanasaalaaya.m sannisinnaana.m sannipatitaana.m ayamantaraakathaa udapaadi -- ``acchariya.m, aavuso, abbhuta.m, aavuso, tathaagatassa mahiddhikataa mahaanubhaavataa, yatra hi naama tathaagato ^a^M3.0160^ea^ atiite buddhe parinibbute chinnapapa~nce chinnava.tume pariyaadinnava.t.te sabbadukkhaviitivatte jaanissati {anussarissati jaanissati (ka0)} -- `eva.mjaccaa te bhagavanto ahesu.m' itipi, `eva.mnaamaa te bhagavanto ahesu.m' itipi, `eva.mgottaa te bhagavanto ahesu.m' itipi, `eva.msiilaa te bhagavanto ahesu.m' itipi, `eva.mdhammaa te bhagavanto ahesu.m' itipi, `eva.mpa~n~naa te bhagavanto ahesu.m' itipi, `eva.mvihaarii te bhagavanto ahesu.m' itipi, `eva.mvimuttaa te bhagavanto ahesu.m' itipii''ti! eva.m vutte, aayasmaa aanando te bhikkhuu etadavoca -- ``acchariyaa ceva, aavuso, tathaagataa acchariyadhammasamannaagataa ca; abbhutaa ceva, aavuso, tathaagataa abbhutadhammasamannaagataa caa''ti. aya~nca ^a^P3.0119^ea^ hida.m tesa.m bhikkhuuna.m antaraakathaa vippakataa hoti.

[03] 198^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito yenupa.t.thaanasaalaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi ^a^T3.0247^ea^. nisajja kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``kaaya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathaaya sannisinnaa, kaa ca pana vo antaraakathaa vippakataa''ti? ``idha, bhante, amhaaka.m pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkantaana.m upa.t.thaanasaalaaya.m sannisinnaana.m sannipatitaana.m ayamantaraakathaa udapaadi -- `acchariya.m, aavuso, abbhuta.m, aavuso, tathaagatassa mahiddhikataa mahaanubhaavataa, yatra hi naama tathaagato atiite buddhe parinibbute chinnapapa~nce chinnava.tume pariyaadinnava.t.te sabbadukkhaviitivatte jaanissati -- eva.mjaccaa te bhagavanto ahesu.m itipi, eva.mnaamaa... eva.mgottaa... eva.msiilaa... eva.mdhammaa.. eva.mpa~n~naa... eva.mvihaarii... eva.mvimuttaa te bhagavanto ahesu.m itipii'ti! eva.m vutte, bhante, aayasmaa aanando amhe etadavoca -- `acchariyaa ceva, aavuso, tathaagataa acchariyadhammasamannaagataa ca, abbhutaa ^a^V3.0162^ea^ ceva, aavuso, tathaagataa abbhutadhammasamannaagataa caa'ti. aya.m kho no, bhante, antaraakathaa vippakataa; atha bhagavaa anuppatto''ti.
[03] 199^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantesi -- ``tasmaatiha ta.m, aananda, bhiyyosomattaaya pa.tibhantu tathaagatassa acchariyaa abbhutadhammaa''ti {abbhutaa dhammaati (?)}.

[03] ``sammukhaa ^a^M3.0161^ea^ meta.m, bhante, bhagavato suta.m, sammukhaa pa.tiggahita.m -- `sato sampajaano, aananda, bodhisatto tusita.m kaaya.m upapajjii'ti. yampi, bhante, sato sampajaano bodhisatto tusita.m kaaya.m upapajji ida.mpaaha.m ^a^T3.0248^ea^, bhante, bhagavato acchariya.m abbhutadhamma.m dhaaremi.

[03] ``sammukhaa meta.m, bhante, bhagavato suta.m, sammukhaa pa.tiggahita.m -- `sato sampajaano, aananda, bodhisatto tusite kaaye a.t.thaasii'ti. yampi, bhante, sato sampajaano bodhisatto tusite kaaye a.t.thaasi ida.mpaaha.m {ida.mpaha.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}, bhante, bhagavato acchariya.m abbhutadhamma.m dhaaremi.

[03] 200^b^.^eb^ ``sammukhaa meta.m, bhante, bhagavato suta.m, sammukhaa pa.tiggahita.m -- `yaavataayuka.m, aananda, bodhisatto tusite kaaye a.t.thaasii'ti. yampi, bhante, yaavataayuka.m bodhisatto tusite kaaye a.t.thaasi ida.mpaaha.m, bhante, bhagavato acchariya.m abbhutadhamma.m dhaaremi.

[03] ``sammukhaa meta.m, bhante, bhagavato suta.m, sammukhaa pa.tiggahita.m -- `sato sampajaano, aananda, bodhisatto tusitaa, kaayaa cavitvaa maatukucchi.m okkamii'ti. yampi, bhante ^a^P3.0120^ea^, sato sampajaano bodhisatto tusitaa kaayaa cavitvaa maatukucchi.m okkami ida.mpaaha.m, bhante, bhagavato acchariya.m abbhutadhamma.m dhaaremi.

[03] 201^b^.^eb^ ``sammukhaa meta.m, bhante, bhagavato suta.m, sammukhaa pa.tiggahita.m -- `yadaa, aananda, bodhisatto tusitaa kaayaa cavitvaa maatukucchi.m okkamati, atha sadevake loke samaarake sabrahmake sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya appamaa.no u.laaro obhaaso loke paatubhavati atikkammeva devaana.m devaanubhaava.m. yaapi taa lokantarikaa aghaa asa.mvutaa andhakaaraa andhakaaratimisaa, yatthapime candimasuuriyaa eva.mmahiddhikaa eva.mmahaanubhaavaa ^a^T3.0249^ea^ aabhaaya naanubhonti ^a^V3.0163^ea^ tatthapi appamaa.no u.laaro obhaaso loke paatubhavati atikkammeva devaana.m devaanubhaava.m. yepi tattha sattaa upapannaa tepi tenobhaasena a~n~nama~n~na.m sa~njaananti -- a~n~nepi kira, bho, santi sattaa idhuupapannaati. aya~nca dasasahassii lokadhaatu sa"nkampati sampakampati sampavedhati ^a^M3.0162^ea^ appamaa.no ca u.laaro obhaaso loke paatubhavati atikkammeva devaana.m devaanubhaava'nti. yampi, bhante...pe0... ida.mpaaha.m, bhante, bhagavato acchariya.m abbhutadhamma.m dhaaremi.

[03] 202^b^.^eb^ ``sammukhaa meta.m, bhante, bhagavato suta.m, sammukhaa pa.tiggahita.m -- `yadaa, aananda, bodhisatto maatukucchi.m okkanto hoti, cattaaro devaputtaa catuddisa.m aarakkhaaya upagacchanti -- maa na.m bodhisatta.m vaa bodhisattamaatara.m vaa manusso vaa amanusso vaa koci vaa vihe.thesii'ti. yampi, bhante...pe0... ida.mpaaha.m, bhante, bhagavato acchariya.m abbhutadhamma.m dhaaremi.

[03] 203^b^.^eb^ ``sammukhaa meta.m, bhante, bhagavato suta.m, sammukhaa pa.tiggahita.m -- `yadaa, aananda, bodhisatto maatukucchi.m okkanto hoti, pakatiyaa siilavatii bodhisattamaataa hoti virataa paa.naatipaataa virataa adinnaadaanaa virataa kaamesumicchaacaaraa virataa musaavaadaa virataa suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaanaa'ti. yampi, bhante...pe0... ida.mpaaha.m, bhante, bhagavato acchariya.m abbhutadhamma.m dhaaremi.

[03] ``sammukhaa ^a^P3.0121^ea^ meta.m, bhante, bhagavato suta.m, sammukhaa pa.tiggahita.m -- `yadaa ^a^T3.0250^ea^, aananda, bodhisatto maatukucchi.m okkanto hoti, na bodhisattamaatu purisesu maanasa.m uppajjati kaamagu.nuupasa.mhita.m, anatikkamaniiyaa ca bodhisattamaataa hoti kenaci purisena rattacittenaa'ti. yampi, bhante...pe0... ida.mpaaha.m, bhante, bhagavato acchariya.m abbhutadhamma.m dhaaremi.

[03] ``sammukhaa meta.m, bhante, bhagavato suta.m, sammukhaa pa.tiggahita.m -- `yadaa, aananda, bodhisatto maatukucchi.m okkanto hoti, laabhinii bodhisattamaataa hoti pa~ncanna.m kaamagu.naana.m. saa pa~ncahi kaamagu.nehi samappitaa sama"ngiibhuutaa paricaaretii'ti. yampi, bhante...pe0... ida.mpaaha.m, bhante, bhagavato acchariya.m abbhutadhamma.m dhaaremi.

[03] 204^b^.^eb^ ``sammukhaa ^a^V3.0164^ea^ meta.m, bhante, bhagavato suta.m, sammukhaa pa.tiggahita.m -- `yadaa, aananda, bodhisatto maatukucchi.m okkanto hoti, na bodhisattamaatu kocideva aabaadho uppajjati; sukhinii bodhisattamaataa hoti akilantakaayaa; bodhisatta~nca bodhisattamaataa tirokucchigata.m ^a^M3.0163^ea^ passati sabba"ngapacca"nga.m ahiinindriya.m. seyyathaapi, aananda, ma.ni ve.luriyo subho jaatimaa a.t.tha.mso suparikammakato. tatraassa sutta.m aavuta.m niila.m vaa piita.m vaa lohita.m vaa odaata.m vaa pa.n.dusutta.m vaa. tamena.m cakkhumaa puriso hatthe karitvaa paccavekkheyya -- aya.m kho ma.ni ve.luriyo subho jaatimaa a.t.tha.mso suparikammakato, tatrida.m sutta.m aavuta.m niila.m vaa piita.m vaa lohita.m vaa odaata.m vaa pa.n.dusutta.m vaati. evameva kho, aananda, yadaa bodhisatto maatukucchi.m okkanto hoti ^a^T3.0251^ea^, na bodhisattamaatu kocideva aabaadho uppajjati; sukhinii bodhisattamaataa hoti akilantakaayaa; bodhisatta~nca bodhisattamaataa tirokucchigata.m passati sabba"ngapacca"nga.m ahiinindriya'nti. yampi, bhante...pe0... ida.mpaaha.m, bhante, bhagavato acchariya.m abbhutadhamma.m dhaaremi.

[03] 205^b^.^eb^ ``sammukhaa ^a^P3.0122^ea^ meta.m, bhante, bhagavato suta.m, sammukhaa pa.tiggahita.m -- `sattaahajaate, aananda, bodhisatte bodhisattamaataa kaala.m karoti, tusita.m kaaya.m upapajjatii'ti. yampi, bhante...pe0... ida.mpaaha.m, bhante, bhagavato acchariya.m abbhutadhamma.m dhaaremi.

[03] ``sammukhaa meta.m, bhante, bhagavato suta.m, sammukhaa pa.tiggahita.m -- `yathaa kho panaananda, a~n~naa itthikaa nava vaa dasa vaa maase gabbha.m kucchinaa pariharitvaa vijaayanti, na heva.m bodhisatta.m bodhisattamaataa vijaayati. daseva maasaani bodhisatta.m bodhisattamaataa kucchinaa pariharitvaa vijaayatii'ti. yampi, bhante...pe0... ida.mpaaha.m, bhante, bhagavato acchariya.m abbhutadhamma.m dhaaremi.

[03] ``sammukhaa meta.m, bhante, bhagavato suta.m, sammukhaa pa.tiggahita.m -- `yathaa kho panaananda, a~n~naa itthikaa nisinnaa vaa nipannaa vaa vijaayanti, na heva.m bodhisatta.m bodhisattamaataa vijaayati. .thitaava bodhisatta.m bodhisattamaataa vijaayatii'ti. yampi, bhante...pe0... ida.mpaaha.m, bhante, bhagavato acchariya.m abbhutadhamma.m dhaaremi.

[03] ``sammukhaa ^a^V3.0165^ea^ meta.m, bhante, bhagavato suta.m, sammukhaa pa.tiggahita.m -- `yadaa ^a^T3.0252^ea^, aananda, bodhisatto maatukucchimhaa nikkhamati, devaa na.m pa.thama.m pa.tigga.nhanti pacchaa manussaa'ti. yampi, bhante...pe0... ida.mpaaha.m, bhante, bhagavato acchariya.m abbhutadhamma.m dhaaremi.

[03] 206^b^.^eb^ ``sammukhaa ^a^M3.0164^ea^ meta.m, bhante, bhagavato suta.m, sammukhaa pa.tiggahita.m -- `yadaa, aananda, bodhisatto maatukucchimhaa nikkhamati, appattova bodhisatto pathavi.m hoti, cattaaro na.m devaputtaa pa.tiggahetvaa maatu purato .thapenti -- attamanaa, devi, hohi; mahesakkho te putto uppanno'ti. yampi, bhante...pe0... ida.mpaaha.m, bhante, bhagavato acchariya.m abbhutadhamma.m dhaaremi.

[03] ``sammukhaa meta.m, bhante, bhagavato suta.m, sammukhaa pa.tiggahita.m -- `yadaa, aananda, bodhisatto maatukucchimhaa nikkhamati, visadova nikkhamati amakkhito udena {uddena (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} amakkhito semhena amakkhito ruhirena amakkhito kenaci ^a^P3.0123^ea^ asucinaa suddho visado {visuddho (syaa0)}. seyyathaapi, aananda, ma.niratana.m kaasike vatthe nikkhitta.m neva ma.niratana.m kaasika.m vattha.m makkheti naapi kaasika.m vattha.m ma.niratana.m makkheti. ta.m kissa hetu? ubhinna.m suddhattaa. evameva kho, aananda, yadaa bodhisatto maatukucchimhaa nikkhamati, visadova nikkhamati amakkhito udena amakkhito semhena amakkhito ruhirena amakkhito kenaci asucinaa suddho visado'ti. yampi, bhante...pe0... ida.mpaaha.m, bhante, bhagavato acchariya.m abbhutadhamma.m dhaaremi.

[03] ``sammukhaa ^a^T3.0253^ea^ meta.m, bhante, bhagavato suta.m, sammukhaa pa.tiggahita.m -- `yadaa, aananda, bodhisatto maatukucchimhaa nikkhamati, dve udakassa dhaaraa antalikkhaa paatubhavanti -- ekaa siitassa, ekaa u.nhassa; yena bodhisattassa udakakicca.m karonti maatu caa'ti. yampi, bhante...pe0... ida.mpaaha.m, bhante, bhagavato acchariya.m abbhutadhamma.m dhaaremi.

[03] 207^b^.^eb^ ``sammukhaa ^a^M3.0165^ea^ meta.m, bhante, bhagavato suta.m, sammukhaa pa.tiggahita.m -- `sampatijaato, aananda, bodhisatto samehi paadehi pathaviya.m pati.t.thahitvaa uttaraabhimukho sattapadaviitihaarena gacchati, setamhi chatte anudhaariyamaane, sabbaa ca disaa viloketi, aasabhi~nca vaaca.m bhaasati -- aggohamasmi lokassa, je.t.thohamasmi lokassa, se.t.thohamasmi lokassa. ayamantimaa jaati ^a^V3.0166^ea^, natthi daani punabbhavo'ti. yampi, bhante...pe0... ida.mpaaha.m, bhante, bhagavato acchariya.m abbhutadhamma.m dhaaremi.

[03] ``sammukhaa meta.m, bhante, bhagavato suta.m, sammukhaa pa.tiggahita.m -- `yadaa, aananda, bodhisatto maatukucchimhaa nikkhamati, atha sadevake loke samaarake sabrahmake sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya appamaa.no u.laaro obhaaso loke paatubhavati atikkammeva devaana.m devaanubhaava.m. yaapi taa lokantarikaa aghaa asa.mvutaa andhakaaraa andhakaaratimisaa yatthapime candimasuuriyaa eva.mmahiddhikaa eva.mmahaanubhaavaa aabhaaya naanubhonti tatthapi ^a^P3.0124^ea^ appamaa.no u.laaro obhaaso loke paatubhavati atikkammeva devaana.m devaanubhaava.m. yepi tattha ^a^T3.0254^ea^ sattaa upapannaa tepi tenobhaasena a~n~nama~n~na.m sa~njaananti -- a~n~nepi kira, bho, santi sattaa idhuupapannaati. aya~nca dasasahassii lokadhaatu sa"nkampati sampakampati sampavedhati, appamaa.no ca u.laaro obhaaso loke paatubhavati atikkammeva devaana.m devaanubhaava'nti. yampi, bhante...pe0... ida.mpaaha.m, bhante, bhagavato acchariya.m abbhutadhamma.m dhaaremii''ti.

[03] 208^b^.^eb^ ``tasmaatiha tva.m, aananda, idampi tathaagatassa acchariya.m abbhutadhamma.m dhaarehi. idhaananda, tathaagatassa viditaa vedanaa uppajjanti, viditaa upa.t.thahanti, viditaa abbhattha.m gacchanti; viditaa sa~n~naa uppajjanti, viditaa upa.t.thahanti, viditaa abbhattha.m gacchanti; viditaa vitakkaa uppajjanti, viditaa upa.t.thahanti, viditaa abbhattha.m gacchanti. idampi kho, tva.m, aananda, tathaagatassa acchariya.m abbhutadhamma.m dhaarehii''ti. ``yampi, bhante, bhagavato viditaa vedanaa uppajjanti, viditaa upa.t.thahanti, viditaa abbhattha.m gacchanti; viditaa sa~n~naa... viditaa vitakkaa uppajjanti, viditaa upa.t.thahanti, viditaa abbhattha.m gacchanti. ida.mpaaha.m, bhante, bhagavato acchariya.m abbhutadhamma.m dhaaremii''ti.
[01] idamavoca aayasmaa aanando. samanu~n~no satthaa ahosi; attamanaa ca te bhikkhuu aayasmato aanandassa bhaasita.m abhinandunti.
[03] acchariyaabbhutasutta.m ni.t.thita.m tatiya.m.

[03] 209^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T3.0255^ea^ ^a^V3.0167^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m aayasmaa baakulo {bakkulo (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. atha kho acelakassapo aayasmato ^a^M3.0166^ea^ baakulassa puraa.nagihisahaayo yenaayasmaa ^a^P3.0125^ea^ baakulo tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmataa baakulena saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho acelakassapo aayasmanta.m baakula.m etadavoca --

[03] ``kiivacira.m pabbajitosi, aavuso baakulaa''ti? ``asiiti me, aavuso, vassaani pabbajitassaa''ti. ``imehi pana te, aavuso baakula, asiitiyaa vassehi katikkhattu.m methuno dhammo pa.tisevito''ti? ``na kho ma.m, aavuso kassapa, eva.m pucchitabba.m -- `imehi pana te, aavuso baakula, asiitiyaa vassehi katikkhattu.m methuno dhammo pa.tisevito'ti. eva~nca kho ma.m, aavuso kassapa, pucchitabba.m -- `imehi pana te, aavuso baakula, asiitiyaa vassehi katikkhattu.m kaamasa~n~naa uppannapubbaa'''ti? ( ) {(imehi pana te aavuso bakkula asiitiyo vassehi katikkhattu.m kaamasa~n~naa uppannapubbaati.) (sii0 pii0)}

[03] 210^b^.^eb^ ``asiiti me, aavuso ^a^T3.0256^ea^, vassaani pabbajitassa naabhijaanaami kaamasa~n~na.m uppannapubba.m. ya.mpaayasmaa baakulo asiitiyaa vassehi naabhijaanaati kaamasa~n~na.m uppannapubba.m idampi maya.m aayasmato baakulassa acchariya.m abbhutadhamma.m dhaarema.

[03] ``asiiti me, aavuso, vassaani pabbajitassa naabhijaanaami byaapaadasa~n~na.m...pe0... vihi.msaasa~n~na.m uppannapubba.m. ya.mpaayasmaa baakulo asiitiyaa vassehi naabhijaanaati vihi.msaasa~n~na.m uppannapubba.m, idampi maya.m aayasmato baakulassa acchariya.m abbhutadhamma.m dhaarema.

[03] ``asiiti me, aavuso, vassaani pabbajitassa naabhijaanaami kaamavitakka.m uppannapubba.m. ya.mpaayasmaa baakulo asiitiyaa vassehi naabhijaanaati kaamavitakka.m uppannapubba.m, idampi maya.m aayasmato baakulassa acchariya.m abbhutadhamma.m dhaarema.

[01] ``asiiti ^a^V3.0168^ea^ me, aavuso, vassaani pabbajitassa naabhijaanaami byaapaadavitakka.m...pe0... vihi.msaavitakka.m uppannapubba.m. ya.mpaayasmaa baakulo asiitiyaa vassehi ^a^M3.0167^ea^ naabhijaanaati vihi.msaavitakka.m uppannapubba.m, idampi maya.m aayasmato baakulassa acchariya.m abbhutadhamma.m dhaarema.

[03] 211^b^.^eb^ ``asiiti ^a^P3.0126^ea^ me, aavuso, vassaani pabbajitassa naabhijaanaami gahapaticiivara.m saaditaa. ya.mpaayasmaa baakulo asiitiyaa vassehi naabhijaanaati gahapaticiivara.m saaditaa, idampi maya.m aayasmato baakulassa acchariya.m abbhutadhamma.m dhaarema.
[03] ``asiiti me, aavuso, vassaani pabbajitassa naabhijaanaami satthena ciivara.m chinditaa. ya.mpaayasmaa baakulo asiitiyaa vassehi naabhijaanaati satthena ciivara.m chinditaa...pe0... dhaarema.

[01] ``asiiti me, aavuso, vassaani pabbajitassa naabhijaanaami suuciyaa ciivara.m sibbitaa...pe0... naabhijaanaami rajanena ciivara.m rajitaa... naabhijaanaami kathine {ka.thine (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} ciivara.m sibbitaa... naabhijaanaami sabrahmacaariina.m ciivarakamme vicaaritaa {sabrahmacaarii ciivarakamme byaapaaritaa (sii0 pii0)} ... naabhijaanaami nimantana.m saaditaa... naabhijaanaami evaruupa.m citta.m uppannapubba.m ^a^T3.0257^ea^ -- `aho vata ma.m koci nimanteyyaa'ti... naabhijaanaami antaraghare nisiiditaa... naabhijaanaami antaraghare bhu~njitaa... naabhijaanaami maatugaamassa anubya~njanaso nimitta.m gahetaa... naabhijaanaami maatugaamassa dhamma.m desitaa antamaso catuppadampi gaatha.m... naabhijaanaami bhikkhunupassaya.m upasa"nkamitaa... naabhijaanaami bhikkhuniyaa dhamma.m desitaa... naabhijaanaami sikkhamaanaaya dhamma.m desitaa... naabhijaanaami saama.neriyaa dhamma.m desitaa... naabhijaanaami pabbaajetaa... naabhijaanaami upasampaadetaa... naabhijaanaami nissaya.m daataa... naabhijaanaami saama.nera.m upa.t.thaapetaa... naabhijaanaami jantaaghare nhaayitaa... naabhijaanaami cu.n.nena nhaayitaa... naabhijaanaami sabrahmacaariigattaparikamme ^a^P3.0127^ea^ vicaaritaa {byaapaaritaa (sii0 pii0)} ... naabhijaanaami aabaadha.m uppannapubba.m, antamaso gadduuhanamattampi... naabhijaanaami bhesajja.m upaharitaa, antamaso haritakikha.n.dampi... naabhijaanaami apassenaka.m apassayitaa... naabhijaanaami seyya.m kappetaa. ya.mpaayasmaa...pe0... dhaarema.

[03] ``asiiti me, aavuso, vassaani pabbajitassa naabhijaanaami gaamantasenaasane vassa.m upagantaa ^a^V3.0169^ea^. ya.mpaayasmaa baakulo asiitiyaa vassehi ^a^M3.0168^ea^ naabhijaanaati gaamantasenaasane vassa.m upagantaa, idampi maya.m aayasmato baakulassa acchariya.m abbhutadhamma.m dhaarema.

[03] ``sattaahameva kho ^a^T3.0258^ea^ aha.m, aavuso, sara.no ra.t.thapi.n.da.m bhu~nji.m; atha a.t.thamiya.m a~n~naa udapaadi. ya.mpaayasmaa baakulo sattaahameva sara.no ra.t.thapi.n.da.m bhu~nji; atha a.t.thamiya.m a~n~naa udapaadi idampi maya.m aayasmato baakulassa acchariya.m abbhutadhamma.m dhaarema.

[03] 212^b^.^eb^ ``labheyyaaha.m, aavuso baakula, imasmi.m dhammavinaye pabbajja.m, labheyya.m upasampada''nti. alattha kho acelakassapo imasmi.m dhammavinaye pabbajja.m, alattha upasampada.m. aciruupasampanno panaayasmaa kassapo eko vuupaka.t.tho appamatto aataapii pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva -- yassatthaaya kulaputtaa sammadeva agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajanti tadanuttara.m -- brahmacariyapariyosaana.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihaasi. `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti abbha~n~naasi. a~n~nataro kho panaayasmaa kassapo arahata.m ahosi.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa baakulo aparena samayena avaapura.na.m {apaapura.na.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} aadaaya vihaarena vihaara.m upasa"nkamitvaa evamaaha -- ``abhikkamathaayasmanto, abhikkamathaayasmanto. ajja me parinibbaana.m bhavissatii''ti. ``ya.mpaayasmaa baakulo avaapura.na.m aadaaya vihaarena vihaara.m upasa"nkamitvaa evamaaha -- `abhikkamathaayasmanto, abhikkamathaayasmanto; ajja me parinibbaana.m bhavissatii'ti, idampi maya.m aayasmato baakulassa acchariya.m abbhutadhamma.m dhaarema''.

[03] aayasmaa ^a^T3.0259^ea^ ^a^P3.0128^ea^ baakulo majjhe bhikkhusa"nghassa nisinnakova parinibbaayi. ``ya.mpaayasmaa baakulo majjhe bhikkhusa"nghassa nisinnakova parinibbaayi, idampi maya.m aayasmato baakulassa acchariya.m abbhutadhamma.m dhaaremaa''ti.
[06] baakulasutta.m ni.t.thita.m catuttha.m.

[03] 213^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T3.0260^ea^ ^a^M3.0169^ea^ ^a^V3.0170^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. tena kho pana samayena aciravato sama.nuddeso ara~n~naku.tikaaya.m viharati. atha kho jayaseno raajakumaaro ja"nghaavihaara.m anuca"nkamamaano anuvicaramaano yena aciravato sama.nuddeso tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aciravatena sama.nuddesena saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho jayaseno raajakumaaro aciravata.m sama.nuddesa.m etadavoca --

[03] ``suta.m meta.m, bho aggivessana -- `idha bhikkhu appamatto aataapii pahitatto viharanto phuseyya cittassa ekaggata'nti. `evameta.m, raajakumaara, evameta.m, raajakumaara. idha bhikkhu appamatto aataapii pahitatto viharanto phuseyya cittassa ekaggata'nti. `saadhu me bhava.m aggivessano yathaasuta.m yathaapariyatta.m dhamma.m desetuu'ti. `na kho te aha.m, raajakumaara, sakkomi yathaasuta.m yathaapariyatta.m dhamma.m desetu.m. aha~nca hi te, raajakumaara, yathaasuta.m yathaapariyatta.m dhamma.m deseyya.m, tva~nca me bhaasitassa attha.m na aajaaneyyaasi; so mamassa kilamatho, saa mamassa vihesaa'ti. `desetu ^a^P3.0129^ea^ me bhava.m aggivessano yathaasuta.m yathaapariyatta.m dhamma.m. appevanaamaaha.m bhoto aggivessanassa ^a^T3.0261^ea^ bhaasitassa attha.m aajaaneyya'nti. `deseyya.m kho te aha.m, raajakumaara, yathaasuta.m yathaapariyatta.m dhamma.m. sace me tva.m bhaasitassa attha.m aajaaneyyaasi, icceta.m kusala.m; no ce me tva.m bhaasitassa attha.m aajaaneyyaasi, yathaasake ti.t.theyyaasi, na ma.m tattha uttari.m pa.tipuccheyyaasii'ti. `desetu me bhava.m aggivessano yathaasuta.m yathaapariyatta.m dhamma.m. sace aha.m bhoto aggivessanassa bhaasitassa attha.m aajaanissaami {aajaaneyyaami (ka0)}, icceta.m kusala.m; no ce aha.m bhoto aggivessanassa bhaasitassa attha.m aajaanissaami, yathaasake ti.t.thissaami {ti.t.theyyaami (ka0)}, naaha.m tattha bhavanta.m aggivessana.m uttari.m pa.tipucchissaamii'''ti.

[03] 214^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^M3.0170^ea^ kho aciravato sama.nuddeso jayasenassa raajakumaarassa yathaasuta.m yathaapariyatta.m dhamma.m desesi. eva.m vutte, jayaseno raajakumaaro aciravata.m sama.nuddesa.m etadavoca ^a^V3.0171^ea^ -- ``a.t.thaanameta.m, bho aggivessana, anavakaaso ya.m bhikkhu appamatto aataapii pahitatto viharanto phuseyya cittassa ekaggata''nti. atha kho jayaseno raajakumaaro aciravatassa sama.nuddesassa a.t.thaanata~nca anavakaasata~nca pavedetvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkaami.

[03] atha kho aciravato sama.nuddeso acirapakkante jayasene raajakumaare yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aciravato sama.nuddeso yaavatako ahosi jayasenena raajakumaarena saddhi.m kathaasallaapo ta.m sabba.m bhagavato aarocesi.

[03] eva.m ^a^T3.0262^ea^ vutte, bhagavaa aciravata.m sama.nuddesa.m etadavoca -- ``ta.m kutettha, aggivessana, labbhaa. ya.m ta.m nekkhammena ~naatabba.m nekkhammena da.t.thabba.m nekkhammena pattabba.m nekkhammena sacchikaatabba.m ta.m vata jayaseno raajakumaaro kaamamajjhe vasanto kaame paribhu~njanto kaamavitakkehi khajjamaano kaamapari.laahena pari.dayhamaano kaamapariyesanaaya ^a^P3.0130^ea^ ussuko {ussukko (sabbattha)} ~nassati vaa dakkhati vaa sacchi vaa karissatii''ti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati.

[03] 215^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapissu, aggivessana, dve hatthidammaa vaa assadammaa vaa godammaa vaa sudantaa suviniitaa, dve hatthidammaa vaa assadammaa vaa godammaa vaa adantaa aviniitaa. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, aggivessana, ye te dve hatthidammaa vaa assadammaa vaa godammaa vaa sudantaa suviniitaa, api nu te dantaava dantakaara.na.m gaccheyyu.m, dantaava dantabhuumi.m sampaapu.neyyu''nti? ``eva.m, bhante''. ``ye pana te dve hatthidammaa vaa assadammaa vaa godammaa vaa adantaa aviniitaa, api nu te adantaava dantakaara.na.m gaccheyyu.m, adantaava dantabhuumi.m sampaapu.neyyu.m, seyyathaapi te dve hatthidammaa vaa assadammaa vaa godammaa vaa sudantaa suviniitaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``evameva kho, aggivessana, ya.m ta.m nekkhammena ~naatabba.m nekkhammena da.t.thabba.m nekkhammena pattabba.m nekkhammena sacchikaatabba.m ta.m vata jayaseno raajakumaaro kaamamajjhe vasanto kaame ^a^M3.0171^ea^ paribhu~njanto ^a^T3.0263^ea^ kaamavitakkehi khajjamaano kaamapari.laahena pari.dayhamaano kaamapariyesanaaya ussuko ~nassati vaa dakkhati vaa sacchi vaa karissatii''ti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati.

[03] 216^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi ^a^V3.0172^ea^, aggivessana, gaamassa vaa nigamassa vaa aviduure mahaapabbato. tamena.m dve sahaayakaa tamhaa gaamaa vaa nigamaa vaa nikkhamitvaa hatthavila"nghakena yena so pabbato tenupasa"nkameyyu.m; upasa"nkamitvaa eko sahaayako he.t.thaa pabbatapaade ti.t.theyya, eko sahaayako uparipabbata.m aaroheyya. tamena.m he.t.thaa pabbatapaade .thito sahaayako uparipabbate .thita.m sahaayaka.m eva.m vedayya -- `ya.m, samma, ki.m tva.m passasi uparipabbate .thito'ti? so eva.m vadeyya -- `passaami kho aha.m, samma, uparipabbate .thito aaraamaraama.neyyaka.m vanaraama.neyyaka.m bhuumiraama.neyyaka.m pokkhara.niiraama.neyyaka'''nti.

[03] ``so eva.m vadeyya -- `a.t.thaana.m kho eta.m, samma ^a^P3.0131^ea^, anavakaaso ya.m tva.m uparipabbate .thito passeyyaasi aaraamaraama.neyyaka.m vanaraama.neyyaka.m bhuumiraama.neyyaka.m pokkhara.niiraama.neyyaka'nti. tamena.m uparipabbate .thito sahaayako he.t.thimapabbatapaada.m orohitvaa ta.m sahaayaka.m baahaaya.m gahetvaa uparipabbata.m aaropetvaa muhutta.m assaasetvaa eva.m vadeyya -- `ya.m, samma, ki.m tva.m passasi uparipabbate .thito'ti? so eva.m vadeyya -- `passaami kho aha.m, samma, uparipabbate .thito aaraamaraama.neyyaka.m vanaraama.neyyaka.m bhuumiraama.neyyaka.m pokkhara.niiraama.neyyaka'''nti ^a^T3.0264^ea^.

[03] ``so eva.m vadeyya -- `idaaneva kho te, samma, bhaasita.m -- maya.m eva.m aajaanaama -- a.t.thaana.m kho eta.m samma, anavakaaso ya.m tva.m uparipabbate .thito passeyyaasi aaraamaraama.neyyaka.m vanaraama.neyyaka.m bhuumiraama.neyyaka.m pokkhara.niiraama.neyyaka'nti. idaaneva ca pana te bhaasita.m maya.m eva.m aajaanaama -- `passaami kho aha.m, samma, uparipabbate .thito aaraamaraama.neyyaka.m vanaraama.neyyaka.m bhuumiraama.neyyaka.m pokkhara.niiraama.neyyaka'nti. so eva.m vadeyya -- `tathaa hi panaaha.m, samma, iminaa mahataa pabbatena aavuto {aava.to (sii0 a.t.tha0 pii0), aavu.to (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} da.t.theyya.m naaddasa'''nti.

[03] ``ato ^a^M3.0172^ea^ mahantatarena, aggivessana, avijjaakhandhena jayaseno raajakumaaro aavuto nivuto {nivu.to (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0)} ophu.to {ovuto (sii0), ovu.to (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} pariyonaddho. so vata ya.m ta.m nekkhammena ~naatabba.m nekkhammena da.t.thabba.m nekkhammena pattabba.m nekkhammena sacchikaatabba.m ta.m vata jayaseno raajakumaaro kaamamajjhe vasanto kaame paribhu~njanto kaamavitakkehi khajjamaano kaamapari.laahena pari.dayhamaano kaamapariyesanaaya ussuko ~nassati vaa dakkhati vaa sacchi vaa karissatiiti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati ^a^V3.0173^ea^. sace kho ta.m, aggivessana, jayasenassa raajakumaarassa imaa dve upamaa pa.tibhaayeyyu.m {pa.tibhaaseyyu.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}, anacchariya.m te jayaseno raajakumaaro pasiideyya, pasanno ca te pasannaakaara.m kareyyaa''ti. ``kuto pana ma.m, bhante, jayasenassa raajakumaarassa imaa dve upamaa pa.tibhaayissanti {pa.tibhaasissanti (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} anacchariyaa pubbe assutapubbaa, seyyathaapi ^a^T3.0265^ea^ bhagavanta''nti?

[03] 217^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi ^a^P3.0132^ea^, aggivessana, raajaa khattiyo muddhaavasitto naagavanika.m aamanteti -- `ehi tva.m, samma naagavanika, ra~n~no naaga.m abhiruhitvaa naagavana.m pavisitvaa aara~n~naka.m naaga.m atipassitvaa ra~n~no naagassa giivaaya.m upanibandhaahii'ti. `eva.m, devaa'ti kho, aggivessana, naagavaniko ra~n~no khattiyassa muddhaavasittassa pa.tissutvaa ra~n~no naaga.m abhiruhitvaa naagavana.m pavisitvaa aara~n~naka.m naaga.m atipassitvaa ra~n~no naagassa giivaaya.m upanibandhati. tamena.m ra~n~no naago abbhokaasa.m niiharati. ettaavataa kho, aggivessana, aara~n~nako naago abbhokaasa.m gato hoti. etthagedhaa {etagedhaa (sii0 pii0)} hi, aggivessana, aara~n~nakaa naagaa yadida.m -- naagavana.m. tamena.m naagavaniko ra~n~no khattiyassa muddhaavasittassa aarocesi -- `abbhokaasagato kho {kho te (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)}, deva, aara~n~nako naago'ti. atha kho aggivessana, tamena.m raajaa khattiyo muddhaavasitto hatthidamaka.m aamantesi -- `ehi tva.m, samma hatthidamaka, aara~n~naka.m naaga.m damayaahi aara~n~nakaana~nceva siilaana.m abhinimmadanaaya aara~n~nakaana~nceva sarasa"nkappaana.m abhinimmadanaaya aara~n~nakaana~nceva darathakilamathapari.laahaana.m abhinimmadanaaya gaamante abhiramaapanaaya manussakantesu siilesu samaadapanaayaa'''ti {samaadaapanaayaati (?)}.

[01] ```eva.m ^a^M3.0173^ea^, devaa'ti kho, aggivessana, hatthidamako ra~n~no khattiyassa muddhaavasittassa pa.tissutvaa mahanta.m thambha.m pathaviya.m nikha.nitvaa aara~n~nakassa naagassa giivaaya.m upanibandhati aara~n~nakaana~nceva ^a^T3.0266^ea^ siilaana.m abhinimmadanaaya aara~n~nakaana~nceva sarasa"nkappaana.m abhinimmadanaaya aara~n~nakaana~nceva darathakilamathapari.laahaana.m abhinimmadanaaya gaamante abhiramaapanaaya manussakantesu siilesu samaadapanaaya. tamena.m hatthidamako yaa saa vaacaa nelaa ka.n.nasukhaa pemaniiyaa hadaya"ngamaa porii bahujanakantaa bahujanamanaapaa tathaaruupaahi vaacaahi samudaacarati. yato kho, aggivessana, aara~n~nako naago hatthidamakassa yaa saa vaacaa nelaa ka.n.nasukhaa pemaniiyaa hadaya"ngamaa porii bahujanakantaa bahujanamanaapaa ^a^P3.0133^ea^ tathaaruupaahi vaacaahi samudaacariyamaano sussuusati, sota.m odahati, a~n~naa citta.m upa.t.thaapeti; tamena.m hatthidamako uttari ti.naghaasodaka.m anuppavecchati.

[03] ``yato ^a^V3.0174^ea^ kho, aggivessana, aara~n~nako naago hatthidamakassa ti.naghaasodaka.m pa.tigga.nhaati, tatra hatthidamakassa eva.m hoti -- `jiivissati kho {nu kho (sii0 ka0)} daani aara~n~nako {ra~n~no (sii0 pii0)} naago'ti. tamena.m hatthidamako uttari kaara.na.m kaareti -- `aadiya, bho, nikkhipa, bho'ti. yato kho, aggivessana, aara~n~nako naago hatthidamakassa aadaananikkhepe vacanakaro hoti ovaadappa.tikaro, tamena.m hatthidamako uttari kaara.na.m kaareti -- `abhikkama, bho, pa.tikkama, bho'ti. yato kho, aggivessana, aara~n~nako naago hatthidamakassa abhikkamapa.tikkamavacanakaro hoti ovaadappa.tikaro, tamena.m hatthidamako uttari kaara.na.m kaareti -- `u.t.thaha, bho, nisiida, bho'ti. yato kho, aggivessana, aara~n~nako naago hatthidamakassa u.t.thaananisajjaaya ^a^T3.0267^ea^ vacanakaro hoti ovaadappa.tikaro, tamena.m hatthidamako uttari aane~nja.m naama kaara.na.m kaareti, mahantassa phalaka.m so.n.daaya upanibandhati, tomarahattho ca puriso uparigiivaaya nisinno hoti, samantato ca tomarahatthaa purisaa parivaaretvaa .thitaa honti, hatthidamako ca diighatomaraya.t.thi.m gahetvaa purato .thito hoti. so aane~nja.m kaara.na.m kaariyamaano neva purime paade copeti na pacchime paade copeti, na purimakaaya.m copeti na pacchimakaaya.m copeti, na siisa.m copeti, na ka.n.ne copeti, na dante copeti ^a^M3.0174^ea^, na na"ngu.t.tha.m copeti, na so.n.da.m copeti. so hoti aara~n~nako naago khamo sattippahaaraana.m asippahaaraana.m usuppahaaraana.m sarapattappahaaraana.m {parasatthappahaaraana.m (sii0), parasattuppahaaraana.m (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} bheripa.navava.msasa"nkha.di.n.dimaninnaadasaddaana.m {bheripa.navasa"nkhati.navaninnaadasaddaana.m (pii0)} sabbava"nkadosanihitaninniitakasaavo raajaaraho raajabhoggo ra~n~no a"nganteva sa"nkha.m gacchati.

[03] 218^b^.^eb^ ``evameva ^a^P3.0134^ea^ kho, aggivessana, idha tathaagato loke uppajjati araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu anuttaro purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa. so ima.m loka.m sadevaka.m samaaraka.m sabrahmaka.m sassama.nabraahma.ni.m paja.m sadevamanussa.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa pavedeti. so dhamma.m deseti aadikalyaa.na.m majjhekalyaa.na.m pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m saattha.m sabya~njana.m, kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m pakaaseti. ta.m dhamma.m su.naati gahapati ^a^T3.0268^ea^ vaa gahapatiputto vaa a~n~natarasmi.m vaa kule paccaajaato. so ta.m dhamma.m sutvaa tathaagate saddha.m pa.tilabhati. so tena saddhaapa.tilaabhena samannaagato iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `sambaadho gharaavaaso rajaapatho, abbhokaaso pabbajjaa. nayida.m sukara.m agaara.m ajjhaavasataa ekantaparipu.n.na.m ekantaparisuddha.m sa"nkhalikhita.m brahmacariya.m caritu.m. ya.mnuunaaha.m kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajeyya'nti.

[03] ``so ^a^V3.0175^ea^ aparena samayena appa.m vaa bhogakkhandha.m pahaaya mahanta.m vaa bhogakkhandha.m pahaaya appa.m vaa ~naatipariva.t.ta.m pahaaya mahanta.m vaa ~naatipariva.t.ta.m pahaaya kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajati. ettaavataa kho, aggivessana, ariyasaavako abbhokaasagato hoti. etthagedhaa hi, aggivessana, devamanussaa yadida.m -- pa~nca kaamagu.naa. tamena.m tathaagato uttari.m vineti -- `ehi tva.m, bhikkhu, siilavaa hohi, paatimokkhasa.mvarasa.mvuto viharaahi aacaaragocarasampanno, a.numattesu vajjesu bhayadassaavii, samaadaaya sikkhassu sikkhaapadesuu'''ti.

[03] ``yato kho, aggivessana, ariyasaavako siilavaa hoti, paatimokkhasa.mvarasa.mvuto viharati aacaaragocarasampanno a.numattesu vajjesu ^a^M3.0175^ea^ bhayadassaavii, samaadaaya sikkhati sikkhaapadesu, tamena.m tathaagato uttari.m vineti -- `ehi tva.m, bhikkhu, indriyesu guttadvaaro hohi, cakkhunaa ruupa.m disvaa maa nimittaggaahii...pe0... (yathaa ga.nakamoggallaanasuttante, eva.m vitthaaretabbaani.) ^a^P3.0135^ea^

[03] 219^b^.^eb^ ``so ^a^P3.0136^ea^ ime pa~nca niivara.ne pahaaya ^a^T3.0269^ea^ cetaso upakkilese pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.ne kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. vedanaasu...pe0... citte...pe0... dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. seyyathaapi, aggivessana, hatthidamako mahanta.m thambha.m pathaviya.m nikha.nitvaa aara~n~nakassa naagassa giivaaya.m upanibandhati aara~n~nakaana~nceva siilaana.m abhinimmadanaaya aara~n~nakaana~nceva sarasa"nkappaana.m abhinimmadanaaya aara~n~nakaana~nceva darathakilamathapari.laahaana.m abhinimmadanaaya gaamante abhiramaapanaaya manussakantesu siilesu samaadapanaaya; evameva kho, aggivessana, ariyasaavakassa ime cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa cetaso upanibandhanaa honti gehasitaana~nceva siilaana.m abhinimmadanaaya gehasitaana~nceva sarasa"nkappaana.m abhinimmadanaaya gehasitaana~nceva darathakilamathapari.laahaana.m abhinimmadanaaya ~naayassa adhigamaaya nibbaanassa sacchikiriyaaya.

[03] 220^b^.^eb^ ``tamena.m tathaagato uttari.m vineti -- `ehi tva.m, bhikkhu, kaaye kaayaanupassii viharaahi ^a^V3.0176^ea^, maa ca kaamuupasa.mhita.m vitakka.m vitakkesi. vedanaasu... citte... dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharaahi, maa ca kaamuupasa.mhita.m vitakka.m vitakkesii'''ti.

[03] ``so vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m cetaso ekodibhaava.m avitakka.m avicaara.m samaadhija.m piitisukha.m dutiya.m jhaana.m...pe0... tatiya.m jhaana.m... catuttha.m jhaana.m ^a^T3.0270^ea^ upasampajja viharati. so eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe pariyodaate ana"nga.ne vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite aane~njappatte pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.naaya citta.m abhininnaameti. so anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati, seyyathida.m -- ekampi jaati.m dvepi jaatiyo...pe0... iti saakaara.m sauddesa.m anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati.

[03] 221^b^.^eb^ ``so ^a^M3.0176^ea^ eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe pariyodaate ana"nga.ne vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite aane~njappatte sattaana.m cutuupapaata~naa.naaya citta.m abhininnaameti. so dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte passati cavamaane upapajjamaane hiine pa.niite suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne, sugate duggate...pe0... yathaakammuupage satte pajaanaati.

[03] ``so eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe pariyodaate ana"nga.ne vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite aane~njappatte aasavaana.m khaya~naa.naaya citta.m abhininnaameti. so `ida.m dukkha'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m dukkhasamudayo'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m dukkhanirodho'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati; `ime aasavaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m aasavasamudayo'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m aasavanirodho'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m aasavanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. tassa ^a^T3.0271^ea^ eva.m jaanato eva.m passato kaamaasavaapi citta.m vimuccati, bhavaasavaapi citta.m vimuccati, avijjaasavaapi citta.m vimuccati. vimuttasmi.m vimuttamiti ~naa.na.m hoti. `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaati.

[03] ``so hoti bhikkhu khamo siitassa u.nhassa jighacchaaya pipaasaaya .da.msamakasavaataatapasariisapasamphassaana.m ^a^V3.0177^ea^ duruttaana.m duraagataana.m vacanapathaana.m, uppannaana.m saariirikaana.m ^a^P3.0137^ea^ vedanaana.m dukkhaana.m tibbaana.m kharaana.m ka.tukaana.m asaataana.m amanaapaana.m paa.naharaana.m adhivaasakajaatiko hoti sabbaraagadosamohanihitaninniitakasaavo aahuneyyo paahuneyyo dakkhi.neyyo a~njalikara.niiyo anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassa.

[03] 222^b^.^eb^ ``mahallako cepi, aggivessana, ra~n~no naago adanto aviniito kaala"nkaroti, `adantamara.na.m {adanta.m mara.na.m (ka0)} mahallako ra~n~no naago kaala"nkato'tveva sa"nkha.m gacchati; majjhimo cepi, aggivessana, ra~n~no naago. daharo cepi, aggivessana, ra~n~no naago adanto aviniito kaala"nkaroti ^a^M3.0177^ea^, `adantamara.na.m daharo ra~n~no naago kaala"nkato'tveva sa"nkha.m gacchati; evameva kho, aggivessana, thero cepi bhikkhu akhii.naasavo kaala"nkaroti, `adantamara.na.m thero bhikkhu kaala"nkato'tveva sa"nkha.m gacchati; majjhimo cepi, aggivessana, bhikkhu. navo cepi, aggivessana, bhikkhu akhii.naasavo kaala"nkaroti, `adantamara.na.m navo bhikkhu kaala"nkato'tveva sa"nkha.m gacchati.

[01] ``mahallako ^a^T3.0272^ea^ cepi, aggivessana, ra~n~no naago sudanto suviniito kaala"nkaroti, `dantamara.na.m mahallako ra~n~no naago kaala"nkato'tveva sa"nkha.m gacchati; majjhimo cepi, aggivessana, ra~n~no naago... daharo cepi, aggivessana, ra~n~no naago sudanto suviniito kaala"nkaroti, `dantamara.na.m daharo ra~n~no naago kaala"nkato'tveva sa"nkha.m gacchati; evameva kho, aggivessana, thero cepi bhikkhu khii.naasavo kaala"nkaroti, `dantamara.na.m thero bhikkhu kaala"nkato'tveva sa"nkha.m gacchati; majjhimo cepi, aggivessana, bhikkhu. navo cepi, aggivessana, bhikkhu khii.naasavo kaala"nkaroti, `dantamara.na.m navo bhikkhu kaala"nkato'tveva sa"nkha.m gacchatii''ti.
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamano aciravato sama.nuddeso bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandiiti.
[06] dantabhuumisutta.m ni.t.thita.m pa~ncama.m.

[03] 223^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T3.0273^ea^ ^a^V3.0178^ea^ ^a^P3.0138^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. atha kho aayasmaa bhuumijo pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena jayasenassa raajakumaarassa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. atha kho jayaseno raajakumaaro yenaayasmaa bhuumijo tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmataa bhuumijena saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho jayaseno raajakumaaro aayasmanta.m bhuumija.m etadavoca -- ``santi, bho bhuumija, eke sama.nabraahma.naa ^a^M3.0178^ea^ eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- `aasa~ncepi karitvaa brahmacariya.m caranti, abhabbaa {carati, abhabbo (sii0 pii0) evamuparipi ekavacaneneva dissati} phalassa adhigamaaya; anaasa~ncepi {aasa~nca anaasa~nca cepi (a.t.tha0)} karitvaa brahmacariya.m caranti, abhabbaa phalassa adhigamaaya; aasa~nca anaasa~ncepi karitvaa brahmacariya.m caranti, abhabbaa phalassa adhigamaaya; nevaasa.m naanaasa~ncepi karitvaa brahmacariya.m caranti, abhabbaa phalassa adhigamaayaa'ti. idha bhoto bhuumijassa satthaa ki.mvaadii {ki.mvaadii ki.mdi.t.thii (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} kimakkhaayii''ti? ``na kho meta.m, raajakumaara, bhagavato sammukhaa suta.m, sammukhaa pa.tiggahita.m. .thaana~nca kho eta.m vijjati ya.m bhagavaa eva.m byaakareyya -- `aasa~ncepi karitvaa ayoniso brahmacariya.m caranti, abhabbaa phalassa adhigamaaya ^a^T3.0274^ea^; anaasa~ncepi karitvaa ayoniso brahmacariya.m caranti, abhabbaa phalassa adhigamaaya; aasa~nca anaasa~ncepi karitvaa ayoniso brahmacariya.m caranti, abhabbaa phalassa adhigamaaya; nevaasa.m naanaasa~ncepi karitvaa ayoniso brahmacariya.m caranti, abhabbaa phalassa adhigamaaya. aasa~ncepi karitvaa yoniso brahmacariya.m caranti, bhabbaa phalassa adhigamaaya ^a^P3.0139^ea^; anaasa~ncepi karitvaa yoniso brahmacariya.m caranti, bhabbaa phalassa adhigamaaya; aasa~nca anaasa~ncepi karitvaa yoniso brahmacariya.m caranti, bhabbaa phalassa adhigamaaya; nevaasa.m naanaasa~ncepi karitvaa yoniso brahmacariya.m caranti, bhabbaa phalassa adhigamaayaa'ti. na kho me ta.m, raajakumaara, bhagavato sammukhaa suta.m, sammukhaa pa.tiggahita.m. .thaana~nca kho eta.m vijjati ya.m bhagavaa eva.m byaakareyyaa''ti. ``sace kho bhoto bhuumijassa satthaa eva.mvaadii {eva.mvaadii eva.mdi.t.thii (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} evamakkhaayii, addhaa bhoto bhuumijassa satthaa sabbesa.myeva puthusama.nabraahma.naana.m muddhaana.m {buddhaana.m (ka0) muddhaanantimuddha.m, matthakanti attho} ma~n~ne aahacca ti.t.thatii''ti ^a^V3.0179^ea^. atha kho jayaseno raajakumaaro aayasmanta.m bhuumija.m sakeneva thaalipaakena parivisi.

[03] 224^b^.^eb^ atha kho aayasmaa bhuumijo pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa bhuumijo bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``idhaaha.m, bhante, pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena jayasenassa raajakumaarassa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami.m; upasa"nkamitvaa ^a^T3.0275^ea^ pa~n~natte ^a^M3.0179^ea^ aasane nisiidi.m. atha kho, bhante, jayaseno raajakumaaro yenaaha.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa mayaa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho, bhante, jayaseno raajakumaaro ma.m etadavoca -- `santi, bho bhuumija, eke sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- aasa~ncepi karitvaa brahmacariya.m caranti, abhabbaa phalassa adhigamaaya; anaasa~ncepi karitvaa...pe0... aasa~nca anaasa~ncepi karitvaa brahmacariya.m caranti, abhabbaa phalassa adhigamaaya; nevaasa.m naanaasa~ncepi ^a^T3.0276^ea^ karitvaa brahmacariya.m caranti, abhabbaa phalassa adhigamaayaa'ti. `idha bhoto bhuumijassa satthaa ki.mvaadii kimakkhaayii'ti? eva.m vutte aha.m, bhante, jayasena.m raajakumaara.m etadavoca.m -- `na kho me ta.m, raajakumaara, bhagavato sammukhaa suta.m, sammukhaa pa.tiggahita.m. .thaana~nca kho eta.m vijjati ya.m bhagavaa eva.m byaakareyya -- aasa~ncepi karitvaa ayoniso brahmacariya.m caranti, abhabbaa phalassa adhigamaaya; anaasa~ncepi karitvaa ayoniso brahmacariya.m caranti, abhabbaa phalassa adhigamaaya; aasa~nca anaasa~ncepi karitvaa ayoniso brahmacariya.m caranti, abhabbaa phalassa adhigamaaya; nevaasa.m naanaasa~ncepi karitvaa ayoniso brahmacariya.m caranti, abhabbaa phalassa adhigamaaya. aasa~ncepi karitvaa yoniso brahmacariya.m caranti, bhabbaa phalassa adhigamaaya; anaasa~ncepi karitvaa...pe0... aasa~nca anaasa~ncepi karitvaa...pe0... nevaasa.m naanaasa~ncepi karitvaa yoniso brahmacariya.m caranti, bhabbaa phalassa adhigamaayaati. na kho me ta.m, raajakumaara, bhagavato sammukhaa suta.m, sammukhaa pa.tiggahita.m. .thaana~nca kho eta.m vijjati ya.m bhagavaa eva.m byaakareyyaa'ti. `sace bhoto bhuumijassa satthaa eva.mvaadii evamakkhaayii, addhaa bhoto bhuumijassa satthaa sabbesa.myeva puthusama.nabraahma.naana.m muddhaana.m ma~n~ne aahacca ti.t.thatii'ti. `kaccaaha.m, bhante, eva.m pu.t.tho eva.m byaakaramaano vuttavaadii ceva bhagavato homi, na ca bhagavanta.m abhuutena abbhaacikkhaami, dhammassa caanudhamma.m byaakaromi, na ca koci sahadhammiko vaadaanuvaado gaarayha.m .thaana.m aagacchatii'''ti?

[03] ``taggha ^a^V3.0180^ea^ ^a^P3.0140^ea^ tva.m, bhuumija, eva.m pu.t.tho eva.m byaakaramaano vuttavaadii ceva me hosi, na ca ma.m abhuutena abbhaacikkhasi, dhammassa caanudhamma.m byaakarosi, na ca koci sahadhammiko vaadaanuvaado gaarayha.m .thaana.m aagacchati. ye hi keci, bhuumija, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa micchaadi.t.thino micchaasa"nkappaa micchaavaacaa ^a^M3.0180^ea^ micchaakammantaa micchaaaajiivaa micchaavaayaamaa micchaasatii micchaasamaadhino te aasa~ncepi karitvaa brahmacariya.m caranti, abhabbaa phalassa adhigamaaya; anaasa~ncepi karitvaa brahmacariya.m caranti, abhabbaa phalassa adhigamaaya; aasa~nca anaasa~ncepi karitvaa brahmacariya.m caranti, abhabbaa phalassa adhigamaaya; nevaasa.m naanaasa~ncepi karitvaa brahmacariya.m caranti, abhabbaa phalassa adhigamaaya. ta.m kissa hetu? ayoni ^a^T3.0277^ea^ hesaa, bhuumija, phalassa adhigamaaya.

[03] 225^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, bhuumija, puriso telatthiko telagavesii telapariyesana.m caramaano vaalika.m do.niyaa aakiritvaa udakena paripphosaka.m paripphosaka.m pii.leyya. aasa~ncepi karitvaa vaalika.m do.niyaa aakiritvaa udakena paripphosaka.m paripphosaka.m pii.leyya, abhabbo telassa adhigamaaya; anaasa~ncepi karitvaa vaalika.m do.niyaa aakiritvaa udakena paripphosaka.m paripphosaka.m pii.leyya, abhabbo telassa adhigamaaya; aasa~nca anaasa~ncepi karitvaa vaalika.m do.niyaa aakiritvaa udakena paripphosaka.m paripphosaka.m pii.leyya, abhabbo telassa adhigamaaya; nevaasa.m naanaasa~ncepi karitvaa vaalika.m do.niyaa aakiritvaa udakena paripphosaka.m paripphosaka.m pii.leyya, abhabbo telassa adhigamaaya. ta.m kissa hetu? ayoni hesaa, bhuumija, telassa adhigamaaya. evameva kho, bhuumija, ye hi keci sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa micchaadi.t.thino micchaasa"nkappaa micchaavaacaa micchaakammantaa micchaaaajiivaa micchaavaayaamaa micchaasatii micchaasamaadhino te aasa~ncepi karitvaa brahmacariya.m caranti, abhabbaa phalassa adhigamaaya; anaasa~ncepi karitvaa brahmacariya.m caranti, abhabbaa phalassa adhigamaaya; aasa~nca anaasa~ncepi karitvaa brahmacariya.m caranti, abhabbaa phalassa adhigamaaya; nevaasa.m naanaasa~ncepi karitvaa brahmacariya.m caranti, abhabbaa phalassa adhigamaaya. ta.m ^a^P3.0141^ea^ kissa hetu? ayoni hesaa, bhuumija, phalassa adhigamaaya.

[03] ``seyyathaapi ^a^T3.0278^ea^, bhuumija, puriso khiiratthiko khiiragavesii khiirapariyesana.m caramaano gaavi.m taru.navaccha.m visaa.nato aavi~ncheyya ^a^V3.0181^ea^ {aavi~njeyya (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}. aasa~ncepi karitvaa gaavi.m taru.navaccha.m visaa.nato aavi~ncheyya, abhabbo khiirassa adhigamaaya; anaasa~ncepi karitvaa...pe0... aasa~nca anaasa~ncepi karitvaa...pe0... nevaasa.m ^a^M3.0181^ea^ naanaasa~ncepi karitvaa gaavi.m taru.navaccha.m visaa.nato aavi~ncheyya, abhabbo khiirassa adhigamaaya. ta.m kissa hetu? ayoni hesaa, bhuumija, khiirassa adhigamaaya. evameva kho, bhuumija, ye hi keci sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa micchaadi.t.thino...pe0... micchaasamaadhino te aasa~ncepi karitvaa brahmacariya.m caranti, abhabbaa phalassa adhigamaaya; anaasa~ncepi karitvaa...pe0... aasa~nca anaasa~ncepi karitvaa...pe0... nevaasa.m naanaasa~ncepi karitvaa brahmacariya.m caranti, abhabbaa phalassa adhigamaaya. ta.m kissa hetu? ayoni hesaa, bhuumija, phalassa adhigamaaya.

[03] 226^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, bhuumija, puriso navaniitatthiko navaniitagavesii navaniitapariyesana.m caramaano udaka.m kalase aasi~ncitvaa matthena {manthena (sii0), mattena (ka0)} aavi~ncheyya. aasa~ncepi karitvaa udaka.m kalase aasi~ncitvaa matthena aavi~ncheyya, abhabbo navaniitassa adhigamaaya; anaasa~ncepi karitvaa...pe0... aasa~nca anaasa~ncepi karitvaa...pe0... nevaasa.m naanaasa~ncepi karitvaa udaka.m kalase aasi~ncitvaa matthena aavi~ncheyya, abhabbo navaniitassa adhigamaaya. ta.m kissa hetu? ayoni hesaa, bhuumija, navaniitassa adhigamaaya. evameva kho, bhuumija, ye hi keci sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa micchaadi.t.thino...pe0... micchaasamaadhino te aasa~ncepi karitvaa brahmacariya.m caranti, abhabbaa ^a^T3.0279^ea^ phalassa adhigamaaya; anaasa~ncepi karitvaa...pe0... aasa~nca anaasa~ncepi karitvaa...pe0... nevaasa.m naanaasa~ncepi karitvaa brahmacariya.m caranti, abhabbaa phalassa adhigamaaya. ta.m kissa hetu? ayoni hesaa, bhuumija, phalassa adhigamaaya.

[01] ``seyyathaapi, bhuumija, puriso aggitthiko {aggatthiko (sii0)} aggigavesii aggipariyesana.m caramaano alla.m ka.t.tha.m sasneha.m uttaraara.ni.m ^a^P3.0142^ea^ aadaaya abhimantheyya {abhimattheyya (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0)}. aasa~ncepi karitvaa alla.m ka.t.tha.m sasneha.m uttaraara.ni.m aadaaya abhimantheyya, abhabbo aggissa adhigamaaya; anaasa~ncepi karitvaa...pe0... aasa~nca anaasa~ncepi karitvaa...pe0... nevaasa.m naanaasa~ncepi karitvaa alla.m ka.t.tha.m sasneha.m uttaraara.ni.m aadaaya abhimantheyya, abhabbo aggissa adhigamaaya. ta.m kissa hetu? ayoni hesaa, bhuumija, aggissa adhigamaaya. evameva kho, bhuumija, ye hi keci sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa ^a^M3.0182^ea^ micchaadi.t.thino...pe0... micchaasamaadhino te aasa~ncepi karitvaa ^a^V3.0182^ea^ brahmacariya.m caranti, abhabbaa phalassa adhigamaaya; anaasa~ncepi karitvaa...pe0...aasa~nca anaasa~ncepi karitvaa...pe0... nevaasa.m naanaasa~ncepi karitvaa brahmacariya.m caranti, abhabbaa phalassa adhigamaaya. ta.m kissa hetu? ayoni hesaa, bhuumija, phalassa adhigamaaya. ye hi keci, bhuumija, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa sammaadi.t.thino sammaasa"nkappaa sammaavaacaa sammaakammantaa sammaaaajiivaa sammaavaayaamaa sammaasatii sammaasamaadhino te aasa~ncepi karitvaa brahmacariya.m ^a^T3.0280^ea^ caranti, bhabbaa phalassa adhigamaaya; anaasa~ncepi karitvaa brahmacariya.m caranti, bhabbaa phalassa adhigamaaya; aasa~nca anaasa~ncepi karitvaa brahmacariya.m caranti, bhabbaa phalassa adhigamaaya; nevaasa.m naanaasa~ncepi karitvaa brahmacariya.m caranti, bhabbaa phalassa adhigamaaya. ta.m kissa hetu? yoni hesaa, bhuumija, phalassa adhigamaaya.

[03] 227^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, bhuumija, puriso telatthiko telagavesii telapariyesana.m caramaano tilapi.t.tha.m do.niyaa aakiritvaa udakena paripphosaka.m paripphosaka.m pii.leyya. aasa~ncepi karitvaa tilapi.t.tha.m do.niyaa aakiritvaa udakena paripphosaka.m paripphosaka.m pii.leyya, bhabbo telassa adhigamaaya; anaasa~ncepi karitvaa...pe0... aasa~nca anaasa~ncepi karitvaa...pe0... nevaasa.m naanaasa~ncepi karitvaa tilapi.t.tha.m do.niyaa aakiritvaa udakena paripphosaka.m paripphosaka.m pii.leyya, bhabbo telassa adhigamaaya. ta.m kissa hetu? yoni hesaa, bhuumija, telassa adhigamaaya. evameva kho, bhuumija, ye hi keci sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa sammaadi.t.thino...pe0... sammaasamaadhino te aasa~ncepi karitvaa brahmacariya.m caranti, bhabbaa ^a^P3.0143^ea^ phalassa adhigamaaya; anaasa~ncepi karitvaa...pe0... aasa~nca anaasa~ncepi karitvaa...pe0... nevaasa.m naanaasa~ncepi karitvaa brahmacariya.m caranti, bhabbaa phalassa adhigamaaya. ta.m kissa hetu? yoni hesaa, bhuumija, phalassa adhigamaaya.

[01] ``seyyathaapi, bhuumija, puriso khiiratthiko khiiragavesii khiirapariyesana.m caramaano ^a^T3.0281^ea^ gaavi.m taru.navaccha.m thanato aavi~ncheyya. aasa~ncepi karitvaa gaavi.m taru.navaccha.m thanato aavi~ncheyya, bhabbo khiirassa adhigamaaya; anaasa~ncepi karitvaa...pe0... aasa~nca anaasa~ncepi karitvaa...pe0... nevaasa.m naanaasa~ncepi karitvaa gaavi.m taru.navaccha.m thanato aavi~ncheyya, bhabbo khiirassa adhigamaaya. ta.m kissa hetu? yoni hesaa, bhuumija, khiirassa ^a^V3.0183^ea^ adhigamaaya. evameva ^a^M3.0183^ea^ kho, bhuumija, ye hi keci sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa sammaadi.t.thino...pe0... sammaasamaadhino te aasa~ncepi karitvaa...pe0... anaasa~ncepi karitvaa...pe0... aasa~nca anaasa~ncepi karitvaa...pe0... nevaasa.m naanaasa~ncepi karitvaa brahmacariya.m caranti, bhabbaa phalassa adhigamaaya. ta.m kissa hetu? yoni hesaa, bhuumija, phalassa adhigamaaya.

[03] 228^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, bhuumija, puriso navaniitatthiko navaniitagavesii navaniitapariyesana.m caramaano dadhi.m kalase aasi~ncitvaa matthena aavi~ncheyya. aasa~ncepi karitvaa dadhi.m kalase aasi~ncitvaa matthena aavi~ncheyya, bhabbo navaniitassa adhigamaaya; anaasa~ncepi karitvaa... aasa~nca anaasa~ncepi karitvaa... nevaasa.m naanaasa~ncepi karitvaa dadhi.m kalase aasi~ncitvaa matthena aavi~ncheyya, bhabbo navaniitassa adhigamaaya. ta.m kissa hetu? yoni hesaa, bhuumija, navaniitassa adhigamaaya. evameva kho, bhuumija, ye hi keci sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa sammaadi.t.thino...pe0... sammaasamaadhino te aasa~ncepi karitvaa brahmacariya.m caranti, bhabbaa phalassa adhigamaaya; anaasa~ncepi karitvaa... aasa~nca anaasa~ncepi karitvaa ^a^T3.0282^ea^... nevaasa.m naanaasa~ncepi karitvaa brahmacariya.m caranti, bhabbaa phalassa adhigamaaya. ta.m kissa hetu? yoni hesaa, bhuumija, phalassa adhigamaaya.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhuumija, puriso aggitthiko aggigavesii aggipariyesana.m caramaano sukkha.m ka.t.tha.m ko.laapa.m uttaraara.ni.m aadaaya abhimantheyya; ( ) {(bhabbo aggissa adhigamaaya) (sabbattha)} aasa~ncepi karitvaa... anaasa~ncepi ^a^P3.0144^ea^ karitvaa.. aasa~nca anaasa~ncepi karitvaa... nevaasa.m naanaasa~ncepi karitvaa sukkha ka.t.tha.m ko.laapa.m uttaraara.ni.m aadaaya abhimantheyya, bhabbo aggissa adhigamaaya. ta.m kissa hetu? yoni hesaa, bhuumija, aggissa adhigamaaya. evameva kho, bhuumija, ye hi keci sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa sammaadi.t.thino...pe0... sammaasamaadhino te aasa~ncepi karitvaa brahmacariya.m caranti, bhabbaa phalassa adhigamaaya; anaasa~ncepi karitvaa brahmacariya.m caranti, bhabbaa phalassa adhigamaaya; aasa~nca anaasa~ncepi karitvaa brahmacariya.m caranti, bhabbaa phalassa adhigamaaya; nevaasa.m naanaasa~ncepi karitvaa brahmacariya.m caranti, bhabbaa phalassa adhigamaaya. ta.m kissa hetu? yoni hesaa, bhuumija, phalassa adhigamaaya.

[03] ``sace ^a^M3.0184^ea^ ^a^V3.0184^ea^ kho ta.m, bhuumija, jayasenassa raajakumaarassa imaa catasso upamaa pa.tibhaayeyyu.m anacchariya.m te jayaseno raajakumaaro pasiideyya, pasanno ca te pasannaakaara.m kareyyaa''ti. ``kuto pana ma.m, bhante, jayasenassa ^a^T3.0283^ea^ raajakumaarassa imaa catasso upamaa pa.tibhaayissanti anacchariyaa pubbe assutapubbaa, seyyathaapi bhagavanta''nti?
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamano aayasmaa bhuumijo bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandiiti.
[06] bhuumijasutta.m ni.t.thita.m cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 229^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T3.0284^ea^ ^a^V3.0185^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. atha kho pa~ncaka"ngo thapati a~n~natara.m purisa.m aamantesi -- ``ehi tva.m, ambho purisa, yenaayasmaa anuruddho tenupasa"nkama; upasa"nkamitvaa mama vacanena aayasmato anuruddhassa ^a^P3.0145^ea^ paade sirasaa vandaahi {vandaahi, eva~nca vadehi (sii0 pii0)} -- `pa~ncaka"ngo, bhante, thapati aayasmato anuruddhassa paade sirasaa vandatii'ti; eva~nca vadehi {eva~nca vadeti (sii0 pii0)} -- `adhivaasetu kira, bhante, aayasmaa anuruddho pa~ncaka"ngassa thapatissa svaatanaaya attacatuttho bhatta.m; yena ca kira, bhante, aayasmaa anuruddho pagevatara.m aagaccheyya; pa~ncaka"ngo, bhante, thapati {pa~ncaka"ngo thapati (sii0 pii0)} bahukicco bahukara.niiyo raajakara.niiyenaa'''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho so puriso pa~ncaka"ngassa thapatissa pa.tissutvaa yenaayasmaa anuruddho tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m anuruddha.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho so puriso aayasmanta.m anuruddha.m etadavoca -- ``pa~ncaka"ngo, bhante, thapati aayasmato anuruddhassa paade sirasaa vandati, eva~nca vadeti -- `adhivaasetu kira, bhante, aayasmaa anuruddho pa~ncaka"ngassa thapatissa svaatanaaya attacatuttho bhatta.m; yena ca kira, bhante, aayasmaa anuruddho pagevatara.m aagaccheyya; pa~ncaka"ngo, bhante, thapati bahukicco bahukara.niiyo raajakara.niiyenaa'''ti. adhivaasesi kho ^a^T3.0285^ea^ aayasmaa anuruddho tu.nhiibhaavena.

[03] 230^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^M3.0185^ea^ kho aayasmaa anuruddho tassaa rattiyaa accayena pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena pa~ncaka"ngassa thapatissa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. atha kho pa~ncaka"ngo thapati aayasmanta.m anuruddha.m pa.niitena khaadaniiyena bhojaniiyena sahatthaa santappesi sampavaaresi. atha kho pa~ncaka"ngo thapati aayasmanta.m anuruddha.m bhuttaavi.m oniitapattapaa.ni.m a~n~natara.m niica.m aasana.m gahetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho pa~ncaka"ngo thapati aayasmanta.m anuruddha.m etadavoca --

[03] ``idha ma.m, bhante, theraa bhikkhuu upasa"nkamitvaa evamaaha.msu -- `appamaa.na.m, gahapati, cetovimutti.m ^a^V3.0186^ea^ bhaavehii'ti {appamaa.naa gahapati cetovimutti bhaavetabbaati (ka0)}. ekacce theraa evamaaha.msu -- `mahaggata.m, gahapati, cetovimutti.m bhaavehii'ti. yaa caaya.m, bhante, appamaa.naa cetovimutti yaa ca mahaggataa cetovimutti -- ime dhammaa naanatthaa ceva naanaabya~njanaa ^a^P3.0146^ea^ ca, udaahu ekatthaa bya~njanameva naana''nti? ``tena hi, gahapati, ta.m yevettha pa.tibhaatu. apa.n.nakante ito bhavissatii''ti. ``mayha.m kho, bhante, eva.m hoti -- `yaa caaya.m appamaa.naa cetovimutti yaa ca mahaggataa cetovimutti ime dhammaa ekatthaa bya~njanameva naana'''nti. ``yaa caaya.m, gahapati, appamaa.naa cetovimutti yaa ca mahaggataa cetovimutti ime dhammaa naanatthaa ceva naanaabya~njanaa ca ^a^T3.0286^ea^. tadaminaapeta.m, gahapati, pariyaayena veditabba.m yathaa ime dhammaa naanatthaa ceva naanaabya~njanaa ca''.

[03] ``katamaa ca, gahapati, appamaa.naa cetovimutti? idha, gahapati, bhikkhu mettaasahagatena cetasaa eka.m disa.m pharitvaa viharati, tathaa dutiya.m tathaa tatiya.m tathaa catuttha.m; iti uddhamadho tiriya.m sabbadhi sabbattataaya sabbaavanta.m loka.m mettaasahagatena cetasaa vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaabajjhena pharitvaa viharati. karu.naasahagatena cetasaa... muditaasahagatena cetasaa... upekkhaasahagatena cetasaa eka.m disa.m pharitvaa viharati, tathaa dutiya.m tathaa tatiya.m tathaa catuttha.m; iti uddhamadho tiriya.m sabbadhi sabbattataaya sabbaavanta.m loka.m upekkhaasahagatena cetasaa vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaabajjhena pharitvaa viharati. aya.m vuccati, gahapati, appamaa.naa cetovimutti.

[03] 231^b^.^eb^ ``katamaa ^a^M3.0186^ea^ ca, gahapati, mahaggataa cetovimutti? idha, gahapati, bhikkhu yaavataa eka.m rukkhamuula.m mahaggatanti pharitvaa adhimuccitvaa viharati. aya.m vuccati, gahapati, mahaggataa cetovimutti. idha pana, gahapati, bhikkhu yaavataa dve vaa tii.ni vaa rukkhamuulaani mahaggatanti pharitvaa adhimuccitvaa viharati. ayampi {aya.m (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} vuccati, gahapati, mahaggataa cetovimutti. idha pana, gahapati, bhikkhu yaavataa eka.m gaamakkhetta.m mahaggatanti pharitvaa adhimuccitvaa viharati. ayampi vuccati, gahapati, mahaggataa cetovimutti. idha pana, gahapati ^a^P3.0147^ea^, bhikkhu yaavataa dve ^a^T3.0287^ea^ vaa tii.ni vaa gaamakkhettaani mahaggatanti pharitvaa adhimuccitvaa viharati. ayampi vuccati, gahapati, mahaggataa cetovimutti. idha pana, gahapati, bhikkhu yaavataa eka.m mahaarajja.m mahaggatanti pharitvaa adhimuccitvaa viharati. ayampi vuccati, gahapati, mahaggataa cetovimutti. idha pana, gahapati, bhikkhu yaavataa dve vaa ^a^V3.0187^ea^ tii.ni vaa mahaarajjaani mahaggatanti pharitvaa adhimuccitvaa viharati. ayampi vuccati, gahapati, mahaggataa cetovimutti. idha pana, gahapati, bhikkhu yaavataa samuddapariyanta.m pathavi.m mahaggatanti pharitvaa adhimuccitvaa viharati. ayampi vuccati, gahapati, mahaggataa cetovimutti. iminaa kho eta.m, gahapati, pariyaayena veditabba.m yathaa ime dhammaa naanatthaa ceva naanaabya~njanaa ca.

[03] 232^b^.^eb^ ``catasso kho imaa gahapati, bhavuupapattiyo. katamaa catasso? idha, gahapati, ekacco `parittaabhaa'ti pharitvaa adhimuccitvaa viharati. so kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa parittaabhaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjati. idha pana, gahapati, ekacco `appamaa.naabhaa'ti pharitvaa adhimuccitvaa viharati. so kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa appamaa.naabhaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjati. idha pana, gahapati, ekacco `sa.mkili.t.thaabhaa'ti pharitvaa adhimuccitvaa viharati. so kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sa.mkili.t.thaabhaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjati. idha pana, gahapati, ekacco `parisuddhaabhaa'ti pharitvaa adhimuccitvaa ^a^T3.0288^ea^ viharati. so kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa parisuddhaabhaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjati. imaa kho, gahapati, catasso bhavuupapattiyo.
