[22] samantaa yojanasata.m, pharitvaa ti.t.thati sabbadaa'' ^a^T3.0342^ea^..

[03] 268^b^.^eb^ ``tassa kho pana, bhikkhave, mahaanirayassa puratthimaaya bhittiyaa acci u.t.thahitvaa pacchimaaya bhittiyaa pa.tiha~n~nati, pacchimaaya bhittiyaa acci u.t.thahitvaa puratthimaaya bhittiyaa ^a^P3.0184^ea^ pa.tiha~n~nati, uttaraaya bhittiyaa acci u.t.thahitvaa dakkhi.naaya bhittiyaa pa.tiha~n~nati, dakkhi.naaya bhittiyaa acci u.t.thahitvaa uttaraaya bhittiyaa pa.tiha~n~nati, he.t.thaa acci u.t.thahitvaa upari pa.tiha~n~nati, uparito acci u.t.thahitvaa he.t.thaa pa.tiha~n~nati. so tattha dukkhaa tibbaa kharaa ka.tukaa vedanaa vedeti, na ca taava kaala"nkaroti yaava na ta.m paapakamma.m byantiihoti.

[03] ``hoti ^a^V3.0223^ea^ kho so, bhikkhave, samayo ya.m kadaaci karahaci diighassa addhuno accayena tassa mahaanirayassa puratthima.m dvaara.m apaapuriiyati {avaapuriiyati (sii0)}. so tattha siighena javena dhaavati. tassa siighena javena dhaavato chavimpi .dayhati, cammampi .dayhati, ma.msampi .dayhati, nhaarumpi .dayhati, a.t.thiinipi sampadhuupaayanti, ubbhata.m taadisameva hoti. yato ca kho so, bhikkhave, bahusampatto hoti, atha ta.m dvaara.m pidhiiyati {pithiiyati (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}. so tattha dukkhaa tibbaa kharaa ka.tukaa vedanaa vedeti, na ca taava kaala"nkaroti yaava na ta.m paapakamma.m byantiihoti.

[03] ``hoti kho so, bhikkhave, samayo ya.m kadaaci karahaci diighassa addhuno accayena tassa mahaanirayassa pacchima.m dvaara.m apaapuriiyati...pe0... uttara.m dvaara.m apaapuriiyati...pe0... dakkhi.na.m dvaara.m apaapuriiyati ^a^T3.0343^ea^. so tattha siighena javena dhaavati. tassa siighena javena dhaavato chavimpi .dayhati, cammampi .dayhati, ma.msampi .dayhati, nhaarumpi .dayhati, a.t.thiinipi sampadhuupaayanti, ubbhata.m taadisameva hoti. yato ca kho so, bhikkhave, bahusampatto hoti, atha ta.m dvaara.m pidhiiyati. so tattha dukkhaa tibbaa kharaa ka.tukaa vedanaa vedeti, na ca taava kaala"nkaroti yaava na ta.m paapakamma.m byantiihoti.

[01] ``hoti ^a^M3.0223^ea^ kho so, bhikkhave, samayo ya.m kadaaci karahaci diighassa addhuno accayena tassa mahaanirayassa puratthima.m dvaara.m apaapuriiyati. so tattha siighena javena dhaavati. tassa siighena javena dhaavato chavimpi .dayhati, cammampi .dayhati, ma.msampi .dayhati, nhaarumpi .dayhati, a.t.thiinipi sampadhuupaayanti, ubbhata.m taadisameva hoti. so tena dvaarena nikkhamati.

[03] 269^b^.^eb^ ``tassa kho pana, bhikkhave, mahaanirayassa samanantaraa ^a^P3.0185^ea^ sahitameva mahanto guuthanirayo. so tattha patati. tasmi.m kho pana, bhikkhave, guuthaniraye suucimukhaa paa.naa chavi.m chindanti, chavi.m chetvaa camma.m chindanti, camma.m chetvaa ma.msa.m chindanti, ma.msa.m chetvaa nhaaru.m chindanti, nhaaru.m chetvaa a.t.thi.m chindanti, a.t.thi.m chetvaa a.t.thimi~nja.m khaadanti. so tattha dukkhaa tibbaa kharaa ka.tukaa vedanaa vedeti, na ca taava kaala"nkaroti yaava na ta.m paapakamma.m byantiihoti.

[03] ``tassa ^a^V3.0224^ea^ kho pana, bhikkhave, guuthanirayassa samanantaraa sahitameva mahanto ^a^T3.0344^ea^ kukkulanirayo. so tattha patati. so tattha dukkhaa tibbaa kharaa ka.tukaa vedanaa vedeti, na ca taava kaala"nkaroti yaava na ta.m paapakamma.m byantiihoti.

[03] ``tassa kho pana, bhikkhave, kukkulanirayassa samanantaraa sahitameva mahanta.m simbalivana.m uddha.m {ucca.m (syaa0 ka.m0), ubbhato (ka0)} yojanamuggata.m so.lasa"ngulaka.n.taka.m {so.lasa"ngulaka.n.daka.m (sii0)} aaditta.m sampajjalita.m sajotibhuuta.m. tattha aaropentipi oropentipi. so tattha dukkhaa tibbaa kharaa ka.tukaa vedanaa vedeti, na ca taava kaala"nkaroti yaava na ta.m paapakamma.m byantiihoti.

[03] ``tassa kho pana, bhikkhave, simbalivanassa samanantaraa sahitameva mahanta.m asipattavana.m. so tattha pavisati. tassa vaateritaani pattaani patitaani hatthampi chindanti, paadampi chindanti, hatthapaadampi chindanti, ka.n.nampi chindanti, naasampi chindanti, ka.n.nanaasampi chindanti. so tattha dukkhaa tibbaa kharaa ka.tukaa vedanaa vedeti, na ca taava kaala"nkaroti yaava na ta.m paapakamma.m byantiihoti.

[03] ``tassa kho pana, bhikkhave, asipattavanassa samanantaraa sahitameva mahatii khaarodakaa nadii {khaarodikaa nadii (sii0)}. so tattha patati. so tattha anusotampi vuyhati ^a^M3.0224^ea^, pa.tisotampi vuyhati, anusotapa.tisotampi vuyhati. so tattha dukkhaa tibbaa kharaa ka.tukaa vedanaa vedeti, na ca taava kaala"nkaroti yaava na ta.m paapakamma.m byantiihoti.

[03] 270^b^.^eb^ ``tamena.m, bhikkhave, nirayapaalaa balisena uddharitvaa ^a^P3.0186^ea^ thale pati.t.thaapetvaa ^a^T3.0345^ea^ evamaaha.msu -- `ambho purisa, ki.m icchasii'ti? so evamaaha -- `jighacchitosmi, bhante'ti. tamena.m, bhikkhave, nirayapaalaa tattena ayosa"nkunaa mukha.m vivaritvaa aadittena sampajjalitena sajotibhuutena tatta.m lohagu.la.m mukhe pakkhipanti aaditta.m sampajjalita.m sajotibhuuta.m. so tassa {ta.m tassa (ka0), tassa (sii0 pii0)} o.t.thampi dahati {.dayhati (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}, mukhampi dahati, ka.n.thampi dahati, urampi {udarampi (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)} dahati, antampi antagu.nampi aadaaya adhobhaagaa nikkhamati. so tattha dukkhaa tibbaa kharaa ka.tukaa vedanaa vedeti, na ca taava kaala"nkaroti yaava na ta.m paapakamma.m byantiihoti.

[03] ``tamena.m ^a^V3.0225^ea^, bhikkhave, nirayapaalaa evamaaha.msu -- `ambho purisa, ki.m icchasii'ti? so evamaaha -- `pipaasitosmi, bhante'ti. tamena.m, bhikkhave, nirayapaalaa tattena ayosa"nkunaa mukha.m vivaritvaa aadittena sampajjalitena sajotibhuutena tatta.m tambaloha.m mukhe aasi~ncanti aaditta.m sampajjalita.m sajotibhuuta.m. ta.m tassa {ettha pana paa.thabhedo natthi} o.t.thampi dahati, mukhampi dahati, ka.n.thampi dahati, urampi dahati, antampi antagu.nampi aadaaya adhobhaagaa nikkhamati. so tattha dukkhaa tibbaa kharaa ka.tukaa vedanaa vedeti, na ca taava kaala"nkaroti, yaava na ta.m paapakamma.m byantiihoti. tamena.m, bhikkhave, nirayapaalaa puna mahaaniraye pakkhipanti.

[03] ``bhuutapubba.m, bhikkhave, yamassa ra~n~no etadahosi -- `ye kira ^a^T3.0346^ea^, bho, loke paapakaani akusalaani kammaani karonti te evaruupaa vividhaa kammakaara.naa kariiyanti. aho vataaha.m manussatta.m labheyya.m. tathaagato ca loke uppajjeyya araha.m sammaasambuddho. ta~ncaaha.m bhagavanta.m payirupaaseyya.m. so ca me bhagavaa dhamma.m deseyya. tassa caaha.m bhagavato dhamma.m aajaaneyya'nti. ta.m kho panaaha.m, bhikkhave, naa~n~nassa sama.nassa vaa braahma.nassa vaa sutvaa vadaami, api ca yadeva saama.m ~naata.m saama.m di.t.tha.m saama.m vidita.m tadevaaha.m vadaamii''ti.
[03] 271^b^.^eb^ idamavoca ^a^M3.0225^ea^ ^a^P3.0187^ea^ bhagavaa. ida.m vatvaana {ida.m vatvaa (sii0 pii0) evamiidisesu .thaanesu} sugato athaapara.m etadavoca satthaa --
[21] ``coditaa devaduutehi, ye pamajjanti maa.navaa.
[22] te diigharatta.m socanti, hiinakaayuupagaa naraa..
[21] ``ye ca kho devaduutehi, santo sappurisaa idha.
[22] coditaa nappamajjanti, ariyadhamme kudaacana.m..
[21] ``upaadaane bhaya.m disvaa, jaatimara.nasambhave.
[22] anupaadaa vimuccanti, jaatimara.nasa"nkhaye..
[21] ``te ^a^V3.0226^ea^ khemappattaa sukhino, di.t.thadhammaabhinibbutaa.
[22] sabbaverabhayaatiitaa, sabbadukkha.m {sabbadukkhaa (ka0)} upaccagu''nti..
[06] devaduutasutta.m ni.t.thita.m dasama.m.
[06] su~n~natavaggo ni.t.thito tatiyo.
[21] tassuddaana.m ^a^T3.0347^ea^ --
[21] dvidhaava su~n~nataa hoti, abbhutadhammabaakula.m.
[27] aciravatabhuumijanaamo, anuruddhupakkilesa.m.
[22] baalapa.n.dito devaduuta~nca te dasaati..

[03] 272^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T3.0348^ea^ ^a^M3.0226^ea^ ^a^V3.0227^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``bhaddekarattassa vo, bhikkhave, uddesa~nca vibha"nga~nca desessaami. ta.m su.naatha, saadhuka.m manasi karotha; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --
[21] ``atiita.m naanvaagameyya, nappa.tika"nkhe anaagata.m.
[22] yadatiita.m pahiina.m ta.m, appatta~nca anaagata.m..
[21] ``paccuppanna~nca yo {ya.m (nettipaa.li)} dhamma.m, tattha tattha vipassati.
[22] asa.mhiira.m {asa.mhira.m (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} asa.mkuppa.m, ta.m vidvaa manubruuhaye..
[21] ``ajjeva kiccamaatappa.m {kicca.m aatappa.m (sii0 ka0)}, ko ja~n~naa mara.na.m suve.
[22] na hi no sa"ngara.m tena, mahaasenena maccunaa..
[21] ``eva.m vihaari.m aataapi.m, ahorattamatandita.m.
[22] ta.m ve bhaddekarattoti, santo aacikkhate muni'' {muniiti (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}..

[03] 273^b^.^eb^ ``katha~nca ^a^V3.0228^ea^ ^a^P3.0188^ea^, bhikkhave, atiita.m anvaagameti? `eva.mruupo ahosi.m atiitamaddhaana'nti ^a^T3.0349^ea^ tattha nandi.m samanvaaneti, `eva.mvedano ahosi.m atiitamaddhaana'nti tattha nandi.m samanvaaneti, `eva.msa~n~no ahosi.m atiitamaddhaana'nti tattha nandi.m samanvaaneti, `eva.msa"nkhaaro ahosi.m atiitamaddhaana'nti tattha nandi.m samanvaaneti, `eva.mvi~n~naa.no ahosi.m atiitamaddhaana'nti tattha nandi.m samanvaaneti -- eva.m kho, bhikkhave, atiita.m anvaagameti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, atiita.m naanvaagameti? `eva.mruupo ahosi.m atiitamaddhaana'nti tattha nandi.m na samanvaaneti, `eva.mvedano ahosi.m atiitamaddhaana'nti tattha nandi.m na samanvaaneti, `eva.msa~n~no ahosi.m atiitamaddhaana'nti ^a^M3.0227^ea^ tattha nandi.m na samanvaaneti, `eva.msa"nkhaaro ahosi.m atiitamaddhaana'nti tattha nandi.m na samanvaaneti, `eva.mvi~n~naa.no ahosi.m atiitamaddhaana'nti tattha nandi.m na samanvaaneti -- eva.m kho, bhikkhave, atiita.m naanvaagameti.

[03] 274^b^.^eb^ ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, anaagata.m pa.tika"nkhati? `eva.mruupo siya.m anaagatamaddhaana'nti tattha nandi.m samanvaaneti, eva.mvedano siya.m...pe0... eva.msa~n~no siya.m... eva.msa"nkhaaro siya.m... eva.mvi~n~naa.no siya.m anaagatamaddhaananti tattha nandi.m samanvaaneti -- eva.m kho, bhikkhave, anaagata.m pa.tika"nkhati.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, anaagata.m nappa.tika"nkhati? `eva.mruupo siya.m anaagatamaddhaana'nti tattha nandi.m na samanvaaneti, eva.mvedano siya.m ^a^T3.0350^ea^... eva.msa~n~no siya.m... eva.msa"nkhaaro siya.m... `eva.mvi~n~naa.no siya.m anaagatamaddhaana'nti tattha nandi.m na samanvaaneti -- eva.m kho, bhikkhave, anaagata.m nappa.tika"nkhati.

[03] 275^b^.^eb^ ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, paccuppannesu dhammesu sa.mhiirati? idha, bhikkhave, assutavaa puthujjano ariyaana.m adassaavii ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme aviniito sappurisaana.m adassaavii sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme aviniito ruupa.m attato samanupassati, ruupavanta.m vaa attaana.m, attani vaa ruupa.m, ruupasmi.m vaa attaana.m; vedana.m...pe0... sa~n~na.m... sa"nkhaare... vi~n~naa.na.m ^a^P3.0189^ea^ attato samanupassati, vi~n~naa.navanta.m vaa attaana.m attani vaa vi~n~naa.na.m, vi~n~naa.nasmi.m vaa attaana.m -- eva.m kho, bhikkhave, paccuppannesu dhammesu sa.mhiirati.

[03] ``katha~nca ^a^V3.0229^ea^, bhikkhave, paccuppannesu dhammesu na sa.mhiirati? idha, bhikkhave, sutavaa ariyasaavako ariyaana.m dassaavii ariyadhammassa kovido ariyadhamme suviniito sappurisaana.m dassaavii sappurisadhammassa kovido sappurisadhamme suviniito na ruupa.m attato samanupassati, na ruupavanta.m vaa attaana.m, na attani vaa ruupa.m, na ruupasmi.m vaa attaana.m; na vedana.m... na sa~n~na.m... na sa"nkhaare... na vi~n~naa.na.m attato samanupassati, na vi~n~naa.navanta.m vaa attaana.m, na attani vaa vi~n~naa.na.m, na vi~n~naa.nasmi.m vaa attaana.m -- eva.m kho, bhikkhave, paccuppannesu dhammesu na sa.mhiirati.
[21] ``atiita.m ^a^T3.0351^ea^ naanvaagameyya, nappa.tika"nkhe anaagata.m.
[22] yadatiita.m pahiina.m ta.m, appatta~nca anaagata.m..
[21] ``paccuppanna~nca ^a^M3.0228^ea^ yo dhamma.m, tattha tattha vipassati.
[22] asa.mhiira.m asa.mkuppa.m, ta.m vidvaa manubruuhaye..
[21] ``ajjeva kiccamaatappa.m, ko ja~n~naa mara.na.m suve.
[22] na hi no sa"ngara.m tena, mahaasenena maccunaa..

[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamanaa te bhikkhuu bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandunti.
[06] bhaddekarattasutta.m ni.t.thita.m pa.thama.m.

[03] 276^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T3.0352^ea^ ^a^V3.0230^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa aanando upa.t.thaanasaalaaya.m bhikkhuuna.m dhammiyaa kathaaya sandasseti samaadapeti samuttejeti ^a^P3.0190^ea^ sampaha.mseti, bhaddekarattassa uddesa~nca vibha"nga~nca bhaasati.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito yenupa.t.thaanasaalaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. nisajja kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``ko nu kho, bhikkhave, upa.t.thaanasaalaaya.m bhikkhuuna.m dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassesi samaadapesi samuttejesi sampaha.msesi, bhaddekarattassa uddesa~nca vibha"nga~nca abhaasii''ti? ``aayasmaa, bhante, aanando upa.t.thaanasaalaaya.m bhikkhuuna.m dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassesi samaadapesi samuttejesi sampaha.msesi, bhaddekarattassa uddesa~nca vibha"nga~nca abhaasii''ti.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantesi -- ``yathaa katha.m pana tva.m, aananda, bhikkhuuna.m dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassesi samaadapesi samuttejesi sampaha.msesi ^a^M3.0229^ea^, bhaddekarattassa uddesa~nca vibha"nga~nca abhaasii''ti? ``eva.m kho aha.m, bhante, bhikkhuuna.m dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassesi.m samaadapesi.m samuttejesi.m sampaha.msesi.m, bhaddekarattassa uddesa~nca vibha"nga~nca abhaasi.m --
[21] ``atiita.m ^a^T3.0353^ea^ naanvaagameyya, nappa.tika"nkhe anaagata.m.
[22] yadatiita.m pahiina.m ta.m, appatta~nca anaagata.m..

[22] na hi no sa"ngara.m tena, mahaasenena maccunaa..
[21] ``eva.m vihaari.m aataapi.m, ahorattamatandita.m.
[22] ta.m ve bhaddekarattoti, santo aacikkhate muni''..

[03] ``katha~nca, aananda, atiita.m anvaagameti...pe0... eva.m kho, aananda, atiita.m anvaagameti. katha~nca, aananda, atiita.m naanvaagameti...pe0... eva.m kho, aananda, atiita.m naanvaagameti. katha~nca, aananda, anaagata.m pa.tika"nkhati...pe0... eva.m kho, aananda, anaagata.m pa.tika"nkhati. katha~nca, aananda, anaagata.m nappa.tika"nkhati...pe0... eva.m kho, aananda, anaagata.m nappa.tika"nkhati. katha~nca, aananda, paccuppannesu dhammesu sa.mhiirati...pe0... eva.m kho, aananda, paccuppannesu dhammesu sa.mhiirati. katha~nca, aananda, paccuppannesu dhammesu na sa.mhiirati...pe0... eva.m kho, aananda, paccuppannesu dhammesu na sa.mhiirati.
[21] ``atiita.m naanvaagameyya...pe0... ^a^V3.0234^ea^
[22] ta.m ve bhaddekarattoti, santo aacikkhate munii''ti..
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamano aayasmaa aanando bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandiiti.
[06] aanandabhaddekarattasutta.m ni.t.thita.m dutiya.m.

[03] 279^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T3.0357^ea^ ^a^V3.0235^ea^ ^a^P3.0192^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati tapodaaraame. atha kho aayasmaa samiddhi rattiyaa paccuusasamaya.m paccu.t.thaaya yena tapodo {tapodaa (sii0)} tenupasa"nkami gattaani parisi~ncitu.m. tapode gattaani ^a^M3.0232^ea^ parisi~ncitvaa paccuttaritvaa ekaciivaro a.t.thaasi gattaani pubbaapayamaano {sukkhaapayamaano (ka0)}. atha kho a~n~nataraa devataa abhikkantaaya rattiyaa abhikkantava.n.naa kevalakappa.m tapoda.m obhaasetvaa yenaayasmaa samiddhi tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thitaa kho saa devataa aayasmanta.m samiddhi.m etadavoca -- ``dhaaresi tva.m, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesa~nca vibha"nga~ncaa''ti? ``na kho aha.m, aavuso, dhaaremi bhaddekarattassa uddesa~nca vibha"nga~nca. tva.m panaavuso, dhaaresi bhaddekarattassa uddesa~nca vibha"nga~ncaa''ti? ``ahampi kho, bhikkhu, na dhaaremi bhaddekarattassa uddesa~nca vibha"nga~nca. dhaaresi pana tva.m, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattiyo gaathaa''ti? ``na kho aha.m, aavuso, dhaaremi bhaddekarattiyo gaathaati. tva.m panaavuso, dhaaresi bhaddekarattiyo gaathaa''ti? ``ahampi kho, bhikkhu na dhaaremi bhaddekarattiyo gaathaati. ugga.nhaahi tva.m, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesa~nca vibha"nga~nca; pariyaapu.naahi tva.m, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesa~nca vibha"nga~nca; dhaarehi tva.m, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesa~nca vibha"nga~nca. atthasa.mhito, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddeso ^a^T3.0358^ea^ ca vibha"ngo ca aadibrahmacariyako''ti. idamavoca saa devataa; ida.m vatvaa tatthevantaradhaayi.

[03] 280^b^.^eb^ atha kho aayasmaa samiddhi tassaa rattiyaa accayena yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa samiddhi bhagavanta.m etadavoca --

[03] ``idhaaha.m, bhante, rattiyaa paccuusasamaya.m paccu.t.thaaya yena tapodo tenupasa"nkami.m gattaani parisi~ncitu.m. tapode ^a^P3.0193^ea^ gattaani parisi~ncitvaa paccuttaritvaa ekaciivaro a.t.thaasi.m gattaani pubbaapayamaano. atha kho bhante, a~n~nataraa devataa abhikkantaaya rattiyaa abhikkantava.n.naa kevalakappa.m tapoda.m obhaasetvaa yenaaha.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m ^a^V3.0236^ea^ .thitaa kho saa devataa ma.m etadavoca -- `dhaaresi tva.m, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesa~nca vibha"nga~ncaa'''ti?

[03] ``eva.m vutte aha.m, bhante, ta.m devata.m etadavoca.m -- `na kho aha.m, aavuso, dhaaremi bhaddekarattassa uddesa~nca vibha"nga~nca. tva.m panaavuso, dhaaresi ^a^M3.0233^ea^ bhaddekarattassa uddesa~nca vibha"nga~ncaa'ti? `ahampi kho, bhikkhu, na dhaaremi bhaddekarattassa uddesa~nca vibha"nga~nca. dhaaresi pana tva.m, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattiyo gaathaa'ti? `na kho aha.m, aavuso, dhaaremi bhaddekarattiyo gaathaati. tva.m panaavuso, dhaaresi bhaddekarattiyo gaathaa'ti? `ahampi kho, bhikkhu, na dhaaremi bhaddekarattiyo gaathaati. ugga.nhaahi tva.m, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa ^a^T3.0359^ea^ uddesa~nca vibha"nga~nca; pariyaapu.naahi tva.m, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesa~nca vibha"nga~nca; dhaarehi tva.m, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesa~nca vibha"nga~nca. atthasa.mhito, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddeso ca vibha"ngo ca aadibrahmacariyako'ti. idamavoca, bhante, saa devataa; ida.m vatvaa tatthevantaradhaayi. saadhu me, bhante, bhagavaa bhaddekarattassa uddesa~nca vibha"nga~nca desetuu''ti. ``tena hi, bhikkhu, su.naahi, saadhuka.m manasi karohi; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho aayasmaa samiddhi bhagavato paccassosi. bhagavaa etadavoca --
[21] ``atiita.m naanvaagameyya, nappa.tika"nkhe anaagata.m.
[22] yadatiita.m pahiina.m ta.m, appatta~nca anaagata.m..
[21] ``paccuppanna~nca yo dhamma.m, tattha tattha vipassati.
[22] asa.mhiira.m asa.mkuppa.m, ta.m vidvaa manubruuhaye..
[21] ``ajjeva kiccamaatappa.m, ko ja~n~naa mara.na.m suve.
[22] na hi no sa"ngara.m tena, mahaasenena maccunaa..
[21] ``eva.m vihaari.m aataapi.m, ahorattamatandita.m.
[22] ta.m ve bhaddekarattoti, santo aacikkhate munii''ti..

[03] idamavoca bhagavaa; ida.m vatvaana sugato u.t.thaayaasanaa vihaara.m paavisi. atha kho tesa.m bhikkhuuna.m ^a^V3.0237^ea^, acirapakkantassa bhagavato, etadahosi -- ``ida.m kho no, aavuso, bhagavaa sa.mkhittena uddesa.m uddisitvaa vitthaarena attha.m ^a^T3.0360^ea^ avibhajitvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa vihaara.m pavi.t.tho --
[21] ``atiita.m naanvaagameyya, nappa.tika"nkhe anaagata.m.
[22] yadatiita.m pahiina.m ta.m, appatta~nca anaagata.m..
[21] ``paccuppanna~nca yo dhamma.m, tattha tattha vipassati.
[22] asa.mhiira.m asa.mkuppa.m, ta.m vidvaa manubruuhaye..
[21] ``ajjeva ^a^M3.0234^ea^ kiccamaatappa.m, ko ja~n~naa mara.na.m suve.
[22] na hi no sa"ngara.m tena, mahaasenena maccunaa..
[21] ``eva.m vihaari.m aataapi.m, ahorattamatandita.m.
[22] ta.m ve bhaddekarattoti, santo aacikkhate munii''ti..
[03] ``ko nu kho imassa bhagavataa sa.mkhittena uddesassa uddi.t.thassa vitthaarena attha.m avibhattassa vitthaarena attha.m vibhajeyyaa''ti?

[03] atha ^a^P3.0194^ea^ kho tesa.m bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``aya.m kho aayasmaa mahaakaccaano satthu ceva sa.mva.n.nito sambhaavito ca vi~n~nuuna.m sabrahmacaariina.m; pahoti caayasmaa mahaakaccaano imassa bhagavataa sa.mkhittena uddesassa uddi.t.thassa vitthaarena attha.m avibhattassa vitthaarena attha.m vibhajitu.m. ya.mnuuna maya.m yenaayasmaa mahaakaccaano tenupasa"nkameyyaama; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m mahaakaccaana.m etamattha.m pa.tipuccheyyaamaa''ti.

[03] 281^b^.^eb^ atha kho te bhikkhuu yenaayasmaa mahaakaccaano tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmataa mahaakaccaanena saddhi.m sammodi.msu. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa ^a^T3.0361^ea^ kho te bhikkhuu aayasmanta.m mahaakaccaana.m etadavocu.m ^a^V3.0238^ea^ -- ``ida.m kho no, aavuso kaccaana, bhagavaa sa.mkhittena uddesa.m uddisitvaa vitthaarena attha.m avibhajitvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa vihaara.m pavi.t.tho --
[21] ``atiita.m naanvaagameyya...pe0...
[22] ta.m ve bhaddekarattoti, santo aacikkhate munii''ti..

[03] ``tesa.m no, aavuso kaccaana, amhaaka.m, acirapakkantassa bhagavato, etadahosi -- ida.m kho no, aavuso, bhagavaa sa.mkhittena uddesa.m uddisitvaa vitthaarena attha.m avibhajitvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa vihaara.m pavi.t.tho --
[21] ``atiita.m naanvaagameyya...pe0...
[22] ta.m ve bhaddekarattoti, santo aacikkhate munii''ti..

[03] ``ko ^a^V3.0239^ea^ nu kho imassa bhagavataa sa.mkhittena uddesassa uddi.t.thassa vitthaarena attha.m avibhattassa vitthaarena attha.m vibhajeyyaati? tesa.m no ^a^M3.0235^ea^, aavuso kaccaana, amhaaka.m etadahosi -- `aya.m kho aayasmaa mahaakaccaano satthu ceva sa.mva.n.nito sambhaavito ca vi~n~nuuna.m sabrahmacaariina.m. pahoti caayasmaa mahaakaccaano imassa bhagavataa sa.mkhittena uddesassa uddi.t.thassa vitthaarena attha.m avibhattassa vitthaarena attha.m vibhajitu.m. ya.mnuuna maya.m yenaayasmaa mahaakaccaano tenupasa"nkameyyaama; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m mahaakaccaana.m etamattha.m pa.tipuccheyyaamaa'ti. vibhajataayasmaa mahaakaccaano''ti.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, aavuso, puriso saaratthiko saaragavesii saarapariyesana.m ^a^T3.0362^ea^ caramaano mahato rukkhassa ti.t.thato saaravato atikkammeva ^a^P3.0195^ea^ muula.m atikkamma khandha.m saakhaapalaase saara.m pariyesitabba.m ma~n~neyya; eva.m sampadamida.m aayasmantaana.m satthari sammukhiibhuute ta.m bhagavanta.m atisitvaa amhe etamattha.m pa.tipucchitabba.m ma~n~natha {ma~n~netha (pii0)}. so haavuso, bhagavaa jaana.m jaanaati, passa.m passati, cakkhubhuuto ~naa.nabhuuto dhammabhuuto brahmabhuuto vattaa pavattaa atthassa ninnetaa amatassa daataa dhammassaamii tathaagato. so ceva panetassa kaalo ahosi ya.m bhagavanta.myeva etamattha.m pa.tipuccheyyaatha, yathaa vo bhagavaa byaakareyya tathaa na.m dhaareyyaathaa''ti.

[03] ``addhaavuso kaccaana, bhagavaa jaana.m jaanaati, passa.m passati, cakkhubhuuto ~naa.nabhuuto dhammabhuuto brahmabhuuto vattaa pavattaa atthassa ninnetaa amatassa daataa dhammassaamii tathaagato. so ceva panetassa kaalo ahosi ya.m bhagavanta.myeva etamattha.m pa.tipuccheyyaama; yathaa no bhagavaa byaakareyya tathaa na.m dhaareyyaama. api caayasmaa mahaakaccaano satthuceva sa.mva.n.nito sambhaavito ca vi~n~nuuna.m sabrahmacaariina.m; pahoti caayasmaa mahaakaccaano imassa bhagavataa sa.mkhittena uddesassa uddi.t.thassa vitthaarena attha.m avibhattassa vitthaarena attha.m vibhajitu.m. vibhajataayasmaa mahaakaccaano agaru.m karitvaa''ti {agarukaritvaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}.

[03] ``tena haavuso, su.naatha, saadhuka.m manasi karotha; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``evamaavuso''ti kho te bhikkhuu aayasmato mahaakaccaanassa paccassosu.m. aayasmaa ^a^T3.0363^ea^ mahaakaccaano etadavoca --
[03] ``ya.m ^a^M3.0236^ea^ ^a^V3.0240^ea^ kho no, aavuso, bhagavaa sa.mkhittena uddesa.m uddisitvaa vitthaarena attha.m avibhajitvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa vihaara.m pavi.t.tho --
[21] ``atiita.m naanvaagameyya...pe0...
[22] ta.m ve bhaddekarattoti, santo aacikkhate munii''ti..
[03] imassa kho aha.m, aavuso, bhagavataa sa.mkhittena uddesassa uddi.t.thassa vitthaarena attha.m avibhattassa eva.m vitthaarena attha.m aajaanaami --

[03] 282^b^.^eb^ ``katha~nca, aavuso, atiita.m anvaagameti? iti me cakkhu ^a^P3.0196^ea^ ahosi atiitamaddhaana.m iti ruupaati -- tattha chandaraagappa.tibaddha.m {chandaraagappa.tibandha.m (ka0)} hoti vi~n~naa.na.m, chandaraagappa.tibaddhattaa vi~n~naa.nassa tadabhinandati, tadabhinandanto atiita.m anvaagameti. iti me sota.m ahosi atiitamaddhaana.m iti saddaati...pe0... iti me ghaana.m ahosi atiitamaddhaana.m iti gandhaati... iti me jivhaa ahosi atiitamaddhaana.m iti rasaati... iti me kaayo ahosi atiitamaddhaana.m iti pho.t.thabbaati... iti me mano ahosi atiitamaddhaana.m iti dhammaati -- tattha chandaraagappa.tibaddha.m hoti vi~n~naa.na.m, chandaraagappa.tibaddhattaa vi~n~naa.nassa tadabhinandati, tadabhinandanto atiita.m anvaagameti -- eva.m kho, aavuso, atiita.m anvaagameti.

[03] ``katha~nca ^a^V3.0241^ea^, aavuso, atiita.m naanvaagameti? iti me cakkhu ahosi atiitamaddhaana.m iti ruupaati -- tattha na chandaraagappa.tibaddha.m hoti vi~n~naa.na.m, na chandaraagappa.tibaddhattaa vi~n~naa.nassa na tadabhinandati, na ^a^T3.0364^ea^ tadabhinandanto atiita.m naanvaagameti. iti me sota.m ahosi atiitamaddhaana.m iti saddaati...pe0... iti me ghaana.m ahosi atiitamaddhaana.m iti gandhaati... iti me jivhaa ahosi atiitamaddhaana.m iti rasaati... iti me kaayo ahosi atiitamaddhaana.m iti pho.t.thabbaati... iti me mano ahosi atiitamaddhaana.m iti dhammaati -- tattha na chandaraagappa.tibaddha.m hoti vi~n~naa.na.m, na chandaraagappa.tibaddhattaa vi~n~naa.nassa, na tadabhinandati, na tadabhinandanto atiita.m naanvaagameti -- eva.m kho, aavuso, atiita.m naanvaagameti.

[03] 283^b^.^eb^ ``katha~nca ^a^M3.0237^ea^, aavuso, anaagata.m pa.tika"nkhati? iti me cakkhu siyaa anaagatamaddhaana.m iti ruupaati -- appa.tiladdhassa pa.tilaabhaaya citta.m pa.nidahati, cetaso pa.nidhaanapaccayaa tadabhinandati, tadabhinandanto anaagata.m pa.tika"nkhati. iti me sota.m siyaa anaagatamaddhaana.m iti saddaati...pe0... iti me ghaana.m siyaa anaagatamaddhaana.m iti gandhaati... iti me jivhaa siyaa anaagatamaddhaana.m iti rasaati... iti me kaayo siyaa anaagatamaddhaana.m iti pho.t.thabbaati... iti me mano siyaa anaagatamaddhaana.m iti ^a^P3.0197^ea^ dhammaati -- appa.tiladdhassa pa.tilaabhaaya citta.m pa.nidahati, cetaso pa.nidhaanapaccayaa tadabhinandati, tadabhinandanto anaagata.m pa.tika"nkhati -- eva.m kho, aavuso, anaagata.m pa.tika"nkhati.

[01] ``katha~nca, aavuso, anaagata.m nappa.tika"nkhati? iti me cakkhu siyaa anaagatamaddhaana.m iti ruupaati -- appa.tiladdhassa pa.tilaabhaaya citta.m nappa.nidahati ^a^T3.0365^ea^, cetaso appa.nidhaanapaccayaa na tadabhinandati, na tadabhinandanto anaagata.m nappa.tika"nkhati. iti me sota.m siyaa anaagatamaddhaana.m iti saddaati...pe0... iti me ghaana.m siyaa anaagatamaddhaana.m iti gandhaati... iti me jivhaa siyaa anaagatamaddhaana.m iti rasaati... iti me kaayo siyaa anaagatamaddhaana.m iti pho.t.thabbaati... iti me mano siyaa anaagatamaddhaana.m iti dhammaati -- appa.tiladdhassa pa.tilaabhaaya citta.m nappa.nidahati, cetaso appa.nidhaanapaccayaa na tadabhinandati, na tadabhinandanto anaagata.m nappa.tika"nkhati -- eva.m kho, aavuso, anaagata.m nappa.tika"nkhati.

[03] 284^b^.^eb^ ``katha~nca, aavuso, paccuppannesu dhammesu sa.mhiirati? ya~ncaavuso, cakkhu ye ca ruupaa ^a^V3.0242^ea^ -- ubhayameta.m paccuppanna.m. tasmi.m ce paccuppanne chandaraagappa.tibaddha.m hoti vi~n~naa.na.m, chandaraagappa.tibaddhattaa vi~n~naa.nassa tadabhinandati, tadabhinandanto paccuppannesu dhammesu sa.mhiirati. ya~ncaavuso, sota.m ye ca saddaa...pe0... ya~ncaavuso, ghaana.m ye ca gandhaa... yaa caavuso, jivhaa ye ca rasaa... yo caavuso, kaayo ye ca pho.t.thabbaa... yo caavuso, mano ye ca dhammaa -- ubhayameta.m paccuppanna.m. tasmi.m ce paccuppanne chandaraagappa.tibaddha.m hoti vi~n~naa.na.m, chandaraagappa.tibaddhattaa vi~n~naa.nassa tadabhinandati, tadabhinandanto paccuppannesu dhammesu sa.mhiirati -- eva.m kho, aavuso, paccuppannesu dhammesu sa.mhiirati.

[21] ``eva.m vihaari.m aataapi.m, ahorattamatandita.m.
[22] ta.m ve bhaddekarattoti, santo aacikkhate munii''ti..

[03] ```ko ^a^P3.0199^ea^ nu kho imassa bhagavataa sa.mkhittena uddesassa uddi.t.thassa vitthaarena ^a^T3.0368^ea^ attha.m avibhattassa vitthaarena attha.m vibhajeyyaa'ti? tesa.m no, bhante, amhaaka.m etadahosi -- `aya.m kho aayasmaa mahaakaccaano satthu ceva sa.mva.n.nito sambhaavito ca vi~n~nuuna.m sabrahmacaariina.m. pahoti caayasmaa mahaakaccaano imassa bhagavataa sa.mkhittena uddesassa uddi.t.thassa vitthaarena attha.m avibhattassa vitthaarena attha.m vibhajitu.m. ya.mnuuna maya.m yenaayasmaa mahaakaccaano tenupasa"nkameyyaama; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m mahaakaccaana.m etamattha.m pa.tipuccheyyaamaa'ti. atha kho maya.m, bhante, yenaayasmaa mahaakaccaano tenupasa"nkamimha; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m mahaakaccaana.m etamattha.m pa.tipucchimha. tesa.m no, bhante, aayasmataa mahaakaccaanena imehi aakaarehi imehi padehi imehi bya~njanehi attho vibhatto''ti.

[03] ``pa.n.dito, bhikkhave, mahaakaccaano; mahaapa~n~no, bhikkhave mahaakaccaano. ma.m cepi tumhe, bhikkhave, etamattha.m pa.tipuccheyyaatha, ahampi ta.m evameva.m byaakareyya.m yathaa ta.m mahaakaccaanena byaakata.m. eso, cevetassa attho. eva~nca na.m dhaarethaa''ti.
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamanaa te bhikkhuu bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandunti.
[06] mahaakaccaanabhaddekarattasutta.m ni.t.thita.m tatiya.m.

[03] 286^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T3.0369^ea^ ^a^M3.0240^ea^ ^a^V3.0245^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa lomasaka"ngiyo {lomasakaka"ngiyo (.tiikaa)} sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmi.m nigrodhaaraame. atha kho candano devaputto abhikkantaaya rattiyaa abhikkantava.n.no kevalakappa.m nigrodhaaraama.m obhaasetvaa yenaayasmaa lomasaka"ngiyo tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thito kho candano devaputto aayasmanta.m lomasaka"ngiya.m etadavoca -- ``dhaaresi tva.m, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesa~nca vibha"nga~ncaa''ti? ``na ^a^P3.0200^ea^ kho aha.m, aavuso, dhaaremi bhaddekarattassa uddesa~nca vibha"nga~nca. tva.m panaavuso, dhaaresi bhaddekarattassa uddesa~nca vibha"nga~ncaa''ti? ``ahampi kho, bhikkhu, na dhaaremi bhaddekarattassa uddesa~nca vibha"nga~nca. dhaaresi pana tva.m, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattiyo gaathaa''ti? ``na kho aha.m, aavuso, dhaaremi bhaddekarattiyo gaathaa. tva.m panaavuso, dhaaresi bhaddekarattiyo gaathaa''ti? ``dhaaremi kho aha.m, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattiyo gaathaa''ti. ``yathaa katha.m pana tva.m, aavuso, dhaaresi bhaddekarattiyo gaathaa''ti? ``ekamida.m, bhikkhu, samaya.m bhagavaa devesu taavati.msesu viharati paaricchattakamuule pa.n.dukambalasilaaya.m. tatra bhagavaa devaana.m taavati.msaana.m ^a^T3.0370^ea^ bhaddekarattassa uddesa~nca vibha"nga~nca abhaasi --
[21] ``atiita.m naanvaagameyya, nappa.tika"nkhe anaagata.m.
[22] yadatiita.m pahiina.m ta.m, appatta~nca anaagata.m..
[21] ``paccuppanna~nca yo dhamma.m, tattha tattha vipassati.
[22] asa.mhiira.m asa.mkuppa.m, ta.m vidvaa manubruuhaye..
[21] ``ajjeva kiccamaatappa.m, ko ja~n~naa mara.na.m suve.
[22] na hi no sa"ngara.m tena, mahaasenena maccunaa..
[21] ``eva.m ^a^V3.0246^ea^ vihaari.m aataapi.m, ahorattamatandita.m.
[22] ta.m ve bhaddekarattoti, santo aacikkhate munii''ti..

[03] ``eva.m kho aha.m, bhikkhu, dhaaremi bhaddekarattiyo gaathaa. ugga.nhaahi tva.m, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesa~nca vibha"nga~nca; pariyaapu.naahi tva.m ^a^M3.0241^ea^, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesa~nca vibha"nga~nca; dhaarehi tva.m, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesa~nca vibha"nga~nca. atthasa.mhito, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddeso ca vibha"ngo ca aadibrahmacariyako''ti. idamavoca candano devaputto. ida.m vatvaa tatthevantaradhaayi.

[03] 287^b^.^eb^ atha kho aayasmaa lomasaka"ngiyo tassaa rattiyaa accayena senaasana.m sa.msaametvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena saavatthi tena ^a^P3.0201^ea^ caarika.m pakkaami. anupubbena caarika.m caramaano yena saavatthi jetavana.m anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraamo yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m ^a^T3.0371^ea^ abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa lomasaka"ngiyo bhagavanta.m etadavoca --

[01] ``ekamidaaha.m, bhante, samaya.m sakkesu viharaami kapilavatthusmi.m nigrodhaaraame. atha kho, bhante, a~n~nataro devaputto abhikkantaaya rattiyaa abhikkantava.n.no kevalakappa.m nigrodhaaraama.m obhaasetvaa yenaaha.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thito kho, bhante, so devaputto ma.m etadavoca -- `dhaaresi tva.m, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesa~nca vibha"nga~ncaa'ti? eva.m vutte aha.m, bhante, ta.m devaputta.m etadavoca.m -- `na kho aha.m, aavuso, dhaaremi bhaddekarattassa uddesa~nca vibha"nga~nca. tva.m panaavuso, dhaaresi bhaddekarattassa uddesa~nca vibha"nga~ncaa'ti? `ahampi kho, bhikkhu, na dhaaremi bhaddekarattassa uddesa~nca vibha"nga~nca. dhaaresi pana tva.m, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattiyo gaathaa'ti? `na kho aha.m, aavuso, dhaaremi bhaddekarattiyo gaathaa. tva.m panaavuso, dhaaresi bhaddekarattiyo gaathaa'ti? `dhaaremi kho aha.m, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattiyo gaathaa'ti. `yathaa katha.m pana tva.m, aavuso, dhaaresi bhaddekarattiyo gaathaa'ti? ekamida.m, bhikkhu, samaya.m bhagavaa devesu taavati.msesu viharati paaricchattakamuule pa.n.dukambalasilaaya.m ^a^V3.0247^ea^. tatra kho bhagavaa devaana.m taavati.msaana.m bhaddekarattassa uddesa~nca vibha"nga~nca abhaasi --
[21] ``atiita.m naanvaagameyya...pe0...
[22] ta.m ve bhaddekarattoti, santo aacikkhate munii''ti..

[01] ``eva.m ^a^T3.0372^ea^ kho aha.m, bhikkhu, dhaaremi bhaddekarattiyo gaathaa. ugga.nhaahi tva.m, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesa~nca vibha"nga~nca; pariyaapu.naahi tva.m, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa ^a^M3.0242^ea^ uddesa~nca vibha"nga~nca; dhaarehi tva.m, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesa~nca vibha"nga~nca. atthasa.mhito, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddeso ca vibha"ngo ca aadibrahmacariyako'ti. idamavoca, bhante, so devaputto; ida.m vatvaa tatthevantaradhaayi. saadhu me, bhante, bhagavaa bhaddekarattassa uddesa~nca vibha"nga~nca desetuu''ti.

[03] 288^b^.^eb^ ``jaanaasi pana tva.m, bhikkhu, ta.m devaputta''nti? ``na kho aha.m, bhante, jaanaami ta.m devaputta''nti. ``candano naama so, bhikkhu, devaputto. candano, bhikkhu, devaputto a.t.thi.m katvaa {a.t.thikatvaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} manasikatvaa sabbacetasaa {sabba.m cetaso (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0), sabba.m cetasaa (ka0)} samannaaharitvaa ohitasoto dhamma.m su.naati. tena hi, bhikkhu, su.naahi, saadhuka.m manasi karohi; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho aayasmaa lomasaka"ngiyo bhagavato paccassosi. bhagavaa etadavoca --
[21] ``atiita.m ^a^V3.0248^ea^ naanvaagameyya, nappa.tika"nkhe anaagata.m.
[22] yadatiita.m pahiina.m ta.m, appatta~nca anaagata.m..
[21] ``paccuppanna~nca yo dhamma.m, tattha tattha vipassati.
[22] asa.mhiira.m asa.mkuppa.m, ta.m vidvaa manubruuhaye..
[21] ``ajjeva kiccamaatappa.m, ko ja~n~naa mara.na.m suve.
[22] na ^a^T3.0373^ea^ hi no sa"ngara.m tena, mahaasenena maccunaa.
[21] ``eva.m vihaari.m aataapi.m, ahorattamatandita.m.

[22] na hi no sa"ngara.m tena, mahaasenena maccunaa..

[03] 289^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T3.0376^ea^ ^a^V3.0250^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane, anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. atha kho subho maa.navo todeyyaputto yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho subho maa.navo todeyyaputto bhagavanta.m etadavoca --

[03] ``ko nu kho, bho gotama, hetu ko paccayo yena manussaana.myeva sata.m manussabhuutaana.m dissanti hiinappa.niitataa? dissanti hi, bho gotama, manussaa appaayukaa, dissanti diighaayukaa; dissanti bavhaabaadhaa {bahvaabaadhaa (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)}, dissanti appaabaadhaa; dissanti dubba.n.naa, dissanti va.n.navanto; dissanti appesakkhaa, dissanti mahesakkhaa; dissanti appabhogaa, dissanti mahaabhogaa; dissanti niicakuliinaa, dissanti uccaakuliinaa; dissanti duppa~n~naa, dissanti pa~n~navanto {pa~n~naavanto (sii0 pii0)} ^a^P3.0203^ea^. ko nu kho, bho gotama, hetu ko paccayo yena manussaana.myeva sata.m manussabhuutaana.m dissanti hiinappa.niitataa''ti?

[03] ``kammassakaa ^a^M3.0244^ea^, maa.nava, sattaa kammadaayaadaa kammayonii kammabandhuu {kammayoni kammabandhu (sii0)} kammappa.tisara.naa. kamma.m satte vibhajati yadida.m -- hiinappa.niitataayaati. na kho aha.m imassa bhoto gotamassa sa.mkhittena bhaasitassa vitthaarena attha.m avibhattassa vitthaarena attha.m aajaanaami. saadhu ^a^T3.0377^ea^ me bhava.m gotamo tathaa dhamma.m desetu yathaa aha.m imassa bhoto gotamassa sa.mkhittena bhaasitassa vitthaarena attha.m avibhattassa vitthaarena attha.m aajaaneyya''nti.
[03] 290^b^.^eb^ ``tena hi, maa.nava, su.naahi, saadhuka.m manasi karohi; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bho''ti kho subho maa.navo todeyyaputto bhagavato paccassosi. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``idha, maa.nava, ekacco itthii vaa puriso vaa paa.naatipaatii hoti luddo lohitapaa.ni hatapahate nivi.t.tho adayaapanno paa.nabhuutesu {sabbapaa.nabhuutesu (sii0 ka0)}. so tena kammena eva.m samattena eva.m samaadinnena {samaadi.n.nena (pii0 ka0)} kaayassa ^a^V3.0251^ea^ bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati. no ce kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati, sace manussatta.m aagacchati yattha yattha paccaajaayati appaayuko hoti. appaayukasa.mvattanikaa esaa, maa.nava, pa.tipadaa yadida.m -- paa.naatipaatii hoti luddo lohitapaa.ni hatapahate nivi.t.tho adayaapanno paa.nabhuutesu.

[03] ``idha pana, maa.nava, ekacco itthii vaa puriso vaa paa.naatipaata.m pahaaya paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato hoti nihitada.n.do nihitasattho, lajjii dayaapanno sabbapaa.nabhuutahitaanukampii viharati. so tena kammena eva.m samattena eva.m samaadinnena kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjati. no ce kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjati, sace manussatta.m aagacchati ^a^T3.0378^ea^ yattha yattha paccaajaayati diighaayuko hoti. diighaayukasa.mvattanikaa esaa, maa.nava, pa.tipadaa yadida.m -- paa.naatipaata.m pahaaya paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato ^a^P3.0204^ea^ hoti nihitada.n.do nihitasattho, lajjii dayaapanno sabbapaa.nabhuutahitaanukampii viharati.

[03] 291^b^.^eb^ ``idha ^a^M3.0245^ea^, maa.nava, ekacco itthii vaa puriso vaa sattaana.m vihe.thakajaatiko hoti, paa.ninaa vaa le.d.dunaa vaa da.n.dena vaa satthena vaa. so tena kammena eva.m samattena eva.m samaadinnena kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati. no ce kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati, sace manussatta.m aagacchati yattha yattha paccaajaayati bavhaabaadho hoti. bavhaabaadhasa.mvattanikaa esaa, maa.nava, pa.tipadaa yadida.m -- sattaana.m vihe.thakajaatiko hoti paa.ninaa vaa le.d.dunaa vaa da.n.dena vaa satthena vaa.

[03] ``idha pana, maa.nava, ekacco itthii vaa puriso vaa sattaana.m avihe.thakajaatiko hoti paa.ninaa vaa le.d.dunaa vaa da.n.dena vaa satthena vaa. so tena kammena eva.m samattena eva.m samaadinnena kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjati. no ce kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjati, sace manussatta.m aagacchati yattha yattha paccaajaayati appaabaadho hoti. appaabaadhasa.mvattanikaa esaa, maa.nava, pa.tipadaa yadida.m ^a^T3.0379^ea^ -- sattaana.m avihe.thakajaatiko hoti paa.ninaa vaa le.d.dunaa vaa da.n.dena vaa satthena vaa.

[03] 292^b^.^eb^ ``idha, maa.nava, ekacco itthii vaa puriso vaa kodhano hoti upaayaasabahulo. appampi ^a^V3.0252^ea^ vutto samaano abhisajjati kuppati byaapajjati pati.t.thiiyati kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca paatukaroti. so tena kammena eva.m samattena eva.m samaadinnena kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati. no ce kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati, sace manussatta.m aagacchati yattha yattha paccaajaayati dubba.n.no hoti. dubba.n.nasa.mvattanikaa esaa, maa.nava, pa.tipadaa yadida.m -- kodhano hoti upaayaasabahulo; appampi vutto samaano abhisajjati kuppati byaapajjati pati.t.thiiyati kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca paatukaroti.

[03] ``idha pana, maa.nava, ekacco itthii vaa puriso vaa akkodhano hoti anupaayaasabahulo; bahumpi vutto samaano naabhisajjati na kuppati na byaapajjati na pati.t.thiiyati na kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca paatukaroti. so tena kammena eva.m samattena eva.m samaadinnena kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjati. no ce kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa ^a^M3.0246^ea^ sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjati, sace manussatta.m aagacchati yattha yattha paccaajaayati ^a^T3.0380^ea^ paasaadiko hoti. paasaadikasa.mvattanikaa esaa, maa.nava, pa.tipadaa yadida.m -- akkodhano hoti anupaayaasabahulo; bahumpi vutto samaano naabhisajjati na kuppati na byaapajjati na pati.t.thiiyati na kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca paatukaroti.

[03] 293^b^.^eb^ ``idha, maa.nava, ekacco itthii vaa puriso vaa issaamanako hoti; paralaabhasakkaaragarukaaramaananavandanapuujanaasu issati upadussati issa.m bandhati. so tena kammena eva.m samattena eva.m samaadinnena kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati. no ce kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati, sace manussatta.m aagacchati yattha yattha paccaajaayati appesakkho hoti. appesakkhasa.mvattanikaa esaa, maa.nava, pa.tipadaa yadida.m -- issaamanako hoti; paralaabhasakkaaragarukaaramaananavandanapuujanaasu issati upadussati issa.m bandhati.

[03] ``idha ^a^P3.0205^ea^ pana, maa.nava, ekacco itthii vaa puriso vaa anissaamanako hoti; paralaabhasakkaaragarukaaramaananavandanapuujanaasu na issati na upadussati na issa.m bandhati. so tena kammena eva.m samattena eva.m samaadinnena kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjati. no ^a^V3.0253^ea^ ce kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjati, sace manussatta.m aagacchati yattha yattha paccaajaayati mahesakkho hoti. mahesakkhasa.mvattanikaa esaa, maa.nava ^a^T3.0381^ea^, pa.tipadaa yadida.m -- anissaamanako hoti; paralaabhasakkaaragarukaaramaananavandanapuujanaasu na issati na upadussati na issa.m bandhati.

[03] 294^b^.^eb^ ``idha, maa.nava, ekacco itthii vaa puriso vaa na daataa hoti sama.nassa vaa braahma.nassa vaa anna.m paana.m vattha.m yaana.m maalaagandhavilepana.m seyyaavasathapadiipeyya.m. so tena kammena eva.m samattena eva.m samaadinnena kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati. no ce kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati, sace manussatta.m aagacchati yattha yattha paccaajaayati appabhogo hoti. appabhogasa.mvattanikaa esaa, maa.nava, pa.tipadaa yadida.m ^a^M3.0247^ea^ -- na daataa hoti sama.nassa vaa braahma.nassa vaa anna.m paana.m vattha.m yaana.m maalaagandhavilepana.m seyyaavasathapadiipeyya.m.

[01] ``idha pana, maa.nava, ekacco itthii vaa puriso vaa daataa hoti sama.nassa vaa braahma.nassa vaa anna.m paana.m vattha.m yaana.m maalaagandhavilepana.m seyyaavasathapadiipeyya.m. so tena kammena eva.m samattena eva.m samaadinnena kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjati. no ce kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjati, sace manussatta.m aagacchati yattha yattha paccaajaayati mahaabhogo hoti. mahaabhogasa.mvattanikaa esaa, maa.nava, pa.tipadaa yadida.m -- daataa hoti sama.nassa vaa braahma.nassa vaa anna.m ^a^T3.0382^ea^ paana.m vattha.m yaana.m maalaagandhavilepana.m seyyaavasathapadiipeyya.m.

[03] 295^b^.^eb^ ``idha, maa.nava, ekacco itthii vaa puriso vaa thaddho hoti atimaanii -- abhivaadetabba.m na abhivaadeti, paccu.t.thaatabba.m na paccu.t.theti, aasanaarahassa na aasana.m deti, maggaarahassa na magga.m deti, sakkaatabba.m na sakkaroti, garukaatabba.m na garukaroti, maanetabba.m na maaneti, puujetabba.m na puujeti. so tena kammena eva.m samattena eva.m samaadinnena kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati. no ce kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati, sace manussatta.m aagacchati yattha yattha paccaajaayati niicakuliino hoti. niicakuliinasa.mvattanikaa esaa, maa.nava, pa.tipadaa yadida.m -- thaddho hoti atimaanii; abhivaadetabba.m na abhivaadeti, paccu.t.thaatabba.m na paccu.t.theti, aasanaarahassa na aasana.m deti, maggaarahassa na magga.m deti, sakkaatabba.m na sakkaroti, garukaatabba.m na garukaroti, maanetabba.m na maaneti, puujetabba.m na puujeti.

[03] ``idha ^a^V3.0254^ea^ pana, maa.nava, ekacco itthii vaa puriso vaa atthaddho hoti anatimaanii; abhivaadetabba.m abhivaadeti, paccu.t.thaatabba.m paccu.t.theti, aasanaarahassa aasana.m deti, maggaarahassa magga.m deti, sakkaatabba.m sakkaroti, garukaatabba.m garukaroti, maanetabba.m maaneti, puujetabba.m puujeti. so tena kammena eva.m samattena eva.m samaadinnena ^a^T3.0383^ea^ kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjati. no ce kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjati, sace manussatta.m ^a^M3.0248^ea^ aagacchati yattha yattha paccaajaayati uccaakuliino hoti. uccaakuliinasa.mvattanikaa esaa, maa.nava, pa.tipadaa yadida.m -- atthaddho hoti anatimaanii; abhivaadetabba.m abhivaadeti, paccu.t.thaatabba.m paccu.t.theti, aasanaarahassa aasana.m deti, maggaarahassa magga.m deti, sakkaatabba.m sakkaroti, garukaatabba.m garukaroti, maanetabba.m maaneti, puujetabba.m puujeti.

[03] 296^b^.^eb^ ``idha, maa.nava, ekacco itthii vaa puriso vaa sama.na.m vaa braahma.na.m vaa upasa"nkamitvaa na paripucchitaa hoti -- `ki.m, bhante, kusala.m, ki.m akusala.m; ki.m saavajja.m, ki.m anavajja.m; ki.m sevitabba.m, ki.m na sevitabba.m; ki.m me kariiyamaana.m diigharatta.m ahitaaya dukkhaaya hoti, ki.m vaa pana me kariiyamaana.m diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaaya hotii'ti? so tena kammena eva.m samattena eva.m samaadinnena kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati. no ce kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati, sace manussatta.m aagacchati yattha yattha paccaajaayati duppa~n~no hoti. duppa~n~nasa.mvattanikaa esaa, maa.nava, pa.tipadaa yadida.m -- sama.na.m vaa braahma.na.m vaa upasa"nkamitvaa na paripucchitaa hoti -- `ki.m, bhante, kusala.m, ki.m akusala.m; ki.m saavajja.m, ki.m anavajja.m; ki.m sevitabba.m, ki.m na sevitabba.m ^a^T3.0384^ea^; ki.m me kariiyamaana.m diigharatta.m ahitaaya dukkhaaya hoti, ki.m vaa pana me kariiyamaana.m diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaaya hotii'''ti?

[03] ``idha ^a^P3.0206^ea^ pana, maa.nava, ekacco itthii vaa puriso vaa sama.na.m vaa braahma.na.m vaa upasa"nkamitvaa paripucchitaa hoti -- `ki.m, bhante, kusala.m, ki.m akusala.m; ki.m saavajja.m, ki.m anavajja.m; ki.m sevitabba.m, ki.m na sevitabba.m; ki.m me kariiyamaana.m diigharatta.m ahitaaya dukkhaaya hoti, ki.m vaa pana me kariiyamaana.m diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaaya hotii'ti? so tena kammena eva.m samattena eva.m samaadinnena kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjati. no ^a^V3.0255^ea^ ce kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjati, sace manussatta.m aagacchati yattha yattha paccaajaayati mahaapa~n~no hoti. mahaapa~n~nasa.mvattanikaa esaa, maa.nava, pa.tipadaa yadida.m -- sama.na.m vaa braahma.na.m vaa upasa"nkamitvaa paripucchitaa hoti -- `ki.m, bhante, kusala.m, ki.m akusala.m; ki.m saavajja.m, ki.m anavajja.m; ki.m sevitabba.m ^a^M3.0249^ea^, ki.m na sevitabba.m; ki.m me kariiyamaana.m diigharatta.m ahitaaya dukkhaaya hoti, ki.m vaa pana me kariiyamaana.m diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaaya hotii'''ti?

[03] 297^b^.^eb^ ``iti kho, maa.nava, appaayukasa.mvattanikaa pa.tipadaa appaayukatta.m upaneti, diighaayukasa.mvattanikaa pa.tipadaa diighaayukatta.m upaneti; bavhaabaadhasa.mvattanikaa pa.tipadaa bavhaabaadhatta.m upaneti, appaabaadhasa.mvattanikaa pa.tipadaa appaabaadhatta.m upaneti; dubba.n.nasa.mvattanikaa pa.tipadaa ^a^T3.0385^ea^ dubba.n.natta.m upaneti, paasaadikasa.mvattanikaa pa.tipadaa paasaadikatta.m upaneti; appesakkhasa.mvattanikaa pa.tipadaa appesakkhatta.m upaneti, mahesakkhasa.mvattanikaa pa.tipadaa mahesakkhatta.m upaneti; appabhogasa.mvattanikaa pa.tipadaa appabhogatta.m upaneti, mahaabhogasa.mvattanikaa pa.tipadaa mahaabhogatta.m upaneti; niicakuliinasa.mvattanikaa pa.tipadaa niicakuliinatta.m upaneti, uccaakuliinasa.mvattanikaa pa.tipadaa uccaakuliinatta.m upaneti; duppa~n~nasa.mvattanikaa pa.tipadaa duppa~n~natta.m upaneti, mahaapa~n~nasa.mvattanikaa pa.tipadaa mahaapa~n~natta.m upaneti. kammassakaa, maa.nava, sattaa kammadaayaadaa kammayonii kammabandhuu kammappa.tisara.naa. kamma.m satte vibhajati yadida.m -- hiinappa.niitataayaa''ti.

[03] eva.m vutte, subho maa.navo todeyyaputto bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``abhikkanta.m, bho gotama, abhikkanta.m, bho gotama! seyyathaapi, bho gotama, nikkujjita.m vaa ukkujjeyya, pa.ticchanna.m vaa vivareyya, muu.lhassa vaa magga.m aacikkheyya, andhakaare vaa telapajjota.m dhaareyya -- `cakkhumanto ruupaani dakkhantii'ti; evameva.m bhotaa gotamena anekapariyaayena dhammo pakaasito. esaaha.m bhavanta.m gotama.m sara.na.m gacchaami dhamma~nca bhikkhusa"ngha~nca. upaasaka.m ma.m bhava.m gotamo dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti.
[06] cuu.lakammavibha"ngasutta.m ni.t.thita.m pa~ncama.m.

[03] 298^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T3.0386^ea^ ^a^V3.0256^ea^ ^a^P3.0207^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa samiddhi ara~n~naku.tikaaya.m ^a^M3.0250^ea^ viharati. atha kho potaliputto paribbaajako ja"nghaavihaara.m anuca"nkamamaano anuvicaramaano yenaayasmaa samiddhi tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmataa samiddhinaa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho potaliputto paribbaajako aayasmanta.m samiddhi.m etadavoca -- ``sammukhaa meta.m, aavuso samiddhi, sama.nassa gotamassa suta.m, sammukhaa pa.tiggahita.m -- `mogha.m kaayakamma.m mogha.m vaciikamma.m, manokammameva sacca'nti. atthi ca saa {atthi cesaa (sii0 ka0)} samaapatti ya.m samaapatti.m samaapanno na ki~nci vediyatii''ti? ``maa heva.m, aavuso potaliputta, avaca; (maa heva.m, aavuso potaliputta, avaca;) {( ) syaa0 ka.m0 potthakesu natthi} maa bhagavanta.m abbhaacikkhi. na hi saadhu bhagavato abbhakkhaana.m. na hi bhagavaa eva.m vadeyya -- `mogha.m kaayakamma.m mogha.m vaciikamma.m, manokammameva sacca'nti. atthi ca kho {atthi ceva kho (sii0 ka0)} saa, aavuso, samaapatti ya.m samaapatti.m samaapanno na ki~nci vediyatii''ti. ``kiivacira.m pabbajitosi, aavuso samiddhii''ti? ``na cira.m, aavuso! tii.ni vassaanii''ti. ``ettha daani maya.m there bhikkhuu ki.m vakkhaama, yatra hi naama eva.mnavo bhikkhu {navakena bhikkhunaa (ka0)} satthaara.m parirakkhitabba.m ma~n~nissati. sa~ncetanika.m, aavuso samiddhi, kamma.m ^a^T3.0387^ea^ katvaa kaayena vaacaaya manasaa ki.m so vediyatii''ti? ``sa~ncetanika.m, aavuso potaliputta, kamma.m katvaa kaayena vaacaaya manasaa dukkha.m so vediyatii''ti. atha kho potaliputto paribbaajako aayasmato samiddhissa bhaasita.m neva abhinandi nappa.tikkosi; anabhinanditvaa appa.tikkositvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkaami.

[03] 299^b^.^eb^ atha kho aayasmaa samiddhi acirapakkante potaliputte paribbaajake yenaayasmaa aanando tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ^a^P3.0208^ea^ aayasmataa aanandena saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa samiddhi yaavatako ahosi potaliputtena paribbaajakena saddhi.m kathaasallaapo ta.m sabba.m aayasmato aanandassa aarocesi.

[01] eva.m ^a^V3.0257^ea^ vutte, aayasmaa aanando aayasmanta.m samiddhi.m etadavoca -- ``atthi kho ida.m, aavuso samiddhi, kathaapaabhata.m bhagavanta.m dassanaaya. aayaamaavuso ^a^M3.0251^ea^ samiddhi, yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkamissaama; upasa"nkamitvaa etamattha.m bhagavato aarocessaama. yathaa no bhagavaa byaakarissati tathaa na.m dhaaressaamaa''ti. ``evamaavuso''ti kho aayasmaa samiddhi aayasmato aanandassa paccassosi.

[01] atha kho aayasmaa ca aanando aayasmaa ca samiddhi yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa aanando yaavatako ahosi aayasmato samiddhissa potaliputtena ^a^T3.0388^ea^ paribbaajakena saddhi.m kathaasallaapo ta.m sabba.m bhagavato aarocesi. eva.m vutte, bhagavaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m etadavoca -- ``dassanampi kho aha.m, aananda, potaliputtassa paribbaajakassa naabhijaanaami, kuto panevaruupa.m kathaasallaapa.m? iminaa ca, aananda, samiddhinaa moghapurisena potaliputtassa paribbaajakassa vibhajjabyaakara.niiyo pa~nho eka.msena byaakato''ti. eva.m vutte, aayasmaa udaayii bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``sace pana {ki.m pana (ka0)}, bhante, aayasmataa samiddhinaa ida.m sandhaaya bhaasita.m -- ya.m ki~nci vedayita.m ta.m dukkhasmi''nti.

[03] 300^b^.^eb^ atha kho {eva.m vutte (syaa0 ka.m0)} bhagavaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantesi -- ``passasi no tva.m, aananda, imassa udaayissa moghapurisassa umma"nga.m {ummagga.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0), uma"nga.m (ka0)}? a~n~naasi.m kho aha.m, aananda -- `idaanevaaya.m udaayii moghapuriso ummujjamaano ayoniso ummujjissatii'ti. aadi.myeva {aadisova (sii0 pii0), aadiyeva (ka0)}, aananda, potaliputtena paribbaajakena tisso vedanaa pucchitaa. sacaaya.m, aananda, samiddhi moghapuriso potaliputtassa ^a^P3.0209^ea^ paribbaajakassa eva.m pu.t.tho eva.m byaakareyya -- `sa~ncetanika.m, aavuso potaliputta, kamma.m katvaa kaayena vaacaaya manasaa sukhavedaniiya.m sukha.m so vedayati; sa~ncetanika.m, aavuso potaliputta, kamma.m katvaa kaayena vaacaaya manasaa dukkhavedaniiya.m dukkha.m so vedayati; sa~ncetanika.m, aavuso potaliputta, kamma.m katvaa kaayena vaacaaya manasaa adukkhamasukhavedaniiya.m adukkhamasukha.m so vedayatii'ti. eva.m byaakaramaano ^a^T3.0389^ea^ kho, aananda, samiddhi moghapuriso potaliputtassa paribbaajakassa sammaa (byaakaramaano) {( ) natthi (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} byaakareyya. api ^a^M3.0252^ea^ ca, aananda, ke ca {keci (ka0)} a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa baalaa abyattaa ke ca tathaagatassa mahaakammavibha"nga.m jaanissanti? sace tumhe, aananda, su.neyyaatha tathaagatassa mahaakammavibha"nga.m vibhajantassaa''ti.

[03] ``etassa, bhagavaa, kaalo, etassa, sugata, kaalo ya.m bhagavaa mahaakammavibha"nga.m vibhajeyya ^a^V3.0258^ea^. bhagavato sutvaa bhikkhuu dhaaressantii''ti. ``tena haananda, su.naahi, saadhuka.m manasi karohi; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavato paccassosi. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``cattaarome, aananda, puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame cattaaro? idhaananda, ekacco puggalo idha paa.naatipaatii hoti, adinnaadaayii hoti, kaamesumicchaacaarii hoti, musaavaadii hoti, pisu.navaaco hoti, pharusavaaco hoti, samphappalaapii hoti, abhijjhaalu hoti, byaapannacitto hoti, micchaadi.t.thi hoti. so kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati.

[03] ``idha panaananda, ekacco puggalo idha paa.naatipaatii hoti, adinnaadaayii hoti, kaamesumicchaacaarii hoti, musaavaadii hoti, pisu.navaaco hoti, pharusavaaco hoti, samphappalaapii hoti, abhijjhaalu hoti, byaapannacitto hoti, micchaadi.t.thi hoti. so kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjati.

[03] ``idhaananda, ekacco ^a^T3.0390^ea^ puggalo idha paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato hoti, adinnaadaanaa pa.tivirato hoti, kaamesumicchaacaaraa pa.tivirato hoti, musaavaadaa pa.tivirato hoti, pisu.naaya vaacaaya pa.tivirato hoti, pharusaaya vaacaaya ^a^P3.0210^ea^ pa.tivirato hoti, samphappalaapaa pa.tivirato hoti, anabhijjhaalu hoti, abyaapannacitto hoti, sammaadi.t.thi hoti. so kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjati.

[03] ``idha panaananda, ekacco puggalo idha paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato hoti, adinnaadaanaa pa.tivirato hoti, kaamesumicchaacaaraa pa.tivirato hoti, musaavaadaa pa.tivirato hoti, pisu.naaya vaacaaya ^a^M3.0253^ea^ pa.tivirato hoti, pharusaaya vaacaaya pa.tivirato hoti, samphappalaapaa pa.tivirato hoti, anabhijjhaalu hoti, abyaapannacitto hoti, sammaadi.t.thi hoti. so kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati.

[03] 301^b^.^eb^ ``idhaananda, ekacco sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa aatappamanvaaya padhaanamanvaaya anuyogamanvaaya ^a^V3.0259^ea^ appamaadamanvaaya sammaamanasikaaramanvaaya tathaaruupa.m cetosamaadhi.m phusati yathaasamaahite citte dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena amu.m puggala.m passati -- idha paa.naatipaati.m adinnaadaayi.m kaamesumicchaacaari.m musaavaadi.m pisu.navaaca.m pharusavaaca.m samphappalaapi.m abhijjhaalu.m byaapannacitta.m micchaadi.t.thi.m kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa passati apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapanna.m. so evamaaha -- `atthi kira, bho, paapakaani kammaani, atthi ^a^T3.0391^ea^ duccaritassa vipaako. amaaha.m {apaaha.m (sii0 pii0 ka0) amu.m + aha.m = amaaha.m-iti padavibhaago} puggala.m addasa.m idha paa.naatipaati.m adinnaadaayi.m...pe0... micchaadi.t.thi.m kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa passaami apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapanna'nti. so evamaaha -- `yo kira, bho, paa.naatipaatii adinnaadaayii...pe0... micchaadi.t.thi, sabbo so kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati. ye eva.m jaananti, te sammaa jaananti; ye a~n~nathaa jaananti, micchaa tesa.m ~naa.na'nti {micchaa te sa~njaananti (ka0)}. iti so yadeva tassa saama.m ~naata.m saama.m di.t.tha.m saama.m vidita.m tadeva tattha thaamasaa paraamaasaa {paraamassa (sii0 pii0)} abhinivissa voharati -- `idameva sacca.m, moghama~n~na'''nti.

[01] ``idha panaananda, ekacco sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa aatappamanvaaya ^a^P3.0211^ea^ padhaanamanvaaya anuyogamanvaaya appamaadamanvaaya sammaamanasikaaramanvaaya tathaaruupa.m cetosamaadhi.m phusati yathaasamaahite citte dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena amu.m puggala.m passati -- idha paa.naatipaati.m adinnaadaayi.m...pe0... micchaadi.t.thi.m, kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa passati sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapanna.m. so evamaaha -- `natthi kira, bho, paapakaani kammaani, natthi duccaritassa vipaako. amaaha.m puggala.m addasa.m -- idha paa.naatipaati.m adinnaadaayi.m...pe0... micchaadi.t.thi.m, kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa passaami sugati.m sagga.m ^a^T3.0392^ea^ loka.m upapanna'nti. so evamaaha -- `yo ^a^M3.0254^ea^ kira, bho, paa.naatipaatii adinnaadaayii...pe0... micchaadi.t.thi, sabbo so kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjati. ye eva.m jaananti te sammaa jaananti; ye a~n~nathaa jaananti, micchaa tesa.m ~naa.na'nti. iti so yadeva tassa saama.m ~naata.m saama.m di.t.tha.m saama.m vidita.m tadeva tattha thaamasaa paraamaasaa abhinivissa voharati -- `idameva sacca.m, moghama~n~na'''nti.

[03] 302^b^.^eb^ ``tatraananda, yvaaya.m sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa evamaaha -- `atthi kira, bho, paapakaani kammaani, atthi duccaritassa vipaako'ti idamassa anujaanaami; yampi so evamaaha -- `amaaha.m puggala.m addasa.m -- idha paa.naatipaati.m adinnaadaayi.m...pe0... micchaadi.t.thi.m, kaayassa ^a^V3.0261^ea^ bhedaa para.m mara.naa passaami apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapanna'nti idampissa anujaanaami; ya~nca kho so evamaaha -- `yo kira, bho, paa.naatipaatii adinnaadaayii...pe0... micchaadi.t.thi, sabbo so kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjatii'ti idamassa naanujaanaami; yampi so evamaaha -- `ye eva.m jaananti te sammaa jaananti; ye a~n~nathaa jaananti, micchaa tesa.m ~naa.na'nti idampissa naanujaanaami; yampi so yadeva tassa saama.m ~naata.m saama.m di.t.tha.m saama.m vidita.m tadeva tattha thaamasaa paraamaasaa abhinivissa voharati -- `idameva sacca.m, moghama~n~na'nti idampissa naanujaanaami. ta.m kissa hetu? a~n~nathaa hi, aananda, tathaagatassa mahaakammavibha"nge ~naa.na.m hoti.

[03] 304^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T3.0400^ea^ ^a^V3.0264^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``sa.laayatanavibha"nga.m vo, bhikkhave, desessaami. ta.m su.naatha, saadhuka.m manasi karotha; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ```cha ^a^P3.0216^ea^ ajjhattikaani aayatanaani veditabbaani, cha baahiraani aayatanaani veditabbaani, cha vi~n~naa.nakaayaa veditabbaa, cha phassakaayaa veditabbaa, a.t.thaarasa manopavicaaraa veditabbaa, chatti.msa sattapadaa veditabbaa, tatra ida.m nissaaya ida.m pajahatha, tayo satipa.t.thaanaa yadariyo sevati yadariyo ^a^M3.0259^ea^ sevamaano satthaa ga.namanusaasitumarahati, so vuccati yoggaacariyaana.m {yogaacariyaana.m (ka0)} anuttaro purisadammasaarathii'ti -- ayamuddeso sa.laayatanavibha"ngassa.

[03] 305^b^.^eb^ ```cha ajjhattikaani aayatanaani veditabbaanii'ti -- iti kho paneta.m vutta.m. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? `cakkhaayatana.m sotaayatana.m ghaanaayatana.m jivhaayatana.m kaayaayatana.m manaayatana.m -- cha ajjhattikaani aayatanaani veditabbaanii'ti -- iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] ```cha baahiraani aayatanaani veditabbaanii'ti -- iti kho paneta.m vutta.m ^a^T3.0401^ea^. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? `ruupaayatana.m saddaayatana.m gandhaayatana.m rasaayatana.m pho.t.thabbaayatana.m dhammaayatana.m -- cha baahiraani aayatanaani veditabbaanii'ti -- iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] ```cha vi~n~naa.nakaayaa veditabbaa'ti -- iti kho paneta.m vutta.m. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? `cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m sotavi~n~naa.na.m ghaanavi~n~naa.na.m jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m kaayavi~n~naa.na.m manovi~n~naa.na.m -- cha vi~n~naa.nakaayaa veditabbaa'ti -- iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] ```cha ^a^V3.0265^ea^ phassakaayaa veditabbaa'ti -- iti kho paneta.m vutta.m. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? `cakkhusamphasso sotasamphasso ghaanasamphasso jivhaasamphasso kaayasamphasso manosamphasso -- cha phassakaayaa veditabbaa'ti -- iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] ```a.t.thaarasa manopavicaaraa veditabbaa'ti -- iti kho paneta.m vutta.m. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? `cakkhunaa ruupa.m disvaa somanassa.t.thaaniiya.m ruupa.m upavicarati, domanassa.t.thaaniiya.m ruupa.m upavicarati, upekkhaa.t.thaaniiya.m ruupa.m upavicarati. sotena sadda.m sutvaa...pe0... ghaanena gandha.m ghaayitvaa... jivhaaya rasa.m saayitvaa... kaayena pho.t.thabba.m ^a^P3.0217^ea^ phusitvaa... manasaa dhamma.m vi~n~naaya somanassa.t.thaaniiya.m dhamma.m upavicarati, domanassa.t.thaaniiya.m dhamma.m upavicarati, upekkhaa.t.thaaniiya.m dhamma.m upavicarati. iti cha somanassuupavicaaraa, cha domanassuupavicaaraa, cha upekkhuupavicaaraa, a.t.thaarasa manopavicaaraa veditabbaa'ti -- iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] 306^b^.^eb^ ```chatti.msa ^a^T3.0402^ea^ ^a^M3.0260^ea^ sattapadaa veditabbaa'ti -- iti kho paneta.m vutta.m. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? cha gehasitaani {gehassitaani (?)} somanassaani, cha nekkhammasitaani {nekkhammassitaani (.tiikaa)} somanassaani, cha gehasitaani domanassaani, cha nekkhammasitaani domanassaani, cha gehasitaa upekkhaa, cha nekkhammasitaa upekkhaa. tattha katamaani cha gehasitaani somanassaani? cakkhuvi~n~neyyaana.m ruupaana.m i.t.thaana.m kantaana.m manaapaana.m manoramaana.m lokaamisapa.tisa.myuttaana.m pa.tilaabha.m vaa pa.tilaabhato samanupassato pubbe vaa pa.tiladdhapubba.m atiita.m niruddha.m vipari.nata.m samanussarato uppajjati somanassa.m. ya.m evaruupa.m somanassa.m ida.m vuccati gehasita.m somanassa.m. sotavi~n~neyyaana.m saddaana.m... ghaanavi~n~neyyaana.m gandhaana.m... jivhaavi~n~neyyaana.m rasaana.m... kaayavi~n~neyyaana.m pho.t.thabbaana.m... manovi~n~neyyaana.m dhammaana.m i.t.thaana.m kantaana.m manaapaana.m...pe0... somanassa.m. ya.m evaruupa.m somanassa.m ida.m vuccati gehasita.m somanassa.m. imaani cha gehasitaani somanassaani.

[03] ``tattha katamaani cha nekkhammasitaani somanassaani? ruupaana.mtveva aniccata.m viditvaa vipari.naamaviraaganirodha.m {vipari.naama.m viraaga.m nirodha.m (ka0)}, `pubbe ceva ruupaa etarahi ca sabbe te ruupaa aniccaa dukkhaa vipari.naamadhammaa'ti evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya passato uppajjati somanassa.m. ya.m ^a^T3.0403^ea^ evaruupa.m somanassa.m ida.m vuccati nekkhammasita.m somanassa.m. saddaana.mtveva... gandhaana.mtveva... rasaana.mtveva... pho.t.thabbaana.mtveva... dhammaana.mtve ^a^P3.0218^ea^ aniccata.m viditvaa vipari.naamaviraaganirodha.m, `pubbe ceva dhammaa etarahi ^a^V3.0266^ea^ ca sabbe te dhammaa aniccaa dukkhaa vipari.naamadhammaa'ti evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya passato uppajjati somanassa.m. ya.m evaruupa.m somanassa.m ida.m vuccati nekkhammasita.m somanassa.m. imaani cha nekkhammasitaani somanassaani.

[03] 307^b^.^eb^ ``tattha katamaani cha gehasitaani domanassaani? cakkhuvi~n~neyyaana.m ruupaana.m...pe0... sotavi~n~neyyaana.m saddaana.m... ghaanavi~n~neyyaana.m gandhaana.m... jivhaavi~n~neyyaana.m rasaana.m... kaayavi~n~neyyaana.m pho.t.thabbaana.m... manovi~n~neyyaana.m dhammaana.m i.t.thaana.m kantaana.m manaapaana.m manoramaana.m lokaamisapa.tisa.myuttaana.m appa.tilaabha.m vaa appa.tilaabhato samanupassato pubbe vaa appa.tiladdhapubba.m atiita.m niruddha.m vipari.nata.m samanussarato uppajjati domanassa.m. ya.m evaruupa.m domanassa.m ^a^M3.0261^ea^ ida.m vuccati gehasita.m domanassa.m. imaani cha gehasitaani domanassaani.

[03] ``tattha katamaani cha nekkhammasitaani domanassaani? ruupaana.mtveva ^a^T3.0404^ea^ aniccata.m viditvaa vipari.naamaviraaganirodha.m, `pubbe ceva ruupaa etarahi ca sabbe te ruupaa aniccaa dukkhaa vipari.naamadhammaa'ti evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya disvaa anuttaresu vimokkhesu piha.m upa.t.thaapeti -- `kudaassu {kadaassu (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} naamaaha.m tadaayatana.m upasampajja viharissaami yadariyaa etarahi aayatana.m upasampajja viharantii'ti iti anuttaresu vimokkhesu piha.m upa.t.thaapayato uppajjati pihapaccayaa domanassa.m. ya.m evaruupa.m domanassa.m ida.m vuccati nekkhammasita.m domanassa.m. saddaana.mtveva...pe0... gandhaana.mtveva... rasaana.mtveva... pho.t.thabbaana.mtveva... dhammaana.mtveva aniccata.m viditvaa vipari.naamaviraaganirodha.m, `pubbe ceva dhammaa etarahi ca sabbe te dhammaa aniccaa dukkhaa vipari.naamadhammaa'ti ^a^P3.0219^ea^ evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya disvaa anuttaresu vimokkhesu piha.m upa.t.thaapeti -- `kudaassu naamaaha.m tadaayatana.m upasampajja viharissaami yadariyaa etarahi aayatana.m upasampajja viharantii'ti iti anuttaresu vimokkhesu piha.m upa.t.thaapayato uppajjati pihapaccayaa domanassa.m. ya.m evaruupa.m domanassa.m ida.m vuccati nekkhammasita.m domanassa.m. imaani cha nekkhammasitaani domanassaani.

[03] 308^b^.^eb^ ``tattha katamaa cha gehasitaa upekkhaa? cakkhunaa ruupa.m disvaa uppajjati upekkhaa baalassa muu.lhassa ( ) {(mandassa) (ka0)} puthujjanassa anodhijinassa avipaakajinassa anaadiinavadassaavino assutavato puthujjanassa. yaa evaruupaa upekkhaa, ruupa.m saa naativattati. tasmaa saa {saaya.m (ka0)} upekkhaa `gehasitaa'ti ^a^T3.0405^ea^ ^a^V3.0267^ea^ vuccati. sotena sadda.m sutvaa... ghaanena gandha.m ghaayitvaa... jivhaaya rasa.m saayitvaa... kaayena pho.t.thabba.m phusitvaa... manasaa dhamma.m vi~n~naaya uppajjati upekkhaa baalassa muu.lhassa puthujjanassa anodhijinassa avipaakajinassa anaadiinavadassaavino assutavato puthujjanassa. yaa evaruupaa upekkhaa, dhamma.m saa naativattati. tasmaa saa upekkhaa `gehasitaa'ti vuccati. imaa cha gehasitaa upekkhaa.

[03] ``tattha katamaa cha nekkhammasitaa upekkhaa? ruupaana.mtveva aniccata.m viditvaa vipari.naamaviraaganirodha.m, `pubbe ceva ruupaa etarahi ca sabbe te ruupaa ^a^M3.0262^ea^ aniccaa dukkhaa vipari.naamadhammaa'ti evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya passato uppajjati upekkhaa. yaa evaruupaa upekkhaa, ruupa.m saa ativattati. tasmaa saa upekkhaa `nekkhammasitaa'ti vuccati. saddaana.mtveva... gandhaana.mtveva... rasaana.mtveva... pho.t.thabbaana.mtveva... dhammaana.mtveva aniccata.m viditvaa vipari.naamaviraaganirodha.m, `pubbe ceva dhammaa etarahi ca sabbe te dhammaa aniccaa dukkhaa vipari.naamadhammaa'ti evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya passato uppajjati upekkhaa. yaa evaruupaa upekkhaa, dhamma.m saa ativattati. tasmaa saa upekkhaa `nekkhammasitaa'ti vuccati. imaa cha nekkhammasitaa upekkhaa. `chatti.msa sattapadaa veditabbaa'ti -- iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] 309^b^.^eb^ ``tatra ^a^T3.0406^ea^ ^a^P3.0220^ea^ ida.m nissaaya ida.m pajahathaa''ti -- iti kho paneta.m vutta.m; ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? tatra, bhikkhave, yaani cha nekkhammasitaani somanassaani taani nissaaya taani aagamma yaani cha gehasitaani somanassaani taani pajahatha, taani samatikkamatha. evametesa.m pahaana.m hoti, evametesa.m samatikkamo hoti.

[03] ``tatra, bhikkhave, yaani cha nekkhammasitaani domanassaani taani nissaaya taani aagamma yaani cha gehasitaani domanassaani taani pajahatha, taani samatikkamatha. evametesa.m pahaana.m hoti, evametesa.m samatikkamo hoti.

[03] ``tatra, bhikkhave, yaa cha nekkhammasitaa upekkhaa taa nissaaya taa aagamma yaa cha gehasitaa ^a^V3.0268^ea^ upekkhaa taa pajahatha, taa samatikkamatha. evametaasa.m pahaana.m hoti, evametaasa.m samatikkamo hoti.

[03] ``tatra, bhikkhave, yaani cha nekkhammasitaani somanassaani taani nissaaya taani aagamma yaani cha nekkhammasitaani domanassaani taani pajahatha, taani samatikkamatha. evametesa.m pahaana.m hoti, evametesa.m samatikkamo hoti.

[03] ``tatra, bhikkhave, yaa cha nekkhammasitaa upekkhaa taa nissaaya taa aagamma yaani cha nekkhammasitaani somanassaani taani pajahatha, taani samatikkamatha. evametesa.m pahaana.m hoti, evametesa.m samatikkamo hoti.

[03] 310^b^.^eb^ ``atthi ^a^M3.0263^ea^, bhikkhave, upekkhaa naanattaa naanattasitaa, atthi upekkhaa ekattaa ekattasitaa. katamaa ca, bhikkhave, upekkhaa naanattaa naanattasitaa? atthi, bhikkhave, upekkhaa ruupesu, atthi saddesu ^a^T3.0407^ea^, atthi gandhesu, atthi rasesu, atthi pho.t.thabbesu -- aya.m, bhikkhave, upekkhaa naanattaa naanattasitaa. katamaa ca, bhikkhave, upekkhaa ekattaa ekattasitaa? atthi, bhikkhave, upekkhaa aakaasaana~ncaayatananissitaa, atthi vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatananissitaa, atthi aaki~nca~n~naayatananissitaa, atthi nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatananissitaa -- aya.m, bhikkhave, upekkhaa ekattaa ekattasitaa.

[03] ``tatra, bhikkhave, yaaya.m upekkhaa ekattaa ekattasitaa ta.m nissaaya ta.m aagamma yaaya.m upekkhaa naanattaa naanattasitaa ta.m pajahatha, ta.m samatikkamatha. evametissaa pahaana.m hoti, evametissaa samatikkamo hoti.

[03] ``atammayata.m, bhikkhave, nissaaya atammayata.m aagamma yaaya.m upekkhaa ekattaa ekattasitaa ta.m pajahatha, ta.m samatikkamatha. evametissaa pahaana.m hoti, evametissaa samatikkamo hoti. `tatra ida.m ^a^P3.0221^ea^ nissaaya ida.m pajahathaa'ti -- iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] 311^b^.^eb^ ```tayo ^a^V3.0269^ea^ satipa.t.thaanaa yadariyo sevati, yadariyo sevamaano satthaa ga.namanusaasitumarahatii'ti -- iti kho paneta.m vutta.m; ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? idha, bhikkhave, satthaa saavakaana.m dhamma.m deseti anukampako hitesii anukampa.m upaadaaya -- `ida.m vo hitaaya, ida.m vo sukhaayaa'ti. tassa saavakaa na sussuusanti, na sota.m odahanti, na a~n~naa citta.m upa.t.thapenti ^a^T3.0408^ea^, vokkamma ca satthusaasanaa vattanti. tatra, bhikkhave, tathaagato na ceva anattamano hoti, na ca anattamanata.m pa.tisa.mvedeti, anavassuto ca viharati sato sampajaano. ida.m, bhikkhave, pa.thama.m satipa.t.thaana.m yadariyo sevati, yadariyo sevamaano satthaa ga.namanusaasitumarahati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, satthaa saavakaana.m dhamma.m deseti anukampako hitesii anukampa.m upaadaaya -- `ida.m vo hitaaya, ida.m vo sukhaayaa'ti. tassa ekacce saavakaa na sussuusanti, na sota.m odahanti, na a~n~naa citta.m upa.t.thapenti, vokkamma ca satthusaasanaa vattanti; ekacce saavakaa sussuusanti, sota.m odahanti, a~n~naa citta.m upa.t.thapenti, na ca vokkamma satthusaasanaa vattanti ^a^M3.0264^ea^. tatra, bhikkhave, tathaagato na ceva anattamano hoti, na ca anattamanata.m pa.tisa.mvedeti; na ca attamano hoti, na ca attamanata.m pa.tisa.mvedeti. anattamanataa ca attamanataa ca -- tadubhaya.m abhinivajjetvaa upekkhako viharati sato sampajaano. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, dutiya.m satipa.t.thaana.m yadariyo sevati, yadariyo sevamaano satthaa ga.namanusaasitumarahati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, satthaa saavakaana.m dhamma.m deseti anukampako hitesii anukampa.m upaadaaya -- `ida.m vo hitaaya, ida.m vo sukhaayaa'ti. tassa saavakaa sussuusanti, sota.m odahanti, a~n~naacitta.m ^a^T3.0409^ea^ upa.t.thapenti, na ca vokkamma satthusaasanaa vattanti. tatra, bhikkhave, tathaagato attamano ceva hoti, attamanata~nca pa.tisa.mvedeti, anavassuto ca viharati sato sampajaano. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, tatiya.m satipa.t.thaana.m yadariyo sevati, yadariyo sevamaano satthaa ga.namanusaasitumarahati. `tayo ^a^P3.0222^ea^ satipa.t.thaanaa yadariyo sevati, yadariyo sevamaano satthaa ga.namanusaasitumarahatii'ti -- iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] 312^b^.^eb^ ```so vuccati yoggaacariyaana.m anuttaro purisadammasaarathii'ti -- iti kho paneta.m ^a^V3.0270^ea^ vutta.m. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? hatthidamakena, bhikkhave, hatthidammo saarito eka.myeva disa.m dhaavati -- puratthima.m vaa pacchima.m vaa uttara.m vaa dakkhi.na.m vaa. assadamakena, bhikkhave, assadammo saarito eka~n~neva disa.m dhaavati -- puratthima.m vaa pacchima.m vaa uttara.m vaa dakkhi.na.m vaa. godamakena, bhikkhave, godammo saarito eka.myeva disa.m dhaavati -- puratthima.m vaa pacchima.m vaa uttara.m vaa dakkhi.na.m vaa. tathaagatena hi, bhikkhave, arahataa sammaasambuddhena purisadammo saarito a.t.tha disaa vidhaavati. ruupii ruupaani passati -- aya.m ekaa disaa; ajjhatta.m aruupasa~n~nii bahiddhaa ruupaani passati -- aya.m dutiyaa disaa; subhantveva adhimutto hoti -- aya.m tatiyaa disaa; sabbaso ruupasa~n~naana.m samatikkamaa pa.tighasa~n~naana.m attha"ngamaa naanattasa~n~naana.m amanasikaaraa `ananto aakaaso'ti aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m ^a^T3.0410^ea^ upasampajja viharati -- aya.m catutthii disaa; sabbaso aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m samatikkamma `ananta.m vi~n~naa.na'nti vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m upasampajja viharati -- aya.m pa~ncamii disaa; sabbaso vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m samatikkamma `natthi ki~ncii'ti aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m upasampajja ^a^M3.0265^ea^ viharati -- aya.m cha.t.thii disaa; sabbaso aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m samatikkamma nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m upasampajja viharati -- aya.m sattamii disaa; sabbaso nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m samatikkamma sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m upasampajja viharati -- aya.m a.t.thamii disaa. tathaagatena, bhikkhave, arahataa sammaasambuddhena purisadammo saarito imaa a.t.tha disaa vidhaavati. `so vuccati yoggaacariyaana.m anuttaro purisadammasaarathii'ti -- iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m idameta.m pa.ticca vutta''nti.
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamanaa te bhikkhuu bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandunti.
[06] sa.laayatanavibha"ngasutta.m ni.t.thita.m sattama.m.

[03] 313^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T3.0411^ea^ ^a^V3.0271^ea^ ^a^P3.0223^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``uddesavibha"nga.m vo, bhikkhave, desessaami. ta.m su.naatha, saadhuka.m manasi karotha; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``tathaa tathaa, bhikkhave, bhikkhu upaparikkheyya yathaa yathaa {yathaa yathaassa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} upaparikkhato bahiddhaa cassa vi~n~naa.na.m avikkhitta.m avisa.ta.m, ajjhatta.m asa.n.thita.m anupaadaaya na paritasseyya. bahiddhaa, bhikkhave, vi~n~naa.ne avikkhitte avisa.te sati ajjhatta.m asa.n.thite anupaadaaya aparitassato aayati.m jaatijaraamara.nadukkhasamudayasambhavo na hotii''ti. idamavoca bhagavaa. ida.m vatvaana sugato u.t.thaayaasanaa vihaara.m paavisi.

[03] 314^b^.^eb^ atha kho tesa.m bhikkhuuna.m, acirapakkantassa bhagavato, etadahosi -- ``ida.m kho no, aavuso, bhagavaa sa.mkhittena uddesa.m uddisitvaa vitthaarena attha.m avibhajitvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa vihaara.m pavi.t.tho -- `tathaa tathaa, bhikkhave ^a^M3.0266^ea^, bhikkhu upaparikkheyya yathaa yathaa upaparikkhato bahiddhaa cassa vi~n~naa.na.m avikkhitta.m avisa.ta.m, ajjhatta.m asa.n.thita.m anupaadaaya na paritasseyya. bahiddhaa ^a^T3.0412^ea^, bhikkhave, vi~n~naa.ne avikkhitte avisa.te sati ajjhatta.m asa.n.thite anupaadaaya aparitassato aayati.m jaatijaraamara.nadukkhasamudayasambhavo na hotii'ti. ko nu kho imassa bhagavataa sa.mkhittena uddesassa uddi.t.thassa vitthaarena attha.m avibhattassa vitthaarena attha.m vibhajeyyaa''ti? atha kho tesa.m bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``aya.m kho aayasmaa mahaakaccaano satthu ceva sa.mva.n.nito sambhaavito ca vi~n~nuuna.m sabrahmacaariina.m; pahoti caayasmaa mahaakaccaano imassa bhagavataa sa.mkhittena uddesassa uddi.t.thassa vitthaarena attha.m avibhattassa vitthaarena attha.m vibhajitu.m. ya.mnuuna maya.m yenaayasmaa mahaakaccaano ^a^P3.0224^ea^ tenupasa"nkameyyaama; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m mahaakaccaana.m etamattha.m pa.tipuccheyyaamaa''ti.

[03] atha ^a^V3.0272^ea^ kho te bhikkhuu yenaayasmaa mahaakaccaano tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmataa mahaakaccaanena saddhi.m sammodi.msu. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho te bhikkhuu aayasmanta.m mahaakaccaana.m etadavocu.m --

[03] ``ida.m kho no, aavuso kaccaana, bhagavaa sa.mkhittena uddesa.m uddisitvaa vitthaarena attha.m avibhajitvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa vihaara.m pavi.t.tho -- `tathaa tathaa, bhikkhave, bhikkhu upaparikkheyya yathaa yathaa upaparikkhato bahiddhaa cassa vi~n~naa.na.m avikkhitta.m avisa.ta.m, ajjhatta.m asa.n.thita.m anupaadaaya na paritasseyya. bahiddhaa, bhikkhave, vi~n~naa.ne avikkhitte avisa.te sati ajjhatta.m asa.n.thite anupaadaaya aparitassato aayati.m jaatijaraamara.nadukkhasamudayasambhavo na hotii'ti. tesa.m no, aavuso kaccaana, amhaaka.m, acirapakkantassa bhagavato, etadahosi -- `ida.m kho no, aavuso, bhagavaa sa.mkhittena uddesa.m uddisitvaa vitthaarena attha.m avibhajitvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa vihaara.m pavi.t.tho -- tathaa tathaa, bhikkhave, bhikkhu upaparikkheyya, yathaa yathaa upaparikkhato bahiddhaa cassa vi~n~naa.na.m avikkhitta.m avisa.ta.m ajjhatta.m asa.n.thita.m anupaadaaya na paritasseyya. bahiddhaa, bhikkhave, vi~n~naa.ne avikkhitte ^a^T3.0413^ea^ avisa.te sati ajjhatta.m asa.n.thite anupaadaaya aparitassato aayati.m jaatijaraamara.nadukkhasamudayasambhavo na hotii'ti. ko nu kho imassa bhagavataa sa.mkhittena uddesassa uddi.t.thassa vitthaarena attha.m ^a^M3.0267^ea^ avibhattassa vitthaarena attha.m vibhajeyyaa''ti. ``tesa.m no, aavuso kaccaana, amhaaka.m etadahosi -- `aya.m kho aayasmaa mahaakaccaano satthu ceva sa.mva.n.nito, sambhaavito ca vi~n~nuuna.m sabrahmacaariina.m. pahoti caayasmaa mahaakaccaano imassa bhagavataa sa.mkhittena uddesassa uddi.t.thassa vitthaarena attha.m avibhattassa vitthaarena attha.m vibhajitu.m. ya.mnuuna maya.m yenaayasmaa mahaakaccaano tenupasa"nkameyyaama; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m mahaakaccaana.m etamattha.m pa.tipuccheyyaamaa'ti -- vibhajataayasmaa mahaakaccaano''ti.
