[03] 315^b^.^eb^ ```seyyathaapi, aavuso, puriso saaratthiko saaragavesii saarapariyesana.m caramaano mahato rukkhassa ti.t.thato saaravato atikkammeva muula.m ^a^T3.0414^ea^ atikkamma khandha.m saakhaapalaase saara.m pariyesitabba.m ma~n~neyya, eva.m sampadamida.m aayasmantaana.m satthari sammukhiibhuute ta.m bhagavanta.m atisitvaa amhe etamattha.m pa.tipucchitabba.m ma~n~natha. so haavuso, bhagavaa jaana.m jaanaati, passa.m passati, cakkhubhuuto ~naa.nabhuuto dhammabhuuto brahmabhuuto vattaa pavattaa atthassa ninnetaa amatassa daataa dhammassaamii tathaagato. so ceva panetassa kaalo ahosi ya.m bhagavanta.myeva etamattha.m pa.tipuccheyyaatha; yathaa vo bhagavaa byaakareyya tathaa na.m dhaareyyaathaa'''ti. `addhaavuso kaccaana, bhagavaa ^a^V3.0273^ea^ jaana.m jaanaati, passa.m passati, cakkhubhuuto ~naa.nabhuuto dhammabhuuto brahmabhuuto vattaa pavattaa atthassa ninnetaa amatassa daataa dhammassaamii tathaagato. so ceva panetassa kaalo ahosi ya.m bhagavanta.myeva etamattha.m pa.tipuccheyyaama; yathaa no bhagavaa byaakareyya ^a^P3.0225^ea^ tathaa na.m dhaareyyaama. api caayasmaa mahaakaccaano satthu ceva sa.mva.n.nito sambhaavito ca vi~n~nuuna.m sabrahmacaariina.m. pahoti caayasmaa mahaakaccaano imassa bhagavataa sa.mkhittena uddesassa uddi.t.thassa vitthaarena attha.m avibhattassa vitthaarena attha.m vibhajitu.m. vibhajataayasmaa mahaakaccaano agaru.m karitvaa'ti. `tena haavuso, su.naatha, saadhuka.m manasi karotha; bhaasissaamii'ti. `evamaavuso'ti kho te bhikkhuu aayasmato mahaakaccaanassa paccassosu.m. aayasmaa mahaakaccaano etadavoca --

[03] `ya.m kho no, aavuso, bhagavaa ^a^T3.0415^ea^ sa.mkhittena uddesa.m uddisitvaa vitthaarena attha.m avibhajitvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa vihaara.m pavi.t.tho -- tathaa tathaa, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ^a^M3.0268^ea^ upaparikkheyya, yathaa yathaa upaparikkhato bahiddhaa cassa vi~n~naa.na.m avikkhitta.m avisa.ta.m ajjhatta.m asa.n.thita.m anupaadaaya na paritasseyya, bahiddhaa, bhikkhave, vi~n~naa.ne avikkhitte avisa.te sati ajjhatta.m asa.n.thite anupaadaaya aparitassato aayati.m jaatijaraamara.nadukkhasamudayasambhavo na hotii'ti. imassa kho aha.m, aavuso, bhagavataa sa.mkhittena uddesassa uddi.t.thassa vitthaarena attha.m avibhattassa eva.m vitthaarena attha.m aajaanaami.

[03] 316^b^.^eb^ ``katha~ncaavuso, bahiddhaa vi~n~naa.na.m vikkhitta.m visa.tanti vuccati? idhaavuso, bhikkhuno cakkhunaa ruupa.m disvaa ruupanimittaanusaari vi~n~naa.na.m hoti ruupanimittassaadagadhita.m {...gathita.m (sii0 pii0)} ruupanimittassaadavinibandha.m {...vinibandha.m (sii0 pii0)} ruupanimittassaadasa.myojanasa.myutta.m bahiddhaa vi~n~naa.na.m vikkhitta.m visa.tanti vuccati. sotena sadda.m sutvaa...pe0... ghaanena gandha.m ghaayitvaa... jivhaaya rasa.m saayitvaa... kaayena pho.t.thabba.m phusitvaa... manasaa dhamma.m vi~n~naaya dhammanimittaanusaarii vi~n~naa.na.m hoti; dhammanimittassaadagadhita.m dhammanimittassaadavinibandha.m dhammanimittassaadasa.myojanasa.myutta.m bahiddhaa vi~n~naa.na.m vikkhitta.m visa.tanti vuccati. eva.m kho aavuso, bahiddhaa vi~n~naa.na.m vikkhitta.m visa.tanti vuccati.

[03] 317^b^.^eb^ ``katha~ncaavuso, bahiddhaa vi~n~naa.na.m avikkhitta.m avisa.tanti vuccati ^a^T3.0416^ea^? idhaavuso, bhikkhuno cakkhunaa ruupa.m disvaa na ruupanimittaanusaari vi~n~naa.na.m hoti ruupanimittassaadagadhita.m na ^a^V3.0274^ea^ ruupanimittassaadavinibandha.m na ruupanimittassaadasa.myojanasa.myutta.m bahiddhaa vi~n~naa.na.m avikkhitta.m avisa.tanti vuccati ^a^P3.0226^ea^. sotena sadda.m sutvaa...pe0... ghaanena gandha.m ghaayitvaa... jivhaaya rasa.m saayitvaa... kaayena pho.t.thabba.m phusitvaa... manasaa dhamma.m vi~n~naaya na dhammanimittaanusaarii vi~n~naa.na.m hoti na dhammanimittassaadagadhita.m na dhammanimittassaadavinibandha.m na dhammanimittassaadasa.myojanasa.myutta.m bahiddhaa vi~n~naa.na.m avikkhitta.m avisa.tanti vuccati. eva.m kho, aavuso, bahiddhaa vi~n~naa.na.m avikkhitta.m avisa.tanti vuccati.

[03] 318^b^.^eb^ ``katha~ncaavuso, ajjhatta.m {ajjhatta.m citta.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} sa.n.thitanti vuccati? idhaavuso, bhikkhu vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. tassa vivekajapiitisukhaanusaari vi~n~naa.na.m hoti vivekajapiitisukhassaadagadhita.m vivekajapiitisukhassaadavinibandha.m ^a^M3.0269^ea^ vivekajapiitisukhassaadasa.myojanasa.myutta.m ajjhatta.m citta.m sa.n.thitanti vuccati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m cetaso ekodibhaava.m avitakka.m avicaara.m samaadhija.m piitisukha.m dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. tassa samaadhijapiitisukhaanusaari vi~n~naa.na.m hoti samaadhijapiitisukhassaadagadhita.m samaadhijapiitisukhassaadavinibandha.m samaadhijapiitisukhassaadasa.myojanasa.myutta.m ajjhatta.m citta.m sa.n.thitanti vuccati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu piitiyaa ca viraagaa upekkhako ^a^T3.0417^ea^ ca viharati sato ca sampajaano sukha~nca kaayena pa.tisa.mvedeti, ya.m ta.m ariyaa aacikkhanti -- `upekkhako satimaa sukhavihaarii'ti tatiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. tassa upekkhaanusaari vi~n~naa.na.m hoti upekkhaasukhassaadagadhita.m upekkhaasukhassaadavinibandha.m upekkhaasukhassaadasa.myojanasa.myutta.m ajjhatta.m citta.m sa.n.thitanti vuccati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahaanaa dukkhassa ca pahaanaa pubbeva somanassadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaa adukkhamasukha.m upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. tassa adukkhamasukhaanusaari vi~n~naa.na.m hoti adukkhamasukhassaadagadhita.m adukkhamasukhassaadavinibandha.m ^a^V3.0275^ea^ adukkhamasukhassaadasa.myojanasa.myutta.m ajjhatta.m citta.m sa.n.thitanti vuccati. eva.m kho, aavuso, ajjhatta.m {ajjhatta.m citta.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} sa.n.thitanti vuccati.

[03] 319^b^.^eb^ ``katha~ncaavuso ^a^P3.0227^ea^, ajjhatta.m {ajjhatta.m citta.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} asa.n.thitanti vuccati? idhaavuso, bhikkhu vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi...pe0... pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. tassa na vivekajapiitisukhaanusaari vi~n~naa.na.m hoti na vivekajapiitisukhassaadagadhita.m na vivekajapiitisukhassaadavinibandha.m na vivekajapiitisukhassaadasa.myojanasa.myutta.m ajjhatta.m citta.m asa.n.thitanti vuccati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa...pe0... dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. tassa na samaadhijapiitisukhaanusaari vi~n~naa.na.m hoti na samaadhijapiitisukhassaadagadhita.m na samaadhijapiitisukhassaadavinibandha.m na samaadhijapiitisukhassaadasa.myojanasa.myutta.m ajjhatta.m citta.m asa.n.thitanti vuccati ^a^T3.0418^ea^.

[03] ``puna ^a^M3.0270^ea^ capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu piitiyaa ca viraagaa...pe0... tatiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. tassa na upekkhaanusaari vi~n~naa.na.m hoti na upekkhaasukhassaadagadhita.m na upekkhaasukhassaadavinibandha.m na upekkhaasukhassaadasa.myojanasa.myutta.m ajjhatta.m citta.m asa.n.thitanti vuccati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahaanaa dukkhassa ca pahaanaa pubbeva somanassadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaa adukkhamasukha.m upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. tassa na adukkhamasukhaanusaari vi~n~naa.na.m hoti na adukkhamasukhassaadagadhita.m na adukkhamasukhassaadavinibandha.m na adukkhamasukhassaadasa.myojanasa.myutta.m ajjhatta.m citta.m asa.n.thitanti vuccati. eva.m kho, aavuso, ajjhatta.m {ajjhatta.m citta.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} asa.n.thitanti vuccati.

[03] 320^b^.^eb^ ``katha~ncaavuso, anupaadaa paritassanaa hoti? idhaavuso, assutavaa puthujjano ariyaana.m adassaavii ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme aviniito sappurisaana.m adassaavii sappurisadhammassa ^a^V3.0276^ea^ akovido sappurisadhamme aviniito ruupa.m attato samanupassati ruupavanta.m vaa attaana.m attani vaa ruupa.m ruupasmi.m vaa attaana.m. tassa ta.m ruupa.m vipari.namati, a~n~nathaa hoti. tassa ruupavipari.naama~n~nathaabhaavaa ruupavipari.naamaanuparivatti vi~n~naa.na.m hoti. tassa ruupavipari.naamaanuparivattajaa paritassanaa dhammasamuppaadaa citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thanti. cetaso pariyaadaanaa uttaasavaa ca hoti vighaatavaa ca apekkhavaa ca anupaadaaya ca paritassati. vedana.m ^a^P3.0228^ea^ ...pe0... sa~n~na.m... sa"nkhaare... vi~n~naa.na.m ^a^T3.0419^ea^ attato samanupassati vi~n~naa.navanta.m vaa attaana.m attani vaa vi~n~naa.na.m vi~n~naa.nasmi.m vaa attaana.m. tassa ta.m vi~n~naa.na.m vipari.namati, a~n~nathaa hoti. tassa vi~n~naa.navipari.naama~n~nathaabhaavaa vi~n~naa.navipari.naamaanuparivatti vi~n~naa.na.m hoti. tassa vi~n~naa.navipari.naamaanuparivattajaa paritassanaa dhammasamuppaadaa citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thanti. cetaso pariyaadaanaa uttaasavaa ca hoti vighaatavaa ca apekkhavaa ca anupaadaaya ca paritassati. eva.m kho, aavuso, anupaadaa paritassanaa hoti.

[03] 321^b^.^eb^ ``katha~ncaavuso, anupaadaanaa aparitassanaa hoti? idhaavuso, sutavaa ariyasaavako ariyaana.m dassaavii ariyadhammassa kovido ariyadhamme ^a^M3.0271^ea^ suviniito sappurisaana.m dassaavii sappurisadhammassa kovido sappurisadhamme suviniito na ruupa.m attato samanupassati na ruupavanta.m vaa attaana.m na attani vaa ruupa.m na ruupasmi.m vaa attaana.m. tassa ta.m ruupa.m vipari.namati, a~n~nathaa hoti. tassa ruupavipari.naama~n~nathaabhaavaa na ca ruupavipari.naamaanuparivatti vi~n~naa.na.m hoti. tassa na ruupavipari.naamaanuparivattajaa paritassanaa dhammasamuppaadaa citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thanti. cetaso pariyaadaanaa na cevuttaasavaa {na ca uttaasavaa (sii0)} hoti na ca vighaatavaa na ca apekkhavaa anupaadaaya ca na paritassati. na vedana.m... na sa~n~na.m... na sa"nkhaare... na vi~n~naa.na.m attato samanupassati na vi~n~naa.navanta.m vaa attaana.m na attani vaa vi~n~naa.na.m na vi~n~naa.nasmi.m vaa ^a^T3.0420^ea^ attaana.m. tassa ta.m vi~n~naa.na.m vipari.namati, a~n~nathaa hoti. tassa vi~n~naa.navipari.naama~n~nathaabhaavaa na ca vi~n~naa.navipari.naamaanuparivatti vi~n~naa.na.m hoti. tassa na vi~n~naa.navipari.naamaanuparivattajaa paritassanaa dhammasamuppaadaa citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thanti. cetaso pariyaadaanaa na cevuttaasavaa hoti na ca vighaatavaa na ca apekkhavaa, anupaadaaya ca na paritassati. eva.m kho, aavuso, anupaadaa aparitassanaa hoti.

[03] ``ya.m kho no, aavuso, bhagavaa sa.mkhittena uddesa.m uddisitvaa vitthaarena attha.m avibhajitvaa ^a^V3.0277^ea^ u.t.thaayaasanaa vihaara.m pavi.t.tho -- `tathaa tathaa, bhikkhave, bhikkhu upaparikkheyya yathaa yathaa upaparikkhato bahiddhaa cassa vi~n~naa.na.m avikkhitta.m avisa.ta.m, ajjhatta.m asa.n.thita.m anupaadaaya na paritasseyya. bahiddhaa, bhikkhave, vi~n~naa.ne avikkhitte avisa.te sati ajjhatta.m asa.n.thite anupaadaaya aparitassato aayati.m jaatijaraamara.nadukkhasamudayasambhavo na hotii'ti. imassa kho aha.m, aavuso, bhagavataa sa.mkhittena uddesassa uddi.t.thassa vitthaarena attha.m avibhattassa eva.m vitthaarena attha.m ^a^P3.0229^ea^ aajaanaami. aaka"nkhamaanaa ca pana tumhe aayasmanto bhagavanta.myeva upasa"nkamitvaa etamattha.m pa.tipuccheyyaatha; yathaa vo bhagavaa byaakaroti tathaa na.m dhaareyyaathaa''ti.

[03] 322^b^.^eb^ atha kho te bhikkhuu aayasmato mahaakaccaanassa bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa ^a^T3.0421^ea^ bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho te bhikkhuu bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m --

[03] ``ya.m ^a^M3.0272^ea^ kho no, bhante, bhagavaa sa.mkhittena uddesa.m uddisitvaa vitthaarena attha.m avibhajitvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa vihaara.m pavi.t.tho -- `tathaa tathaa, bhikkhave, bhikkhu upaparikkheyya yathaa yathaa upaparikkhato bahiddhaa cassa vi~n~naa.na.m avikkhitta.m avisa.ta.m, ajjhatta.m asa.n.thita.m anupaadaaya na paritasseyya. bahiddhaa, bhikkhave, vi~n~naa.ne avikkhitte avisa.te sati ajjhatta.m asa.n.thite anupaadaaya aparitassato aayati.m jaatijaraamara.nadukkhasamudayasambhavo na hotii'''ti.

[03] ``tesa.m no, bhante, amhaaka.m, acirapakkantassa bhagavato, etadahosi -- `ida.m kho no, aavuso, bhagavaa sa.mkhittena uddesa.m uddisitvaa vitthaarena attha.m avibhajitvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa vihaara.m pavi.t.tho -- tathaa tathaa, bhikkhave, bhikkhu upaparikkheyya, yathaa yathaa upaparikkhato bahiddhaa cassa vi~n~naa.na.m avikkhitta.m avisa.ta.m, ajjhatta.m asa.n.thita.m anupaadaaya na paritasseyya. bahiddhaa, bhikkhave, vi~n~naa.ne avikkhitte avisa.te sati ajjhatta.m asa.n.thite anupaadaaya aparitassato aayati.m jaatijaraamara.nadukkhasamudayasambhavo na hotiiti. ko nu kho imassa bhagavataa sa.mkhittena uddesassa uddi.t.thassa vitthaarena attha.m avibhattassa vitthaarena attha.m vibhajeyyaa'ti? tesa.m no, bhante, amhaaka.m etadahosi -- `aya.m kho aayasmaa mahaakaccaano ^a^V3.0278^ea^ satthu ceva sa.mva.n.nito sambhaavito ca vi~n~nuuna.m sabrahmacaariina.m. pahoti caayasmaa mahaakaccaano ^a^T3.0422^ea^ imassa bhagavataa sa.mkhittena uddesassa uddi.t.thassa vitthaarena attha.m avibhattassa vitthaarena attha.m vibhajitu.m. ya.mnuuna maya.m yenaayasmaa mahaakaccaano tenupasa"nkameyyaama; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m mahaakaccaana.m etamattha.m pa.tipuccheyyaamaa'ti.

[03] ``atha kho maya.m, bhante, yenaayasmaa mahaakaccaano tenupasa"nkamimha; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m mahaakaccaana.m etamattha.m pa.tipucchimha. tesa.m no, bhante, aayasmataa mahaakaccaanena imehi aakaarehi imehi padehi imehi bya~njanehi attho vibhatto''ti.

[03] ``pa.n.dito, bhikkhave, mahaakaccaano; mahaapa~n~no, bhikkhave, mahaakaccaano. ma.m cepi tumhe, bhikkhave, etamattha.m pa.tipuccheyyaatha, ahampi evameva.m byaakareyya.m ^a^M3.0273^ea^ yathaa ta.m mahaakaccaanena byaakata.m. eso cevetassa {eso cetassa (sii0 pii0), eso ceva tassa (syaa0 ka.m0), esoyeva tassa (ka0)} attho. eva~nca na.m dhaareyyaathaa''ti.
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamanaa te bhikkhuu bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandunti.
[06] uddesavibha"ngasutta.m ni.t.thita.m a.t.thama.m.

[03] 323^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T3.0423^ea^ ^a^V3.0279^ea^ ^a^P3.0230^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``ara.navibha"nga.m vo, bhikkhave, desessaami. ta.m su.naatha, saadhuka.m manasi karotha; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``na kaamasukhamanuyu~njeyya hiina.m gamma.m pothujjanika.m anariya.m anatthasa.mhita.m, na ca attakilamathaanuyogamanuyu~njeyya dukkha.m anariya.m anatthasa.mhita.m. ete kho, bhikkhave {ete kho (sii0), ete te (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}, ubho ante anupagamma majjhimaa pa.tipadaa tathaagatena abhisambuddhaa, cakkhukara.nii ~naa.nakara.nii upasamaaya abhi~n~naaya sambodhaaya nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati. ussaadana~nca ja~n~naa, apasaadana~nca ja~n~naa; ussaadana~nca ~natvaa apasaadana~nca ~natvaa nevussaadeyya, na apasaadeyya {naapasaadeyya (sii0)}, dhammameva deseyya. sukhavinicchaya.m ja~n~naa; sukhavinicchaya.m ~natvaa ajjhatta.m sukhamanuyu~njeyya. rahovaada.m na bhaaseyya, sammukhaa na khii.na.m {naatikhii.na.m (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} bha.ne. ataramaanova bhaaseyya, no taramaano. janapadanirutti.m naabhiniveseyya, sama~n~na.m naatidhaaveyyaati -- ayamuddeso ara.navibha"ngassa.

[03] 324^b^.^eb^ ```na ^a^T3.0424^ea^ kaamasukhamanuyu~njeyya hiina.m gamma.m pothujjanika.m anariya.m anatthasa.mhita.m, na ca attakilamathaanuyogamanuyu~njeyya dukkha.m anariya.m anatthasa.mhita'nti ^a^M3.0274^ea^ -- iti kho paneta.m vutta.m; ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? yo kaamapa.tisandhisukhino somanassaanuyogo hiino gammo pothujjaniko anariyo anatthasa.mhito, sadukkho eso dhammo saupaghaato saupaayaaso sapari.laaho; micchaapa.tipadaa. yo kaamapa.tisandhisukhino somanassaanuyoga.m ananuyogo ^a^P3.0231^ea^ hiina.m gamma.m pothujjanika.m anariya.m anatthasa.mhita.m, adukkho eso dhammo anupaghaato anupaayaaso apari.laaho; sammaapa.tipadaa. yo attakilamathaanuyogo dukkho anariyo anatthasa.mhito, sadukkho eso dhammo saupaghaato saupaayaaso sapari.laaho; micchaapa.tipadaa. yo attakilamathaanuyoga.m ananuyogo dukkha.m anariya.m anatthasa.mhita.m, adukkho eso dhammo anupaghaato ^a^V3.0280^ea^ anupaayaaso apari.laaho; sammaapa.tipadaa. `na kaamasukhamanuyu~njeyya hiina.m gamma.m pothujjanika.m anariya.m anatthasa.mhita.m, na ca attakilamathaanuyoga.m anuyu~njeyya dukkha.m anariya.m anatthasa.mhita'nti -- iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] 325^b^.^eb^ ```ete kho ubho ante anupagamma majjhimaa pa.tipadaa tathaagatena abhisambuddhaa, cakkhukara.nii ~naa.nakara.nii upasamaaya abhi~n~naaya sambodhaaya nibbaanaaya sa.mvattatii'ti -- iti kho paneta.m vutta.m. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? ayameva ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo, seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi ^a^T3.0425^ea^, sammaasa"nkappo, sammaavaacaa, sammaakammanto, sammaaaajiivo, sammaavaayaamo, sammaasati, sammaasamaadhi. `ete kho ubho ante anupagamma majjhimaa pa.tipadaa tathaagatena abhisambuddhaa, cakkhukara.nii ~naa.nakara.nii upasamaaya abhi~n~naaya sambodhaaya nibbaanaaya sa.mvattatii'ti -- iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m, idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] 326^b^.^eb^ ```ussaadana~nca ja~n~naa, apasaadana~nca ja~n~naa; ussaadana~nca ~natvaa apasaadana~nca ~natvaa nevussaadeyya, na apasaadeyya, dhammameva deseyyaa'ti -- iti kho paneta.m vutta.m. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? katha~nca, bhikkhave, ussaadanaa ca hoti apasaadanaa ca, no ca dhammadesanaa? `ye kaamapa.tisandhisukhino somanassaanuyoga.m anuyuttaa hiina.m gamma.m pothujjanika.m anariya.m anatthasa.mhita.m, sabbe te sadukkhaa saupaghaataa saupaayaasaa sapari.laahaa micchaapa.tipannaa'ti -- iti vada.m {iti para.m (ka0)} ittheke apasaadeti.

[03] ```ye ^a^M3.0275^ea^ kaamapa.tisandhisukhino somanassaanuyoga.m ananuyuttaa hiina.m gamma.m pothujjanika.m anariya.m anatthasa.mhita.m, sabbe te adukkhaa anupaghaataa anupaayaasaa apari.laahaa sammaapa.tipannaa'ti -- iti vada.m ittheke ussaadeti.

[03] ```ye attakilamathaanuyoga.m anuyuttaa dukkha.m anariya.m anatthasa.mhita.m, sabbe te sadukkhaa ^a^P3.0232^ea^ saupaghaataa saupaayaasaa sapari.laahaa micchaapa.tipannaa'ti -- iti vada.m ittheke apasaadeti.

[03] ```ye attakilamathaanuyoga.m ananuyuttaa dukkha.m anariya.m anatthasa.mhita.m, sabbe te adukkhaa ^a^V3.0281^ea^ anupaghaataa anupaayaasaa apari.laahaa sammaapa.tipannaa'ti ^a^T3.0426^ea^ -- iti vada.m ittheke ussaadeti.
[03] ```yesa.m kesa~nci bhavasa.myojana.m appahiina.m, sabbe te sadukkhaa saupaghaataa saupaayaasaa sapari.laahaa micchaapa.tipannaa'ti -- iti vada.m ittheke apasaadeti.

[03] ```yesa.m kesa~nci bhavasa.myojana.m pahiina.m, sabbe te adukkhaa anupaghaataa anupaayaasaa apari.laahaa sammaapa.tipannaa'ti -- iti vada.m ittheke ussaadeti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, ussaadanaa ca hoti apasaadanaa ca, no ca dhammadesanaa.

[03] 327^b^.^eb^ ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, nevussaadanaa hoti na apasaadanaa, dhammadesanaa ca {dhammadesanaava (syaa0 ka.m0)}? `ye kaamapa.tisandhisukhino somanassaanuyoga.m anuyuttaa hiina.m gamma.m pothujjanika.m anariya.m anatthasa.mhita.m, sabbe te sadukkhaa saupaghaataa saupaayaasaa sapari.laahaa micchaapa.tipannaa'ti -- na evamaaha. `anuyogo ca kho, sadukkho eso dhammo saupaghaato saupaayaaso sapari.laaho; micchaapa.tipadaa'ti -- iti vada.m dhammameva deseti.

[03] ```ye kaamapa.tisandhisukhino somanassaanuyoga.m ananuyuttaa hiina.m gamma.m pothujjanika.m anariya.m anatthasa.mhita.m, sabbe te adukkhaa anupaghaataa anupaayaasaa apari.laahaa sammaapa.tipannaa'ti -- na evamaaha. `ananuyogo ca kho, adukkho eso dhammo anupaghaato anupaayaaso apari.laaho; sammaapa.tipadaa'ti -- iti vada.m dhammameva deseti.

[03] ```ye ^a^M3.0276^ea^ attakilamathaanuyoga.m anuyuttaa dukkha.m anariya.m anatthasa.mhita.m, sabbe te sadukkhaa saupaghaataa saupaayaasaa sapari.laahaa micchaapa.tipannaa'ti -- na evamaaha. `anuyogo ca kho ^a^T3.0427^ea^, sadukkho eso dhammo saupaghaato saupaayaaso sapari.laaho; micchaapa.tipadaa'ti -- iti vada.m dhammameva deseti.

[03] ```ye attakilamathaanuyoga.m ananuyuttaa dukkha.m anariya.m anatthasa.mhita.m, sabbe te adukkhaa anupaghaataa anupaayaasaa apari.laahaa sammaapa.tipannaa'ti -- na evamaaha. `ananuyogo ca kho, adukkho eso dhammo anupaghaato anupaayaaso apari.laaho; sammaapa.tipadaa'ti -- iti vada.m dhammameva deseti.

[03] ```yesa.m ^a^V3.0282^ea^ kesa~nci bhavasa.myojana.m appahiina.m, sabbe te sadukkhaa saupaghaataa saupaayaasaa sapari.laahaa micchaapa.tipannaa'ti -- na evamaaha ^a^P3.0233^ea^. `bhavasa.myojane ca kho appahiine bhavopi appahiino hotii'ti -- iti vada.m dhammameva deseti.

[03] ```yesa.m kesa~nci bhavasa.myojana.m pahiina.m, sabbe te adukkhaa anupaghaataa anupaayaasaa apari.laahaa sammaapa.tipannaa'ti -- na evamaaha. `bhavasa.myojane ca kho pahiine bhavopi pahiino hotii'ti -- iti vada.m dhammameva deseti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, nevussaadanaa hoti na apasaadanaa, dhammadesanaa ca. `ussaadana~nca ja~n~naa, apasaadana~nca ja~n~naa; ussaadana~nca ~natvaa apasaadana~nca ~natvaa nevussaadeyya, na apasaadeyya, dhammameva deseyyaa'ti -- iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] 328^b^.^eb^ ```sukhavinicchaya.m ja~n~naa; sukhavinicchaya.m ~natvaa ajjhatta.m sukhamanuyu~njeyyaa'ti -- iti kho paneta.m vutta.m. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? pa~ncime, bhikkhave, kaamagu.naa. katame pa~nca? cakkhuvi~n~neyyaa ruupaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa, sotavi~n~neyyaa ^a^T3.0428^ea^ saddaa... ghaanavi~n~neyyaa gandhaa... jivhaavi~n~neyyaa rasaa... kaayavi~n~neyyaa pho.t.thabbaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa -- ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca kaamagu.naa. ya.m kho, bhikkhave, ime pa~nca kaamagu.ne pa.ticca uppajjati sukha.m somanassa.m ida.m vuccati kaamasukha.m mii.lhasukha.m puthujjanasukha.m anariyasukha.m. `na aasevitabba.m, na bhaavetabba.m, na bahuliikaatabba.m, bhaayitabba.m etassa sukhassaa'ti -- vadaami. idha ^a^M3.0277^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m cetaso ekodibhaava.m avitakka.m avicaara.m samaadhija.m piitisukha.m dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. piitiyaa ca viraagaa upekkhako ca viharati...pe0... tatiya.m jhaana.m... catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. ida.m vuccati nekkhammasukha.m pavivekasukha.m upasamasukha.m sambodhisukha.m. `aasevitabba.m, bhaavetabba.m, bahuliikaatabba.m, na bhaayitabba.m etassa sukhassaa'ti -- vadaami ^a^P3.0234^ea^. `sukhavinicchaya.m ja~n~naa ^a^V3.0283^ea^; sukhavinicchaya.m ~natvaa ajjhatta.m sukhamanuyu~njeyyaa'ti -- iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] 329^b^.^eb^ ```rahovaada.m na bhaaseyya, sammukhaa na khii.na.m bha.ne'ti -- iti kho paneta.m vutta.m. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? tatra, bhikkhave, ya.m ja~n~naa rahovaada.m abhuuta.m ataccha.m anatthasa.mhita.m sasakka.m {sampatta.m (ka0)} ta.m rahovaada.m na bhaaseyya. yampi ja~n~naa rahovaada.m bhuuta.m taccha.m anatthasa.mhita.m tassapi sikkheyya avacanaaya. ya~nca kho ja~n~naa rahovaada.m ^a^T3.0429^ea^ bhuuta.m taccha.m atthasa.mhita.m tatra kaala~n~nuu assa tassa rahovaadassa vacanaaya. tatra, bhikkhave, ya.m ja~n~naa sammukhaa khii.navaada.m abhuuta.m ataccha.m anatthasa.mhita.m sasakka.m ta.m sammukhaa khii.navaada.m na bhaaseyya. yampi ja~n~naa sammukhaa khii.navaada.m bhuuta.m taccha.m anatthasa.mhita.m tassapi sikkheyya avacanaaya. ya~nca kho ja~n~naa sammukhaa khii.navaada.m bhuuta.m taccha.m atthasa.mhita.m tatra kaala~n~nuu assa tassa sammukhaa khii.navaadassa vacanaaya. `rahovaada.m na bhaaseyya, sammukhaa na khii.na.m bha.ne'ti -- iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m, idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] 330^b^.^eb^ ```ataramaanova bhaaseyya no taramaano'ti -- iti kho paneta.m vutta.m. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? tatra, bhikkhave, taramaanassa bhaasato kaayopi kilamati, cittampi upaha~n~nati {uuha~n~nati (sii0)}, saropi upaha~n~nati {uuha~n~nati (sii0)}, ka.n.thopi aaturiiyati, avisa.t.thampi hoti avi~n~neyya.m taramaanassa bhaasita.m. tatra, bhikkhave, ataramaanassa bhaasato kaayopi na kilamati, cittampi na upaha~n~nati, saropi na upaha~n~nati, ka.n.thopi na aaturiiyati, visa.t.thampi hoti vi~n~neyya.m ataramaanassa bhaasita.m. `ataramaanova bhaaseyya, no taramaano'ti -- iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m, idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] 331^b^.^eb^ ```janapadanirutti.m ^a^M3.0278^ea^ naabhiniveseyya, sama~n~na.m naatidhaaveyyaa'ti -- iti kho paneta.m vutta.m. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? katha~nca, bhikkhave, janapadaniruttiyaa ca abhiniveso hoti sama~n~naaya ca atisaaro? idha, bhikkhave, tadevekaccesu janapadesu `paatii'ti sa~njaananti, `patta'nti ^a^P3.0235^ea^ sa~njaananti ^a^T3.0430^ea^, `vitta'nti {vi.t.thanti (syaa0 ka.m0)} sa~njaananti, `saraava'nti sa~njaananti `dhaaropa'nti {harosanti (syaa0 ka.m0)} sa~njaananti, `po.na'nti sa~njaananti, `pisiilava'nti {pisiilanti (sii0 pii0), pipilanti (syaa0 ka.m0)} sa~njaananti. iti yathaa yathaa na.m tesu tesu janapadesu sa~njaananti tathaa tathaa thaamasaa paraamaasaa {paraamassa (sii0)} abhinivissa voharati -- `idameva sacca.m ^a^V3.0284^ea^, moghama~n~na'nti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, janapadaniruttiyaa ca abhiniveso hoti sama~n~naaya ca atisaaro.

[03] 332^b^.^eb^ ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, janapadaniruttiyaa ca anabhiniveso hoti sama~n~naaya ca anatisaaro? idha, bhikkhave, tadevekaccesu janapadesu `paatii'ti sa~njaananti, `patta'nti sa~njaananti, `vitta'nti sa~njaananti, `saraava'nti sa~njaananti, `dhaaropa'nti sa~njaananti, `po.na'nti sa~njaananti, `pisiilava'nti sa~njaananti. iti yathaa yathaa na.m tesu tesu janapadesu sa~njaananti `ida.m kira me {ida.m kira te ca (ka0)} aayasmanto sandhaaya voharantii'ti tathaa tathaa voharati aparaamasa.m. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, janapadaniruttiyaa ca anabhiniveso hoti, sama~n~naaya ca anatisaaro. `janapadanirutti.m naabhiniveseyya sama~n~na.m naatidhaaveyyaa'ti -- iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m, idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] 333^b^.^eb^ ``tatra, bhikkhave, yo kaamapa.tisandhisukhino somanassaanuyogo hiino gammo pothujjaniko anariyo anatthasa.mhito, sadukkho eso dhammo saupaghaato saupaayaaso sapari.laaho; micchaapa.tipadaa. tasmaa eso ^a^T3.0431^ea^ dhammo sara.no. tatra, bhikkhave, yo kaamapa.tisandhisukhino somanassaanuyoga.m ananuyogo hiina.m gamma.m pothujjanika.m anariya.m anatthasa.mhita.m, adukkho eso dhammo anupaghaato anupaayaaso apari.laaho; sammaapa.tipadaa. tasmaa eso dhammo ara.no.

[03] 334^b^.^eb^ ``tatra, bhikkhave, yo attakilamathaanuyogo dukkho anariyo anatthasa.mhito, sadukkho eso dhammo saupaghaato saupaayaaso ^a^M3.0279^ea^ sapari.laaho; micchaapa.tipadaa. tasmaa eso dhammo sara.no. tatra, bhikkhave, yo attakilamathaanuyoga.m ananuyogo dukkha.m anariya.m anatthasa.mhita.m, adukkho eso dhammo anupaghaato anupaayaaso apari.laaho; sammaapa.tipadaa. tasmaa eso dhammo ara.no.

[03] 335^b^.^eb^ ``tatra, bhikkhave, yaaya.m majjhimaa pa.tipadaa tathaagatena abhisambuddhaa, cakkhukara.nii ~naa.nakara.nii upasamaaya abhi~n~naaya sambodhaaya nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati, adukkho eso dhammo anupaghaato anupaayaaso apari.laaho; sammaapa.tipadaa ^a^P3.0236^ea^. tasmaa eso dhammo ara.no.

[03] 336^b^.^eb^ ``tatra ^a^V3.0285^ea^, bhikkhave, yaaya.m ussaadanaa ca apasaadanaa ca no ca dhammadesanaa, sadukkho eso dhammo saupaghaato saupaayaaso sapari.laaho; micchaapa.tipadaa. tasmaa eso dhammo sara.no. tatra, bhikkhave, yaaya.m nevussaadanaa ca na apasaadanaa ca dhammadesanaa ca, adukkho eso dhammo anupaghaato anupaayaaso apari.laaho; sammaapa.tipadaa. tasmaa eso dhammo ara.no.

[03] 337^b^.^eb^ ``tatra, bhikkhave, yamida.m kaamasukha.m mii.lhasukha.m pothujjanasukha.m anariyasukha.m ^a^T3.0432^ea^, sadukkho eso dhammo saupaghaato saupaayaaso sapari.laaho; micchaapa.tipadaa. tasmaa eso dhammo sara.no. tatra, bhikkhave, yamida.m nekkhammasukha.m pavivekasukha.m upasamasukha.m sambodhisukha.m, adukkho eso dhammo anupaghaato anupaayaaso apari.laaho; sammaapa.tipadaa. tasmaa eso dhammo ara.no.

[03] 338^b^.^eb^ ``tatra, bhikkhave, yvaaya.m rahovaado abhuuto ataccho anatthasa.mhito, sadukkho eso dhammo saupaghaato saupaayaaso sapari.laaho; micchaapa.tipadaa. tasmaa eso dhammo sara.no. tatra, bhikkhave, yvaaya.m rahovaado bhuuto taccho anatthasa.mhito, sadukkho eso dhammo saupaghaato saupaayaaso sapari.laaho; micchaapa.tipadaa. tasmaa eso dhammo sara.no. tatra, bhikkhave, yvaaya.m rahovaado bhuuto taccho atthasa.mhito, adukkho eso dhammo anupaghaato anupaayaaso apari.laaho; sammaapa.tipadaa. tasmaa eso dhammo ara.no.

[03] 339^b^.^eb^ ``tatra ^a^M3.0280^ea^, bhikkhave, yvaaya.m sammukhaa khii.navaado abhuuto ataccho anatthasa.mhito, sadukkho eso dhammo saupaghaato saupaayaaso sapari.laaho; micchaapa.tipadaa. tasmaa eso dhammo sara.no. tatra, bhikkhave, yvaaya.m sammukhaa khii.navaado bhuuto taccho anatthasa.mhito, sadukkho eso dhammo saupaghaato saupaayaaso sapari.laaho; micchaapa.tipadaa. tasmaa eso dhammo sara.no. tatra, bhikkhave, yvaaya.m sammukhaa khii.navaado ^a^P3.0237^ea^ bhuuto taccho atthasa.mhito, adukkho eso ^a^T3.0433^ea^ dhammo anupaghaato anupaayaaso apari.laaho; sammaapa.tipadaa. tasmaa eso dhammo ara.no.

[03] 340^b^.^eb^ ``tatra, bhikkhave, yamida.m taramaanassa bhaasita.m, sadukkho eso dhammo saupaghaato saupaayaaso sapari.laaho; micchaapa.tipadaa. tasmaa eso dhammo sara.no. tatra, bhikkhave ^a^V3.0286^ea^, yamida.m ataramaanassa bhaasita.m, adukkho eso dhammo anupaghaato anupaayaaso apari.laaho; sammaapa.tipadaa. tasmaa eso dhammo ara.no.

[03] 341^b^.^eb^ ``tatra, bhikkhave, yvaaya.m janapadaniruttiyaa ca abhiniveso sama~n~naaya ca atisaaro, sadukkho eso dhammo saupaghaato saupaayaaso sapari.laaho; micchaapa.tipadaa. tasmaa eso dhammo sara.no. tatra bhikkhave, yvaaya.m janapadaniruttiyaa ca anabhiniveso sama~n~naaya ca anatisaaro, adukkho eso dhammo anupaghaato anupaayaaso apari.laaho; sammaapa.tipadaa. tasmaa eso dhammo ara.no.

[03] ``tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, `sara.na~nca dhamma.m jaanissaama, ara.na~nca dhamma.m jaanissaama; sara.na~nca dhamma.m ~natvaa ara.na~nca dhamma.m ~natvaa ara.napa.tipada.m pa.tipajjissaamaa'ti eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba.m. subhuuti ca pana, bhikkhave, kulaputto ara.napa.tipada.m pa.tipanno''ti.
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamanaa te bhikkhuu bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandunti.
[06] ara.navibha"ngasutta.m ni.t.thita.m navama.m.

[03] 342^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T3.0434^ea^ ^a^M3.0281^ea^ ^a^V3.0287^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa magadhesu caarika.m caramaano yena raajagaha.m tadavasari; yena bhaggavo kumbhakaaro tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhaggava.m kumbhakaara.m etadavoca -- ``sace te, bhaggava, agaru viharemu aavesane {viharaamaavesane (sii0 pii0), viharaama nivesane (syaa0 ka.m0), viharemu nivesane (ka0)} ekaratta''nti. ``na kho me, bhante, garu. atthi cettha pabbajito pa.thama.m vaasuupagato. sace so anujaanaati, viharatha {vihara (sii0 pii0)}, bhante, yathaasukha''nti.

[03] tena ^a^P3.0238^ea^ kho pana samayena pukkusaati naama kulaputto bhagavanta.m uddissa saddhaaya agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito. so tasmi.m kumbhakaaraavesane {kumbhakaaranivesane (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} pa.thama.m vaasuupagato hoti. atha kho bhagavaa yenaayasmaa pukkusaati tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m pukkusaati.m etadavoca -- ``sace te, bhikkhu, agaru viharemu aavesane ekaratta''nti. ``urunda.m, aavuso {uuruunda.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0), uruuddha.m (ka0) dii0 ni0 2 sakkapa~nhasutta.tiikaa oloketabbaa}, kumbhakaaraavesana.m. viharataayasmaa yathaasukha''nti.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa kumbhakaaraavesana.m pavisitvaa ekamanta.m ti.nasanthaaraka.m {ti.nasantharika.m (sii0), ti.nasantharaka.m (syaa0 ka.m0)} pa~n~naapetvaa nisiidi palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa uju.m kaaya.m pa.nidhaaya parimukha.m sati.m upa.t.thapetvaa. atha kho bhagavaa bahudeva ratti.m ^a^T3.0435^ea^ nisajjaaya viitinaamesi. aayasmaapi kho pukkusaati bahudeva ratti.m nisajjaaya viitinaamesi.

[03] atha kho bhagavato etadahosi -- ``paasaadika.m kho aya.m kulaputto iriyati. ya.mnuunaaha.m puccheyya''nti. atha kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m pukkusaati.m etadavoca -- ``ka.msi tva.m, bhikkhu, uddissa pabbajito? ko vaa te satthaa? kassa vaa tva.m dhamma.m rocesii''ti? ``atthaavuso, sama.no gotamo sakyaputto sakyakulaa pabbajito. ta.m kho pana bhagavanta.m gotama.m eva.m kalyaa.no kittisaddo abbhuggato -- `itipi so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu anuttaro purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa'ti ^a^M3.0282^ea^. taaha.m bhagavanta.m uddissa pabbajito. so ca me bhagavaa satthaa. tassa caaha.m bhagavato ^a^V3.0288^ea^ dhamma.m rocemii''ti. ``kaha.m pana, bhikkhu, etarahi so bhagavaa viharati araha.m sammaasambuddho''ti. ``atthaavuso, uttaresu janapadesu saavatthi naama nagara.m. tattha so bhagavaa etarahi viharati araha.m sammaasambuddho''ti. ``di.t.thapubbo pana te, bhikkhu, so bhagavaa; disvaa ca pana jaaneyyaasii''ti? ``na ^a^P3.0239^ea^ kho me, aavuso, di.t.thapubbo so bhagavaa; disvaa caaha.m na jaaneyya''nti.

[03] atha kho bhagavato etadahosi -- ``mama~nca khvaaya.m {ma.m tvaaya.m (sii0), mama.m khvaaya.m (syaa0 ka.m0), ma.m khvaaya.m (pii0)} kulaputto uddissa pabbajito. ya.mnuunassaaha.m dhamma.m deseyya''nti. atha kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m pukkusaati.m aamantesi -- ``dhamma.m te, bhikkhu, desessaami. ta.m su.naahi, saadhuka.m manasi karohi; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``evamaavuso''ti kho aayasmaa pukkusaati bhagavato paccassosi. bhagavaa ^a^T3.0436^ea^ etadavoca --

[03] 343^b^.^eb^ ```chadhaaturo {chaddhaaturo (sii0)} aya.m, bhikkhu, puriso chaphassaayatano a.t.thaarasamanopavicaaro caturaadhi.t.thaano; yattha .thita.m ma~n~nassavaa nappavattanti, ma~n~nassave kho pana nappavattamaane muni santoti vuccati. pa~n~na.m nappamajjeyya, saccamanurakkheyya, caagamanubruuheyya, santimeva so sikkheyyaa'ti -- ayamuddeso dhaatuvibha"ngassa {chadhaatuvibha"ngassa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}.

[03] 344^b^.^eb^ ```chadhaaturo aya.m, bhikkhu, puriso'ti -- iti kho paneta.m vutta.m. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? (chayimaa, bhikkhu, dhaatuyo) {( ) natthi sii0 pii0 potthakesu} -- pathaviidhaatu, aapodhaatu, tejodhaatu, vaayodhaatu, aakaasadhaatu, vi~n~naa.nadhaatu. `chadhaaturo aya.m, bhikkhu, puriso'ti -- iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m, idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] 345^b^.^eb^ ```chaphassaayatano aya.m, bhikkhu, puriso'ti -- iti kho paneta.m vutta.m. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? cakkhusamphassaayatana.m, sotasamphassaayatana.m, ghaanasamphassaayatana.m, jivhaasamphassaayatana.m, kaayasamphassaayatana.m, manosamphassaayatana.m. `chaphassaayatano aya.m, bhikkhu, puriso'ti -- iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m, idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] 346^b^.^eb^ ```a.t.thaarasamanopavicaaro ^a^M3.0283^ea^ aya.m, bhikkhu, puriso'ti -- iti kho paneta.m vutta.m. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? cakkhunaa ruupa.m disvaa somanassa.t.thaaniiya.m ruupa.m upavicarati, domanassa.t.thaaniiya.m ^a^V3.0289^ea^ ruupa.m upavicarati, upekkhaa.t.thaaniiya.m ruupa.m upavicarati; sotena sadda.m sutvaa...pe0... ghaanena gandha.m ^a^P3.0240^ea^ ghaayitvaa... jivhaaya rasa.m saayitvaa... kaayena pho.t.thabba.m phusitvaa... manasaa dhamma.m vi~n~naaya somanassa.t.thaaniiya.m dhamma.m upavicarati, domanassa.t.thaaniiya.m dhamma.m upavicarati ^a^T3.0437^ea^, upekkhaa.t.thaaniiya.m dhamma.m upavicarati -- iti cha somanassupavicaaraa, cha domanassupavicaaraa, cha upekkhupavicaaraa. `a.t.thaarasamanopavicaaro aya.m, bhikkhu, puriso'ti -- iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m, idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] 347^b^.^eb^ ```caturaadhi.t.thaano aya.m, bhikkhu, puriso'ti -- iti kho paneta.m vutta.m. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? pa~n~naadhi.t.thaano, saccaadhi.t.thaano, caagaadhi.t.thaano, upasamaadhi.t.thaano. `caturaadhi.t.thaano aya.m, bhikkhu, puriso'ti -- iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] 348^b^.^eb^ ```pa~n~na.m nappamajjeyya, saccamanurakkheyya, caagamanubruuheyya, santimeva so sikkheyyaa'ti -- iti kho paneta.m vutta.m. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? katha~nca, bhikkhu, pa~n~na.m nappamajjati? chayimaa, bhikkhu, dhaatuyo -- pathaviidhaatu, aapodhaatu, tejodhaatu, vaayodhaatu, aakaasadhaatu, vi~n~naa.nadhaatu.

[03] 349^b^.^eb^ ``katamaa ca, bhikkhu, pathaviidhaatu? pathaviidhaatu siyaa ajjhattikaa siyaa baahiraa. katamaa ca, bhikkhu, ajjhattikaa pathaviidhaatu? ya.m ajjhatta.m paccatta.m kakkha.la.m kharigata.m upaadinna.m {upaadi.n.na.m (pii0 ka0)}, seyyathida.m -- kesaa lomaa nakhaa dantaa taco ma.msa.m nhaaru a.t.thi a.t.thimi~nja.m {a.t.thimi~njaa (sii0 pii0)} vakka.m hadaya.m yakana.m kilomaka.m pihaka.m papphaasa.m anta.m antagu.na.m udariya.m kariisa.m, ya.m vaa pana~n~nampi ki~nci ajjhatta.m paccatta.m kakkha.la.m kharigata.m upaadinna.m -- aya.m vuccati, bhikkhu, ajjhattikaa pathaviidhaatu. yaa ceva kho pana ajjhattikaa pathaviidhaatu yaa ca baahiraa pathaviidhaatu pathaviidhaaturevesaa ^a^T3.0438^ea^. `ta.m neta.m mama nesohamasmi na meso attaa'ti -- evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya ^a^V3.0290^ea^ da.t.thabba.m. evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya disvaa pathaviidhaatuyaa nibbindati, pathaviidhaatuyaa citta.m viraajeti.

[03] 350^b^.^eb^ ``katamaa ^a^M3.0284^ea^ ca, bhikkhu, aapodhaatu? aapodhaatu siyaa ajjhattikaa ^a^P3.0241^ea^ siyaa baahiraa. katamaa ca, bhikkhu, ajjhattikaa aapodhaatu? ya.m ajjhatta.m paccatta.m aapo aapogata.m upaadinna.m seyyathida.m -- pitta.m semha.m pubbo lohita.m sedo medo assu vasaa khe.lo si"nghaa.nikaa lasikaa mutta.m, ya.m vaa pana~n~nampi ki~nci ajjhatta.m paccatta.m aapo aapogata.m upaadinna.m -- aya.m vuccati, bhikkhu, ajjhattikaa aapodhaatu. yaa ceva kho pana ajjhattikaa aapodhaatu yaa ca baahiraa aapodhaatu aapodhaaturevesaa. `ta.m neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti -- evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya da.t.thabba.m. evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya disvaa aapodhaatuyaa nibbindati, aapodhaatuyaa citta.m viraajeti.

[03] 351^b^.^eb^ ``katamaa ca, bhikkhu, tejodhaatu? tejodhaatu siyaa ajjhattikaa siyaa baahiraa. katamaa ca, bhikkhu, ajjhattikaa tejodhaatu? ya.m ajjhatta.m paccatta.m tejo tejogata.m upaadinna.m, seyyathida.m -- yena ca santappati, yena ca jiiriiyati, yena ca pari.dayhati, yena ca asitapiitakhaayitasaayita.m sammaa pari.naama.m gacchati, ya.m vaa pana~n~nampi ki~nci ajjhatta.m ^a^T3.0439^ea^ paccatta.m tejo tejogata.m upaadinna.m -- aya.m vuccati, bhikkhu, ajjhattikaa tejodhaatu. yaa ceva kho pana ajjhattikaa tejodhaatu yaa ca baahiraa tejodhaatu tejodhaaturevesaa. `ta.m neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti -- evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya da.t.thabba.m. evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya disvaa tejodhaatuyaa nibbindati, tejodhaatuyaa citta.m viraajeti.

[03] 352^b^.^eb^ ``katamaa ca, bhikkhu, vaayodhaatu? vaayodhaatu siyaa ajjhattikaa siyaa baahiraa. katamaa ca, bhikkhu, ajjhattikaa vaayodhaatu? ya.m ajjhatta.m paccatta.m vaayo vaayogata.m upaadinna.m, seyyathida.m -- uddha"ngamaa vaataa adhogamaa vaataa kucchisayaa vaataa ko.t.thaasayaa {ko.t.thasayaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} vaataa a"ngama"ngaanusaarino vaataa assaaso passaaso iti, ya.m vaa pana~n~nampi ki~nci ajjhatta.m paccatta.m vaayo vaayogata.m upaadinna.m -- aya.m vuccati, bhikkhu, ajjhattikaa vaayodhaatu. yaa ceva kho pana ajjhattikaa vaayodhaatu yaa ca baahiraa vaayodhaatu vaayodhaaturevesaa. `ta.m neta.m mama ^a^V3.0291^ea^, nesohamasmi ^a^M3.0285^ea^, na meso attaa'ti -- evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya da.t.thabba.m. evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya disvaa vaayodhaatuyaa nibbindati, vaayodhaatuyaa citta.m viraajeti.

[03] 353^b^.^eb^ ``katamaa ca, bhikkhu, aakaasadhaatu? aakaasadhaatu siyaa ajjhattikaa siyaa baahiraa. katamaa ca, bhikkhu, ajjhattikaa aakaasadhaatu ^a^P3.0242^ea^? ya.m ajjhatta.m paccatta.m aakaasa.m aakaasagata.m upaadinna.m, seyyathida.m ^a^T3.0440^ea^ -- ka.n.nacchidda.m naasacchidda.m mukhadvaara.m yena ca asitapiitakhaayitasaayita.m ajjhoharati, yattha ca asitapiitakhaayitasaayita.m santi.t.thati, yena ca asitapiitakhaayitasaayita.m adhobhaaga.m {adhobhaagaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0) devaduutasuttena sameti} nikkhamati, ya.m vaa pana~n~nampi ki~nci ajjhatta.m paccatta.m aakaasa.m aakaasagata.m agha.m aghagata.m vivara.m vivaragata.m asamphu.t.tha.m ma.msalohitehi upaadinna.m -- aya.m vuccati bhikkhu ajjhattikaa aakaasadhaatu. yaa ceva kho pana ajjhattikaa aakaasadhaatu yaa ca baahiraa aakaasadhaatu aakaasadhaaturevesaa. `ta.m neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti -- evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya da.t.thabba.m. evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya disvaa aakaasadhaatuyaa nibbindati, aakaasadhaatuyaa citta.m viraajeti.

[03] 354^b^.^eb^ ``athaapara.m vi~n~naa.na.myeva avasissati parisuddha.m pariyodaata.m. tena ca vi~n~naa.nena ki.m {tena vi~n~naa.nena ki~nca (sii0)} vijaanaati? `sukha'ntipi vijaanaati, `dukkha'ntipi vijaanaati, `adukkhamasukha'ntipi vijaanaati. sukhavedaniya.m, bhikkhu, phassa.m pa.ticca uppajjati sukhaa vedanaa. so sukha.m vedana.m vedayamaano `sukha.m vedana.m vedayaamii'ti pajaanaati. `tasseva sukhavedaniyassa phassassa nirodhaa ya.m tajja.m vedayita.m sukhavedaniya.m phassa.m pa.ticca uppannaa sukhaa vedanaa saa nirujjhati, saa vuupasammatii'ti pajaanaati.

[03] 355^b^.^eb^ ``dukkhavedaniya.m, bhikkhu, phassa.m pa.ticca uppajjati dukkhaa vedanaa. so dukkha.m vedana.m vedayamaano `dukkha.m vedana.m vedayaamii'ti pajaanaati. `tasseva dukkhavedaniyassa phassassa nirodhaa ya.m tajja.m vedayita.m dukkhavedaniya.m phassa.m pa.ticca ^a^T3.0441^ea^ uppannaa dukkhaa vedanaa saa nirujjhati, saa vuupasammatii'ti pajaanaati.

[03] 356^b^.^eb^ ``adukkhamasukhavedaniya.m, bhikkhu, phassa.m pa.ticca uppajjati adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa. so adukkhamasukha.m vedana.m vedayamaano `adukkhamasukha.m vedana.m vedayaamii'ti ^a^M3.0286^ea^ pajaanaati. `tasseva adukkhamasukhavedaniyassa ^a^V3.0292^ea^ phassassa nirodhaa ya.m tajja.m vedayita.m adukkhamasukhavedaniya.m phassa.m pa.ticca uppannaa adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa saa nirujjhati, saa vuupasammatii'ti pajaanaati.

[03] 357^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhu, dvinna.m ka.t.thaana.m sa"ngha.t.taa {samphassa (sii0 pii0), sa"ngha.taa (syaa0 ka.m0)} samodhaanaa usmaa jaayati, tejo abhinibbattati, tesa.myeva dvinna.m ka.t.thaana.m naanaabhaavaa vikkhepaa yaa tajjaa usmaa saa nirujjhati, saa vuupasammati; evameva kho, bhikkhu, sukhavedaniya.m ^a^P3.0243^ea^ phassa.m pa.ticca uppajjati sukhaa vedanaa. so sukha.m vedana.m vedayamaano `sukha.m vedana.m vedayaamii'ti pajaanaati. `tasseva sukhavedaniyassa phassassa nirodhaa ya.m tajja.m vedayita.m sukhavedaniya.m phassa.m pa.ticca uppannaa sukhaa vedanaa saa nirujjhati, saa vuupasammatii'ti pajaanaati.

[03] 358^b^.^eb^ ``dukkhavedaniya.m, bhikkhu, phassa.m pa.ticca uppajjati dukkhaa vedanaa. so dukkha.m vedana.m vedayamaano `dukkha.m vedana.m vedayaamii'ti pajaanaati. `tasseva dukkhavedaniyassa phassassa nirodhaa ya.m tajja.m vedayita.m dukkhavedaniya.m phassa.m pa.ticca uppannaa dukkhaa vedanaa saa nirujjhati, saa vuupasammatii'ti pajaanaati.

[03] 359^b^.^eb^ ``adukkhamasukhavedaniya.m ^a^T3.0442^ea^, bhikkhu, phassa.m pa.ticca uppajjati adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa. so adukkhamasukha.m vedana.m vedayamaano `adukkhamasukha.m vedana.m vedayaamii'ti pajaanaati. `tasseva adukkhamasukhavedaniyassa phassassa nirodhaa ya.m tajja.m vedayita.m adukkhamasukhavedaniya.m phassa.m pa.ticca uppannaa adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa saa nirujjhati, saa vuupasammatii'ti pajaanaati.

[03] 360^b^.^eb^ ``athaapara.m upekkhaayeva avasissati parisuddhaa pariyodaataa mudu ca kamma~n~naa ca pabhassaraa ca. seyyathaapi, bhikkhu, dakkho suva.n.nakaaro vaa suva.n.nakaarantevaasii vaa ukka.m bandheyya, ukka.m bandhitvaa ukkaamukha.m aalimpeyya, ukkaamukha.m aalimpetvaa sa.n.daasena jaataruupa.m gahetvaa ukkaamukhe pakkhipeyya, tamena.m kaalena kaala.m abhidhameyya, kaalena kaala.m udakena paripphoseyya, kaalena kaala.m ajjhupekkheyya, ta.m hoti jaataruupa.m {jaataruupa.m dhanta.m (sii0 pii0)} sudhanta.m niddhanta.m niiha.ta.m {nihata.m (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} ninniitakasaava.m {nihatakasaava.m (ka0)} mudu ca kamma~n~na~nca pabhassara~nca, yassaa yassaa ca pi.landhanavikatiyaa aaka"nkhati -- yadi pa.t.tikaaya {pava.t.tikaaya (sii0 syaa0)} yadi ^a^M3.0287^ea^ ku.n.dalaaya yadi giiveyyakaaya yadi suva.n.namaalaaya ta~ncassa attha.m ^a^V3.0293^ea^ anubhoti; evameva kho, bhikkhu, athaapara.m upekkhaayeva avasissati parisuddhaa pariyodaataa mudu ca kamma~n~naa ca pabhassaraa ca.

[03] 361^b^.^eb^ ``so eva.m pajaanaati -- `ima~nce aha.m upekkha.m eva.m parisuddha.m eva.m pariyodaata.m aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m upasa.mhareyya.m, tadanudhamma~nca citta.m bhaaveyya.m. eva.m me aya.m upekkhaa ta.mnissitaa ^a^T3.0443^ea^ tadupaadaanaa cira.m diighamaddhaana.m ti.t.theyya. ima~nce aha.m upekkha.m eva.m parisuddha.m eva.m pariyodaata.m vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m upasa.mhareyya.m, tadanudhamma~nca citta.m bhaaveyya.m. eva.m me aya.m upekkhaa ta.mnissitaa tadupaadaanaa cira.m diighamaddhaana.m ti.t.theyya. ima~nce aha.m ^a^P3.0244^ea^ upekkha.m eva.m parisuddha.m eva.m pariyodaata.m aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m upasa.mhareyya.m, tadanudhamma~nca citta.m bhaaveyya.m. eva.m me aya.m upekkhaa ta.mnissitaa tadupaadaanaa cira.m diighamaddhaana.m ti.t.theyya. ima~nce aha.m upekkha.m eva.m parisuddha.m eva.m pariyodaata.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m upasa.mhareyya.m, tadanudhamma~nca citta.m bhaaveyya.m. eva.m me aya.m upekkhaa ta.mnissitaa tadupaadaanaa cira.m diighamaddhaana.m ti.t.theyyaa'''ti.

[03] 362^b^.^eb^ ``so eva.m pajaanaati -- `ima~nce aha.m upekkha.m eva.m parisuddha.m eva.m pariyodaata.m aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m upasa.mhareyya.m, tadanudhamma~nca citta.m bhaaveyya.m; sa"nkhatameta.m. ima~nce aha.m upekkha.m eva.m parisuddha.m eva.m pariyodaata.m vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m upasa.mhareyya.m, tadanudhamma~nca citta.m bhaaveyya.m; sa"nkhatameta.m. ima~nce aha.m upekkha.m eva.m parisuddha.m eva.m pariyodaata.m aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m upasa.mhareyya.m, tadanudhamma~nca citta.m bhaaveyya.m; sa"nkhatameta.m. ima~nce aha.m upekkha.m eva.m parisuddha.m eva.m pariyodaata.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m upasa.mhareyya.m, tadanudhamma~nca citta.m bhaaveyya.m; sa"nkhatameta'''nti.

[03] ``so neva ta.m abhisa"nkharoti, na abhisa~ncetayati bhavaaya vaa vibhavaaya vaa. so anabhisa"nkharonto anabhisa~ncetayanto bhavaaya vaa vibhavaaya vaa na ki~nci ^a^T3.0444^ea^ loke upaadiyati, anupaadiya.m na paritassati, aparitassa.m paccatta.myeva parinibbaayati. `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaati.

[03] 363^b^.^eb^ ``so sukha~nce vedana.m vedeti, `saa aniccaa'ti pajaanaati, `anajjhositaa'ti pajaanaati, `anabhinanditaa'ti pajaanaati. dukkha~nce vedana.m vedeti ^a^M3.0288^ea^, `saa aniccaa'ti pajaanaati, ^b`anajjhositaa'ti ^a^V3.0294^ea^ pajaanaati, `anabhinanditaa'ti pajaanaati. adukkhamasukha~nce vedana.m vedeti, `saa aniccaa'ti pajaanaati, `anajjhositaa'ti pajaanaati, `anabhinanditaa'ti pajaanaati.b^

[03] 364^b^.^eb^ ``so sukha~nce vedana.m vedeti, visa.myutto na.m vedeti; dukkha~nce vedana.m vedeti, visa.myutto na.m vedeti; adukkhamasukha~nce vedana.m vedeti, visa.myutto na.m vedeti. so kaayapariyantika.m vedana.m vedayamaano `kaayapariyantika.m vedana.m vedayaamii'ti pajaanaati, jiivitapariyantika.m ^a^P3.0245^ea^ vedana.m vedayamaano `jiivitapariyantika.m vedana.m vedayaamii'ti pajaanaati, `kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa uddha.m jiivitapariyaadaanaa idheva sabbavedayitaani anabhinanditaani siitiibhavissantii'ti pajaanaati.

[03] 365^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhu, tela~nca pa.ticca va.t.ti~nca pa.ticca telappadiipo jhaayati; tasseva telassa ca va.t.tiyaa ca pariyaadaanaa a~n~nassa ca anupahaaraa {anupaahaaraa (sii0 pii0), anupaadaanaa (ka0)} anaahaaro nibbaayati; evameva kho, bhikkhu, kaayapariyantika.m vedana.m vedayamaano `kaayapariyantika.m vedana.m vedayaamii'ti pajaanaati, jiivitapariyantika.m vedana.m vedayamaano `jiivitapariyantika.m vedana.m vedayaamii'ti pajaanaati, `kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa uddha.m jiivitapariyaadaanaa idheva sabbavedayitaani ^a^T3.0445^ea^ anabhinanditaani siitiibhavissantii'ti pajaanaati. tasmaa eva.m samannaagato bhikkhu iminaa paramena pa~n~naadhi.t.thaanena samannaagato hoti. esaa hi, bhikkhu, paramaa ariyaa pa~n~naa yadida.m -- sabbadukkhakkhaye ~naa.na.m.

[03] 366^b^.^eb^ ``tassa saa vimutti sacce .thitaa akuppaa hoti. ta~nhi, bhikkhu, musaa ya.m mosadhamma.m, ta.m sacca.m ya.m amosadhamma.m nibbaana.m. tasmaa eva.m samannaagato bhikkhu iminaa paramena saccaadhi.t.thaanena samannaagato hoti. eta~nhi, bhikkhu, parama.m ariyasacca.m yadida.m -- amosadhamma.m nibbaana.m.

[03] 367^b^.^eb^ ``tasseva kho pana pubbe aviddasuno upadhii honti samattaa samaadinnaa. tyaassa pahiinaa honti ucchinnamuulaa taalaavatthukataa anabhaava.mkataa aayati.m anuppaadadhammaa. tasmaa eva.m samannaagato bhikkhu ^a^M3.0289^ea^ iminaa paramena caagaadhi.t.thaanena samannaagato hoti. eso hi, bhikkhu, paramo ariyo caago yadida.m -- sabbuupadhipa.tinissaggo.

[03] 368^b^.^eb^ ``tasseva kho pana pubbe aviddasuno abhijjhaa hoti chando saaraago. svaassa ^a^V3.0295^ea^ pahiino hoti ucchinnamuulo taalaavatthukato anabhaava.mkato aayati.m anuppaadadhammo. tasseva kho pana pubbe aviddasuno aaghaato hoti byaapaado sampadoso. svaassa pahiino hoti ucchinnamuulo ^a^P3.0246^ea^ taalaavatthukato anabhaava.mkato aayati.m anuppaadadhammo. tasseva kho pana pubbe aviddasuno avijjaa hoti sammoho. svaassa pahiino hoti ucchinnamuulo taalaavatthukato anabhaava.mkato aayati.m anuppaadadhammo. tasmaa eva.m ^a^T3.0446^ea^ samannaagato bhikkhu iminaa paramena upasamaadhi.t.thaanena samannaagato hoti. eso hi, bhikkhu, paramo ariyo upasamo yadida.m -- raagadosamohaana.m upasamo. `pa~n~na.m nappamajjeyya, saccamanurakkheyya, caagamanubruuheyya, santimeva so sikkheyyaa'ti -- iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m, idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] 369^b^.^eb^ ```yattha .thita.m ma~n~nassavaa nappavattanti, ma~n~nassave kho pana nappavattamaane muni santoti vuccatii'ti -- iti kho paneta.m vutta.m. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? `asmii'ti, bhikkhu, ma~n~nitameta.m, `ayamahamasmii'ti ma~n~nitameta.m, `bhavissa'nti ma~n~nitameta.m, `na bhavissa'nti ma~n~nitameta.m, `ruupii bhavissa'nti ma~n~nitameta.m, `aruupii bhavissa'nti ma~n~nitameta.m, `sa~n~nii bhavissa'nti ma~n~nitameta.m, `asa~n~nii bhavissa'nti ma~n~nitameta.m, `nevasa~n~niinaasa~n~nii bhavissa'nti ma~n~nitameta.m. ma~n~nita.m, bhikkhu, rogo ma~n~nita.m ga.n.do ma~n~nita.m salla.m. sabbama~n~nitaana.m tveva, bhikkhu, samatikkamaa muni santoti vuccati. muni kho pana, bhikkhu, santo na jaayati, na jiiyati, na miiyati, na kuppati, na piheti. ta~nhissa, bhikkhu, natthi yena jaayetha, ajaayamaano ki.m jiiyissati, ajiiyamaano ki.m miiyissati, amiiyamaano ki.m kuppissati, akuppamaano kissa {ki.m (ka0)} pihessati? `yattha .thita.m ma~n~nassavaa nappavattanti, ma~n~nassave kho pana nappavattamaane muni santoti vuccatii'ti -- iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m, idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m. ima.m kho me tva.m, bhikkhu, sa.mkhittena chadhaatuvibha"nga.m dhaarehii''ti.

[03] 370^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^T3.0447^ea^ ^a^M3.0290^ea^ kho aayasmaa pukkusaati -- ``satthaa kira me anuppatto, sugato kira me anuppatto sammaasambuddho kira me anuppatto''ti u.t.thaayaasanaa eka.msa.m ciivara.m katvaa bhagavato paadesu sirasaa nipatitvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``accayo ma.m, bhante, accagamaa yathaabaala.m yathaamuu.lha.m yathaaakusala.m, yoha.m bhagavanta.m aavusovaadena samudaacaritabba.m ama~n~nissa.m. tassa me, bhante, bhagavaa accaya.m accayato pa.tigga.nhaatu aayati.m sa.mvaraayaa''ti. ``taggha tva.m, bhikkhu, accayo accagamaa yathaabaala.m yathaamuu.lha.m yathaaakusala.m ^a^P3.0247^ea^, ya.m ma.m tva.m aavusovaadena ^a^V3.0296^ea^ samudaacaritabba.m ama~n~nittha. yato ca kho tva.m, bhikkhu, accaya.m accayato disvaa yathaadhamma.m pa.tikarosi, ta.m te maya.m pa.tigga.nhaama. vuddhihesaa, bhikkhu, ariyassa vinaye yo accaya.m accayato disvaa yathaadhamma.m pa.tikaroti, aayati.m sa.mvara.m aapajjatii''ti. ``labheyyaaha.m, bhante, bhagavato santike upasampada''nti. ``paripu.n.na.m pana te, bhikkhu, pattaciivara''nti? ``na kho me, bhante, paripu.n.na.m pattaciivara''nti. ``na kho, bhikkhu, tathaagataa aparipu.n.napattaciivara.m upasampaadentii''ti.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa pukkusaati bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pattaciivarapariyesana.m pakkaami. atha kho aayasmanta.m pukkusaati.m pattaciivarapariyesana.m caranta.m vibbhantaa gaavii {bhantagaavii (sii0 pii0), gaavii (syaa0 ka.m0)} jiivitaa voropesi. atha kho sambahulaa ^a^T3.0448^ea^ bhikkhuu yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho te bhikkhuu bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``yo so, bhante, pukkusaati naama kulaputto bhagavataa sa.mkhittena ovaadena ovadito so kaala"nkato. tassa kaa gati, ko abhisamparaayo''ti? ``pa.n.dito, bhikkhave, pukkusaati kulaputto paccapaadi dhammassaanudhamma.m, na ca ma.m dhammaadhikara.na.m vihesesi {vihe.thesi (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0) viheseti (ka0)}. pukkusaati, bhikkhave, kulaputto pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa opapaatiko tattha parinibbaayii anaavattidhammo tasmaa lokaa''ti.
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamanaa te bhikkhuu bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandunti.
[06] dhaatuvibha"ngasutta.m ni.t.thita.m dasama.m.

[03] 371^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T3.0449^ea^ ^a^M3.0291^ea^ ^a^V3.0297^ea^ ^a^P3.0248^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa baaraa.nasiya.m viharati isipatane migadaaye. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``tathaagatena, bhikkhave, arahataa sammaasambuddhena baaraa.nasiya.m isipatane migadaaye anuttara.m dhammacakka.m pavattita.m appa.tivattiya.m sama.nena vaa braahma.nena vaa devena vaa maarena vaa brahmunaa vaa kenaci vaa lokasmi.m, yadida.m -- catunna.m ariyasaccaana.m aacikkhanaa desanaa pa~n~naapanaa pa.t.thapanaa vivara.naa vibhajanaa uttaaniikamma.m. katamesa.m catunna.m? dukkhassa ariyasaccassa aacikkhanaa desanaa pa~n~naapanaa pa.t.thapanaa vivara.naa vibhajanaa uttaaniikamma.m, dukkhasamudayassa ariyasaccassa aacikkhanaa desanaa pa~n~naapanaa pa.t.thapanaa vivara.naa vibhajanaa uttaaniikamma.m, dukkhanirodhassa ariyasaccassa aacikkhanaa desanaa pa~n~naapanaa pa.t.thapanaa vivara.naa vibhajanaa uttaaniikamma.m, dukkhanirodhagaaminiyaa pa.tipadaaya ariyasaccassa aacikkhanaa desanaa pa~n~naapanaa pa.t.thapanaa vivara.naa vibhajanaa uttaaniikamma.m. tathaagatena, bhikkhave, arahataa sammaasambuddhena baaraa.nasiya.m isipatane migadaaye anuttara.m dhammacakka.m pavattita.m appa.tivattiya.m sama.nena vaa braahma.nena vaa devena vaa maarena vaa brahmunaa vaa kenaci vaa lokasmi.m ^a^T3.0450^ea^, yadida.m -- imesa.m catunna.m ariyasaccaana.m aacikkhanaa desanaa pa~n~naapanaa pa.t.thapanaa vivara.naa vibhajanaa uttaaniikamma.m.

[03] ``sevatha, bhikkhave, saariputtamoggallaane; bhajatha, bhikkhave, saariputtamoggallaane. pa.n.ditaa bhikkhuu anuggaahakaa sabrahmacaariina.m. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, janetaa {janetti (sii0 pii0)}, eva.m saariputto; seyyathaapi jaatassa aapaadetaa, eva.m moggallaano. saariputto, bhikkhave, sotaapattiphale vineti, moggallaano uttamatthe. saariputto, bhikkhave, pahoti cattaari ariyasaccaani vitthaarena aacikkhitu.m desetu.m pa~n~naapetu.m pa.t.thapetu.m vivaritu.m vibhajitu.m uttaaniikaatu''nti. idamavoca bhagavaa. ida.m vatvaana sugato u.t.thaayaasanaa vihaara.m paavisi.

[03] 372^b^.^eb^ tatra ^a^V3.0298^ea^ ^a^P3.0249^ea^ kho aayasmaa saariputto acirapakkantassa bhagavato bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``aavuso, bhikkhave''ti. ``aavuso''ti kho te bhikkhuu ^a^M3.0292^ea^ aayasmato saariputtassa paccassosu.m. aayasmaa saariputto etadavoca --

[03] ``tathaagatena, aavuso, arahataa sammaasambuddhena baaraa.nasiya.m isipatane migadaaye anuttara.m dhammacakka.m pavattita.m appa.tivattiya.m sama.nena vaa braahma.nena vaa devena vaa maarena vaa brahmunaa vaa kenaci vaa lokasmi.m, yadida.m -- catunna.m ariyasaccaana.m aacikkhanaa desanaa pa~n~naapanaa pa.t.thapanaa vivara.naa vibhajanaa uttaaniikamma.m. katamesa.m catunna.m? dukkhassa ariyasaccassa aacikkhanaa desanaa pa~n~naapanaa pa.t.thapanaa vivara.naa vibhajanaa uttaaniikamma.m, dukkhasamudayassa ariyasaccassa ^a^T3.0451^ea^ aacikkhanaa desanaa pa~n~naapanaa pa.t.thapanaa vivara.naa vibhajanaa uttaaniikamma.m, dukkhanirodhassa ariyasaccassa aacikkhanaa desanaa pa~n~naapanaa pa.t.thapanaa vivara.naa vibhajanaa uttaaniikamma.m, dukkhanirodhagaaminiyaa pa.tipadaaya ariyasaccassa aacikkhanaa desanaa pa~n~naapanaa pa.t.thapanaa vivara.naa vibhajanaa uttaaniikamma.m.

[03] 373^b^.^eb^ ``katama~ncaavuso, dukkha.m ariyasacca.m? jaatipi dukkhaa, jaraapi dukkhaa, mara.nampi dukkha.m, sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaapi dukkhaa, yampiccha.m na labhati tampi dukkha.m; sa.mkhittena pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhaa dukkhaa.

[03] ``katamaa caavuso, jaati? yaa tesa.m tesa.m sattaana.m tamhi tamhi sattanikaaye jaati sa~njaati okkanti abhinibbatti khandhaana.m paatubhaavo aayatanaana.m pa.tilaabho, aya.m vuccataavuso -- `jaati'''.

[03] ``katamaa caavuso, jaraa? yaa tesa.m tesa.m sattaana.m tamhi tamhi sattanikaaye jaraa jiira.nataa kha.n.dicca.m paalicca.m valittacataa aayuno sa.mhaani indriyaana.m paripaako, aya.m vuccataavuso -- `jaraa'''.

[03] ``katama~ncaavuso, mara.na.m? yaa tesa.m tesa.m sattaana.m tamhaa tamhaa sattanikaayaa cuti cavanataa ^a^V3.0299^ea^ bhedo antaradhaana.m maccu mara.na.m kaala.mkiriyaa khandhaana.m bhedo ka.levarassa nikkhepo jiivitindriyassupacchedo, ida.m vuccataavuso -- `mara.na.m'''.

[03] ``katamo caavuso, soko? yo kho, aavuso, a~n~natara~n~natarena byasanena samannaagatassa a~n~natara~n~natarena dukkhadhammena phu.t.thassa soko socanaa socitatta.m antosoko antoparisoko, aya.m vuccataavuso ^a^T3.0452^ea^ -- `soko'''.

[03] ``katamo ^a^M3.0293^ea^ caavuso, paridevo? yo kho, aavuso, a~n~natara~n~natarena byasanena samannaagatassa a~n~natara~n~natarena dukkhadhammena phu.t.thassa aadevo paridevo aadevanaa ^a^P3.0250^ea^ paridevanaa aadevitatta.m paridevitatta.m, aya.m vuccataavuso -- `paridevo'''.
[03] ``katama~ncaavuso, dukkha.m? ya.m kho, aavuso, kaayika.m dukkha.m kaayika.m asaata.m kaayasamphassaja.m dukkha.m asaata.m vedayita.m, ida.m vuccataavuso -- `dukkha.m'''.
[03] ``katama~ncaavuso, domanassa.m? ya.m kho, aavuso, cetasika.m dukkha.m cetasika.m asaata.m manosamphassaja.m dukkha.m asaata.m vedayita.m, ida.m vuccataavuso -- `domanassa.m'''.

[03] ``katamo caavuso, upaayaaso? yo kho, aavuso, a~n~natara~n~natarena byasanena samannaagatassa a~n~natara~n~natarena dukkhadhammena phu.t.thassa aayaaso upaayaaso aayaasitatta.m upaayaasitatta.m, aya.m vuccataavuso -- `upaayaaso'''.

[03] ``katama~ncaavuso, yampiccha.m na labhati tampi dukkha.m? jaatidhammaana.m, aavuso, sattaana.m eva.m icchaa uppajjati -- `aho vata, maya.m na jaatidhammaa assaama; na ca, vata, no jaati aagaccheyyaa'ti. na kho paneta.m icchaaya pattabba.m. idampi -- `yampiccha.m na labhati tampi dukkha.m'. jaraadhammaana.m, aavuso, sattaana.m...pe0... byaadhidhammaana.m, aavuso, sattaana.m... mara.nadhammaana.m, aavuso, sattaana.m... sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasadhammaana.m, aavuso, sattaana.m eva.m icchaa uppajjati -- `aho vata, maya.m na sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasadhammaa assaama ^a^V3.0300^ea^; na ca, vata, no sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa aagaccheyyu'nti ^a^T3.0453^ea^. na kho paneta.m icchaaya pattabba.m. idampi -- `yampiccha.m na labhati tampi dukkha.m'''.

[03] ``katame caavuso, sa.mkhittena pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhaa dukkhaa? seyyathida.m -- ruupupaadaanakkhandho, vedanupaadaanakkhandho, sa~n~nupaadaanakkhandho, sa"nkhaarupaadaanakkhandho, vi~n~naa.nupaadaanakkhandho. ime vuccantaavuso -- `sa.mkhittena pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhaa dukkhaa'. ida.m vuccataavuso -- `dukkha.m ariyasacca.m'''.

[03] 374^b^.^eb^ ``katama~ncaavuso, dukkhasamudaya.m {dukkhasamudayo (syaa0 ka.m0)} ariyasacca.m? yaaya.m ta.nhaa ponobbhavikaa {ponobhavikaa (sii0 pii0)} nandiiraagasahagataa {nandiraagasahagataa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} tatratatraabhinandinii, seyyathida.m -- kaamata.nhaa ^a^M3.0294^ea^ bhavata.nhaa vibhavata.nhaa ^a^P3.0251^ea^, ida.m vuccataavuso -- `dukkhasamudaya.m {dukkhasamudayo (syaa0 ka.m0)} ariyasacca.m'''.

[03] ``katama~ncaavuso, dukkhanirodha.m {dukkhanirodho (syaa0 ka.m0)} ariyasacca.m? yo tassaayeva ta.nhaaya asesaviraaganirodho caago pa.tinissaggo mutti anaalayo, ida.m vuccataavuso -- `dukkhanirodha.m {dukkhanirodho (syaa0 ka.m0)} ariyasacca.m'''.

[03] 375^b^.^eb^ ``katama~ncaavuso, dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa ariyasacca.m? ayameva ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo, seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi, sammaasa"nkappo, sammaavaacaa, sammaakammanto, sammaaaajiivo, sammaavaayaamo, sammaasati, sammaasamaadhi.

[03] ``katamaacaavuso, sammaadi.t.thi? ya.m kho, aavuso, dukkhe ~naa.na.m, dukkhasamudaye ~naa.na.m, dukkhanirodhe ~naa.na.m, dukkhanirodhagaaminiyaa pa.tipadaaya ~naa.na.m, aya.m vuccataavuso -- `sammaadi.t.thi'''.
[03] ``katamo caavuso, sammaasa"nkappo? nekkhammasa"nkappo, abyaapaadasa"nkappo ^a^T3.0454^ea^, avihi.msaasa"nkappo, aya.m vuccataavuso -- `sammaasa"nkappo'''.
[03] ``katamaa caavuso, sammaavaacaa? musaavaadaa verama.nii, pisu.naaya vaacaaya verama.nii, pharusaaya vaacaaya verama.nii, samphappalaapaa verama.nii, aya.m vuccataavuso -- `sammaavaacaa'''.
[03] ``katamo ^a^V3.0301^ea^ caavuso, sammaakammantii? paa.naatipaataa verama.nii, adinnaadaanaa verama.nii, kaamesumicchaacaaraa verama.nii, aya.m vuccataavuso -- `sammaakammanto'''.
[03] ``katamo caavuso, sammaaaajiivo? idhaavuso, ariyasaavako micchaaaajiiva.m pahaaya sammaaaajiivena jiivika.m kappeti, aya.m vuccataavuso -- `sammaaaajiivo'''.

[03] ``katamo caavuso, sammaavaayaamo? idhaavuso, bhikkhu anuppannaana.m paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m anuppaadaaya chanda.m janeti vaayamati viiriya.m aarabhati citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati, uppannaana.m paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya chanda.m janeti vaayamati viiriya.m aarabhati citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati, anuppannaana.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m ^a^P3.0252^ea^ uppaadaaya chanda.m janeti vaayamati viiriya.m aarabhati citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati, uppannaana.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m .thitiyaa ^a^M3.0295^ea^ asammosaaya bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa chanda.m janeti vaayamati viiriya.m aarabhati citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati, aya.m vuccataavuso -- `sammaavaayaamo'''.

[03] ``katamaa caavuso, sammaasati? idhaavuso, bhikkhu kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. vedanaasu vedanaanupassii viharati...pe0... citte cittaanupassii viharati... dhammesu dhammaanupassii ^a^T3.0455^ea^ viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m, aya.m vuccataavuso -- `sammaasati'''.

[03] ``katamo caavuso, sammaasamaadhi? idhaavuso, bhikkhu vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati, vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m cetaso ekodibhaava.m avitakka.m avicaara.m samaadhija.m piitisukha.m dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati, piitiyaa ca viraagaa upekkhako ca viharati...pe0... tatiya.m jhaana.m... ^a^V3.0302^ea^ viharati, aya.m vuccataavuso -- `sammaasamaadhi'. ida.m vuccataavuso -- `dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa ariyasacca.m'''.

[03] ``tathaagatenaavuso, arahataa sammaasambuddhena baaraa.nasiya.m isipatane migadaaye anuttara.m dhammacakka.m pavattita.m appa.tivattiya.m sama.nena vaa braahma.nena vaa devena vaa maarena vaa brahmunaa vaa kenaci vaa lokasmi.m, yadida.m -- imesa.m catunna.m ariyasaccaana.m aacikkhanaa desanaa pa~n~naapanaa pa.t.thapanaa vivara.naa vibhajanaa uttaaniikamma''nti.
[03] idamavoca aayasmaa saariputto. attamanaa te bhikkhuu aayasmato saariputtassa bhaasita.m abhinandunti.
[03] saccavibha"ngasutta.m ni.t.thita.m ekaadasama.m.

[03] 376^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T3.0456^ea^ ^a^V3.0303^ea^ ^a^P3.0253^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmi.m nigrodhaaraame. atha kho mahaapajaapati {mahaapajaapatii (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} gotamii nava.m dussayuga.m aadaaya yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ^a^M3.0296^ea^ ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho mahaapajaapati gotamii bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ida.m me, bhante, nava.m dussayuga.m bhagavanta.m uddissa saama.m kanta.m saama.m vaayita.m. ta.m me, bhante, bhagavaa pa.tigga.nhaatu anukampa.m upaadaayaa''ti. eva.m vutte, bhagavaa mahaapajaapati.m gotami.m etadavoca -- ``sa"nghe, gotami, dehi. sa"nghe te dinne aha~nceva puujito bhavissaami sa"ngho caa''ti. dutiyampi kho mahaapajaapati gotamii bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ida.m me, bhante, nava.m dussayuga.m bhagavanta.m uddissa saama.m kanta.m saama.m vaayita.m. ta.m me, bhante, bhagavaa pa.tigga.nhaatu anukampa.m upaadaayaa''ti. dutiyampi kho bhagavaa mahaapajaapati.m gotami.m etadavoca -- ``sa"nghe, gotami, dehi. sa"nghe te dinne aha~nceva puujito bhavissaami sa"ngho caa''ti. tatiyampi kho mahaapajaapati gotamii bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ida.m me, bhante, nava.m dussayuga.m bhagavanta.m uddissa saama.m kanta.m saama.m vaayita.m. ta.m me, bhante, bhagavaa pa.tigga.nhaatu anukampa.m upaadaayaa''ti. tatiyampi kho bhagavaa mahaapajaapati.m gotami.m etadavoca -- ``sa"nghe, gotami, dehi ^a^T3.0457^ea^. sa"nghe te dinne aha~nceva puujito bhavissaami sa"ngho caa''ti.

[03] 377^b^.^eb^ eva.m vutte, aayasmaa aanando bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``pa.tigga.nhaatu, bhante, bhagavaa mahaapajaapatiyaa gotamiyaa nava.m dussayuga.m. bahuupakaaraa {bahukaaraa (syaa0 ka.m0)}, bhante, mahaapajaapati gotamii bhagavato maatucchaa aapaadikaa posikaa khiirassa daayikaa; bhagavanta.m janettiyaa kaala"nkataaya tha~n~na.m paayesi. bhagavaapi, bhante, bahuupakaaro mahaapajaapatiyaa gotamiyaa. bhagavanta.m, bhante, aagamma mahaapajaapati gotamii buddha.m sara.na.m gataa, dhamma.m sara.na.m gataa, sa"ngha.m sara.na.m gataa. bhagavanta.m, bhante, aagamma mahaapajaapati gotamii paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirataa adinnaadaanaa pa.tivirataa kaamesumicchaacaaraa pa.tivirataa musaavaadaa pa.tivirataa suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaanaa pa.tivirataa. bhagavanta.m, bhante, aagamma mahaapajaapati gotamii buddhe aveccappasaadena samannaagataa ^a^V3.0304^ea^, dhamme aveccappasaadena samannaagataa, sa"nghe aveccappasaadena samannaagataa ariyakantehi ^a^P3.0254^ea^ siilehi samannaagataa. bhagavanta.m, bhante, aagamma mahaapajaapati gotamii dukkhe nikka"nkhaa, dukkhasamudaye nikka"nkhaa, dukkhanirodhe nikka"nkhaa, dukkhanirodhagaaminiyaa pa.tipadaaya nikka"nkhaa. bhagavaapi, bhante, bahuupakaaro mahaapajaapatiyaa gotamiyaa''ti.

[03] 378^b^.^eb^ ``evameta.m ^a^M3.0297^ea^, aananda. ya.m haananda, puggalo puggala.m aagamma buddha.m sara.na.m gato hoti, dhamma.m sara.na.m gato hoti, sa"ngha.m sara.na.m gato hoti, imassaananda, puggalassa iminaa puggalena na suppatikaara.m vadaami, yadida.m -- abhivaadana-paccu.t.thaanaa~njalikamma ^a^T3.0458^ea^ saamiicikammaciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaa- nappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraanuppadaanena.

[03] ``ya.m haananda, puggalo puggala.m aagamma paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato hoti, adinnaadaanaa pa.tivirato hoti, kaamesumicchaacaaraa pa.tivirato hoti, musaavaadaa pa.tivirato hoti, suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaanaa pa.tivirato hoti, imassaananda, puggalassa iminaa puggalena na suppatikaara.m vadaami, yadida.m -- abhivaadana-paccu.t.thaana-a~njalikamma-saamiicikammaciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaa- nappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraanuppadaanena.

[03] ``ya.m haananda, puggalo puggala.m aagamma buddhe aveccappasaadena samannaagato hoti, dhamme... sa"nghe... ariyakantehi siilehi samannaagato hoti, imassaananda, puggalassa iminaa puggalena na suppatikaara.m vadaami, yadida.m -- abhivaadana-paccu.t.thaana-a~njalikamma-saamiicikammaciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaa- nappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraanuppadaanena.

[01] ``ya.m haananda, puggalo puggala.m aagamma dukkhe nikka"nkho hoti, dukkhasamudaye nikka"nkho hoti, dukkhanirodhe nikka"nkho hoti, dukkhanirodhagaaminiyaa pa.tipadaaya nikka"nkho hoti, imassaananda, puggalassa iminaa puggalena na suppatikaara.m vadaami, yadida.m -- abhivaadana-paccu.t.thaanaa~njalikamma-saamiicikamma-ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaa- nappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraanuppadaanena.

[03] 379^b^.^eb^ ``cuddasa kho panimaananda, paa.tipuggalikaa dakkhi.naa. katamaa cuddasa? tathaagate ^a^T3.0459^ea^ arahante sammaasambuddhe daana.m deti -- aya.m pa.thamaa paa.tipuggalikaa dakkhi.naa. paccekasambuddhe {paccekabuddhe (sii0 pii0)} daana.m ^a^V3.0305^ea^ deti -- aya.m dutiyaa paa.tipuggalikaa dakkhi.naa. tathaagatasaavake arahante daana.m deti -- aya.m tatiyaa paa.tipuggalikaa dakkhi.naa. arahattaphalasacchikiriyaaya pa.tipanne daana.m deti -- aya.m catutthii paa.tipuggalikaa dakkhi.naa. anaagaamissa daana.m deti -- aya.m pa~ncamii paa.tipuggalikaa dakkhi.naa. anaagaamiphalasacchikiriyaaya ^a^P3.0255^ea^ pa.tipanne daana.m deti -- aya.m cha.t.thii paa.tipuggalikaa dakkhi.naa. sakadaagaamissa daana.m deti -- aya.m sattamii paa.tipuggalikaa ^a^M3.0298^ea^ dakkhi.naa. sakadaagaamiphalasacchikiriyaaya pa.tipanne daana.m deti -- aya.m a.t.thamii paa.tipuggalikaa dakkhi.naa. sotaapanne daana.m deti -- aya.m navamii paa.tipuggalikaa dakkhi.naa. sotaapattiphalasacchikiriyaaya pa.tipanne daana.m deti -- aya.m dasamii paa.tipuggalikaa dakkhi.naa. baahirake kaamesu viitaraage daana.m deti -- aya.m ekaadasamii paa.tipuggalikaa dakkhi.naa. puthujjanasiilavante daana.m deti -- aya.m dvaadasamii paa.tipuggalikaa dakkhi.naa. puthujjanadussiile daana.m deti -- aya.m terasamii paa.tipuggalikaa dakkhi.naa. tiracchaanagate daana.m deti -- aya.m cuddasamii paa.tipuggalikaa dakkhi.naati.

[03] ``tatraananda, tiracchaanagate daana.m datvaa satagu.naa dakkhi.naa paa.tika"nkhitabbaa, puthujjanadussiile daana.m datvaa sahassagu.naa dakkhi.naa paa.tika"nkhitabbaa, puthujjanasiilavante daana.m datvaa satasahassagu.naa dakkhi.naa ^a^T3.0460^ea^ paa.tika"nkhitabbaa, baahirake kaamesu viitaraage daana.m datvaa ko.tisatasahassagu.naa dakkhi.naa paa.tika"nkhitabbaa, sotaapattiphalasacchikiriyaaya pa.tipanne daana.m datvaa asa"nkheyyaa appameyyaa dakkhi.naa paa.tika"nkhitabbaa, ko pana vaado sotaapanne, ko pana vaado sakadaagaamiphalasacchikiriyaaya pa.tipanne, ko pana vaado sakadaagaamissa, ko pana vaado anaagaamiphalasacchikiriyaaya pa.tipanne, ko pana vaado anaagaamissa, ko pana vaado arahattaphalasacchikiriyaaya pa.tipanne, ko pana vaado arahante, ko pana vaado paccekasambuddhe, ko pana vaado tathaagate arahante sammaasambuddhe!

[03] 380^b^.^eb^ ``satta kho panimaananda, sa"nghagataa dakkhi.naa. katamaa satta? buddhappamukhe ubhatosa"nghe daana.m deti -- aya.m pa.thamaa sa"nghagataa dakkhi.naa. tathaagate parinibbute ubhatosa"nghe daana.m deti -- aya.m dutiyaa sa"nghagataa dakkhi.naa. bhikkhusa"nghe daana.m deti -- aya.m tatiyaa sa"nghagataa dakkhi.naa. bhikkhunisa"nghe daana.m deti -- aya.m catutthii sa"nghagataa dakkhi.naa. `ettakaa me bhikkhuu ca bhikkhuniyo ca ^a^P3.0256^ea^ sa"nghato uddissathaa'ti daana.m deti -- aya.m pa~ncamii sa"nghagataa dakkhi.naa. `ettakaa ^a^V3.0306^ea^ me bhikkhuu sa"nghato uddissathaa'ti daana.m deti -- aya.m cha.t.thii sa"nghagataa dakkhi.naa. `ettakaa me bhikkhuniyo sa"nghato uddissathaa'ti daana.m deti -- aya.m sattamii sa"nghagataa dakkhi.naa.

[03] ``bhavissanti ^a^M3.0299^ea^ kho panaananda, anaagatamaddhaana.m gotrabhuno kaasaavaka.n.thaa ^a^T3.0461^ea^ dussiilaa paapadhammaa. tesu dussiilesu sa"ngha.m uddissa daana.m dassanti. tadaapaaha.m, aananda, sa"nghagata.m dakkhi.na.m asa"nkheyya.m appameyya.m vadaami. na tvevaaha.m, aananda, kenaci pariyaayena sa"nghagataaya dakkhi.naaya paa.tipuggalika.m daana.m mahapphalatara.m vadaami.

[03] 381^b^.^eb^ ``catasso kho imaa, aananda, dakkhi.naa visuddhiyo. katamaa catasso? atthaananda, dakkhi.naa daayakato visujjhati no pa.tiggaahakato. atthaananda, dakkhi.naa pa.tiggaahakato visujjhati no daayakato. atthaananda, dakkhi.naa neva daayakato visujjhati no pa.tiggaahakato. atthaananda, dakkhi.naa daayakato ceva visujjhati pa.tiggaahakato ca.

[03] ``katha~ncaananda, dakkhi.naa daayakato visujjhati no pa.tiggaahakato? idhaananda, daayako hoti siilavaa kalyaa.nadhammo, pa.tiggaahakaa honti dussiilaa paapadhammaa -- eva.m kho, aananda, dakkhi.naa daayakato visujjhati no pa.tiggaahakato.

[03] ``katha~ncaananda, dakkhi.naa pa.tiggaahakato visujjhati no daayakato? idhaananda, daayako hoti dussiilo paapadhammo, pa.tiggaahakaa honti siilavanto {siilavantaa (sii0)} kalyaa.nadhammaa -- eva.m kho, aananda, dakkhi.naa pa.tiggaahakato visujjhati no daayakato.

[03] ``katha~ncaananda, dakkhi.naa neva daayakato visujjhati no pa.tiggaahakato? idhaananda, daayako ca hoti dussiilo paapadhammo, pa.tiggaahakaa ^a^T3.0462^ea^ ca honti dussiilaa paapadhammaa -- eva.m kho, aananda, dakkhi.naa neva daayakato visujjhati no pa.tiggaahakato.

[01] ``katha~ncaananda, dakkhi.naa daayakato ceva visujjhati pa.tiggaahakato ca? idhaananda, daayako ca hoti siilavaa kalyaa.nadhammo, pa.tiggaahakaa ca honti siilavanto kalyaa.nadhammaa ^a^P3.0257^ea^ -- eva.m ^a^V3.0307^ea^ kho, aananda, dakkhi.naa daayakato ceva visujjhati pa.tiggaahakato ca. imaa kho, aananda, catasso dakkhi.naa visuddhiyo''ti.
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. ida.m vatvaana sugato athaapara.m etadavoca satthaa --
[21] ``yo ^a^M3.0300^ea^ siilavaa dussiilesu dadaati daana.m,
[27] dhammena laddha.m {laddhaa (sii0 pii0)} supasannacitto.
[26] abhisaddaha.m kammaphala.m u.laara.m,
[22] saa dakkhi.naa daayakato visujjhati..
[21] ``yo dussiilo siilavantesu dadaati daana.m,
[27] adhammena laddha.m appasannacitto.
[26] anabhisaddaha.m kammaphala.m u.laara.m,
[22] saa dakkhi.naa pa.tiggaahakato visujjhati..
[21] ``yo dussiilo dussiilesu dadaati daana.m,
[27] adhammena laddha.m appasannacitto.
[26] anabhisaddaha.m ^a^T3.0463^ea^ kammaphala.m u.laara.m,
[22] na ta.m daana.m vipulapphalanti bruumi..
[21] ``yo siilavaa siilavantesu dadaati daana.m,
[27] dhammena laddha.m supasannacitto.
[26] abhisaddaha.m kammaphala.m u.laara.m,
[22] ta.m ve daana.m vipulapphalanti bruumi {saa dakkhi.naa nevubhato visujjhati (sii0 pii0)}..
[21] ``yo viitaraago viitaraagesu dadaati daana.m,
[27] dhammena laddha.m supasannacitto.
[26] abhisaddaha.m ^a^V3.0308^ea^ kammaphala.m u.laara.m,
[22] ta.m ve daana.m aamisadaanaanamagga'' {ta.m ve daana.m vipulanti bruumi (sii0)} nti..
[06] dakkhi.naavibha"ngasutta.m ni.t.thita.m dvaadasama.m.
[06] vibha"ngavaggo ni.t.thito catuttho.
[21] tassuddaana.m --
[21] bhaddekaanandakaccaana, lomasaka"ngiyaasubho.
[22] mahaakammasa.laayatanavibha"ngaa, uddesaara.naa dhaatu sacca.m..
[06] dakkhi.naavibha"ngasuttanti.

[03] 383^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T3.0464^ea^ ^a^M3.0301^ea^ ^a^V3.0309^ea^ ^a^P3.0258^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena anaathapi.n.diko gahapati aabaadhiko hoti dukkhito baa.lhagilaano. atha kho anaathapi.n.diko gahapati a~n~natara.m purisa.m aamantesi -- ``ehi tva.m, ambho purisa, yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkama; upasa"nkamitvaa mama vacanena bhagavato paade sirasaa vandaahi {vandaahi eva~nca vadehi (sabbattha) a~n~nasuttesu pana natthi} -- `anaathapi.n.diko, bhante, gahapati aabaadhiko dukkhito baa.lhagilaano. so bhagavato paade sirasaa vandatii'ti. yena caayasmaa saariputto tenupasa"nkama; upasa"nkamitvaa mama vacanena aayasmato saariputtassa paade sirasaa vandaahi {vandaahi eva~nca vadehi (sabbattha) a~n~nasuttesu pana natthi} -- `anaathapi.n.diko, bhante, gahapati aabaadhiko dukkhito baa.lhagilaano. so aayasmato saariputtassa paade sirasaa vandatii'ti. eva~nca vadehi -- `saadhu kira, bhante, aayasmaa saariputto yena anaathapi.n.dikassa gahapatissa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkamatu anukampa.m upaadaayaa'''ti.

[03] ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho so puriso anaathapi.n.dikassa gahapatissa pa.tissutvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho so puriso bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``anaathapi.n.diko, bhante, gahapati aabaadhiko dukkhito baa.lhagilaano. so bhagavato paade sirasaa vandatii''ti. yena caayasmaa saariputto tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m saariputta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m ^a^T3.0465^ea^ nisinno kho so puriso aayasmanta.m saariputta.m etadavoca -- ``anaathapi.n.diko, bhante, gahapati aabaadhiko dukkhito baa.lhagilaano. so aayasmato saariputtassa paade sirasaa vandati; eva~nca vadeti -- `saadhu kira, bhante, aayasmaa saariputto yena anaathapi.n.dikassa ^a^V3.0310^ea^ gahapatissa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkamatu anukampa.m ^a^M3.0302^ea^ upaadaayaa'''ti. adhivaasesi kho aayasmaa saariputto tu.nhiibhaavena.

[03] 384^b^.^eb^ atha kho aayasmaa saariputto nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya aayasmataa aanandena pacchaasama.nena yena anaathapi.n.dikassa gahapatissa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte ^a^P3.0259^ea^ aasane nisiidi. nisajja kho aayasmaa saariputto anaathapi.n.dika.m gahapati.m etadavoca -- ``kacci te, gahapati, khamaniiya.m, kacci yaapaniiya.m? kacci te dukkhaa vedanaa pa.tikkamanti, no abhikkamanti; pa.tikkamosaana.m pa~n~naayati, no abhikkamo''ti?

[03] ``na me, bhante saariputta, khamaniiya.m na yaapaniiya.m. baa.lhaa me dukkhaa vedanaa abhikkamanti, no pa.tikkamanti; abhikkamosaana.m pa~n~naayati, no pa.tikkamo. seyyathaapi, bhante saariputta, balavaa puriso ti.nhena sikharena ^a^T3.0466^ea^ muddhani {muddhaana.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} abhimattheyya {abhimantheyya (sii0 pii0)}; evameva kho me, bhante saariputta, adhimattaa vaataa muddhani {ohananti (syaa0 ka.m0)} uuhananti {adhimattaa vaataa siila.m parikantanti (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)}. na me, bhante saariputta, khamaniiya.m na yaapaniiya.m. baa.lhaa me dukkhaa vedanaa abhikkamanti, no pa.tikkamanti; abhikkamosaana.m pa~n~naayati, no pa.tikkamo. seyyathaapi, bhante saariputta, balavaa puriso da.lhena varattakha.n.dena siise siisave.tha.m dadeyya; evameva kho me, bhante saariputta, adhimattaa siise siisavedanaa. na me, bhante saariputta, khamaniiya.m na yaapaniiya.m. baa.lhaa me dukkhaa vedanaa abhikkamanti, no pa.tikkamanti; abhikkamosaana.m pa~n~naayati, no pa.tikkamo. seyyathaapi, bhante saariputta, dakkho goghaatako vaa goghaatakantevaasii vaa ti.nhena govikantanena kucchi.m parikanteyya; evameva kho me, bhante saariputta, adhimattaa vaataa kucchi.m parikantanti. na me, bhante saariputta, khamaniiya.m na yaapaniiya.m. baa.lhaa me dukkhaa vedanaa abhikkamanti, no pa.tikkamanti; abhikkamosaana.m pa~n~naayati, no pa.tikkamo. seyyathaapi, bhante saariputta, dve balavanto purisaa dubbalatara.m purisa.m naanaabaahaasu gahetvaa a"ngaarakaasuyaa santaapeyyu.m, samparitaapeyyu.m; evameva kho me, bhante saariputta, adhimatto kaayasmi.m .daaho. na me, bhante saariputta, khamaniiya.m na yaapaniiya.m. baa.lhaa me dukkhaa vedanaa ^a^M3.0303^ea^ abhikkamanti, no pa.tikkamanti; abhikkamosaana.m ^a^T3.0467^ea^ pa~n~naayati, no pa.tikkamo''ti.

[03] 385^b^.^eb^ ``tasmaatiha ^a^V3.0311^ea^ te, gahapati, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `na cakkhu.m upaadiyissaami, na ca me cakkhunissita.m vi~n~naa.na.m bhavissatii'ti. eva~nhi te, gahapati, sikkhitabba.m.

[03] ``tasmaatiha te, gahapati, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `na sota.m upaadiyissaami, na ca me sotanissita.m vi~n~naa.na.m bhavissatii'ti. eva~nhi te, gahapati, sikkhitabba.m. tasmaatiha te, gahapati, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `na ghaana.m upaadiyissaami, na ca me ghaananissita.m vi~n~naa.na.m bhavissatii'ti. eva~nhi te, gahapati, sikkhitabba.m. tasmaatiha te, gahapati, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `na jivha.m upaadiyissaami, na ca me jivhaanissita.m vi~n~naa.na.m bhavissatii'ti. eva~nhi te, gahapati, sikkhitabba.m. tasmaatiha te, gahapati, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `na kaaya.m upaadiyissaami, na ca me kaayanissita.m vi~n~naa.na.m bhavissatii'ti. eva~nhi te, gahapati, sikkhitabba.m. tasmaatiha te, gahapati, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `na mana.m upaadiyissaami, na ca me manonissita.m vi~n~naa.na.m bhavissatii'ti. eva~nhi te, gahapati, sikkhitabba.m.

[03] ``tasmaatiha te, gahapati, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `na ruupa.m upaadiyissaami, na ca me ruupanissita.m vi~n~naa.na.m bhavissatii'ti. eva~nhi te, gahapati, sikkhitabba.m. tasmaatiha te, gahapati, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `na sadda.m upaadiyissaami...pe0... na gandha.m upaadiyissaami... na rasa.m upaadiyissaami... na pho.t.thabba.m upaadiyissaami... na dhamma.m upaadiyissaami na ^a^T3.0468^ea^ ca me dhammanissita.m vi~n~naa.na.m bhavissatii'ti. eva~nhi te, gahapati, sikkhitabba.m.
