[03] ``tasmaatiha te, gahapati, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `na cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m upaadiyissaami, na ca me cakkhuvi~n~naa.nanissita.m vi~n~naa.na.m bhavissatii'ti. eva~nhi te, gahapati, sikkhitabba.m. tasmaatiha te, gahapati, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `na sotavi~n~naa.na.m upaadiyissaami... na ghaanavi~n~naa.na.m upaadiyissaami... na jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m upaadiyissaami... na kaayavi~n~naa.na.m upaadiyissaami... na manovi~n~naa.na.m upaadiyissaami na ca me manovi~n~naa.nanissita.m vi~n~naa.na.m bhavissatii'ti. eva~nhi te, gahapati, sikkhitabba.m.

[03] ``tasmaatiha ^a^M3.0304^ea^ te, gahapati, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `na cakkhusamphassa.m upaadiyissaami, na ca ^a^V3.0312^ea^ me cakkhusamphassanissita.m ^a^P3.0260^ea^ vi~n~naa.na.m bhavissatii'ti. eva~nhi te, gahapati, sikkhitabba.m. tasmaatiha te, gahapati, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `na sotasamphassa.m upaadiyissaami... na ghaanasamphassa.m upaadiyissaami... na jivhaasamphassa.m upaadiyissaami... na kaayasamphassa.m upaadiyissaami... na manosamphassa.m upaadiyissaami, na ca me manosamphassanissita.m vi~n~naa.na.m bhavissatii'ti. eva~nhi te, gahapati, sikkhitabba.m.

[03] ``tasmaatiha te, gahapati, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `na cakkhusamphassaja.m vedana.m upaadiyissaami, na ca me cakkhusamphassajaavedanaanissita.m vi~n~naa.na.m bhavissatii'ti. eva~nhi te, gahapati, sikkhitabba.m. tasmaatiha te ^a^T3.0469^ea^, gahapati, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `na sotasamphassaja.m vedana.m upaadiyissaami... na ghaanasamphassaja.m vedana.m upaadiyissaami... na jivhaasamphassaja.m vedana.m upaadiyissaami... na kaayasamphassaja.m vedana.m upaadiyissaami... na manosamphassaja.m vedana.m upaadiyissaami, na ca me manosamphassajaavedanaanissita.m vi~n~naa.na.m bhavissatii'ti. eva~nhi te, gahapati, sikkhitabba.m.

[03] 386^b^.^eb^ ``tasmaatiha te, gahapati, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `na pathaviidhaatu.m upaadiyissaami, na ca me pathaviidhaatunissita.m vi~n~naa.na.m bhavissatii'ti. eva~nhi te, gahapati, sikkhitabba.m. tasmaatiha te, gahapati, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `na aapodhaatu.m upaadiyissaami... na tejodhaatu.m upaadiyissaami... na vaayodhaatu.m upaadiyissaami... na aakaasadhaatu.m upaadiyissaami... na vi~n~naa.nadhaatu.m upaadiyissaami, na ca me vi~n~naa.nadhaatunissita.m vi~n~naa.na.m bhavissatii'ti. eva~nhi te, gahapati, sikkhitabba.m.

[03] ``tasmaatiha te, gahapati, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `na ruupa.m upaadiyissaami, na ca me ruupanissita.m vi~n~naa.na.m bhavissatii'ti. eva~nhi te, gahapati, sikkhitabba.m. tasmaatiha te, gahapati, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `na vedana.m upaadiyissaami... na sa~n~na.m upaadiyissaami... na sa"nkhaare upaadiyissaami... na vi~n~naa.na.m upaadiyissaami, na ca me vi~n~naa.nanissita.m vi~n~naa.na.m bhavissatii'ti. eva~nhi te, gahapati, sikkhitabba.m.

[03] ``tasmaatiha te, gahapati, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `na aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m ^a^T3.0470^ea^ upaadiyissaami ^a^V3.0313^ea^, na ca me aakaasaana~ncaayatananissita.m vi~n~naa.na.m bhavissatii'ti ^a^M3.0305^ea^. eva~nhi te, gahapati, sikkhitabba.m. tasmaatiha te, gahapati, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `na vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m upaadiyissaami... na aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m ^a^P3.0261^ea^ upaadiyissaami... na nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m upaadiyissaami na ca me nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatananissita.m vi~n~naa.na.m bhavissatii'ti. eva~nhi te, gahapati, sikkhitabba.m.

[03] ``tasmaatiha te, gahapati, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `na idhaloka.m upaadiyissaami, na ca me idhalokanissita.m vi~n~naa.na.m bhavissatii'ti. eva~nhi te, gahapati, sikkhitabba.m. tasmaatiha te, gahapati, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `na paraloka.m upaadiyissaami, na ca me paralokanissita.m vi~n~naa.na.m bhavissatii'ti. eva~nhi te, gahapati, sikkhitabba.m. tasmaatiha te, gahapati, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `yampi me di.t.tha.m suta.m muta.m vi~n~naata.m patta.m pariyesita.m anupariyesita.m anucarita.m manasaa tampi na upaadiyissaami, na ca me ta.mnissita.m vi~n~naa.na.m bhavissatii'ti. eva~nhi te, gahapati, sikkhitabba''nti.

[03] 387^b^.^eb^ eva.m vutte, anaathapi.n.diko gahapati parodi, assuuni pavattesi. atha kho aayasmaa aanando anaathapi.n.dika.m gahapati.m etadavoca -- ``oliiyasi kho tva.m, gahapati, sa.msiidasi kho tva.m, gahapatii''ti? ``naaha.m, bhante aananda, oliiyaami, napi sa.msiidaami; api ca me diigharatta.m satthaa payirupaasito manobhaavaniiyaa ca bhikkhuu; na ca me evaruupii dhammii ^a^T3.0471^ea^ kathaa sutapubbaa''ti. ``na kho, gahapati, gihiina.m odaatavasanaana.m evaruupii dhammii kathaa pa.tibhaati; pabbajitaana.m kho, gahapati, evaruupii dhammii kathaa pa.tibhaatii''ti. ``tena hi, bhante saariputta, gihiinampi odaatavasanaana.m evaruupii dhammii kathaa pa.tibhaatu. santi hi, bhante, kulaputtaa apparajakkhajaatikaa, assavanataa dhammassa parihaayanti; bhavissanti dhammassa a~n~naataaro''ti.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa ca saariputto aayasmaa ca aanando anaathapi.n.dika.m gahapati.m iminaa ovaadena ovaditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkami.msu. atha kho anaathapi.n.diko gahapati, acirapakkante aayasmante ca saariputte aayasmante ca aanande ^a^P3.0262^ea^, kaalamakaasi tusita.m kaaya.m upapajji. atha kho anaathapi.n.diko devaputto abhikkantaaya rattiyaa abhikkantava.n.no kevalakappa.m ^a^V3.0314^ea^ jetavana.m obhaasetvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m ^a^M3.0306^ea^ j.thito kho anaathapi.n.diko devaputto bhagavanta.m gaathaahi ajjhabhaasi --
[21] ``ida~nhi ta.m jetavana.m, isisa"nghanisevita.m.
[22] aavuttha.m dhammaraajena, piitisa~njanana.m mama..
[21] ``kamma.m vijjaa ca dhammo ca, siila.m jiivitamuttama.m.
[22] etena maccaa sujjhanti, na gottena dhanena vaa..
[21] ``tasmaa hi pa.n.dito poso, sampassa.m atthamattano.
[22] yoniso vicine dhamma.m, eva.m tattha visujjhati..
[21] ``saariputtova ^a^T3.0472^ea^ pa~n~naaya, siilena upasamena.
[22] yopi paara"ngato bhikkhu, etaavaparamo siyaa''ti..

[03] idamavoca anaathapi.n.diko devaputto. samanu~n~no satthaa ahosi. atha kho anaathapi.n.diko devaputto -- ``samanu~n~no me satthaa''ti bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa tatthevantaradhaayi.

[03] 388^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa tassaa rattiyaa accayena bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``ima.m, bhikkhave, ratti.m a~n~nataro devaputto abhikkantaaya rattiyaa abhikkantava.n.no kevalakappa.m jetavana.m obhaasetvaa yenaaha.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ma.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thito kho so devaputto ma.m gaathaahi ajjhabhaasi --
[21] ``ida~nhi ta.m jetavana.m, isisa"nghanisevita.m.
[22] aavuttha.m dhammaraajena, piitisa~njanana.m mama..
[21] ``kamma.m vijjaa ca dhammo ca, siila.m jiivitamuttama.m.
[22] etena maccaa sujjhanti, na gottena dhanena vaa..
[21] ``tasmaa ^a^V3.0315^ea^ hi pa.n.dito poso, sampassa.m atthamattano.
[22] yoniso vicine dhamma.m, eva.m tattha visujjhati..
[21] ``saariputtova pa~n~naaya, siilena upasamena.
[22] yopi paara"ngato bhikkhu, etaavaparamo siyaa''ti..
[03] ``idamavoca ^a^P3.0263^ea^, bhikkhave, so devaputto. `samanu~n~no me satthaa'ti ma.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa tatthevantaradhaayii''ti.

[03] eva.m ^a^T3.0473^ea^ ^a^M3.0307^ea^ vutte, aayasmaa aanando bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``so hi nuuna so, bhante, anaathapi.n.diko devaputto bhavissati. anaathapi.n.diko, bhante, gahapati aayasmante saariputte abhippasanno ahosii''ti. ``saadhu, saadhu, aananda! yaavataka.m kho, aananda, takkaaya pattabba.m, anuppatta.m ta.m tayaa. anaathapi.n.diko so, aananda, devaputto''ti.
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamano aayasmaa aanando bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandiiti.
[06] anaathapi.n.dikovaadasutta.m ni.t.thita.m pa.thama.m.

[03] 389^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T3.0474^ea^ ^a^V3.0316^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa ca saariputto aayasmaa ca mahaacundo aayasmaa ca channo gijjhakuu.te pabbate viharanti. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa channo aabaadhiko hoti dukkhito baa.lhagilaano. atha kho aayasmaa saariputto saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito yenaayasmaa mahaacundo tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m mahaacunda.m etadavoca -- ``aayaamaavuso cunda, yenaayasmaa channo tenupasa"nkamissaama gilaanapucchakaa''ti. ``evamaavuso''ti kho aayasmaa mahaacundo aayasmato saariputtassa paccassosi.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa ca saariputto aayasmaa ca mahaacundo yenaayasmaa channo tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmataa channena saddhi.m sammodi.msu. sammodaniiya.m katha.m ^a^P3.0264^ea^ saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa saariputto aayasmanta.m channa.m etadavoca -- ``kacci te, aavuso channa, khamaniiya.m, kacci yaapaniiya.m? kacci te dukkhaa vedanaa pa.tikkamanti, no abhikkamanti; pa.tikkamosaana.m pa~n~naayati, no abhikkamo''ti?

[03] ``na me, aavuso saariputta, khamaniiya.m na yaapaniiya.m. baa.lhaa me dukkhaa vedanaa abhikkamanti, no pa.tikkamanti; abhikkamosaana.m pa~n~naayati, no pa.tikkamo. seyyathaapi ^a^T3.0475^ea^, aavuso saariputta, balavaa puriso ^a^M3.0308^ea^ ti.nhena sikharena muddhani abhimattheyya; evameva kho me, aavuso saariputta, adhimattaa vaataa muddhani uuhananti. na me, aavuso saariputta, khamaniiya.m na yaapaniiya.m. baa.lhaa me dukkhaa vedanaa abhikkamanti, no pa.tikkamanti; abhikkamosaana.m pa~n~naayati no pa.tikkamo. seyyathaapi, aavuso saariputta, balavaa puriso da.lhena varattakkha.n.dena siise siisave.tha.m dadeyya; evameva kho me, aavuso saariputta, adhimattaa siise siisavedanaa. na me, aavuso saariputta, khamaniiya.m na yaapaniiya.m. baa.lhaa me dukkhaa vedanaa abhikkamanti, no pa.tikkamanti; abhikkamosaana.m pa~n~naayati, no pa.tikkamo. seyyathaapi, aavuso ^a^V3.0317^ea^ saariputta, dakkho goghaatako vaa goghaatakantevaasii vaa ti.nhena govikantanena kucchi.m parikanteyya; evameva kho me, aavuso saariputta, adhimattaa vaataa kucchi.m parikantanti. na me, aavuso saariputta, khamaniiya.m na yaapaniiya.m. baa.lhaa me dukkhaa vedanaa abhikkamanti, no pa.tikkamanti; abhikkamosaana.m pa~n~naayati, no pa.tikkamo. seyyathaapi, aavuso saariputta, dve balavanto purisaa dubbalatara.m purisa.m naanaabaahaasu gahetvaa a"ngaarakaasuyaa santaapeyyu.m samparitaapeyyu.m; evameva kho me, aavuso saariputta, adhimatto ^a^T3.0476^ea^ kaayasmi.m .daaho. na me, aavuso saariputta, khamaniiya.m na yaapaniiya.m. baa.lhaa me dukkhaa vedanaa abhikkamanti, no pa.tikkamanti; abhikkamosaana.m pa~n~naayati, no pa.tikkamo. sattha.m, aavuso saariputta, aaharissaami, naavaka"nkhaami jiivita''nti.

[03] 390^b^.^eb^ ``maayasmaa channo sattha.m aaharesi. yaapetaayasmaa channo. yaapenta.m maya.m aayasmanta.m channa.m icchaama. sace aayasmato channassa natthi sappaayaani bhojanaani, aha.m aayasmato channassa sappaayaani bhojanaani pariyesissaami. sace aayasmato channassa natthi sappaayaani bhesajjaani, aha.m aayasmato channassa sappaayaani bhesajjaani pariyesissaami. sace aayasmato channassa natthi patiruupaa upa.t.thaakaa, aha.m aayasmanta.m channa.m upa.t.thahissaami. maayasmaa channo sattha.m aaharesi. yaapetaayasmaa channo. yaapenta.m maya.m aayasmanta.m channa.m icchaamaa''ti.

[03] ``napi me, aavuso saariputta, natthi sappaayaani bhojanaani; napi me natthi sappaayaani bhesajjaani; napi me natthi patiruupaa upa.t.thaakaa; api caavuso saariputta ^a^M3.0309^ea^, parici.n.no me satthaa diigharatta.m manaapeneva no amanaapena. eta~nhi, aavuso saariputta, saavakassa patiruupa.m ya.m satthaara.m paricareyya manaapeneva no amanaapena. `anupavajja.m channo bhikkhu sattha.m aaharissatii'ti evameta.m {evameva kho tva.m (ka0)}, aavuso saariputta, dhaarehii''ti. ``puccheyyaama maya.m aayasmanta.m channa.m ka~ncideva desa.m, sace aayasmaa ^a^T3.0477^ea^ channo okaasa.m karoti pa~nhassa veyyaakara.naayaa''ti. ``pucchaavuso saariputta, sutvaa vedissaamii''ti.

[03] 391^b^.^eb^ ``cakkhu.m, aavuso channa, cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.navi~n~naatabbe dhamme `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso ^a^P3.0265^ea^ me attaa'ti samanupassasi? sota.m, aavuso channa, sotavi~n~naa.na.m...pe0... ghaana.m, aavuso channa, ghaanavi~n~naa.na.m... jivha.m, aavuso channa, jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m ^a^V3.0318^ea^... kaaya.m, aavuso channa, kaayavi~n~naa.na.m... mana.m, aavuso channa, manovi~n~naa.na.m manovi~n~naa.navi~n~naatabbe dhamme `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'ti samanupassasii''ti?

[03] ``cakkhu.m, aavuso saariputta, cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.navi~n~naatabbe dhamme `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti samanupassaami. sota.m, aavuso saariputta...pe0... ghaana.m, aavuso saariputta... jivha.m, aavuso saariputta... kaaya.m, aavuso saariputta... mana.m, aavuso saariputta, manovi~n~naa.na.m manovi~n~naa.navi~n~naatabbe dhamme `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti samanupassaamii''ti.

[03] 392^b^.^eb^ ``cakkhusmi.m, aavuso channa, cakkhuvi~n~naa.ne cakkhuvi~n~naa.navi~n~naatabbesu dhammesu ki.m disvaa ki.m abhi~n~naaya cakkhu.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.navi~n~naatabbe dhamme `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti samanupassasi? sotasmi.m, aavuso channa, sotavi~n~naa.ne ^a^T3.0478^ea^... ghaanasmi.m, aavuso channa, ghaanavi~n~naa.ne... jivhaaya, aavuso channa, jivhaavi~n~naa.ne... kaayasmi.m, aavuso channa, kaayavi~n~naa.ne... manasmi.m, aavuso channa, manovi~n~naa.ne manovi~n~naa.navi~n~naatabbesu dhammesu ki.m disvaa ki.m abhi~n~naaya mana.m manovi~n~naa.na.m manovi~n~naa.navi~n~naatabbe dhamme `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti samanupassasii''ti?

[03] ``cakkhusmi.m ^a^M3.0310^ea^, aavuso saariputta, cakkhuvi~n~naa.ne cakkhuvi~n~naa.navi~n~naatabbesu dhammesu nirodha.m disvaa nirodha.m abhi~n~naaya cakkhu.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.navi~n~naatabbe dhamme `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti samanupassaami. sotasmi.m, aavuso saariputta, sotavi~n~naa.ne... ghaanasmi.m, aavuso saariputta, ghaanavi~n~naa.ne... jivhaaya, aavuso saariputta, jivhaavi~n~naa.ne... kaayasmi.m, aavuso saariputta, kaayavi~n~naa.ne... manasmi.m, aavuso saariputta, manovi~n~naa.ne manovi~n~naa.navi~n~naatabbesu ^a^V3.0319^ea^ dhammesu nirodha.m disvaa nirodha.m abhi~n~naa mana.m manovi~n~naa.na.m manovi~n~naa.navi~n~naatabbe ^a^P3.0266^ea^ dhamme `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti samanupassaamii''ti.

[03] 393^b^.^eb^ eva.m vutte, aayasmaa mahaacundo aayasmanta.m channa.m etadavoca -- ``tasmaatiha, aavuso channa, idampi tassa bhagavato saasana.m {vacana.m (sii0)}, niccakappa.m manasi kaatabba.m -- `nissitassa calita.m, anissitassa calita.m ^a^T3.0479^ea^ natthi. calite asati passaddhi, passaddhiyaa sati nati na hoti. natiyaa asati aagatigati na hoti. aagatigatiyaa asati cutuupapaato na hoti. cutuupapaate asati nevidha na hura.m na ubhayamantarena. esevanto dukkhassaa'''ti. atha kho aayasmaa ca saariputto aayasmaa ca mahaacundo aayasmanta.m channa.m iminaa ovaadena ovaditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkami.msu.

[03] 394^b^.^eb^ atha kho aayasmaa channo acirapakkante aayasmante ca saariputte aayasmante ca mahaacunde sattha.m aaharesi. atha kho aayasmaa saariputto yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa saariputto bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``aayasmataa, bhante, channena sattha.m aaharita.m. tassa kaa gati, ko abhisamparaayo''ti? ``nanu te, saariputta, channena bhikkhunaa sammukhaayeva anupavajjataa byaakataa''ti? ``atthi, bhante, pubbajira.m {pappajita~nhita.m (ka0), upavajjita.m (ka0), pubbavijjana.m, pubbavijjhana.m, pubbavicira.m (sa.myuttake)} naama vajjigaamo. tatthaayasmato channassa mittakulaani suhajjakulaani upavajjakulaanii''ti. ``honti {posanti (ka0)} hete, saariputta, channassa bhikkhuno mittakulaani suhajjakulaani upavajjakulaani. naaha.m, saariputta, ettaavataa ^a^M3.0311^ea^ `saupavajjo'ti vadaami. yo kho, saariputta, ima~nca kaaya.m nikkhipati a~n~na~nca kaaya.m upaadiyati tamaha.m `saupavajjo'ti vadaami. ta.m channassa bhikkhuno natthi. `anupavajjo channo bhikkhu sattha.m aaharesii'ti evameta.m, saariputta, dhaarehii''ti.
[03] idamavoca ^a^T3.0480^ea^ bhagavaa. attamano aayasmaa saariputto bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandiiti.
[06] channovaadasutta.m ni.t.thita.m dutiya.m.

[03] 395^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T3.0481^ea^ ^a^V3.0320^ea^ ^a^P3.0267^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. atha kho aayasmaa pu.n.no saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa pu.n.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``saadhu ma.m, bhante, bhagavaa sa.mkhittena ovaadena ovadatu, yamaha.m bhagavato dhamma.m sutvaa eko vuupaka.t.tho appamatto aataapii pahitatto vihareyya''nti. ``tena hi, pu.n.na, su.naahi, saadhuka.m manasi karohi; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho aayasmaa pu.n.no bhagavato paccassosi. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``santi kho, pu.n.na, cakkhuvi~n~neyyaa ruupaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa. ta.m ce bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosaaya ti.t.thati. tassa ta.m abhinandato abhivadato ajjhosaaya ti.t.thato uppajjati nandii {nandi (syaa0 ka.m0)}. `nandiisamudayaa dukkhasamudayo, pu.n.naa'ti vadaami.

[03] ``santi kho, pu.n.na, sotavi~n~neyyaa saddaa... ghaanavi~n~neyyaa gandhaa... jivhaavi~n~neyyaa rasaa... kaayavi~n~neyyaa pho.t.thabbaa... manovi~n~neyyaa dhammaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa. ta.m ce bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosaaya ti.t.thati. tassa ta.m abhinandato abhivadato ^a^T3.0482^ea^ ajjhosaaya ti.t.thato uppajjati nandii. `nandiisamudayaa dukkhasamudayo, pu.n.naa'ti vadaami.

[03] ``santi ^a^M3.0312^ea^ ca kho, pu.n.na, cakkhuvi~n~neyyaa ruupaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa. ta.m ce bhikkhu naabhinandati naabhivadati naajjhosaaya ti.t.thati. tassa ta.m anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosaaya ti.t.thato nandii nirujjhati. `nandiinirodhaa dukkhanirodho, pu.n.naa'ti vadaami.

[03] ``santi ^a^V3.0321^ea^ ca kho, pu.n.na, sotavi~n~neyyaa saddaa... ghaanavi~n~neyyaa gandhaa... jivhaavi~n~neyyaa rasaa... kaayavi~n~neyyaa pho.t.thabbaa... manovi~n~neyyaa dhammaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa ^a^P3.0268^ea^ rajaniiyaa. ta.m ce bhikkhu naabhinandati naabhivadati naajjhosaaya ti.t.thati. tassa ta.m anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosaaya ti.t.thato nandii nirujjhati. `nandiinirodhaa dukkhanirodho, pu.n.naa'ti vadaami.

[03] ``iminaa ca tva.m pu.n.na, mayaa sa.mkhittena ovaadena ovadito katarasmi.m janapade viharissasii''ti? ``iminaaha.m, bhante, bhagavataa sa.mkhittena ovaadena ovadito, atthi sunaaparanto naama janapado, tatthaaha.m viharissaamii''ti.

[03] 396^b^.^eb^ ``ca.n.daa kho, pu.n.na, sunaaparantakaa manussaa; pharusaa kho, pu.n.na, sunaaparantakaa manussaa. sace ta.m, pu.n.na, sunaaparantakaa manussaa akkosissanti paribhaasissanti, tattha te, pu.n.na, kinti bhavissatii''ti? ``sace ma.m, bhante, sunaaparantakaa manussaa akkosissanti paribhaasissanti, tattha me eva.m bhavissati -- `bhaddakaa {bhadrakaa (ka0)} vatime sunaaparantakaa ^a^T3.0483^ea^ manussaa, subhaddakaa vatime sunaaparantakaa manussaa, ya.m me nayime paa.ninaa pahaara.m dentii'ti. evamettha {evammettha (?)}, bhagavaa, bhavissati; evamettha, sugata, bhavissatii''ti.

[03] ``sace pana te, pu.n.na, sunaaparantakaa manussaa paa.ninaa pahaara.m dassanti, tattha pana te, pu.n.na, kinti bhavissatii''ti? ``sace me, bhante, sunaaparantakaa manussaa paa.ninaa pahaara.m dassanti, tattha me eva.m bhavissati -- `bhaddakaa vatime sunaaparantakaa manussaa, subhaddakaa vatime sunaaparantakaa manussaa, ya.m me nayime le.d.dunaa pahaara.m dentii'ti. evamettha, bhagavaa, bhavissati; evamettha, sugata, bhavissatii''ti.

[03] ``sace pana te, pu.n.na, sunaaparantakaa manussaa le.d.dunaa pahaara.m dassanti, tattha pana te, pu.n.na, kinti bhavissatii''ti? ``sace me, bhante, sunaaparantakaa manussaa ^a^M3.0313^ea^ le.d.dunaa pahaara.m dassanti, tattha me eva.m bhavissati -- `bhaddakaa vatime sunaaparantakaa manussaa, subhaddakaa vatime sunaaparantakaa manussaa, ya.m me nayime da.n.dena pahaara.m dentii'ti. evamettha, bhagavaa, bhavissati; evamettha, sugata, bhavissatii''ti.

[03] ``sace ^a^V3.0322^ea^ ^a^P3.0269^ea^ pana te, pu.n.na, sunaaparantakaa manussaa da.n.dena pahaara.m dassanti, tattha pana te, pu.n.na, kinti bhavissatii''ti? ``sace me, bhante, sunaaparantakaa manussaa da.n.dena pahaara.m dassanti, tattha me eva.m bhavissati -- `bhaddakaa vatime sunaaparantakaa manussaa, subhaddakaa vatime ^a^T3.0484^ea^ sunaaparantakaa manussaa, ya.m me nayime satthena pahaara.m dentii'ti. evamettha, bhagavaa, bhavissati; evamettha, sugata, bhavissatii''ti.

[03] ``sace pana te, pu.n.na, sunaaparantakaa manussaa satthena pahaara.m dassanti, tattha pana te, pu.n.na, kinti bhavissatii''ti? ``sace me, bhante, sunaaparantakaa manussaa satthena pahaara.m dassanti, tattha me eva.m bhavissati -- `bhaddakaa vatime sunaaparantakaa manussaa, subhaddakaa vatime sunaaparantakaa manussaa, ya.m ma.m {ya.m me (sii0 pii0 ka0)} nayime ti.nhena satthena jiivitaa voropentii'ti. evamettha, bhagavaa, bhavissati; evamettha, sugata, bhavissatii''ti.

[03] ``sace pana ta.m, pu.n.na, sunaaparantakaa manussaa ti.nhena satthena jiivitaa voropessanti, tattha pana te, pu.n.na, kinti bhavissatii''ti? ``sace ma.m, bhante, sunaaparantakaa manussaa ti.nhena satthena jiivitaa voropessanti, tattha me eva.m bhavissati -- `santi kho bhagavato saavakaa kaaye ca jiivite ca a.t.tiiyamaanaa haraayamaanaa jigucchamaanaa satthahaaraka.m pariyesanti. ta.m me ida.m apariyi.t.tha.myeva satthahaaraka.m laddha'nti. evamettha, bhagavaa, bhavissati; evamettha, sugata, bhavissatii''ti. ``saadhu, saadhu, pu.n.na! sakkhissasi kho tva.m, pu.n.na, iminaa damuupasamena samannaagato sunaaparantasmi.m janapade viharitu.m. yassadaani tva.m, pu.n.na, kaala.m ma~n~nasii''ti.

[03] 397^b^.^eb^ atha kho aayasmaa pu.n.no bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ^a^T3.0485^ea^ padakkhi.na.m katvaa senaasana.m sa.msaametvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena sunaaparanto janapado tena ^a^M3.0314^ea^ caarika.m pakkaami. anupubbena caarika.m caramaano yena sunaaparanto janapado tadavasari. tatra suda.m aayasmaa pu.n.no sunaaparantasmi.m janapade viharati. atha kho aayasmaa pu.n.no tenevantaravassena pa~ncamattaani upaasakasataani pa.tivedesi {pa.tipaadesi (sii0 pii0), pa.tidesesi (syaa0 ka.m0)}, tenevantaravassena pa~ncamattaani upaasikasataani pa.tivedesi, tenevantaravassena tisso vijjaa sacchaakaasi. atha kho aayasmaa pu.n.no aparena samayena parinibbaayi.

[03] atha ^a^V3.0323^ea^ kho sambahulaa bhikkhuu yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho te bhikkhuu bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``yo so, bhante, pu.n.no naama ^a^P3.0270^ea^ kulaputto bhagavataa sa.mkhittena ovaadena ovadito so kaala"nkato. tassa kaa gati, ko abhisamparaayo''ti? ``pa.n.dito, bhikkhave, pu.n.no kulaputto paccapaadi {saccavaadii dhammavaadii (ka0)} dhammassaanudhamma.m, na ca ma.m dhammaadhikara.na.m vihe.thesi. parinibbuto, bhikkhave, pu.n.no kulaputto''ti.
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamanaa te bhikkhuu bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandunti.
[06] pu.n.novaadasutta.m ni.t.thita.m tatiya.m.

[03] 398^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T3.0486^ea^ ^a^V3.0324^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. atha kho mahaapajaapatigotamii pa~ncamattehi bhikkhunisatehi saddhi.m yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thitaa kho mahaapajaapatigotamii bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ovadatu, bhante, bhagavaa bhikkhuniyo; anusaasatu, bhante, bhagavaa bhikkhuniyo; karotu, bhante, bhagavaa bhikkhuniina.m dhammi.m katha''nti {dhammikathanti (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)}.

[03] tena kho pana samayena theraa bhikkhuu bhikkhuniyo ovadanti pariyaayena. aayasmaa nandako na icchati bhikkhuniyo ovaditu.m pariyaayena. atha ^a^M3.0315^ea^ kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantesi -- ``kassa nu kho, aananda, ajja pariyaayo bhikkhuniyo ovaditu.m pariyaayenaa''ti? ``sabbeheva, bhante, kato {nandakassa bhante (sii0 pii0)} pariyaayo bhikkhuniyo ovaditu.m pariyaayena. aya.m, bhante, aayasmaa nandako na icchati bhikkhuniyo ovaditu.m pariyaayenaa''ti.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m nandaka.m aamantesi -- ``ovada, nandaka, bhikkhuniyo; anusaasa, nandaka, bhikkhuniyo; karohi tva.m, braahma.na, bhikkhuniina.m dhammi.m katha''nti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho aayasmaa ^a^P3.0271^ea^ nandako bhagavato pa.tissutvaa ^a^T3.0487^ea^ pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya saavatthi.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. saavatthiya.m pi.n.daaya caritvaa pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto attadutiyo yena raajakaaraamo tenupasa"nkami. addasa.msu kho taa bhikkhuniyo aayasmanta.m nandaka.m duuratova aagacchanta.m. disvaana aasana.m pa~n~naapesu.m, udaka~nca paadaana.m upa.t.thapesu.m. nisiidi kho aayasmaa nandako pa~n~natte aasane. nisajja paade pakkhaalesi. taapi kho bhikkhuniyo aayasmanta.m nandaka.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho taa bhikkhuniyo aayasmaa nandako etadavoca -- ``pa.tipucchakathaa kho, bhaginiyo, bhavissati. tattha aajaanantiihi -- `aajaanaamaa' tissa vacaniiya.m, na aajaanantiihi -- `na aajaanaamaa' tissa vacaniiya.m. yassaa vaa panassa ka"nkhaa vaa vimati vaa ^a^V3.0325^ea^ ahameva tattha pa.tipucchitabbo -- `ida.m, bhante, katha.m; imassa kvattho'''ti? ``ettakenapi maya.m, bhante, ayyassa nandakassa attamanaa abhiraddhaa {abhinandaama (syaa0 ka.m0)} ya.m no ayyo nandako pavaaretii''ti.

[03] 399^b^.^eb^ ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhaginiyo, cakkhu nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti? ``anicca.m, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vaa ta.m sukha.m vaa''ti? ``dukkha.m, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, kalla.m nu ta.m samanupassitu.m -- `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'''ti? ``no heta.m ^a^T3.0488^ea^, bhante''. ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhaginiyo, sota.m nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti? ``anicca.m, bhante...pe0... ghaana.m nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti? ``anicca.m, bhante''... ``jivhaa niccaa vaa aniccaa vaa''ti? ``aniccaa, bhante''... ``kaayo nicco vaa anicco vaa''ti? ``anicco, bhante''... ``mano nicco vaa anicco vaa''ti? ``anicco, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vaa ta.m sukha.m vaa''ti? ``dukkha.m, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma.m ^a^P3.0272^ea^, kalla.m ^a^M3.0316^ea^ nu ta.m samanupassitu.m -- `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``ta.m kissa hetu''? ``pubbeva no eta.m, bhante, yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya sudi.t.tha.m -- `itipime cha ajjhattikaa aayatanaa aniccaa'''ti. ``saadhu, saadhu, bhaginiyo! eva~nheta.m, bhaginiyo, hoti ariyasaavakassa yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya passato''.

[03] 400^b^.^eb^ ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhaginiyo, ruupaa niccaa vaa aniccaa vaa''ti? ``aniccaa, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vaa ta.m sukha.m vaa''ti? ``dukkha.m, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, kalla.m nu ta.m samanupassitu.m -- `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhaginiyo, saddaa niccaa vaa aniccaa vaa''ti? ``aniccaa, bhante...pe0... gandhaa niccaa vaa aniccaa vaa''ti? ``aniccaa, bhante''... ``rasaa niccaa vaa aniccaa vaa''ti? ``aniccaa, bhante''... ``pho.t.thabbaa niccaa vaa aniccaa vaa''ti? ``aniccaa ^a^T3.0489^ea^, bhante''... ``dhammaa niccaa vaa aniccaa vaa''ti? ``aniccaa, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vaa ta.m sukha.m vaa''ti? ``dukkha.m, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, kalla.m nu ta.m samanupassitu.m -- `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``ta.m kissa hetu''? ``pubbeva no eta.m, bhante, yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya sudi.t.tha.m -- `itipime cha baahiraa aayatanaa aniccaa'''ti ^a^V3.0326^ea^. ``saadhu, saadhu, bhaginiyo! eva~nheta.m, bhaginiyo, hoti ariyasaavakassa yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya passato''.

[03] 401^b^.^eb^ ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhaginiyo, cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti? ``anicca.m, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vaa ta.m sukha.m vaa''ti? ``dukkha.m, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, kalla.m nu ta.m samanupassitu.m -- `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``ta.m ^a^P3.0273^ea^ ki.m ma~n~natha, bhaginiyo, sotavi~n~naa.na.m nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti? ``anicca.m, bhante...pe0... ghaanavi~n~naa.na.m nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti? ``anicca.m, bhante''... ``jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti? ``anicca.m, bhante''... ``kaayavi~n~naa.na.m nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti? ``anicca.m, bhante''... ``manovi~n~naa.na.m nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti? ``anicca.m, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vaa ta.m sukha.m vaati''? ``dukkha.m, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, kalla.m nu ta.m samanupassitu.m -- `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso ^a^T3.0490^ea^ me attaa'''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``ta.m kissa hetu''? ``pubbeva no eta.m, bhante, yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya sudi.t.tha.m -- `itipime cha vi~n~naa.nakaayaa aniccaa'''ti. ``saadhu, saadhu, bhaginiyo! eva~nheta.m, bhaginiyo, hoti ariyasaavakassa yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya passato''.

[03] 402^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi ^a^M3.0317^ea^, bhaginiyo, telappadiipassa jhaayato telampi anicca.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, va.t.tipi aniccaa vipari.naamadhammaa, accipi aniccaa vipari.naamadhammaa, aabhaapi aniccaa vipari.naamadhammaa. yo nu kho, bhaginiyo, eva.m vadeyya -- `amussa telappadiipassa jhaayato telampi anicca.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, va.t.tipi aniccaa vipari.naamadhammaa, accipi aniccaa vipari.naamadhammaa; yaa ca khvaassa aabhaa saa niccaa dhuvaa sassataa avipari.naamadhammaa'ti; sammaa nu kho so, bhaginiyo, vadamaano vadeyyaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``ta.m kissa hetu''? ``amussa hi, bhante, telappadiipassa jhaayato telampi anicca.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, va.t.tipi aniccaa vipari.naamadhammaa, accipi aniccaa vipari.naamadhammaa; pagevassa aabhaa aniccaa vipari.naamadhammaa''ti. ``evameva kho, bhaginiyo, yo nu kho eva.m vadeyya -- `cha khome ajjhattikaa aayatanaa aniccaa {aniccaa vipari.naamadhammaa (?)}; ya~nca kho cha ajjhattike aayatane pa.ticca pa.tisa.mvedeti sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa ta.m nicca.m dhuva.m sassata.m avipari.naamadhamma'nti; sammaa ^a^V3.0327^ea^ nu kho so, bhaginiyo, vadamaano vadeyyaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``ta.m kissa hetu''? ``tajja.m ^a^T3.0491^ea^ tajja.m, bhante, paccaya.m pa.ticca tajjaa tajjaa vedanaa uppajjanti. tajjass ^a^P3.0274^ea^ tajjassa paccayassa nirodhaa tajjaa tajjaa vedanaa nirujjhantii''ti. ``saadhu, saadhu, bhaginiyo! eva~nheta.m, bhaginiyo, hoti ariyasaavakassa yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya passato''.

[03] 403^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, bhaginiyo, mahato rukkhassa ti.t.thato saaravato muulampi anicca.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, khandhopi anicco vipari.naamadhammo, saakhaapalaasampi anicca.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, chaayaapi aniccaa vipari.naamadhammaa. yo nu kho, bhaginiyo, eva.m vadeyya -- `amussa mahato rukkhassa ti.t.thato saaravato muulampi anicca.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, khandhopi anicco vipari.naamadhammo, saakhaapalaasampi anicca.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, yaa ca khvaassa chaayaa saa niccaa dhuvaa sassataa avipari.naamadhammaa'ti; sammaa nu kho so, bhaginiyo, vadamaano vadeyyaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``ta.m kissa hetu''? ``amussa hi, bhante, mahato rukkhassa ti.t.thato saaravato muulampi anicca.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, khandhopi anicco vipari.naamadhammo, saakhaapalaasampi anicca.m vipari.naamadhamma.m; pagevassa chaayaa aniccaa vipari.naamadhammaa''ti. ``evameva kho, bhaginiyo, yo nu kho eva.m vadeyya -- `cha khome baahiraa aayatanaa ^a^M3.0318^ea^ aniccaa {aniccaa vipari.naamadhammaa (sii0 pii0)}. ya~nca kho cha baahire aayatane pa.ticca pa.tisa.mvedeti sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa ta.m nicca.m dhuva.m sassata.m avipari.naamadhamma'nti; sammaa nu kho so, bhaginiyo, vadamaano ^a^T3.0492^ea^ vadeyyaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``ta.m kissa hetu''? ``tajja.m tajja.m, bhante, paccaya.m pa.ticca tajjaa tajjaa vedanaa uppajjanti. tajjassa tajjassa paccayassa nirodhaa tajjaa tajjaa vedanaa nirujjhantii''ti. ``saadhu, saadhu, bhaginiyo! eva~nheta.m, bhaginiyo, hoti ariyasaavakassa yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya passato''.

[03] 404^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, bhaginiyo, dakkho goghaatako vaa goghaatakantevaasii vaa gaavi.m vadhitvaa ti.nhena govikantanena gaavi.m sa"nkanteyya anupahacca antara.m ma.msakaaya.m anupahacca baahira.m cammakaaya.m. ya.m yadeva tattha antaraa vilima.msa.m {vilima.m (sii0 pii0 ka0)} antaraa nhaaru antaraa bandhana.m ta.m tadeva ti.nhena govikantanena ^a^P3.0275^ea^ sa~nchindeyya sa"nkanteyya sampakanteyya samparikanteyya. sa~nchinditvaa sa"nkantitvaa sampakantitvaa samparikantitvaa vidhunitvaa baahira.m cammakaaya.m teneva cammena ta.m gaavi.m pa.ticchaadetvaa eva.m vadeyya -- `tathevaaya.m gaavii sa.myuttaa iminaava cammenaa'ti; sammaa nu kho ^a^V3.0328^ea^ so, bhaginiyo, vadamaano vadeyyaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``ta.m kissa hetu''? ``amu hi, bhante, dakkho goghaatako vaa goghaatakantevaasii vaa gaavi.m vadhitvaa ti.nhena govikantanena gaavi.m sa"nkanteyya anupahacca antara.m ma.msakaaya.m anupahacca baahira.m cammakaaya.m. ya.m yadeva tattha antaraa vilima.msa.m antaraa nhaaru antaraa bandhana.m ta.m tadeva ti.nhena govikantanena sa~nchindeyya sa"nkanteyya sampakanteyya samparikanteyya. sa~nchinditvaa sa"nkantitvaa sampakantitvaa samparikantitvaa vidhunitvaa baahira.m cammakaaya.m teneva ^a^T3.0493^ea^ cammena ta.m gaavi.m pa.ticchaadetvaa ki~ncaapi so eva.m vadeyya -- `tathevaaya.m gaavii sa.myuttaa iminaava cammenaa'ti; atha kho saa gaavii visa.myuttaa teneva cammenaa''ti.

[03] ``upamaa kho me aya.m, bhaginiyo, kataa atthassa vi~n~naapanaaya. ayamevettha attho; `antaraa ma.msakaayo'ti kho, bhaginiyo, channeta.m ajjhattikaana.m aayatanaana.m adhivacana.m; `baahiro cammakaayo'ti kho bhaginiyo, channeta.m baahiraana.m aayatanaana.m adhivacana.m; `antaraa vilima.msa.m, antaraa nhaaru, antaraa bandhana'nti kho, bhaginiyo, nandiiraagasseta.m adhivacana.m; `ti.nha.m ^a^M3.0319^ea^ govikantana'nti kho, bhaginiyo, ariyaayeta.m pa~n~naaya adhivacana.m; yaaya.m ariyaa pa~n~naa antaraa kilesa.m antaraa sa.myojana.m antaraa bandhana.m sa~nchindati sa"nkantati sampakantati samparikantati.

[03] 405^b^.^eb^ ``satta kho panime, bhaginiyo, bojjha"ngaa, yesa.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa bhikkhu aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharati. katame satta? idha, bhaginiyo, bhikkhu satisambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m, dhammavicayasambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti...pe0... viiriyasambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti... piitisambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti... passaddhisambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti... samaadhisambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti... upekkhaasambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m ^a^T3.0494^ea^ nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m. ime kho, bhaginiyo, satta bojjha"ngaa, yesa.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa bhikkhu aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharatii''ti.

[03] 406^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^V3.0329^ea^ ^a^P3.0276^ea^ kho aayasmaa nandako taa bhikkhuniyo iminaa ovaadena ovaditvaa uyyojesi -- ``gacchatha, bhaginiyo; kaalo''ti. atha kho taa bhikkhuniyo aayasmato nandakassa bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa aayasmanta.m nandaka.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.tha.msu. ekamanta.m .thitaa kho taa bhikkhuniyo bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``gacchatha, bhikkhuniyo; kaalo''ti. atha kho taa bhikkhuniyo bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkami.msu. atha kho bhagavaa acirapakkantiisu taasu bhikkhuniisu bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, tadahuposathe caatuddase na hoti bahunojanassa ka"nkhaa vaa vimati vaa -- `uuno nu kho cando, pu.n.no nu kho cando'ti, atha kho uuno candotveva hoti. evameva kho, bhikkhave, taa bhikkhuniyo nandakassa dhammadesanaaya attamanaa honti no ca kho paripu.n.nasa"nkappaa''ti.

[03] 407^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m nandaka.m aamantesi -- ``tena hi tva.m, nandaka, svepi taa bhikkhuniyo tenevovaadena ovadeyyaasii''ti. ``eva.m ^a^M3.0320^ea^, bhante''ti kho aayasmaa nandako ^a^T3.0495^ea^ bhagavato paccassosi. atha kho aayasmaa nandako tassaa rattiyaa accayena pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya saavatthi.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. saavatthiya.m pi.n.daaya caritvaa pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto attadutiyo yena raajakaaraamo tenupasa"nkami. addasa.msu kho taa bhikkhuniyo aayasmanta.m nandaka.m duuratova aagacchanta.m. disvaana aasana.m pa~n~naapesu.m, udaka~nca paadaana.m upa.t.thapesu.m. nisiidi kho aayasmaa nandako pa~n~natte aasane. nisajja paade pakkhaalesi. taapi kho bhikkhuniyo aayasmanta.m nandaka.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho taa bhikkhuniyo aayasmaa nandako etadavoca -- ``pa.tipucchakathaa kho, bhaginiyo, bhavissati. tattha aajaanantiihi `aajaanaamaa' tissa vacaniiya.m, na aajaanantiihi `na aajaanaamaa' tissa vacaniiya.m. yassaa vaa panassa ka"nkhaa vaa vimati vaa, ahameva tattha pa.tipucchitabbo ^a^P3.0277^ea^ -- `ida.m, bhante, katha.m; imassa kvattho'''ti. ``ettakenapi maya.m, bhante, ayyassa nandakassa attamanaa abhiraddhaa ya.m no ayyo nandako pavaaretii''ti.

[03] 408^b^.^eb^ ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhaginiyo, cakkhu nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti? ``anicca.m, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vaa ta.m sukha.m vaa''ti? ``dukkha.m, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, kalla.m nu ta.m samanupassitu.m -- `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me ^a^V3.0330^ea^ attaa'''ti? ``no heta.m ^a^T3.0496^ea^, bhante''. ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhaginiyo, sota.m nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti? ``anicca.m, bhante...pe0... ghaana.m nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti? ``anicca.m, bhante... jivhaa... kaayo... mano nicco vaa anicco vaa''ti? ``anicco, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vaa ta.m sukha.m vaa''ti? ``dukkha.m, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, kalla.m nu ta.m samanupassitu.m -- `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``ta.m kissa hetu''? ``pubbeva no eta.m, bhante, yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya sudi.t.tha.m -- `itipime cha ajjhattikaa aayatanaa aniccaa'''ti. ``saadhu saadhu, bhaginiyo! eva~nheta.m, bhaginiyo, hoti ariyasaavakass yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya passato''.

[03] 409^b^.^eb^ ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhaginiyo, ruupaa niccaa vaa aniccaa vaa''ti? ``aniccaa, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vaa ta.m sukha.m vaa''ti? ``dukkha.m, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, kalla.m nu ta.m samanupassitu.m -- `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso ^a^M3.0321^ea^ me attaa'''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhaginiyo, saddaa niccaa vaa aniccaa vaa''ti? ``aniccaa, bhante...pe0... gandhaa niccaa vaa aniccaa vaa''ti? ``aniccaa, bhante... rasaa niccaa vaa aniccaa vaa''ti? ``aniccaa, bhante... pho.t.thabbaa niccaa vaa aniccaa vaa''ti ^a^T3.0497^ea^? ``aniccaa, bhante... dhammaa niccaa vaa aniccaa vaa''ti? ``aniccaa, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vaa ta.m sukha.m vaa''ti? ``dukkha.m, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, kalla.m nu ta.m samanupassitu.m -- `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``ta.m kissa hetu''? ``pubbeva no eta.m, bhante, yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya sudi.t.tha.m -- `itipime cha baahiraa aayatanaa aniccaa'''ti. ``saadhu saadhu, bhaginiyo! eva~nheta.m, bhaginiyo, hoti ariyasaavakassa yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya passato''.

[03] 410^b^.^eb^ ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhaginiyo, cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti? ``anicca.m, bhante...pe0... sotavi~n~naa.na.m nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti? ``anicca.m, bhante... ghaanavi~n~naa.na.m nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti? ``anicca.m, bhante... jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti? ``anicca.m, bhante... kaayavi~n~naa.na.m nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti? ``anicca.m, bhante... manovi~n~naa.na.m nicca.m ^a^T3.0498^ea^ vaa anicca.m vaa''ti? ``anicca.m, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vaa ta.m sukha.m vaa''ti? ``dukkha.m, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, kalla.m nu ta.m samanupassitu.m -- `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``ta.m kissa hetu''? ``pubbeva no eta.m, bhante, yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya ^a^V3.0331^ea^ sudi.t.tha.m -- `itipime cha vi~n~naa.nakaayaa aniccaa'''ti. ``saadhu saadhu, bhaginiyo! eva~nheta.m, bhaginiyo, hoti ariyasaavakassa yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya passato''.

[03] 411^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, bhaginiyo, telappadiipassa jhaayato telampi anicca.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, va.t.tipi aniccaa vipari.naamadhammaa, accipi aniccaa vipari.naamadhammaa, aabhaapi aniccaa vipari.naamadhammaa. yo nu kho, bhaginiyo, eva.m vadeyya -- `amussa telappadiipassa jhaayato telampi anicca.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, va.t.tipi aniccaa vipari.naamadhammaa, accipi aniccaa vipari.naamadhammaa; yaa ca khvaassa aabhaa saa niccaa dhuvaa sassataa avipari.naamadhammaa'ti; sammaa nu kho so, bhaginiyo, vadamaano vadeyyaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``ta.m kissa hetu''? ``amussa hi, bhante, telappadiipassa jhaayato telampi anicca.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, va.t.tipi aniccaa vipari.naamadhammaa, accipi aniccaa vipari.naamadhammaa ^a^M3.0322^ea^; pagevassa aabhaa aniccaa vipari.naamadhammaa''ti. ``evameva kho, bhaginiyo, yo nu kho eva.m vadeyya -- `cha khome ajjhattikaa aayatanaa aniccaa. ya~nca kho cha ajjhattike aayatane ^a^T3.0499^ea^ pa.ticca pa.tisa.mvedeti sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa ta.m nicca.m dhuva.m sassata.m avipari.naamadhamma'nti; sammaa nu kho so, bhaginiyo, vadamaano vadeyyaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``ta.m kissa hetu''? ``tajja.m tajja.m, bhante, paccaya.m pa.ticca tajjaa tajjaa vedanaa uppajjanti. tajjassa tajjassa paccayassa nirodhaa tajjaa tajjaa vedanaa nirujjhantii''ti. ``saadhu saadhu, bhaginiyo! eva~nheta.m, bhaginiyo, hoti ariyasaavakassa yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya passato''.

[03] 412^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, bhaginiyo, mahato rukkhassa ti.t.thato saaravato muulampi anicca.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, khandhopi anicco vipari.naamadhammo, saakhaapalaasampi anicca.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, chaayaapi aniccaa vipari.naamadhammaa. yo nu kho, bhaginiyo, eva.m vadeyya -- `amussa mahato rukkhassa ti.t.thato saaravato muulampi anicca.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, khandhopi anicco vipari.naamadhammo, saakhaapalaasampi anicca.m vipari.naamadhamma.m; yaa ca khvaassa chaayaa saa niccaa dhuvaa sassataa avipari.naamadhammaa'ti; sammaa nu kho so bhaginiyo, vadamaano vadeyyaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``ta.m kissa hetu''? ``amussa hi, bhante, mahato rukkhassa ti.t.thato saaravato muulampi anicca.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, khandhopi anicco vipari.naamadhammo, saakhaapalaasampi anicca.m vipari.naamadhamma.m; pagevassa chaayaa aniccaa vipari.naamadhammaa''ti. ``evameva kho, bhaginiyo, yo nu kho eva.m vadeyya -- `cha khome ^a^T3.0500^ea^ baahiraa aayatanaa aniccaa. ya~nca kho baahire aayatane pa.ticca pa.tisa.mvedeti sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa ta.m nicca.m dhuva.m ^a^V3.0332^ea^ sassata.m avipari.naamadhamma'nti; sammaa nu kho so, bhaginiyo, vadamaano vadeyyaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``ta.m kissa hetu''? ``tajja.m tajja.m, bhante, paccaya.m pa.ticca tajjaa tajjaa vedanaa uppajjanti. tajjassa tajjassa paccayassa nirodhaa tajjaa tajjaa vedanaa nirujjhantii''ti. ``saadhu saadhu, bhaginiyo! eva~nheta.m, bhaginiyo, hoti ariyasaavakassa yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya passato''.

[03] 413^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, bhaginiyo, dakkho goghaatako vaa goghaatakantevaasii vaa gaavi.m vadhitvaa ti.nhena govikantanena gaavi.m sa"nkanteyya anupahacca ^a^M3.0323^ea^ antara.m ma.msakaaya.m anupahacca baahira.m cammakaaya.m. ya.m yadeva tattha antaraa vilima.msa.m antaraa nhaaru antaraa bandhana.m ta.m tadeva ti.nhena govikantanena sa~nchindeyya sa"nkanteyya sampakanteyya samparikanteyya. sa~nchinditvaa sa"nkantitvaa sampakantitvaa samparikantitvaa vidhunitvaa baahira.m cammakaaya.m teneva cammena ta.m gaavi.m pa.ticchaadetvaa eva.m vadeyya -- `tathevaaya.m gaavii sa.myuttaa iminaava cammenaa'ti; sammaa nu kho so, bhaginiyo, vadamaano vadeyyaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``ta.m kissa hetu''? ``amu hi, bhante, dakkho goghaatako vaa goghaatakantevaasii vaa gaavi.m vadhitvaa ti.nhena govikantanena gaavi.m sa"nkanteyya anupahacca antara.m ma.msakaaya.m anupahacca baahira.m cammakaaya.m. ya.m yadeva tattha antaraa vilima.msa.m antaraa ^a^T3.0501^ea^ nhaaru antaraa bandhana.m ta.m tadeva ti.nhena govikantanena sa~nchindeyya sa"nkanteyya sampakanteyya samparikanteyya. sa~nchinditvaa sa"nkantitvaa sampakantitvaa samparikantitvaa vidhunitvaa baahira.m cammakaaya.m teneva cammena ta.m gaavi.m pa.ticchaadetvaa ki~ncaapi so eva.m vadeyya -- `tathevaaya.m gaavii sa.myuttaa iminaava cammenaa'ti; atha kho saa gaavii visa.myuttaa teneva cammenaa''ti.

[01] ``upamaa kho me aya.m, bhaginiyo, kataa atthassa vi~n~naapanaaya ayamevettha attho. `antaraa ma.msakaayo'ti kho, bhaginiyo, channeta.m ajjhattikaana.m aayatanaana.m adhivacana.m; `baahiro cammakaayo'ti kho, bhaginiyo, channeta.m baahiraana.m aayatanaana.m adhivacana.m; `antaraa vilima.msa.m antaraa nhaaru antaraa bandhana'nti kho, bhaginiyo, nandiiraagasseta.m adhivacana.m; `ti.nha.m govikantana'nti kho, bhaginiyo, ariyaayeta.m pa~n~naaya adhivacana.m; yaaya.m ariyaa pa~n~naa antaraa kilesa.m antaraa sa.myojana.m antaraa bandhana.m sa~nchindati sa"nkantati sampakantati samparikantati.

[03] 414^b^.^eb^ ``satta kho panime, bhaginiyo, bojjha"ngaa, yesa.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa bhikkhu aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja ^a^V3.0333^ea^ viharati. katame satta? idha, bhaginiyo, bhikkhu satisambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m. dhammavicayasambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti...pe0... viiriyasambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti... piitisambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti... passaddhisambojjha"nga.m ^a^T3.0502^ea^ bhaaveti... samaadhisambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti... upekkhaasambojjha"nga.m ^a^M3.0324^ea^ bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m. ime kho, bhaginiyo, satta bojjha"ngaa yesa.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa bhikkhu aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharatii''ti.

[03] 415^b^.^eb^ atha kho aayasmaa nandako taa bhikkhuniyo iminaa ovaadena ovaditvaa uyyojesi -- ``gacchatha, bhaginiyo; kaalo''ti. atha kho taa bhikkhuniyo aayasmato nandakassa bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa aayasmanta.m nandaka.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.tha.msu. ekamanta.m .thitaa kho taa bhikkhuniyo bhagavaa etadavoca --``gacchatha, bhikkhuniyo; kaalo''ti. atha kho taa bhikkhuniyo bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkami.msu. atha kho bhagavaa acirapakkantiisu taasu bhikkhuniisu bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, tadahuposathe pannarase na hoti bahuno janassa ka"nkhaa vaa vimati vaa -- `uuno nu kho cando, pu.n.no nu kho cando'ti, atha kho pu.n.no candotveva hoti; evameva kho, bhikkhave, taa bhikkhuniyo nandakassa dhammadesanaaya attamanaa ceva paripu.n.nasa"nkappaa ca. taasa.m, bhikkhave, pa~ncanna.m bhikkhunisataana.m yaa ^a^T3.0503^ea^ pacchimitaa bhikkhunii saa {yaa pacchimaa bhikkhunii, saa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0), yaa pacchimikaa, taa bhikkhuniyo (ka0)} sotaapannaa avinipaatadhammaa niyataa sambodhiparaayanaa''ti.
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamanaa te bhikkhuu bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandunti.
[06] nandakovaadasutta.m ni.t.thita.m catuttha.m.

[03] 416^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T3.0504^ea^ ^a^V3.0334^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. atha kho bhagavato rahogatassa pa.tisalliinassa eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi -- ``paripakkaa kho ^a^M3.0325^ea^ raahulassa vimuttiparipaacaniiyaa dhammaa. ya.mnuunaaha.m raahula.m uttari.m aasavaana.m khaye vineyya''nti. atha kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya saavatthi.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. saavatthiya.m pi.n.daaya caritvaa pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto aayasmanta.m raahula.m aamantesi -- ``ga.nhaahi, raahula, nisiidana.m; yena andhavana.m tenupasa"nkamissaama divaavihaaraayaa''ti ^a^P3.0278^ea^. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho aayasmaa raahulo bhagavato pa.tissutvaa nisiidana.m aadaaya bhagavanta.m pi.t.thito pi.t.thito anubandhi.

[03] tena kho pana samayena anekaani devataasahassaani bhagavanta.m anubandhaani honti -- ``ajja bhagavaa aayasmanta.m raahula.m uttari.m aasavaana.m khaye vinessatii''ti. atha kho bhagavaa andhavana.m ajjhogaahetvaa a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. aayasmaapi kho raahulo bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho aayasmanta.m raahula.m bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] 417^b^.^eb^ ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, raahula, cakkhu nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti? ``anicca.m, bhante ^a^T3.0505^ea^''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vaa ta.m sukha.m vaa''ti? ``dukkha.m, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, kalla.m nu ta.m samanupassitu.m -- `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, raahula, ruupaa niccaa vaa aniccaa vaa''ti? ``aniccaa, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vaa ta.m sukha.m vaa''ti? ``dukkha.m, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, kalla.m nu ta.m ^a^V3.0335^ea^ samanupassitu.m -- `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, raahula, cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti? ``anicca.m, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vaa ta.m sukha.m vaa''ti? ``dukkha.m, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, kalla.m nu ta.m samanupassitu.m -- `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, raahula, cakkhusamphasso nicco vaa anicco vaa''ti? ``anicco, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m, dukkha.m vaa ta.m sukha.m vaa''ti? ``dukkha.m, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, kalla.m nu ta.m samanupassitu.m -- `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'''ti? ``no ^a^P3.0279^ea^ heta.m, bhante''. ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, raahula, yamida.m {yampida.m (sii0 ka0)} cakkhusamphassapaccayaa uppajjati ^a^T3.0506^ea^ vedanaagata.m sa~n~naagata.m sa"nkhaaragata.m vi~n~naa.nagata.m tampi nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti ^a^M3.0326^ea^? ``anicca.m, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m, dukkha.m vaa ta.m sukha.m vaa''ti? ``dukkha.m, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, kalla.m nu ta.m samanupassitu.m -- `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''.

[03] 418^b^.^eb^ ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi raahula, sota.m nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti? ``anicca.m, bhante...pe0... ghaana.m nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti? ``anicca.m, bhante...pe0... jivhaa niccaa vaa aniccaa vaa''ti? ``aniccaa, bhante...pe0... kaayo nicco vaa anicco vaa''ti? ``anicco, bhante...pe0... mano nicco vaa anicco vaa''ti? ``anicco, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m, dukkha.m vaa ta.m sukha.m vaa''ti? ``dukkha.m, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, kalla.m nu ta.m samanupassitu.m --`eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi raahula, manosamphasso nicco vaa anicco vaa''ti? ``anicco, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m, dukkha.m vaa ta.m sukha.m vaa''ti? ``dukkha.m, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, kalla.m nu ta.m samanupassitu.m -- `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, raahula, yamida.m manosamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedanaagata.m sa~n~naagata.m sa"nkhaaragata.m vi~n~naa.nagata.m, tampi nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti? ``anicca.m, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m, dukkha.m vaa ta.m sukha.m vaa''ti? ``dukkha.m, bhante''. ``ya.m ^a^V3.0336^ea^ panaanicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma.m kalla.m nu ta.m samanupassitu.m -- `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''.

[03] 419^b^.^eb^ ``eva.m passa.m, raahula, sutavaa ariyasaavako cakkhusmi.m {cakkhusmimpi (syaa0 ka.m0) evamitaresupi} nibbindati, ruupesu nibbindati, cakkhuvi~n~naa.ne nibbindati, cakkhusamphasse nibbindati, yamida.m cakkhusamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedanaagata.m sa~n~naagata.m sa"nkhaaragata.m vi~n~naa.nagata.m tasmimpi nibbindati. sotasmi.m ^a^T3.0508^ea^ nibbindati, saddesu nibbindati...pe0... ^a^M3.0327^ea^, ghaanasmi.m nibbindati, gandhesu nibbindati... jivhaaya nibbindati, rasesu nibbindati... kaayasmi.m nibbindati, pho.t.thabbesu nibbindati... manasmi.m nibbindati, dhammesu nibbindati, manovi~n~naa.ne nibbindati, manosamphasse nibbindati, yamida.m manosamphassapaccayaa ^a^P3.0280^ea^ uppajjati vedanaagata.m sa~n~naagata.m sa"nkhaaragata.m vi~n~naa.nagata.m tasmimpi nibbindati. nibbinda.m virajjati, viraagaa vimuccati. vimuttasmi.m vimuttamiti ~naa.na.m hoti. `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaatii''ti.

[01] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamano aayasmaa raahulo bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandiiti. imasmi~nca pana veyyaakara.nasmi.m bha~n~namaane aayasmato raahulassa anupaadaaya aasavehi citta.m vimucci. taasa~nca anekaana.m devataasahassaana.m viraja.m viitamala.m dhammacakkhu.m udapaadi -- `ya.m ki~nci samudayadhamma.m sabba.m ta.m nirodhadhamma''nti.
[06] cuu.laraahulovaadasutta.m ni.t.thita.m pa~ncama.m.

[03] 420^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T3.0509^ea^ ^a^V3.0337^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``dhamma.m vo, bhikkhave, desessaami aadikalyaa.na.m majjhekalyaa.na.m pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m saattha.m sabya~njana.m, kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m pakaasessaami, yadida.m -- cha chakkaani. ta.m su.naatha, saadhuka.m manasi karotha; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``cha ajjhattikaani aayatanaani veditabbaani, cha baahiraani aayatanaani veditabbaani, cha vi~n~naa.nakaayaa veditabbaa, cha phassakaayaa veditabbaa, cha vedanaakaayaa veditabbaa, cha ta.nhaakaayaa veditabbaa.

[03] 421^b^.^eb^ ```cha ajjhattikaani aayatanaani veditabbaanii'ti -- iti kho paneta.m vutta.m. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? cakkhaayatana.m, sotaayatana.m, ghaanaayatana.m, jivhaayatana.m ^a^M3.0328^ea^, kaayaayatana.m, manaayatana.m. `cha ajjhattikaani aayatanaani veditabbaanii'ti -- iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m, idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m. ida.m pa.thama.m chakka.m.

[03] ```cha ^a^P3.0281^ea^ baahiraani aayatanaani veditabbaanii'ti -- iti kho paneta.m vutta.m ^a^T3.0510^ea^. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? ruupaayatana.m, saddaayatana.m, gandhaayatana.m, rasaayatana.m, pho.t.thabbaayatana.m, dhammaayatana.m. `cha baahiraani aayatanaani veditabbaanii'ti -- iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m, idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m. ida.m dutiya.m chakka.m.

[03] ```cha vi~n~naa.nakaayaa veditabbaa'ti -- iti kho paneta.m vutta.m. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? cakkhu~nca pa.ticca ruupe ca uppajjati cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m, sota~nca pa.ticca sadde ca uppajjati ^a^V3.0338^ea^ sotavi~n~naa.na.m, ghaana~nca pa.ticca gandhe ca uppajjati ghaanavi~n~naa.na.m, jivha~nca pa.ticca rase ca uppajjati jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m, kaaya~nca pa.ticca pho.t.thabbe ca uppajjati kaayavi~n~naa.na.m, mana~nca pa.ticca dhamme ca uppajjati manovi~n~naa.na.m. `cha vi~n~naa.nakaayaa veditabbaa'ti -- iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m, idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m. ida.m tatiya.m chakka.m.

[03] ```cha phassakaayaa veditabbaa'ti -- iti kho paneta.m vutta.m. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? cakkhu~nca pa.ticca ruupe ca uppajjati cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m, ti.n.na.m sa"ngati phasso; sota~nca pa.ticca sadde ca uppajjati sotavi~n~naa.na.m, ti.n.na.m sa"ngati phasso; ghaana~nca pa.ticca gandhe ca uppajjati ghaanavi~n~naa.na.m, ti.n.na.m sa"ngati phasso; jivha~nca pa.ticca rase ca uppajjati jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m, ti.n.na.m sa"ngati phasso; kaaya~nca pa.ticca pho.t.thabbe ca uppajjati kaayavi~n~naa.na.m, ti.n.na.m sa"ngati phasso; mana~nca pa.ticca dhamme ca ^a^T3.0511^ea^ uppajjati manovi~n~naa.na.m, ti.n.na.m sa"ngati phasso. `cha phassakaayaa veditabbaa'ti -- iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m, idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m. ida.m catuttha.m chakka.m.

[03] ```cha vedanaakaayaa veditabbaa'ti -- iti kho paneta.m vutta.m. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? cakkhu~nca pa.ticca ruupe ca uppajjati cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m, ti.n.na.m sa"ngati phasso, phassapaccayaa vedanaa; sota~nca pa.ticca sadde ca uppajjati sotavi~n~naa.na.m, ti.n.na.m sa"ngati phasso, phassapaccayaa vedanaa; ghaana~nca pa.ticca gandhe ca uppajjati ghaanavi~n~naa.na.m, ti.n.na.m sa"ngati phasso, phassapaccayaa vedanaa; jivha~nca pa.ticca rase ca uppajjati jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m, ti.n.na.m sa"ngati phasso, phassapaccayaa vedanaa; kaaya~nca pa.ticca pho.t.thabbe ca uppajjati kaayavi~n~naa.na.m, ti.n.na.m sa"ngati phasso, phassapaccayaa ^a^M3.0329^ea^ vedanaa; mana~nca pa.ticca dhamme ^a^T3.0512^ea^ ca uppajjati manovi~n~naa.na.m, ti.n.na.m sa"ngati phasso, phassapaccayaa vedanaa. `cha vedanaakaayaa veditabbaa'ti -- iti ya.m ta.m ^a^P3.0282^ea^ vutta.m, idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m. ida.m pa~ncama.m chakka.m.

[03] ```cha ta.nhaakaayaa veditabbaa'ti -- iti kho paneta.m vutta.m. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? cakkhu~nca pa.ticca ruupe ca uppajjati cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m, ti.n.na.m sa"ngati phasso, phassapaccayaa vedanaa, vedanaapaccayaa ta.nhaa; sota~nca pa.ticca sadde ca uppajjati sotavi~n~naa.na.m...pe0... ghaana~nca pa.ticca gandhe ca uppajjati ghaanavi~n~naa.na.m... jivha~nca pa.ticca rase ca uppajjati ^a^V3.0339^ea^ jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m... kaaya~nca pa.ticca pho.t.thabbe ca uppajjati kaayavi~n~naa.na.m... mana~nca pa.ticca dhamme ca uppajjati manovi~n~naa.na.m, ti.n.na.m sa"ngati phasso, phassapaccayaa vedanaa, vedanaapaccayaa ta.nhaa. `cha ta.nhaakaayaa veditabbaa'ti -- iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m, idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m. ida.m cha.t.tha.m chakka.m.

[03] 422^b^.^eb^ ```cakkhu attaa'ti yo vadeyya ta.m na upapajjati. cakkhussa uppaadopi vayopi pa~n~naayati. yassa kho pana uppaadopi vayopi pa~n~naayati, `attaa me uppajjati ca veti caa'ti iccassa evamaagata.m hoti. tasmaa ta.m na upapajjati -- `cakkhu attaa'ti yo vadeyya. iti cakkhu anattaa.

[03] ```ruupaa attaa'ti yo vadeyya ta.m na upapajjati. ruupaana.m uppaadopi vayopi pa~n~naayati. yassa kho pana uppaadopi vayopi pa~n~naayati, `attaa me uppajjati ca veti caa'ti iccassa evamaagata.m hoti. tasmaa ta.m na upapajjati -- `ruupaa attaa'ti yo vadeyya. iti cakkhu anattaa, ruupaa anattaa.

[03] ```cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m attaa'ti yo vadeyya ta.m na upapajjati. cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa uppaadopi vayopi pa~n~naayati. yassa kho pana uppaadopi vayopi pa~n~naayati, `attaa me uppajjati ca veti caa'ti iccassa evamaagata.m hoti. tasmaa ta.m na upapajjati -- `cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m attaa'ti yo vadeyya. iti cakkhu anattaa, ruupaa anattaa, cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m anattaa.

[03] ```cakkhusamphasso attaa'ti yo vadeyya ta.m na upapajjati. cakkhusamphassassa uppaadopi vayopi pa~n~naayati ^a^T3.0513^ea^. yassa kho pana uppaadopi vayopi pa~n~naayati, `attaa me uppajjati ca veti caa'ti iccassa evamaagata.m hoti. tasmaa ta.m na upapajjati -- `cakkhusamphasso attaa'ti yo ^a^M3.0330^ea^ vadeyya. iti cakkhu anattaa, ruupaa anattaa, cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m anattaa, cakkhusamphasso anattaa.

[03] ```vedanaa ^a^V3.0340^ea^ attaa'ti yo vadeyya ta.m ^a^P3.0283^ea^ na upapajjati. vedanaaya uppaadopi vayopi pa~n~naayati. yassa kho pana uppaadopi vayopi pa~n~naayati, `attaa me uppajjati ca veti caa'ti iccassa evamaagata.m hoti. tasmaa ta.m na upapajjati -- `vedanaa attaa'ti yo vadeyya. iti cakkhu anattaa, ruupaa anattaa, cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m anattaa, cakkhusamphasso anattaa, vedanaa anattaa.

[03] ```ta.nhaa attaa'ti yo vadeyya ta.m na upapajjati. ta.nhaaya uppaadopi vayopi pa~n~naayati. yassa kho pana uppaadopi vayopi pa~n~naayati, `attaa me uppajjati ca veti caa'ti iccassa evamaagata.m hoti. tasmaa ta.m na upapajjati -- `ta.nhaa attaa'ti yo vadeyya. iti cakkhu anattaa, ruupaa anattaa, cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m anattaa, cakkhusamphasso anattaa, vedanaa anattaa, ta.nhaa anattaa.

[03] 423^b^.^eb^ ```sota.m attaa'ti yo vadeyya...pe0... `ghaana.m attaa'ti yo vadeyya... `jivhaa attaa'ti yo vadeyya... `kaayo attaa'ti yo vadeyya... `mano attaa'ti yo vadeyya ta.m na upapajjati. manassa uppaadopi vayopi pa~n~naayati. yassa kho pana uppaadopi vayopi ^a^T3.0514^ea^ pa~n~naayati, `attaa me uppajjati ca veti caa'ti iccassa evamaagata.m hoti. tasmaa ta.m na upapajjati -- `mano attaa'ti yo vadeyya. iti mano anattaa.

[03] ```dhammaa attaa'ti yo vadeyya ta.m na upapajjati. dhammaana.m uppaadopi vayopi pa~n~naayati. yassa kho pana uppaadopi vayopi pa~n~naayati, `attaa me uppajjati ca veti caa'ti iccassa evamaagata.m hoti. tasmaa ta.m na upapajjati -- `dhammaa attaa'ti yo vadeyya. iti mano anattaa, dhammaa anattaa.

[03] ```manovi~n~naa.na.m attaa'ti yo vadeyya ta.m na upapajjati. manovi~n~naa.nassa uppaadopi vayopi pa~n~naayati. yassa kho pana uppaadopi vayopi pa~n~naayati, `attaa me uppajjati ca veti caa'ti iccassa evamaagata.m hoti. tasmaa ta.m na upapajjati -- `manovi~n~naa.na.m attaa'ti ^a^M3.0331^ea^ yo vadeyya. iti mano anattaa, dhammaa anattaa, manovi~n~naa.na.m anattaa.

[01] ```manosamphasso ^a^V3.0341^ea^ attaa'ti yo vadeyya ta.m na upapajjati. manosamphassassa uppaadopi vayopi pa~n~naayati. yassa kho pana uppaadopi vayopi pa~n~naayati, `attaa me uppajjati ca veti caa'ti iccassa evamaagata.m hoti. tasmaa ta.m na upapajjati -- `manosamphasso attaa'ti yo vadeyya. iti mano anattaa, dhammaa anattaa, manovi~n~naa.na.m anattaa, manosamphasso anattaa.

[01] ```vedanaa attaa'ti yo vadeyya ta.m na upapajjati. vedanaaya uppaadopi vayopi pa~n~naayati. yassa kho ^a^T3.0515^ea^ pana uppaadopi ^a^P3.0284^ea^ vayopi pa~n~naayati, `attaa me uppajjati ca veti caa'ti iccassa evamaagata.m hoti. tasmaa ta.m na upapajjati -- `vedanaa attaa'ti yo vadeyya. iti mano anattaa, dhammaa anattaa, manovi~n~naa.na.m anattaa, manosamphasso anattaa, vedanaa anattaa.

[01] ```ta.nhaa attaa'ti yo vadeyya ta.m na upapajjati. ta.nhaaya uppaadopi vayopi pa~n~naayati. yassa kho pana uppaadopi vayopi pa~n~naayati, `attaa me uppajjati ca veti caa'ti iccassa evamaagata.m hoti. tasmaa ta.m na upapajjati -- `ta.nhaa attaa'ti yo vadeyya. iti mano anattaa, dhammaa anattaa, manovi~n~naa.na.m anattaa, manosamphasso anattaa, vedanaa anattaa, ta.nhaa anattaa.

[03] 424^b^.^eb^ ``aya.m kho pana, bhikkhave, sakkaayasamudayagaaminii pa.tipadaa -- cakkhu.m `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'ti samanupassati; ruupe `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'ti samanupassati; cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'ti samanupassati; cakkhusamphassa.m `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'ti samanupassati; vedana.m `eta.m mama ^a^T3.0516^ea^, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'ti samanupassati; ta.nha.m `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'ti samanupassati; sota.m `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'ti samanupassati...pe0... ghaana.m `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'ti samanupassati...pe0... jivha.m `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'ti ^a^M3.0332^ea^ samanupassati...pe0... kaaya.m `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'ti samanupassati...pe0... mana.m `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'ti samanupassati, dhamme `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'ti samanupassati, manovi~n~naa.na.m `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'ti samanupassati, manosamphassa.m `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'ti samanupassati, vedana.m `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'ti samanupassati, ta.nha.m `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'ti samanupassati.

[01] ``aya.m ^a^V3.0342^ea^ kho pana, bhikkhave, sakkaayanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa -- cakkhu.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti samanupassati. ruupe `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti samanupassati. cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti samanupassati. cakkhusamphassa.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti samanupassati. vedana.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti samanupassati. ta.nha.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti samanupassati. sota.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti samanupassati...pe0... ghaana.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti samanupassati... jivha.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti samanupassati... kaaya.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti samanupassati... mana.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti samanupassati. dhamme `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti samanupassati. manovi~n~naa.na.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti samanupassati. manosamphassa.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti samanupassati. vedana.m `neta.m ^a^P3.0285^ea^ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti samanupassati. ta.nha.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti samanupassati.

[03] 425^b^.^eb^ ``cakkhu~nca, bhikkhave, pa.ticca ruupe ca uppajjati cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m, ti.n.na.m sa"ngati ^a^V3.0343^ea^ phasso, phassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m ^a^T3.0517^ea^ vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa. so sukhaaya vedanaaya phu.t.tho samaano abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosaaya ti.t.thati. tassa raagaanusayo anuseti. dukkhaaya vedanaaya phu.t.tho samaano socati kilamati paridevati urattaa.li.m ^a^M3.0333^ea^ kandati sammoha.m aapajjati. tassa pa.tighaanusayo anuseti. adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya phu.t.tho samaano tassaa vedanaaya samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca assaada~nca aadiinava~nca nissara.na~nca yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati. tassa avijjaanusayo anuseti. so vata, bhikkhave, sukhaaya vedanaaya raagaanusaya.m appahaaya dukkhaaya vedanaaya pa.tighaanusaya.m appa.tivinodetvaa adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya avijjaanusaya.m asamuuhanitvaa avijja.m appahaaya vijja.m anuppaadetvaa di.t.theva dhamme dukkhassantakaro bhavissatiiti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati.

[03] ``sota~nca, bhikkhave, pa.ticca sadde ca uppajjati sotavi~n~naa.na.m...pe0... ghaana~nca, bhikkhave, pa.ticca gandhe ca uppajjati ghaanavi~n~naa.na.m...pe0... jivha~nca, bhikkhave, pa.ticca rase ca uppajjati jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m...pe0... kaaya~nca, bhikkhave, pa.ticca pho.t.thabbe ca uppajjati kaayavi~n~naa.na.m...pe0... mana~nca, bhikkhave, pa.ticca dhamme ca uppajjati manovi~n~naa.na.m, ti.n.na.m sa"ngati phasso, phassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa. so sukhaaya vedanaaya phu.t.tho samaano abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosaaya ti.t.thati. tassa raagaanusayo anuseti. dukkhaaya vedanaaya phu.t.tho samaano socati kilamati paridevati urattaa.li.m ^a^T3.0518^ea^ kandati sammoha.m aapajjati. tassa pa.tighaanusayo anuseti. adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya phu.t.tho samaano tassaa vedanaaya samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca assaada~nca aadiinava~nca nissara.na~nca yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati. tassa avijjaanusayo anuseti. so vata, bhikkhave, sukhaaya vedanaaya raagaanusaya.m appahaaya dukkhaaya vedanaaya pa.tighaanusaya.m appa.tivinodetvaa adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya avijjaanusaya.m asamuuhanitvaa avijja.m appahaaya vijja.m anuppaadetvaa di.t.theva dhamme dukkhassantakaro bhavissatiiti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati.

[03] 426^b^.^eb^ ``cakkhu~nca ^a^P3.0286^ea^, bhikkhave, pa.ticca ruupe ca uppajjati cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m, ti.n.na.m sa"ngati phasso, phassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa. so sukhaaya vedanaaya phu.t.tho samaano naabhinandati naabhivadati naajjhosaaya ti.t.thati. tassa raagaanusayo naanuseti. dukkhaaya vedanaaya phu.t.tho samaano na socati na kilamati paridevati na urattaa.li.m kandati ^a^V3.0344^ea^ na sammoha.m aapajjati. tassa pa.tighaanusayo naanuseti. adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya phu.t.tho samaano tassaa ^a^M3.0334^ea^ vedanaaya samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca assaada~nca aadiinava~nca nissara.na~nca yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. tassa avijjaanusayo naanuseti. so vata, bhikkhave, sukhaaya vedanaaya raagaanusaya.m pahaaya dukkhaaya vedanaaya pa.tighaanusaya.m pa.tivinodetvaa adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya avijjaanusaya.m samuuhanitvaa avijja.m pahaaya vijja.m uppaadetvaa di.t.theva dhamme ^a^T3.0519^ea^ dukkhassantakaro bhavissatiiti -- .thaanameta.m vijjati.

[03] 427^b^.^eb^ ``eva.m passa.m, bhikkhave, sutavaa ariyasaavako cakkhusmi.m {cakkhusmimpi (syaa0 ka.m0) evamitaresupi} nibbindati, ruupesu nibbindati, cakkhuvi~n~naa.ne nibbindati, cakkhusamphasse ^a^T3.0520^ea^ nibbindati, vedanaaya nibbindati, ta.nhaaya nibbindati. sotasmi.m nibbindati, saddesu nibbindati...pe0... ^a^V3.0346^ea^ ghaanasmi.m nibbindati, gandhesu nibbindati... jivhaaya nibbindati, rasesu nibbindati... kaayasmi.m nibbindati, pho.t.thabbesu nibbindati... manasmi.m nibbindati, dhammesu nibbindati, manovi~n~naa.ne nibbindati, manosamphasse nibbindati, vedanaaya nibbindati, ta.nhaaya nibbindati. nibbinda.m virajjati ^a^P3.0287^ea^, viraagaa vimuccati. vimuttasmi.m vimuttamiti ~naa.na.m ^a^M3.0335^ea^ hoti. `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaatii''ti.

[03] 428^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T3.0521^ea^ ^a^V3.0347^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``mahaasa.laayatanika.m vo, bhikkhave, desessaami. ta.m su.naatha, saadhuka.m manasi karotha; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] 429^b^.^eb^ ``cakkhu.m, bhikkhave, ajaana.m apassa.m yathaabhuuta.m, ruupe ajaana.m apassa.m yathaabhuuta.m, cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m ajaana.m apassa.m yathaabhuuta.m, cakkhusamphassa.m ajaana.m apassa.m yathaabhuuta.m, yamida.m cakkhusamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tampi ajaana.m apassa.m yathaabhuuta.m, cakkhusmi.m saarajjati, ruupesu saarajjati, cakkhuvi~n~naa.ne saarajjati, cakkhusamphasse saarajjati, yamida.m cakkhusamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tasmimpi saarajjati.

[03] ``tassa saarattassa sa.myuttassa sammuu.lhassa assaadaanupassino viharato aayati.m pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhaa upacaya.m gacchanti. ta.nhaa cassa ponobbhavikaa nandiiraagasahagataa tatratatraabhinandinii, saa cassa pava.d.dhati. tassa kaayikaapi darathaa pava.d.dhanti, cetasikaapi ^a^P3.0288^ea^ darathaa pava.d.dhanti; kaayikaapi santaapaa pava.d.dhanti ^a^T3.0522^ea^, cetasikaapi santaapaa pava.d.dhanti; kaayikaapi pari.laahaa pava.d.dhanti, cetasikaapi pari.laahaa pava.d.dhanti. so kaayadukkhampi {kaayikadukkhampi (syaa0 ka.m0), kaayika.m dukkhampi (ka0)} cetodukkhampi pa.tisa.mvedeti.

[03] ``sota.m ^a^M3.0336^ea^, bhikkhave, ajaana.m apassa.m yathaabhuuta.m...pe0... ghaana.m, bhikkhave, ajaana.m apassa.m yathaabhuuta.m...pe0... jivha.m, bhikkhave, ajaana.m apassa.m yathaabhuuta.m...pe0... kaaya.m, bhikkhave, ajaana.m apassa.m yathaabhuuta.m...pe0... mana.m, bhikkhave, ajaana.m apassa.m yathaabhuuta.m, dhamme, bhikkhave, ajaana.m apassa.m yathaabhuuta.m, manovi~n~naa.na.m, bhikkhave, ajaana.m apassa.m yathaabhuuta.m ^a^V3.0348^ea^, manosamphassa.m, bhikkhave, ajaana.m apassa.m yathaabhuuta.m, yamida.m manosamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tampi ajaana.m apassa.m yathaabhuuta.m, manasmi.m saarajjati, dhammesu saarajjati, manovi~n~naa.ne saarajjati, manosamphasse saarajjati, yamida.m manosamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tasmimpi saarajjati.

[03] ``tassa ^a^T3.0524^ea^ eva.m ima.m ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bhaavayato cattaaropi satipa.t.thaanaa bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchanti, cattaaropi sammappadhaanaa bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchanti, cattaaropi iddhipaadaa bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchanti, pa~ncapi indriyaani bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchanti, pa~ncapi balaani bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchanti, sattapi bojjha"ngaa bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchanti.
